analyzed: vālmīki rāmāyaṇa
kiṣkindhākāṇḍa
sa tām puṣkariṇīm gatvā padma utpala jhaṣa ākulām
rāmaḥ saumitri sahitaḥ vilalāpa ākula indriyaḥ

original: 4.001.002a tasya dṛṣṭvaiva tāṃ harṣād indriyāṇi cakampire
analyzed: tasya dṛṣṭvā eva tām harṣāt indriyāṇi cakampire

original: 4.001.002c sa kāmavaśam āpannaḥ saumitrim idam abravīt
analyzed: sa kāma vaśam āpannaḥ saumitrim idam abravīt
saumitre paśya pampāyāḥ kānanam śubha darśanam

original: 4.001.003c yatra rājanti śailābhā drumāḥ saśikharā iva
analyzed: yatra rājanti śaila ābhāḥ drumāḥ sa śikharāḥ iva

original: 4.001.004a māṃ tu śokābhisaṃtaptam ādhayaḥ pīḍayanti vai
analyzed: mām tu śoka abhisaṃtaptam ādhayaḥ pīḍayanti vai

original: 4.001.004c bharatasya ca duḥkhena vaidehyā haraṇena ca
analyzed: bharatasya ca duḥkhena vaidehyāḥ haraṇena ca

original: 4.001.005a adhikaṃ pravibhāty etan nīlapītaṃ tu śādvalam
analyzed: adhikam pravibhāti etat nīla pītam tu śādvalam
drumāṇām vividhaiḥ puṣpaiḥ paristomaiḥ iva arpitam
sukha anilaḥ yam saumitre kālaḥ pracura manmathaḥ
gandhavān surabhiḥ māsaḥ jāta puṣpa phala drumaḥ
paśya rūpāṇi saumitre vanānām puṣpa śālinām
sṛjatām puṣpa varṣāṇi varṣam toyamucām iva
prastareṣu ca ramyeṣu vividhāḥ kānana drumāḥ
vāyu vega pracalitāḥ puṣpaiḥ avakiranti gām
mārutaḥ sukham saṃsparśe vāti candana śītalaḥ
ṣaṭpadaiḥ anukūjadbhiḥ vaneṣu madhu gandhiṣu
giri prastheṣu ramyeṣu puṣpavadbhiḥ manoramaiḥ
saṃsakta śikharā śailāḥ virājanti mahā drumaiḥ
puṣpita agrān ca paśya imān karṇikārān samantataḥ
hāṭaka pratisaṃchannān narān pīta ambarān iva
ayam vasantaḥ saumitre nānā vihaga nāditaḥ
sītayā viprahīṇasya śoka saṃdīpanaḥ mama
mām hi śoka samākrāntam saṃtāpayati manmathaḥ
hṛṣṭaḥ pravadamānaḥ ca samāhvayati kokilaḥ

original: 4.001.014a eṣa dātyūhako hṛṣṭo ramye māṃ vananirjhare
analyzed: eṣa dātyūhakaḥ hṛṣṭaḥ ramye mām vana nirjhare
praṇadan manmatha āviṣṭam śocayiṣyati lakṣmaṇa
vimiśrāḥ vihagāḥ pumbhiḥ ātma vyūha abhinanditāḥ
bhṛṅgarāja pramuditāḥ saumitre madhura svarāḥ
mām hi sā mṛgaśāvākṣī cintā śoka balātkṛtam
saṃtāpayati saumitre krūraḥ caitra vana anilaḥ
śikhinībhiḥ parivṛtāḥ mayūrāḥ giri sānuṣu
manmatha abhiparītasya mama manmatha vardhanāḥ
paśya lakṣṇama nṛtyantam mayūram upanṛtyati
śikhinī manmatha ārtā eṣā bhartāram giri sānuṣu

original: 4.001.019a mayūrasya vane nūnaṃ rakṣasā na hṛtā priyā
analyzed: mayūrasya vane nūnam rakṣasā na hṛtā priyā

original: 4.001.019c mama tv ayaṃ vinā vāsaḥ puṣpamāse suduḥsahaḥ
analyzed: mama tu ayam vinā vāsaḥ puṣpamāse su duḥsahaḥ

original: 4.001.020a paśya lakṣmaṇa puṣpāṇi niṣphalāni bhavanti me
analyzed: paśya lakṣmaṇa puṣpāṇi niṣphalāni bhavanti me
puṣpa bhāra samṛddhānām vanānām śiśirātyaye

original: 4.001.021a vadanti rāvaṃ muditāḥ śakunāḥ saṃghaśaḥ kalam
analyzed: vadanti rāvam muditāḥ śakunāḥ saṃghaśas kalam
āhvayantaḥ iva anyonyam kāma unmāda karāḥ mama

original: 4.001.022a nūnaṃ paravaśā sītā sāpi śocaty ahaṃ yathā
analyzed: nūnam paravaśā sītā sā api śocati aham yathā

original: 4.001.022c śyāmā padmapalāśākṣī mṛdubhāṣā ca me priyā
analyzed: śyāmā padma palāśa akṣī mṛdu bhāṣā ca me priyā
eṣa puṣpa vahaḥ vāyuḥ sukha sparśaḥ hima āvahaḥ
tām vicintayataḥ kāntām pāvaka pratimaḥ mama

original: 4.001.024a tāṃ vinātha vihaṃgo 'sau pakṣī praṇaditas tadā
analyzed: tām vinā atha vihaṃgo sau pakṣī praṇaditaḥ tadā
vāyasaḥ pādapa gataḥ prahṛṣṭam abhinardati

original: 4.001.025a eṣa vai tatra vaidehyā vihagaḥ pratihārakaḥ
analyzed: eṣa vai tatra vaidehyāḥ vihagaḥ pratihārakaḥ

original: 4.001.025c pakṣī māṃ tu viśālākṣyāḥ samīpam upaneṣyati
analyzed: pakṣī mām tu viśāla akṣyāḥ samīpam upaneṣyati
paśya lakṣmaṇa saṃnādam vane mada vivardhanam
puṣpita agreṣu vṛkṣeṣu dvijānām upakūjatām
saumitre paśya pampāyāḥ citrāsu vana rājiṣu
nalināni prakāśante jale taruṇa sūrya vat
eṣā prasanna salilā padma nīlotpala āyatā
cakravāka yutā nityam citra prastha vana antarā
mātaṅga mṛga yūthaiḥ ca śobhate salila arthibhiḥ
padma kośa palāśāni draṣṭum dṛṣṭiḥ hi manyate
sītāyāḥ netrakośābhyām sadṛśāni iti lakṣmaṇa
padma kesara saṃsṛṣṭaḥ vṛkṣa antara viniḥsṛtaḥ

original: 4.001.031c niḥśvāsa iva sītāyā vāti vāyur manoharaḥ
analyzed: niḥśvāsaḥ iva sītāyāḥ vāti vāyuḥ manoharaḥ
saumitre paśya pampāyāḥ dakṣiṇe giri sānuni
puṣpitām karṇikārasya yaṣṭim parama śobhanām
adhikam śaila rājaḥ yam dhātubhiḥ tu vibhūṣitaḥ
vicitram sṛjate reṇum vāyu vega vighaṭṭitam
giri prasthāḥ tu saumitre sarvatas saṃprapuṣpitaiḥ

original: 4.001.034c niṣpatraiḥ sarvato ramyaiḥ pradīpā iva kuṃśukaiḥ
analyzed: niṣpatraiḥ sarvatas ramyaiḥ pradīpāḥ iva kuṃśukaiḥ
pampā tīra ruhāḥ ca ime saṃsaktāḥ madhu gandhinaḥ
mālatī mallikā ṣaṇḍāḥ karavīrāḥ ca puṣpitāḥ

original: 4.001.036a ketakyaḥ sinduvārāś ca vāsantyaś ca supuṣpitāḥ
analyzed: ketakyaḥ sinduvārāḥ ca vāsantyaḥ ca su puṣpitāḥ

original: 4.001.036c mādhavyo gandhapūrṇāś ca kundagulmāś ca sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: mādhavyaḥ gandha pūrṇāḥ ca kunda gulmāḥ ca sarvaśas

original: 4.001.037a ciribilvā madhūkāś ca vañjulā bakulās tathā
analyzed: ciribilvāḥ madhūkāḥ ca vañjulāḥ bakulāḥ tathā

original: 4.001.037c campakās tilakāś caiva nāgavṛkṣāś ca puṣpitāḥ
analyzed: campakāḥ tilakāḥ ca eva nāgavṛkṣāḥ ca puṣpitāḥ

original: 4.001.038a nīpāś ca varaṇāś caiva kharjūrāś ca supuṣpitāḥ
analyzed: nīpāḥ ca varaṇāḥ ca eva kharjūrāḥ ca su puṣpitāḥ

original: 4.001.038c aṅkolāś ca kuraṇṭāś ca cūrṇakāḥ pāribhadrakāḥ
analyzed: aṅkolāḥ ca kuraṇṭāḥ ca cūrṇakāḥ pāribhadrakāḥ

original: 4.001.039a cūtāḥ pāṭalayaś caiva kovidārāś ca puṣpitāḥ
analyzed: cūtāḥ pāṭalayaḥ ca eva kovidārāḥ ca puṣpitāḥ
mucukunda arjunāḥ ca eva dṛśyante giri sānuṣu
ketaka uddālakāḥ ca eva śirīṣāḥ śiṃśapāḥ dhavāḥ

original: 4.001.040c śālmalyaḥ kiṃśukāś caiva raktāḥ kurabakās tathā
analyzed: śālmalyaḥ kiṃśukāḥ ca eva raktāḥ kurabakāḥ tathā

original: 4.001.040e tiniśā nakta mālāś ca candanāḥ syandanās tathā
analyzed: tiniśāḥ nakta mālāḥ ca candanāḥ syandanāḥ tathā

original: 4.001.041a vividhā vividhaiḥ puṣpais tair eva nagasānuṣu
analyzed: vividhāḥ vividhaiḥ puṣpaiḥ taiḥ eva naga sānuṣu
vikīrṇaiḥ pīta rakta ābhāḥ saumitre prastarāḥ kṛtāḥ
hima ante paśya saumitre vṛkṣāṇām puṣpa saṃbhavam

original: 4.001.042c puṣpamāse hi taravaḥ saṃgharṣād iva puṣpitāḥ
analyzed: puṣpa māse hi taravaḥ saṃgharṣāt iva puṣpitāḥ
paśya śīta jalām ca imām saumitre puṣkara āyutām
cakravāka anucaritām kāraṇḍava niṣevitām
plavaiḥ krauñcaiḥ ca saṃpūrṇām varāha mṛga sevitām
adhikam śobhate pampā vikūjadbhiḥ vihaṃgamaiḥ

original: 4.001.045a dīpayantīva me kāmaṃ vividhā muditā dvijāḥ
analyzed: dīpayanti iva me kāmam vividhāḥ muditāḥ dvijāḥ
śyāmām candra mukhīm smṛtvā priyām padma nibha īkṣaṇām

original: 4.001.046a paya sānuṣu citreṣu mṛgībhiḥ sahitān mṛgān
analyzed: paya sānuṣu citreṣu mṛgībhiḥ sahitān mṛgān
mām punar mṛgaśāvākṣyā vaidehyā virahīkṛtam
evam sa vilapan tatra śoka upahata cetanaḥ
avekṣata śivām pampām ramya vāri vahām śubhām
nirīkṣamāṇaḥ sahasā mahātmā
sarvam vanam nirjhara kandaram ca
udvigna cetāḥ saha lakṣmaṇena
vicārya duḥkha upahataḥ pratasthe
tau ṛṣyamūkam sahitau prayātau
sugrīva śākhāmṛga sevitam tam
trastāḥ tu dṛṣṭvā harayaḥ babhūvuḥ
mahā ojasau rāghava lakṣmaṇau tau

original: 4.002.001a tau tu dṛṣṭvā mahātmānau bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau
analyzed: tau tu dṛṣṭvā mahātmānau bhrātarau rāma lakṣmaṇau
vara āyudha dharau vīrau sugrīvaḥ śaṅkitaḥ bhavat
udvigna hṛdayaḥ sarvāḥ diśaḥ samavalokayan

original: 4.002.002c na vyatiṣṭhata kasmiṃś cid deśe vānarapuṃgavaḥ
analyzed: na vyatiṣṭhata kasmin cit deśe vānara puṃgavaḥ

original: 4.002.003a naiva cakre manaḥ sthāne vīkṣamāṇo mahābalau
analyzed: na eva cakre manaḥ sthāne vīkṣamāṇaḥ mahā balau
kapeḥ param abhītasya cittam vyavasasāda ha
cintayitvā sa dharma ātmā vimṛśya gurulāghavam
sugrīvaḥ parama udvignaḥ sarvaiḥ anucaraiḥ saha

original: 4.002.005a tataḥ sa sacivebhyas tu sugrīvaḥ plavagādhipaḥ
analyzed: tatas sa sacivebhyaḥ tu sugrīvaḥ plavaga adhipaḥ
śaśaṃsa parama udvignaḥ paśyan tau rāma lakṣmaṇau

original: 4.002.006a etau vanam idaṃ durgaṃ vālipraṇihitau dhruvam
analyzed: etau vanam idam durgam vāli praṇihitau dhruvam
chadmanā cīra vasanau pracarantau iha āgatau
tatas sugrīva sacivāḥ dṛṣṭvā parama dhanvinau

original: 4.002.007c jagmur giritaṭāt tasmād anyac chikharam uttamam
analyzed: jagmuḥ giri taṭāt tasmāt anyat śikharam uttamam
te kṣipram abhigamya atha yūthapāḥ yūthapa ṛṣabham
harayaḥ vānara śreṣṭham parivārya upatasthire
ekam ekāyana gatāḥ plavamānāḥ gireḥ girim
prakampayantaḥ vegena girīṇām śikharāṇi ca
tatas śākhāmṛgāḥ sarve plavamānāḥ mahā balāḥ

original: 4.002.010c babhañjuś ca nagāṃs tatra puṣpitān durgasaṃśritān
analyzed: babhañjuḥ ca nagān tatra puṣpitān durga saṃśritān
āplavantaḥ hari varāḥ sarvatas tam mahā girim
mṛga mārjāra śārdūlān trāsayantaḥ yayuḥ tadā
tatas sugrīva sacivāḥ parvata indram samāśritāḥ
saṃgamya kapi mukhyena sarve prāñjalayaḥ sthitāḥ
tatas tam bhaya saṃtrastam vāli kilbiṣa śaṅkitam
uvāca hanumān vākyam sugrīvam vākya kovidaḥ
yasmāt udvigna cetāḥ tvam pradrutaḥ hari puṃgava

original: 4.002.014c taṃ krūradarśanaṃ krūraṃ neha paśyāmi vālinam
analyzed: tam krūra darśanam krūram na iha paśyāmi vālinam

original: 4.002.015a yasmāt tava bhayaṃ saumya pūrvajāt pāpakarmaṇaḥ
analyzed: yasmāt tava bhayam saumya pūrvajāt pāpa karmaṇaḥ

original: 4.002.015c sa neha vālī duṣṭātmā na te paśyāmy ahaṃ bhayam
analyzed: sa nā iha vālī duṣṭa ātmā na te paśyāmi aham bhayam

original: 4.002.016a aho śākhāmṛgatvaṃ te vyaktam eva plavaṃgama
analyzed: aho śākhāmṛga tvam te vyaktam eva plavaṃgama
laghucittatayā ātmānam na sthāpayasi yaḥ matau
buddhi vijñāna saṃpannaḥ iṅgitaiḥ sarvam ācara

original: 4.002.017c na hy abuddhiṃ gato rājā sarvabhūtāni śāsti hi
analyzed: na hi abuddhim gataḥ rājā sarva bhūtāni śāsti hi

original: 4.002.018a sugrīvas tu śubhaṃ vākyaṃ śrutvā sarvaṃ hanūmataḥ
analyzed: sugrīvaḥ tu śubham vākyam śrutvā sarvam hanūmataḥ

original: 4.002.018c tataḥ śubhataraṃ vākyaṃ hanūmantam uvāca ha
analyzed: tatas śubhataram vākyam hanūmantam uvāca ha
dīrgha bāhū viśāla akṣau śara cāpa asi dhāriṇau

original: 4.002.019c kasya na syād bhayaṃ dṛṣṭvā etau surasutopamau
analyzed: kasya na syāt bhayam dṛṣṭvā etau sura suta upamau
vāli praṇihitau etau śaṅke ham puruṣa uttamau

original: 4.002.020c rājāno bahumitrāś ca viśvāso nātra hi kṣamaḥ
analyzed: rājānaḥ bahu mitrāḥ ca viśvāsaḥ na atra hi kṣamaḥ
arayaḥ ca manuṣyeṇa vijñeyāḥ channa cāriṇaḥ
viśvastānām aviśvastāḥ chidreṣu praharanti hi
kṛtyeṣu vālī medhāvī rājānaḥ bahu darśanāḥ

original: 4.002.022c bhavanti parahantāras te jñeyāḥ prākṛtair naraiḥ
analyzed: bhavanti para hantāraḥ te jñeyāḥ prākṛtaiḥ naraiḥ

original: 4.002.023a tau tvayā prākṛtenaiva gatvā jñeyau plavaṃgama
analyzed: tau tvayā prākṛtena eva gatvā jñeyau plavaṃgama
śaṅkitānām prakāraiḥ ca rūpa vyābhāṣaṇena ca
lakṣayasva tayoḥ bhāvam prahṛṣṭa manasau yadi

original: 4.002.024c viśvāsayan praśaṃsābhir iṅgitaiś ca punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: viśvāsayan praśaṃsābhiḥ iṅgitaiḥ ca punar punar
mama eva abhimukham sthitvā pṛccha tvam hari puṃgava
prayojanam praveśasya vanasya asya dhanuḥ dharau

original: 4.002.026a śuddhātmānau yadi tv etau jānīhi tvaṃ plavaṃgama
analyzed: śuddha ātmānau yadi tu etau jānīhi tvam plavaṃgama

original: 4.002.026c vyābhāṣitair vā rūpair vā vijñeyā duṣṭatānayoḥ
analyzed: vyābhāṣitaiḥ vā rūpaiḥ vā vijñeyā duṣṭa tā anayoḥ
iti evam kapi rājena saṃdiṣṭaḥ mārutātmajaḥ

original: 4.002.027c cakāra gamane buddhiṃ yatra tau rāmalakṣmaṇau
analyzed: cakāra gamane buddhim yatra tau rāma lakṣmaṇau
tathā iti saṃpūjya vacaḥ tu tasya
kapeḥ subhītasya durāsadasya
mahā anubhāvaḥ hanumān yayau tadā
sa yatra ca lakṣmaṇaḥ
vacaḥ vijñāya hanumān sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 4.003.001c parvatād ṛśyamūkāt tu pupluve yatra rāghavau
analyzed: parvatāt ṛśyamūkāt tu pupluve yatra rāghavau

original: 4.003.002a sa tatra gatvā hanumān balavān vānarottamaḥ
analyzed: sa tatra gatvā hanumān balavān vānara uttamaḥ
upacakrāma tau vāgbhiḥ mṛdvībhiḥ satya vikramaḥ
svakam rūpam parityajya bhikṣu rūpeṇa vānaraḥ

original: 4.003.003c ābabhāṣe ca tau vīrau yathāvat praśaśaṃsa ca
analyzed: ābabhāṣe ca tau vīrau yathāvat praśaśaṃsa ca
rājarṣi deva pratimau tāpasau saṃśita vratau

original: 4.003.004c deśaṃ katham imaṃ prāptau bhavantau varavarṇinau
analyzed: deśam katham imam prāptau bhavantau vara varṇinau
trāsayantau mṛga gaṇān anyān ca vana cāriṇaḥ
pampā tīra ruhān vṛkṣān vīkṣamāṇau samantataḥ
imām nadīm śubha jalām śobhayantau tarasvinau
dhairyavantau suvarṇa ābhau kau yuvām cīra vāsasau
siṃha viprekṣitau vīrau siṃha ati bala vikramau
śakra cāpa nibhe cāpe pragṛhya vipulaiḥ bhujaiḥ
śrīmantau rūpa saṃpannau vṛṣabha śreṣṭha vikramau
hasti hasta upama bhujau dyutimantau nara ṛṣabhau
prabhayā parvata indraḥ yam yuvayoḥ avabhāsitaḥ
rājya arhau amara prakhyau katham deśam iha āgatau
padma patra īkṣaṇau vīrau jaṭā maṇḍala dhāriṇau
anyonya sadṛśau vīrau deva lokāt iva āgatau
yadṛcchayā iva saṃprāptau candra sūryau vasuṃdharām
viśāla vakṣasau vīrau mānuṣau deva rūpiṇau
siṃha skandhau mahāsattvau sa madau iva go vṛṣau

original: 4.003.012c āyatāś ca suvṛttāś ca bāhavaḥ parighottamāḥ
analyzed: āyatāḥ ca su vṛttāḥ ca bāhavaḥ parigha uttamāḥ
sarva bhūṣaṇa bhūṣā arhāḥ kim artham na vibhūṣitaḥ

original: 4.003.013a ubhau yogyāv ahaṃ manye rakṣituṃ pṛthivīm imām
analyzed: ubhau yogyau aham manye rakṣitum pṛthivīm imām
sa sāgara vanām kṛtsnām vindhya meru vibhūṣitām

original: 4.003.014a ime ca dhanuṣī citre ślakṣṇe citrānulepane
analyzed: ime ca dhanuṣī citre ślakṣṇe citra anulepane
prakāśete yathā indrasya vajre hema vibhūṣite

original: 4.003.015a saṃpūrṇā niśitair bāṇair tūṇāś ca śubhadarśanāḥ
analyzed: saṃpūrṇāḥ niśitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ tūṇāḥ ca śubha darśanāḥ
jīvitānta karaiḥ ghoraiḥ jvaladbhiḥ iva pannagaiḥ
mahā pramāṇau vipulau tapta hāṭaka bhūṣitau
khaḍgau etau virājete nirmukta bhujagau iva

original: 4.003.017a evaṃ māṃ paribhāṣantaṃ kasmād vai nābhibhāṣathaḥ
analyzed: evam mām paribhāṣantam kasmāt vai na abhibhāṣathaḥ

original: 4.003.018a sugrīvo nāma dharmātmā kaś cid vānarayūthapaḥ
analyzed: sugrīvaḥ nāma dharma ātmā kaḥ cid vānara yūthapaḥ

original: 4.003.018c vīro vinikṛto bhrātrā jagad bhramati duḥkhitaḥ
analyzed: vīraḥ vinikṛtaḥ bhrātrā jagat bhramati duḥkhitaḥ
prāptaḥ ham preṣitaḥ tena sugrīveṇa mahātmanā
rājñā vānara mukhyānām hanumān nāma vānaraḥ

original: 4.003.020a yuvābhyāṃ saha dharmātmā sugrīvaḥ sakhyam icchati
analyzed: yuvābhyām saha dharma ātmā sugrīvaḥ sakhyam icchati

original: 4.003.020c tasya māṃ sacivaṃ vittaṃ vānaraṃ pavanātmajam
analyzed: tasya mām sacivam vittam vānaram pavanātmajam
bhikṣu rūpa praticchannam sugrīva priya kāmyayā
ṛśyamūkāt iha prāptam kāma gam kāmarūpiṇam

original: 4.003.022a evam uktvā tu hanumāṃs tau vīrau rāmalakṣmaṇau
analyzed: evam uktvā tu hanumān tau vīrau rāma lakṣmaṇau

original: 4.003.022c vākyajñau vākyakuśalaḥ punar novāca kiṃ cana
analyzed: vākya jñau vākya kuśalaḥ punar na uvāca kim cana

original: 4.003.023a etac chrutvā vacas tasya rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
analyzed: etat śrutvā vacaḥ tasya rāmaḥ lakṣmaṇam abravīt
prahṛṣṭa vadanaḥ śrīmān bhrātaram pārśvatas sthitam
sacivaḥ yam kapi indrasya sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ
tam eva kāṅkṣamāṇasya mama antikam upāgataḥ
tam abhyabhāṣa saumitre sugrīva sacivam kapim
vākya jñam madhuraiḥ vākyaiḥ sneha yuktam ariṃdamam

original: 4.004.001a tataḥ prahṛṣṭo hanumān kṛtyavān iti tad vacaḥ
analyzed: tatas prahṛṣṭaḥ hanumān kṛtyavān iti tat vacaḥ
śrutvā madhura saṃbhāṣam sugrīvam manasā gataḥ
bhavyaḥ rājya āgamaḥ tasya sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 4.004.002c yad ayaṃ kṛtyavān prāptaḥ kṛtyaṃ caitad upāgatam
analyzed: yat ayam kṛtyavān prāptaḥ kṛtyam ca etat upāgatam
tatas parama saṃhṛṣṭaḥ hanūmān plavaga ṛṣabhaḥ
pratyuvāca tatas vākyam rāmam vākya viśāradaḥ
kimartham tvam vanam ghoram pampā kānana maṇḍitam
āgataḥ sa anujaḥ durgam nānā vyāla mṛga āyutam
tasya tat vacanam śrutvā lakṣmaṇaḥ rāma coditaḥ
ācacakṣe mahātmānam rāmam daśaratha ātmajam
rājā daśarathaḥ nāma dyutimān dharma vatsalaḥ

original: 4.004.006c tasyāyaṃ pūrvajaḥ putro rāmo nāma janaiḥ śrutaḥ
analyzed: tasya ayam pūrvajaḥ putraḥ rāmaḥ nāma janaiḥ śrutaḥ
śaraṇyaḥ sarva bhūtānām pituḥ nirdeśa pāragaḥ
vīraḥ daśarathasya ayam putrāṇām guṇavattaraḥ

original: 4.004.008a rājyād bhraṣṭo vane vastuṃ mayā sārdham ihāgataḥ
analyzed: rājyāt bhraṣṭaḥ vane vastum mayā sārdham iha āgataḥ
bhāryayā ca mahā tejāḥ sītayā anugataḥ vaśī
dinakṣaye mahā tejāḥ prabhayā iva divākaraḥ

original: 4.004.009a aham asyāvaro bhrātā guṇair dāsyam upāgataḥ
analyzed: aham asya avaraḥ bhrātā guṇaiḥ dāsyam upāgataḥ
kṛtajñasya bahu jñasya lakṣmaṇaḥ nāma nāmataḥ
sukha arhasya mahārhasya sarva bhūta hita ātmanaḥ
aiśvaryeṇa vihīnasya vana vāsa āśritasya ca
rakṣasā apahṛtā bhāryā rahite kāmarūpiṇā

original: 4.004.011c tac ca na jñāyate rakṣaḥ patnī yenāsya sā hṛtā
analyzed: tat ca na jñāyate rakṣaḥ patnī yena asya sā hṛtā

original: 4.004.012a danur nāma śriyaḥ putraḥ śāpād rākṣasatāṃ gataḥ
analyzed: danuḥ nāma śriyaḥ putraḥ śāpāt rākṣasa tām gataḥ
ākhyātaḥ tena sugrīvaḥ samarthaḥ vānara adhipaḥ
sa jñāsyati mahā vīryaḥ tava bhāryā apahāriṇam

original: 4.004.013c evam uktvā danuḥ svargaṃ bhrājamāno gataḥ sukham
analyzed: evam uktvā danuḥ svargam bhrājamānaḥ gataḥ sukham

original: 4.004.014a etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yāthātathyena pṛcchataḥ
analyzed: etat te sarvam ākhyātam yāthātathyena pṛcchataḥ

original: 4.004.014c ahaṃ caiva hi rāmaś ca sugrīvaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatau
analyzed: aham ca eva hi rāmaḥ ca sugrīvam śaraṇam gatau

original: 4.004.015a eṣa dattvā ca vittāni prāpya cānuttamaṃ yaśaḥ
analyzed: eṣa dattvā ca vittāni prāpya ca anuttamam yaśaḥ

original: 4.004.015c lokanāthaḥ purā bhūtvā sugrīvaṃ nātham icchati
analyzed: loka nāthaḥ purā bhūtvā sugrīvam nātham icchati

original: 4.004.016a śokābhibhūte rāme tu śokārte śaraṇaṃ gate
analyzed: śoka abhibhūte rāme tu śoka ārte śaraṇam gate

original: 4.004.016c kartum arhati sugrīvaḥ prasādaṃ saha yūthapaiḥ
analyzed: kartum arhati sugrīvaḥ prasādam saha yūthapaiḥ
evam bruvāṇam saumitrim karuṇam sa aśru pātanam
hanūmān pratyuvāca idam vākyam vākya viśāradaḥ
īdṛśāḥ buddhi saṃpannāḥ jita krodhāḥ jita indriyāḥ
draṣṭavyāḥ vānara indreṇa diṣṭyā darśanam āgatāḥ

original: 4.004.019a sa hi rājyāc ca vibhraṣṭaḥ kṛtavairaś ca vālinā
analyzed: sa hi rājyāt ca vibhraṣṭaḥ kṛta vairaḥ ca vālinā

original: 4.004.019c hṛtadāro vane trasto bhrātrā vinikṛto bhṛśam
analyzed: hṛta dāraḥ vane trastaḥ bhrātrā vinikṛtaḥ bhṛśam
kariṣyati sa sāhāyyam yuvayoḥ bhāskara ātmajaḥ
sugrīvaḥ saha ca asmābhiḥ sītāyāḥ parimārgaṇe

original: 4.004.021a ity evam uktvā hanumāñ ślakṣṇaṃ madhurayā girā
analyzed: iti evam uktvā hanumān ślakṣṇam madhurayā girā
babhāṣe saḥ bhigacchāmaḥ sugrīvam iti rāghavam

original: 4.004.022a evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ dharmātmā hanūmantaṃ sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
analyzed: evam bruvāṇam dharma ātmā hanūmantam sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
pratipūjya yathānyāyam idam provāca rāghavam
kapiḥ kathayate hṛṣṭaḥ yathā ayam mārutātmajaḥ
kṛtyavān saḥ pi saṃprāptaḥ kṛtakṛtyaḥ si rāghava

original: 4.004.024a prasannamukhavarṇaś ca vyaktaṃ hṛṣṭaś ca bhāṣate
analyzed: prasanna mukha varṇaḥ ca vyaktam hṛṣṭaḥ ca bhāṣate
na anṛtam vakṣyate vīraḥ hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ

original: 4.004.025a tataḥ sa tu mahāprājño hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
analyzed: tatas sa tu mahā prājñaḥ hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
jagāma ādāya tau vīrau hari rājāya rāghavau
sa tu vipula yaśāḥ kapi pravīraḥ
pavanasutaḥ kṛtakṛtya vat prahṛṣṭaḥ
giri varam uru vikramaḥ prayātaḥ
sa śubha matiḥ saha rāma lakṣmaṇābhyām

original: 4.005.001a ṛśyamūkāt tu hanumān gatvā taṃ malayaṃ giram
analyzed: ṛśyamūkāt tu hanumān gatvā tam malayam giram
ācacakṣe tadā vīrau kapi rājāya rāghavau
ayam rāmaḥ mahā prājñaḥ saṃprāptaḥ dṛḍha vikramaḥ
lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā rāmaḥ yam satya vikramaḥ
ikṣvākūṇām kule jātaḥ rāmaḥ daśaratha ātmajaḥ
dharme nigaditaḥ ca eva pituḥ nirdeśa pālakaḥ
tasya asya vasataḥ raṇye niyatasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 4.005.004c rakṣasāpahṛtā bhāryā sa tvāṃ śaraṇam āgataḥ
analyzed: rakṣasā apahṛtā bhāryā sa tvām śaraṇam āgataḥ
rājasūya aśvamedhaiḥ ca vahniḥ yena abhitarpitaḥ
dakṣiṇāḥ ca tathā utsṛṣṭāḥ gāvaḥ śata sahasraśas
tapasā satya vākyena vasudhā yena pālitā

original: 4.005.006c strīhetos tasya putro 'yaṃ rāmas tvāṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: strī hetoḥ tasya putraḥ yam rāmaḥ tvām śaraṇam gataḥ
bhavatā sakhya kāmau tau bhrātarau rāma lakṣmaṇau
pratigṛhya arcayasva imau pūjanīyatamau ubhau
śrutvā hanumataḥ vākyam sugrīvaḥ hṛṣṭa mānasaḥ

original: 4.005.008c bhayaṃ sa rāghavād ghoraṃ prajahau vigatajvaraḥ
analyzed: bhayam sa rāghavāt ghoram prajahau vigata jvaraḥ

original: 4.005.009a sa kṛtvā mānuṣaṃ rūpaṃ sugrīvaḥ plavagādhipaḥ
analyzed: sa kṛtvā mānuṣam rūpam sugrīvaḥ plavaga adhipaḥ
darśanīyatamaḥ bhūtvā prītyā provāca rāghavam
bhavān dharma vinītaḥ ca vikrāntaḥ sarva vatsalaḥ
ākhyātāḥ vāyuputreṇa tattvataḥ me bhavat guṇāḥ

original: 4.005.011a tan mamaivaiṣa satkāro lābhaś caivottamaḥ prabho
analyzed: tat mama eva eṣa satkāraḥ lābhaḥ ca eva uttamaḥ prabho

original: 4.005.011c yat tvam icchasi sauhārdaṃ vānareṇa mayā saha
analyzed: yat tvam icchasi sauhārdam vānareṇa mayā saha

original: 4.005.012a rocate yadi vā sakhyaṃ bāhur eṣa prasāritaḥ
analyzed: rocate yadi vā sakhyam bāhuḥ eṣa prasāritaḥ

original: 4.005.012c gṛhyatāṃ pāṇinā pāṇir maryādā vadhyatāṃ dhruvā
analyzed: gṛhyatām pāṇinā pāṇiḥ maryādā vadhyatām dhruvā

original: 4.005.013a etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā sugrīvasya subhāṣitam
analyzed: etat tu vacanam śrutvā sugrīvasya subhāṣitam
saṃprahṛṣṭa manāḥ hastam pīḍayām āsa pāṇinā
hṛdyam sauhṛdam ālambya paryaṣvajata pīḍitam
tatas hanūmān saṃtyajya bhikṣu rūpam ariṃdamaḥ

original: 4.005.014c kāṣṭhayoḥ svena rūpeṇa janayām āsa pāvakam
analyzed: kāṣṭhayoḥ svena rūpeṇa janayām āsa pāvakam

original: 4.005.015a dīpyamānaṃ tato vahniṃ puṣpair abhyarcya satkṛtam
analyzed: dīpyamānam tatas vahnim puṣpaiḥ abhyarcya satkṛtam

original: 4.005.015c tayor madhye tu suprīto nidadhe susamāhitaḥ
analyzed: tayoḥ madhye tu su prītaḥ nidadhe su samāhitaḥ

original: 4.005.016a tato 'gniṃ dīpyamānaṃ tau cakratuś ca pradakṣiṇam
analyzed: tatas gnim dīpyamānam tau cakratuḥ ca pradakṣiṇam
sugrīvaḥ rāghavaḥ ca eva vayasya tvam upāgatau

original: 4.005.017a tataḥ suprīta manasau tāv ubhau harirāghavau
analyzed: tatas su prīta manasau tau ubhau hari rāghavau
anyonyam abhivīkṣantau na tṛptim upajagmatuḥ
tatas sarva artha vidvāṃsam rāmam daśaratha ātmajam

original: 4.005.018c sugrīvaḥ prāha tejasvī vākyam ekamanās tadā
analyzed: sugrīvaḥ prāha tejasvī vākyam ekamanāḥ tadā

original: 4.006.001a ayam ākhyāti me rāma sacivo mantrisattamaḥ
analyzed: ayam ākhyāti me rāma sacivaḥ mantri sattamaḥ

original: 4.006.001c hanumān yannimittaṃ tvaṃ nirjanaṃ vanam āgataḥ
analyzed: hanumān yat nimittam tvam nirjanam vanam āgataḥ

original: 4.006.002a lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā vasataś ca vane tava
analyzed: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā vasataḥ ca vane tava
rakṣasā apahṛtā bhāryā maithilī janakātmajā

original: 4.006.003a tvayā viyuktā rudatī lakṣmaṇena ca dhīmatā
analyzed: tvayā viyuktā rudatī lakṣmaṇena ca dhīmatā

original: 4.006.003c antaraṃ prepsunā tena hatvā gṛdhraṃ jaṭāyuṣam
analyzed: antaram prepsunā tena hatvā gṛdhram jaṭāyuṣam
bhāryā viyoga jam duḥkham nacirāt tvam vimokṣyase

original: 4.006.004c ahaṃ tām ānayiṣyāmi naṣṭāṃ vedaśrutiṃ yathā
analyzed: aham tām ānayiṣyāmi naṣṭām veda śrutim yathā

original: 4.006.005a rasātale vā vartantīṃ vartantīṃ vā nabhastale
analyzed: rasātale vā vartantīm vartantīm vā nabhastale

original: 4.006.005c aham ānīya dāsyāmi tava bhāryām ariṃdama
analyzed: aham ānīya dāsyāmi tava bhāryām ariṃdama

original: 4.006.006a idaṃ tathyaṃ mama vacas tvam avehi ca rāghava
analyzed: idam tathyam mama vacaḥ tvam avehi ca rāghava

original: 4.006.006c tyaja śokaṃ mahābāho tāṃ kāntām ānayāmi te
analyzed: tyaja śokam mahā bāho tām kāntām ānayāmi te

original: 4.006.007a anumānāt tu jānāmi maithilī sā na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: anumānāt tu jānāmi maithilī sā na saṃśayaḥ
hriyamāṇā mayā dṛṣṭā rakṣasā krūra karmaṇā

original: 4.006.008a krośantī rāma rāmeti lakṣmaṇeti ca visvaram
analyzed: krośantī rāma rāma iti lakṣmaṇa iti ca visvaram
sphurantī rāvaṇasya aṅke pannaga indra vadhūḥ yathā

original: 4.006.009a ātmanā pañcamaṃ māṃ hi dṛṣṭvā śailataṭe sthitam
analyzed: ātmanā pañcamam mām hi dṛṣṭvā śaila taṭe sthitam

original: 4.006.009c uttarīyaṃ tayā tyaktaṃ śubhāny ābharaṇāni ca
analyzed: uttarīyam tayā tyaktam śubhāni ābharaṇāni ca

original: 4.006.010a tāny asmābhir gṛhītāni nihitāni ca rāghava
analyzed: tāni asmābhiḥ gṛhītāni nihitāni ca rāghava
ānayiṣyāmi aham tāni pratyabhijñātum arhasi

original: 4.006.011a tam abravīt tato rāmaḥ sugrīvaṃ priyavādinam
analyzed: tam abravīt tatas rāmaḥ sugrīvam priya vādinam
ānayasva sakhe śīghram kimartham pravilambase

original: 4.006.012a evam uktas tu sugrīvaḥ śailasya gahanāṃ guhām
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu sugrīvaḥ śailasya gahanām guhām
praviveśa tatas śīghram rāghava priya kāmyayā

original: 4.006.013a uttarīyaṃ gṛhītvā tu śubhāny ābharaṇāni ca
analyzed: uttarīyam gṛhītvā tu śubhāni ābharaṇāni ca

original: 4.006.013c idaṃ paśyeti rāmāya darśayām āsa vānaraḥ
analyzed: idam paśya iti rāmāya darśayām āsa vānaraḥ

original: 4.006.014a tato gṛhītvā tadvāsaḥ śubhāny ābharaṇāni ca
analyzed: tatas gṛhītvā tad vāsaḥ śubhāni ābharaṇāni ca
abhavat bāṣpa saṃruddhaḥ nīhāreṇa iva candramāḥ
sītā sneha pravṛttena sa tu bāṣpeṇa dūṣitaḥ

original: 4.006.015c hā priyeti rudan dhairyam utsṛjya nyapatat kṣitau
analyzed: hā priya iti rudan dhairyam utsṛjya nyapatat kṣitau

original: 4.006.016a hṛdi kṛtvā sa bahuśas tam alaṃkāram uttamam
analyzed: hṛdi kṛtvā sa bahuśas tam alaṃkāram uttamam

original: 4.006.016c niśaśvāsa bhṛśaṃ sarpo bilastha iva roṣitaḥ
analyzed: niśaśvāsa bhṛśam sarpaḥ bila sthaḥ iva roṣitaḥ
a vicchinna aśru vegaḥ tu saumitrim vīkṣya pārśvatas
paridevayitum dīnam rāmaḥ samupacakrame
paśya lakṣmaṇa vaidehyā saṃtyaktam hriyamāṇayā

original: 4.006.018c uttarīyam idaṃ bhūmau śarīrād bhūṣaṇāni ca
analyzed: uttarīyam idam bhūmau śarīrāt bhūṣaṇāni ca
śādvalinyām dhruvam bhūmyām sītayā hriyamāṇayā

original: 4.006.019c utsṛṣṭaṃ bhūṣaṇam idaṃ tathārūpaṃ hi dṛśyate
analyzed: utsṛṣṭam bhūṣaṇam idam tathārūpam hi dṛśyate

original: 4.006.020a brūhi sugrīva kaṃ deśaṃ hriyantī lakṣitā tvayā
analyzed: brūhi sugrīva kam deśam hriyantī lakṣitā tvayā
rakṣasā raudra rūpeṇa mama prāṇa samā priyā

original: 4.006.021a kva vā vasati tad rakṣo mahad vyasanadaṃ mama
analyzed: kva vā vasati tat rakṣaḥ mahat vyasana dam mama
yad nimittam aham sarvān nāśayiṣyāmi rākṣasān

original: 4.006.022a haratā maithilīṃ yena māṃ ca roṣayatā bhṛśam
analyzed: haratā maithilīm yena mām ca roṣayatā bhṛśam
ātmanaḥ jīvitāntāya mṛtyu dvāram apāvṛtam
mama dayitatamā hṛtā vanāt
rajanicareṇa vimathya yena sā

original: 4.006.023c kathaya mama ripuṃ tam adya vai;
analyzed: kathaya mama ripum tam adya vai
pravaga pate yama saṃnidhim nayāmi

original: 4.007.001a evam uktas tu sugrīvo rāmeṇārtena vānaraḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu sugrīvaḥ rāmeṇa ārtena vānaraḥ
abravīt prāñjaliḥ vākyam sa bāṣpam bāṣpa gadgadaḥ

original: 4.007.002a na jāne nilayaṃ tasya sarvathā pāparakṣasaḥ
analyzed: na jāne nilayam tasya sarvathā pāpa rakṣasaḥ

original: 4.007.002c sāmarthyaṃ vikramaṃ vāpi dauṣkuleyasya vā kulam
analyzed: sāmarthyam vikramam vā api dauṣkuleyasya vā kulam

original: 4.007.003a satyaṃ tu pratijānāmi tyaja śokam ariṃdama
analyzed: satyam tu pratijānāmi tyaja śokam ariṃdama

original: 4.007.003c kariṣyāmi tathā yatnaṃ yathā prāpsyasi maithilīm
analyzed: kariṣyāmi tathā yatnam yathā prāpsyasi maithilīm
rāvaṇam sa gaṇam hatvā paritoṣya ātma pauruṣam

original: 4.007.004c tathāsmi kartā nacirād yathā prīto bhaviṣyasi
analyzed: tathā asmi kartā nacirāt yathā prītaḥ bhaviṣyasi

original: 4.007.005a alaṃ vaiklavyam ālambya dhairyam ātmagataṃ smara
analyzed: alam vaiklavyam ālambya dhairyam ātma gatam smara
tvadvidhānām na sadṛśam īdṛśam buddhi lāghavam

original: 4.007.006a mayāpi vyasanaṃ prāptaṃ bhāryā haraṇajaṃ mahat
analyzed: mayā api vyasanam prāptam bhāryā haraṇa jam mahat

original: 4.007.006c na cāham evaṃ śocāmi na ca dhairyaṃ parityaje
analyzed: na ca aham evam śocāmi na ca dhairyam parityaje

original: 4.007.007a nāhaṃ tām anuśocāmi prākṛto vānaro 'pi san
analyzed: na aham tām anuśocāmi prākṛtaḥ san

original: 4.007.007c mahātmā ca vinītaś cā kiṃ punar dhṛtimān bhavān
analyzed: mahātmā ca vinītaḥ ca ā kim punar dhṛtimān bhavān

original: 4.007.008a bāṣpam āpatitaṃ dhairyān nigrahītuṃ tvam arhasi
analyzed: bāṣpam āpatitam dhairyāt nigrahītum tvam arhasi
maryādām sattva yuktānām dhṛtim nā utsraṣṭum arhasi

original: 4.007.009a vyasane vārtha kṛcchre vā bhaye vā jīvitāntage
analyzed: vyasane vā artha kṛcchre vā bhaye vā jīvitānta ge

original: 4.007.009c vimṛśan vai svayā buddhyā dhṛtimān nāvasīdati
analyzed: vimṛśan vai svayā buddhyā dhṛtimān na avasīdati

original: 4.007.010a bāliśas tu naro nityaṃ vaiklavyaṃ yo 'nuvartate
analyzed: bāliśaḥ tu naraḥ nityam vaiklavyam yaḥ nuvartate

original: 4.007.010c sa majjaty avaśaḥ śoke bhārākrānteva naur jale
analyzed: sa majjati avaśaḥ śoke bhāra ākrāntā iva nauḥ jale

original: 4.007.011a eṣo 'ñjalir mayā baddhaḥ praṇayāt tvāṃ prasādaye
analyzed: eṣaḥ ñjaliḥ mayā baddhaḥ praṇayāt tvām prasādaye

original: 4.007.011c pauruṣaṃ śraya śokasya nāntaraṃ dātum arhasi
analyzed: pauruṣam śraya śokasya na antaram dātum arhasi

original: 4.007.012a ye śokam anuvartante na teṣāṃ vidyate sukham
analyzed: ye śokam anuvartante na teṣām vidyate sukham

original: 4.007.012c tejaś ca kṣīyate teṣāṃ na tvaṃ śocitum arhasi
analyzed: tejaḥ ca kṣīyate teṣām na tvam śocitum arhasi

original: 4.007.013a hitaṃ vayasya bhāvena brūhi nopadiśāmi te
analyzed: hitam vayasya bhāvena brūhi nā upadiśāmi te

original: 4.007.013c vayasyatāṃ pūjayan me na tvaṃ śocitum arhasi
analyzed: vayasyatām pūjayan me na tvam śocitum arhasi

original: 4.007.014a madhuraṃ sāntvitas tena sugrīveṇa sa rāghavaḥ
analyzed: madhuram sāntvitaḥ tena sugrīveṇa sa rāghavaḥ
mukham aśru pariklinnam vastra antena pramārjayat
prakṛtiṣṭhaḥ tu kākutsthaḥ sugrīva vacanāt prabhuḥ
saṃpariṣvajya sugrīvam idam vacanam abravīt

original: 4.007.016a kartavyaṃ yad vayasyena snigdhena ca hitena ca
analyzed: kartavyam yat vayasyena snigdhena ca hitena ca

original: 4.007.016c anurūpaṃ ca yuktaṃ ca kṛtaṃ sugrīva tat tvayā
analyzed: anurūpam ca yuktam ca kṛtam sugrīva tat tvayā

original: 4.007.017a eṣa ca prakṛtiṣṭho 'ham anunītas tvayā sakhe
analyzed: eṣa ca prakṛtiṣṭhaḥ ham anunītaḥ tvayā sakhe

original: 4.007.017c durlabho hīdṛśo bandhur asmin kāle viśeṣataḥ
analyzed: durlabhaḥ hi īdṛśaḥ bandhuḥ asmin kāle viśeṣataḥ

original: 4.007.018a kiṃ tu yatnas tvayā kāryo maithilyāḥ parimārgaṇe
analyzed: kim tu yatnaḥ tvayā kāryaḥ maithilyāḥ parimārgaṇe
rākṣasasya ca raudrasya rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ

original: 4.007.019a mayā ca yad anuṣṭheyaṃ visrabdhena tad ucyatām
analyzed: mayā ca yat anuṣṭheyam visrabdhena tat ucyatām

original: 4.007.019c varṣāsv iva ca sukṣetre sarvaṃ saṃpadyate tava
analyzed: varṣāsu iva ca sukṣetre sarvam saṃpadyate tava

original: 4.007.020a mayā ca yad idaṃ vākyam abhimānāt samīritam
analyzed: mayā ca yat idam vākyam abhimānāt samīritam

original: 4.007.020c tat tvayā hariśārdūla tattvam ity upadhāryatām
analyzed: tat tvayā hari śārdūla tattvam iti upadhāryatām

original: 4.007.021a anṛtaṃ noktapūrvaṃ me na ca vakṣye kadā cana
analyzed: anṛtam na ukta pūrvam me na ca vakṣye kadā cana

original: 4.007.021c etat te pratijānāmi satyenaiva śapāmi te
analyzed: etat te pratijānāmi satyena eva śapāmi te

original: 4.007.022a tataḥ prahṛṣṭaḥ sugrīvo vānaraiḥ sacivaiḥ saha
analyzed: tatas prahṛṣṭaḥ sugrīvaḥ vānaraiḥ sacivaiḥ saha
rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā pratijñātam viśeṣataḥ
mahā anubhāvasya vacaḥ niśamya
hariḥ narāṇām ṛṣabhasya tasya
kṛtam sa mene hari vīra mukhyaḥ
tadā sva kāryam hṛdayena vidvān

original: 4.008.001a parituṣṭas tu sugrīvas tena vākyena vānaraḥ
analyzed: parituṣṭaḥ tu sugrīvaḥ tena vākyena vānaraḥ
lakṣmaṇasya agrajam rāmam idam vacanam abravīt
sarvathā aham anugrāhyaḥ devatānām asaṃśayaḥ
upapanna guṇa upetaḥ sakhā yasya bhavān mama

original: 4.008.003a śakyaṃ khalu bhaved rāma sahāyena tvayānagha
analyzed: śakyam khalu bhavet rāma sahāyena tvayā anagha

original: 4.008.003c surarājyam api prāptuṃ svarājyaṃ kiṃ punaḥ prabho
analyzed: sura rājyam api prāptum sva rājyam kim punar prabho

original: 4.008.004a so 'haṃ sabhājyo bandhūnāṃ suhṛdāṃ caiva rāghava
analyzed: saḥ ham sabhājyaḥ bandhūnām suhṛdām ca eva rāghava
yasya agni sākṣikam mitram labdham rāghava vaṃśa jam

original: 4.008.005a aham apy anurūpas te vayasyo jñāsyase śanaiḥ
analyzed: aham api anurūpaḥ te vayasyaḥ jñāsyase śanais

original: 4.008.005c na tu vaktuṃ samartho 'haṃ svayam ātmagatān guṇān
analyzed: na tu vaktum samarthaḥ ham svayam ātma gatān guṇān
mahātmanām tu bhūyiṣṭham tvadvidhānām kṛtātmanām

original: 4.008.006c niścalā bhavati prītir dhairyam ātmavatām iva
analyzed: niścalā bhavati prītiḥ dhairyam ātmavatām iva

original: 4.008.007a rajataṃ vā suvarṇaṃ vā vastrāṇy ābharaṇāni vā
analyzed: rajatam vā suvarṇam vā vastrāṇi ābharaṇāni vā
avibhaktāni sādhūnām avagacchanti sādhavaḥ

original: 4.008.008a āḍhyo vāpi daridro vā duḥkhitaḥ sukhito 'pi vā
analyzed: āḍhyaḥ vā api daridraḥ vā duḥkhitaḥ vā

original: 4.008.008c nirdoṣo vā sadoṣo vā vayasyaḥ paramā gatiḥ
analyzed: nirdoṣaḥ vā sa doṣaḥ vā vayasyaḥ paramā gatiḥ
dhana tyāgaḥ sukha tyāgaḥ vā punar
vayasya arthe pravartante sneham dṛṣṭvā tathāvidham

original: 4.008.010a tat tathety abravīd rāmaḥ sugrīvaṃ priyavādinam
analyzed: tat tathā iti abravīt rāmaḥ sugrīvam priya vādinam
lakṣmaṇasya agratas lakṣmyāḥ vāsavasya iva dhīmataḥ

original: 4.008.011a tato rāmaṃ sthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābalam
analyzed: tatas rāmam sthitam dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇam ca mahā balam

original: 4.008.011c sugrīvaḥ sarvataś cakṣur vane lolam apātayat
analyzed: sugrīvaḥ sarvatas cakṣuḥ vane lolam apātayat

original: 4.008.012a sa dadarśa tataḥ sālam avidūre harīśvaraḥ
analyzed: sa dadarśa tatas sālam avidūre hari īśvaraḥ
su puṣpam īṣat pattra āḍhyam bhramaraiḥ upaśobhitam
tasya ekām parṇa bahulām bhaṅktvā śākhām su puṣpitām
sālasya āstīrya sugrīvaḥ niṣasāda sa rāghavaḥ

original: 4.008.014a tāv āsīnau tato dṛṣṭvā hanūmān api lakṣmaṇam
analyzed: tau āsīnau tatas dṛṣṭvā hanūmān api lakṣmaṇam
sāla śākhām samutpāṭya vinītam upaveśayat

original: 4.008.015a tataḥ prahṛṣṭaḥ sugrīvaḥ ślakṣṇaṃ madhurayā girā
analyzed: tatas prahṛṣṭaḥ sugrīvaḥ ślakṣṇam madhurayā girā
uvāca praṇayāt rāmam harṣa vyākulita akṣaram

original: 4.008.016a ahaṃ vinikṛto bhrātrā carāmy eṣa bhayārditaḥ
analyzed: aham vinikṛtaḥ bhrātrā carāmi eṣa bhaya arditaḥ
ṛśyamūkam giri varam hṛta bhāryaḥ su duḥkhitaḥ

original: 4.008.017a so 'haṃ trasto bhaye magno vasāmy udbhrāntacetanaḥ
analyzed: saḥ ham trastaḥ bhaye magnaḥ vasāmi udbhrānta cetanaḥ

original: 4.008.017c vālinā nikṛto bhrātrā kṛtavairaś ca rāghava
analyzed: vālinā nikṛtaḥ bhrātrā kṛta vairaḥ ca rāghava
vālinaḥ me bhaya ārtasya sarva lokāḥ abhayaṃkara

original: 4.008.018c mamāpi tvam anāthasya prasādaṃ kartum arhasi
analyzed: mama api tvam anāthasya prasādam kartum arhasi

original: 4.008.019a evam uktas tu tejasvī dharmajño dharmavatsalaḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu tejasvī dharma jñaḥ dharma vatsalaḥ

original: 4.008.019c pratyuvāca sa kākutsthaḥ sugrīvaṃ prahasann iva
analyzed: pratyuvāca sa kākutsthaḥ sugrīvam prahasan iva
upakāra phalam mitram apakāraḥ ri lakṣaṇam
adyā eva tam haniṣyāmi tava bhāryā apahāriṇam

original: 4.008.021a ime hi me mahāvegāḥ patriṇas tigmatejasaḥ
analyzed: ime hi me mahā vegāḥ patriṇaḥ tigma tejasaḥ
kārtikeya vana udbhūtāḥ śarāḥ hema vibhūṣitāḥ
kaṅka patra praticchannāḥ mahā indra aśani saṃnibhāḥ
su parvāṇaḥ su tīkṣṇa agrā sa roṣāḥ bhujagāḥ iva
bhrātṛ saṃjñam amitram te vālinam kṛta kilbiṣam

original: 4.008.023c śarair vinihataṃ paśya vikīrṇam iva parvatam
analyzed: śaraiḥ vinihatam paśya vikīrṇam iva parvatam
rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā sugrīvaḥ vāhinīpatiḥ

original: 4.008.024c praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe sādhu sādhv iti cābravīt
analyzed: praharṣam atulam lebhe sādhu sādhu iti ca abravīt
rāma śoka abhibhūtaḥ ham śoka ārtānām bhavān gatiḥ

original: 4.008.025c vayasya iti kṛtvā hi tvayy ahaṃ paridevaye
analyzed: vayasyaḥ iti kṛtvā hi tvayi aham paridevaye
tvam hi pāṇi pradānena saḥ agni sākṣikaḥ

original: 4.008.026c kṛtaḥ prāṇair bahumataḥ satyenāpi śapāmy aham
analyzed: kṛtaḥ prāṇaiḥ bahu mataḥ satyena api śapāmi aham

original: 4.008.027a vayasya iti kṛtvā ca visrabdhaṃ pravadāmy aham
analyzed: vayasyaḥ iti kṛtvā ca visrabdham pravadāmi aham

original: 4.008.027c duḥkham antargataṃ yan me mano dahati nityaśaḥ
analyzed: duḥkham antargatam yat me manaḥ dahati nityaśas
etāvat uktvā vacanam bāṣpa dūṣita locanaḥ
bāṣpa upahatayā vācā na uccais śaknoti bhāṣitum
bāṣpa vegam tu sahasā nadī vegam iva āgatam
dhārayām āsa dhairyeṇa sugrīvaḥ rāma saṃnidhau

original: 4.008.030a saṃnigṛhya tu taṃ bāṣpaṃ pramṛjya nayane śubhe
analyzed: saṃnigṛhya tu tam bāṣpam pramṛjya nayane śubhe

original: 4.008.030c viniḥśvasya ca tejasvī rāghavaṃ punar abravīt
analyzed: viniḥśvasya ca tejasvī rāghavam punar abravīt

original: 4.008.031a purāhaṃ valinā rāma rājyāt svād avaropitaḥ
analyzed: purā aham valinā rāma rājyāt svāt avaropitaḥ
paruṣāṇi ca saṃśrāvya nirdhūtaḥ smi balīyasā

original: 4.008.032a hṛtā bhāryā ca me tena prāṇebhyo 'pi garīyasī
analyzed: hṛtā bhāryā ca me tena prāṇebhyaḥ garīyasī

original: 4.008.032c suhṛdaś ca madīyā ye saṃyatā bandhaneṣu te
analyzed: suhṛdaḥ ca madīyāḥ ye saṃyatāḥ bandhaneṣu te

original: 4.008.033a yatnavāṃś ca suduṣṭātmā mad vināśāya rāghava
analyzed: yatnavān ca su duṣṭa ātmā mat vināśāya rāghava

original: 4.008.033c bahuśas tat prayuktāś ca vānarā nihatā mayā
analyzed: bahuśas tat prayuktāḥ ca vānarāḥ nihatāḥ mayā

original: 4.008.034a śaṅkayā tv etayā cāhaṃ dṛṣṭvā tvām api rāghava
analyzed: śaṅkayā tu etayā ca aham dṛṣṭvā tvām api rāghava

original: 4.008.034c nopasarpāmy ahaṃ bhīto bhaye sarve hi bibhyati
analyzed: na upasarpāmi aham bhītaḥ bhaye sarve hi bibhyati

original: 4.008.035a kevalaṃ hi sahāyā me hanumat pramukhās tv ime
analyzed: kevalam hi sahāyāḥ me hanumat pramukhāḥ tu ime

original: 4.008.035c ato 'haṃ dhārayāmy adya prāṇān kṛcchra gato 'pi san
analyzed: atas ham dhārayāmi adya prāṇān kṛcchra gataḥ pi san

original: 4.008.036a ete hi kapayaḥ snigdhā māṃ rakṣanti samantataḥ
analyzed: ete hi kapayaḥ snigdhāḥ mām rakṣanti samantataḥ

original: 4.008.036c saha gacchanti gantavye nityaṃ tiṣṭhanti ca sthite
analyzed: saha gacchanti gantavye nityam tiṣṭhanti ca sthite

original: 4.008.037a saṃkṣepas tv eṣa me rāma kim uktvā vistaraṃ hi te
analyzed: saṃkṣepaḥ tu eṣa me rāma kim uktvā vistaram hi te

original: 4.008.037c sa me jyeṣṭho ripur bhrātā vālī viśrutapauruṣaḥ
analyzed: sa me jyeṣṭhaḥ ripuḥ bhrātā vālī viśruta pauruṣaḥ

original: 4.008.038a tadvināśād dhi me duḥkhaṃ pranaṣṭaṃ syād anantaram
analyzed: tad vināśāt hi me duḥkham pranaṣṭam syāt anantaram
sukham me jīvitam ca eva tad vināśa nibandhanam

original: 4.008.039a eṣa me rāma śokāntaḥ śokārtena niveditaḥ
analyzed: eṣa me rāma śoka antaḥ śoka ārtena niveditaḥ

original: 4.008.039c duḥkhito 'duḥkhito vāpi sakhyur nityaṃ sakhā gatiḥ
analyzed: duḥkhitaḥ duḥkhitaḥ vā api sakhyuḥ nityam sakhā gatiḥ

original: 4.008.040a śrutvaitac ca vaco rāmaḥ sugrīvam idam abravīt
analyzed: śrutvā etat ca vacaḥ rāmaḥ sugrīvam idam abravīt

original: 4.008.040c kiṃnimittam abhūd vairaṃ śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ
analyzed: kiṃnimittam abhūt vairam śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ

original: 4.008.041a sukhaṃ hi kāraṇaṃ śrutvā vairasya tava vānara
analyzed: sukham hi kāraṇam śrutvā vairasya tava vānara
ānantaryam vidhāsyāmi saṃpradhārya balābalam

original: 4.008.042a balavān hi mamāmarṣaḥ śrutvā tvām avamānitam
analyzed: balavān hi mama āmarṣaḥ śrutvā tvām avamānitam
vardhate hṛdaya utkampī prāvṛṣ vegaḥ iva ambhasaḥ

original: 4.008.043a hṛṣṭaḥ kathaya visrabdho yāvad āropyate dhanuḥ
analyzed: hṛṣṭaḥ kathaya visrabdhaḥ yāvat āropyate dhanuḥ

original: 4.008.043c sṛṣṭaś ca hi mayā bāṇo nirastaś ca ripus tava
analyzed: sṛṣṭaḥ ca hi mayā bāṇaḥ nirastaḥ ca ripuḥ tava

original: 4.008.044a evam uktas tu sugrīvaḥ kākutsthena mahātmanā
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu sugrīvaḥ kākutsthena mahātmanā

original: 4.008.044c praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe caturbhiḥ saha vānaraiḥ
analyzed: praharṣam atulam lebhe caturbhiḥ saha vānaraiḥ
tatas prahṛṣṭa vadanaḥ sugrīvaḥ lakṣmaṇa agraje
vairasya kāraṇam tattvam ākhyātum upacakrame

original: 4.009.001a vālī nāma mama bhrātā jyeṣṭhaḥ śatruniṣūdanaḥ
analyzed: vālī nāma mama bhrātā jyeṣṭhaḥ śatru niṣūdanaḥ

original: 4.009.001c pitur bahumato nityaṃ mama cāpi tathā purā
analyzed: pituḥ bahu mataḥ nityam mama ca api tathā purā
pitari uparate smākam jyeṣṭhaḥ yam iti mantribhiḥ
kapīnām īśvaraḥ rājye kṛtaḥ parama saṃmataḥ
rājyam praśāsataḥ tasya pitṛpaitāmaham mahat

original: 4.009.003c ahaṃ sarveṣu kāleṣu praṇataḥ preṣyavat sthitaḥ
analyzed: aham sarveṣu kāleṣu praṇataḥ preṣya vat sthitaḥ

original: 4.009.004a māyāvī nāma tejasvī pūrvajo dundubheḥ sutaḥ
analyzed: māyāvī nāma tejasvī pūrvajaḥ dundubheḥ sutaḥ

original: 4.009.004c tena tasya mahad vairaṃ strīkṛtaṃ viśrutaṃ purā
analyzed: tena tasya mahat vairam strī kṛtam viśrutam purā

original: 4.009.005a sa tu supte jane rātrau kiṣkindhād vāram āgataḥ
analyzed: sa tu supte jane rātrau kiṣkindhāt vāram āgataḥ

original: 4.009.005c nardati sma susaṃrabdho vālinaṃ cāhvayad raṇe
analyzed: nardati sma su saṃrabdhaḥ vālinam ca āhvayat raṇe

original: 4.009.006a prasuptas tu mama bhrātā narditaṃ bhairavasvanam
analyzed: prasuptaḥ tu mama bhrātā narditam bhairava svanam

original: 4.009.006c śrutvā na mamṛṣe vālī niṣpapāta javāt tadā
analyzed: śrutvā na mamṛṣe vālī niṣpapāta javāt tadā

original: 4.009.007a sa tu vai niḥsṛtaḥ krodhāt taṃ hantum asurottamam
analyzed: sa tu vai niḥsṛtaḥ krodhāt tam hantum asura uttamam

original: 4.009.007c vāryamāṇas tataḥ strībhir mayā ca praṇatātmanā
analyzed: vāryamāṇaḥ tatas strībhiḥ mayā ca praṇata ātmanā

original: 4.009.008a sa tu nirdhūya sarvānno nirjagāma mahābalaḥ
analyzed: sa tu nirdhūya sarvān naḥ nirjagāma mahā balaḥ

original: 4.009.008c tato 'ham api sauhārdān niḥsṛto vālinā saha
analyzed: tatas ham api sauhārdāt niḥsṛtaḥ vālinā saha

original: 4.009.009a sa tu me bhrātaraṃ dṛṣṭvā māṃ ca dūrād avasthitam
analyzed: sa tu me bhrātaram dṛṣṭvā mām ca dūrāt avasthitam
asuraḥ jāta saṃtrāsaḥ pradudrāva tadā bhṛśam

original: 4.009.010a tasmin dravati saṃtraste hy āvāṃ drutataraṃ gatau
analyzed: tasmin dravati saṃtraste hi āvām drutataram gatau
prakāśaḥ pi kṛtaḥ mārgaḥ candreṇa udgacchatā tadā

original: 4.009.011a sa tṛṇair āvṛtaṃ durgaṃ dharaṇyā vivaraṃ mahat
analyzed: sa tṛṇaiḥ āvṛtam durgam dharaṇyāḥ vivaram mahat
praviveśa asuraḥ vegāt āvām āsādya viṣṭhitau

original: 4.009.012a taṃ praviṣṭaṃ ripuṃ dṛṣṭvā bilaṃ roṣavaśaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: tam praviṣṭam ripum dṛṣṭvā bilam roṣa vaśam gataḥ

original: 4.009.012c mām uvāca tadā vālī vacanaṃ kṣubhitendriyaḥ
analyzed: mām uvāca tadā vālī vacanam kṣubhita indriyaḥ

original: 4.009.013a iha tvaṃ tiṣṭha sugrīva biladvāri samāhitaḥ
analyzed: iha tvam tiṣṭha sugrīva bila dvāri samāhitaḥ

original: 4.009.013c yāvad atra praviśyāhaṃ nihanmi samare ripum
analyzed: yāvat atra praviśya aham nihanmi samare ripum

original: 4.009.014a mayā tv etad vacaḥ śrutvā yācitaḥ sa paraṃtapa
analyzed: mayā tu etat vacaḥ śrutvā yācitaḥ sa paraṃtapa

original: 4.009.014c śāpayitvā ca māṃ padbhyāṃ praviveśa bilaṃ tadā
analyzed: śāpayitvā ca mām padbhyām praviveśa bilam tadā

original: 4.009.015a tasya praviṣṭasya bilaṃ sāgraḥ saṃvatsaro gataḥ
analyzed: tasya praviṣṭasya bilam sāgraḥ saṃvatsaraḥ gataḥ

original: 4.009.015c sthitasya ca mama dvāri sa kālo vyatyavartata
analyzed: sthitasya ca mama dvāri sa kālaḥ vyatyavartata

original: 4.009.016a ahaṃ tu naṣṭaṃ taṃ jñātvā snehād āgatasaṃbhramaḥ
analyzed: aham tu naṣṭam tam jñātvā snehāt āgata saṃbhramaḥ

original: 4.009.016c bhrātaraṃ na hi paśyāmi pāpaśaṅki ca me manaḥ
analyzed: bhrātaram na hi paśyāmi pāpa śaṅki ca me manaḥ

original: 4.009.017a atha dīrghasya kālasya bilāt tasmād viniḥsṛtam
analyzed: atha dīrghasya kālasya bilāt tasmāt viniḥsṛtam

original: 4.009.017c saphenaṃ rudhiraṃ raktam ahaṃ dṛṣṭvā suduḥkhitaḥ
analyzed: sa phenam rudhiram raktam aham dṛṣṭvā su duḥkhitaḥ

original: 4.009.018a nardatām asurāṇāṃ ca dhvanir me śrotram āgataḥ
analyzed: nardatām asurāṇām ca dhvaniḥ me śrotram āgataḥ

original: 4.009.018c nirastasya ca saṃgrāme krośato niḥsvano guroḥ
analyzed: nirastasya ca saṃgrāme krośataḥ niḥsvanaḥ guroḥ

original: 4.009.019a ahaṃ tv avagato buddhyā cihnais tair bhrātaraṃ hatam
analyzed: aham tu avagataḥ buddhyā cihnaiḥ taiḥ bhrātaram hatam
pidhāya ca bila dvāram śilayā giri mātrayā

original: 4.009.019e śokārtaś codakaṃ kṛtvā kiṣkindhām āgataḥ sakhe
analyzed: śoka ārtaḥ ca udakam kṛtvā kiṣkindhām āgataḥ sakhe

original: 4.009.020a gūhamānasya me tattvaṃ yatnato mantribhiḥ śrutam
analyzed: gūhamānasya me tattvam yatnataḥ mantribhiḥ śrutam
tatas ham taiḥ samāgamya sametaiḥ abhiṣecitaḥ

original: 4.009.021a rājyaṃ praśāsatas tasya nyāyato mama rāghava
analyzed: rājyam praśāsataḥ tasya nyāyataḥ mama rāghava

original: 4.009.021c ājagāma ripuṃ hatvā vālī tam asurottamam
analyzed: ājagāma ripum hatvā vālī tam asura uttamam

original: 4.009.022a abhiṣiktaṃ tu māṃ dṛṣṭvā krodhāt saṃraktalocanaḥ
analyzed: abhiṣiktam tu mām dṛṣṭvā krodhāt saṃrakta locanaḥ

original: 4.009.022c madīyān mantriṇo baddhvā paruṣaṃ vākyam abravīt
analyzed: madīyān mantriṇaḥ baddhvā paruṣam vākyam abravīt

original: 4.009.023a nigrahe 'pi samarthasya taṃ pāpaṃ prati rāghava
analyzed: nigrahe pi samarthasya tam pāpam prati rāghava
na prāvartata me buddhiḥ bhrātṛ gaurava yantritā
mānayan tam mahātmānam yathāvat ca abhyavādayam
uktāḥ ca na āśiṣaḥ tena saṃtuṣṭena antarātmanā
tatas krodha samāviṣṭam saṃrabdham tam upāgatam
aham bhrātaram priya kāmyayā

original: 4.010.002a diṣṭyāsi kuśalī prāpto nihataś ca tvayā ripuḥ
analyzed: diṣṭyā asi kuśalī prāptaḥ nihataḥ ca tvayā ripuḥ

original: 4.010.002c anāthasya hi me nāthas tvam eko 'nāthanandanaḥ
analyzed: anāthasya hi me nāthaḥ tvam ekaḥ nātha nandanaḥ
idam bahu śalākam te pūrṇa candram iva uditam
chatram pratīcchasva mayā udyatam

original: 4.010.004a tvam eva rājā mānārhaḥ sadā cāhaṃ yathāpurā
analyzed: tvam eva rājā māna arhaḥ sadā ca aham yathā purā

original: 4.010.004c nyāsabhūtam idaṃ rājyaṃ tava niryātayāmy aham
analyzed: nyāsa bhūtam idam rājyam tava niryātayāmi aham

original: 4.010.005a mā ca roṣaṃ kṛthāḥ saumya mayi śatrunibarhaṇa
analyzed: mā ca roṣam kṛthāḥ saumya mayi śatru nibarhaṇa

original: 4.010.005c yāce tvāṃ śirasā rājan mayā baddho 'yam añjaliḥ
analyzed: yāce tvām śirasā rājan mayā baddhaḥ yam añjaliḥ
balāt asmi samāgamya mantribhiḥ pura vāsibhiḥ
rāja bhāve niyuktaḥ ham śūnya deśa jigīṣayā

original: 4.010.007a snigdham evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ māṃ sa tu nirbhartsya vānaraḥ
analyzed: snigdham evam bruvāṇam mām sa tu nirbhartsya vānaraḥ

original: 4.010.007c dhik tvām iti ca mām uktvā bahu tat tad uvāca ha
analyzed: tvām iti ca mām uktvā bahu tat tat uvāca ha

original: 4.010.008a prakṛtīś ca samānīya mantriṇaś caiva saṃmatān
analyzed: prakṛtīḥ ca samānīya mantriṇaḥ ca eva saṃmatān

original: 4.010.008c mām āha suhṛdāṃ madhye vākyaṃ paramagarhitam
analyzed: mām āha suhṛdām madhye vākyam parama garhitam

original: 4.010.009a viditaṃ vo yathā rātrau māyāvī sa mahāsuraḥ
analyzed: viditam vaḥ yathā rātrau māyāvī sa mahā asuraḥ
mām samāhvayata krūraḥ yuddha ākāṅkṣī su durmatiḥ

original: 4.010.010a tasya tad garjitaṃ śrutvā niḥsṛto 'haṃ nṛpālayāt
analyzed: tasya tat garjitam śrutvā niḥsṛtaḥ ham nṛpa ālayāt

original: 4.010.010c anuyātaś ca māṃ tūrṇam ayaṃ bhrātā sudāruṇaḥ
analyzed: anuyātaḥ ca mām tūrṇam ayam bhrātā su dāruṇaḥ

original: 4.010.011a sa tu dṛṣṭvaiva māṃ rātrau sadvitīyaṃ mahābalaḥ
analyzed: sa tu dṛṣṭvā eva mām rātrau sa dvitīyam mahā balaḥ
prādravat bhaya saṃtrastaḥ vīkṣya āvām tam anudrutau
anudrutaḥ tu vegena praviveśa mahā bilam

original: 4.010.012a taṃ praviṣṭaṃ viditvā tu sughoraṃ sumahad bilam
analyzed: tam praviṣṭam viditvā tu su ghoram su mahat bilam

original: 4.010.012c ayam ukto 'tha me bhrātā mayā tu krūradarśanaḥ
analyzed: ayam me bhrātā mayā tu krūra darśanaḥ

original: 4.010.013a ahatvā nāsti me śaktiḥ pratigantum itaḥ purīm
analyzed: a hatvā na asti me śaktiḥ pratigantum itas purīm

original: 4.010.013c biladvāri pratīkṣa tvaṃ yāvad enaṃ nihanmy aham
analyzed: bila dvāri pratīkṣa tvam yāvat enam nihanmi aham

original: 4.010.014a sthito 'yam iti matvā tu praviṣṭo 'haṃ durāsadam
analyzed: sthitaḥ yam iti matvā tu praviṣṭaḥ ham durāsadam

original: 4.010.014c taṃ ca me mārgamāṇasya gataḥ saṃvatsaras tadā
analyzed: tam ca me mārgamāṇasya gataḥ saṃvatsaraḥ tadā

original: 4.010.015a sa tu dṛṣṭo mayā śatrur anirvedād bhayāvahaḥ
analyzed: sa tu dṛṣṭaḥ mayā śatruḥ anirvedāt bhaya āvahaḥ

original: 4.010.015c nihataś ca mayā tatra so 'suro bandhubhiḥ saha
analyzed: nihataḥ ca mayā tatra saḥ suraḥ bandhubhiḥ saha

original: 4.010.016a tasyāsyāt tu pravṛttena rudhiraugheṇa tad bilam
analyzed: tasya āsyāt tu pravṛttena rudhira ogheṇa tat bilam

original: 4.010.016c pūrṇam āsīd durākrāmaṃ stanatas tasya bhūtale
analyzed: pūrṇam āsīt durākrāmam stanataḥ tasya bhū tale

original: 4.010.017a sūdayitvā tu taṃ śatruṃ vikrāntaṃ dundubheḥ sutam
analyzed: sūdayitvā tu tam śatrum vikrāntam dundubheḥ sutam

original: 4.010.017c niṣkrāmann eva paśyāmi bilasya pihitaṃ mukham
analyzed: niṣkrāman eva paśyāmi bilasya pihitam mukham

original: 4.010.018a vikrośamānasya tu me sugrīveti punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: vikrośamānasya tu me sugrīva iti punar punar
yadā prativacaḥ na asti tatas ham bhṛśa duḥkhitaḥ

original: 4.010.019a pādaprahārais tu mayā bahuśas tad vidāritam
analyzed: pāda prahāraiḥ tu mayā bahuśas tat vidāritam

original: 4.010.019c tato 'haṃ tena niṣkramya yathā punar upāgataḥ
analyzed: tatas ham tena niṣkramya yathā punar upāgataḥ
tatra anena asmi saṃruddhaḥ rājyam mārgayatā ātmanaḥ
sugrīveṇa nṛśaṃsena vismṛtya bhrātṛ sauhṛdam

original: 4.010.021a evam uktvā tu māṃ tatra vastreṇaikena vānaraḥ
analyzed: evam uktvā tu mām tatra vastreṇa ekena vānaraḥ
tadā nirvāsayām āsa vālī vigata sādhvasaḥ

original: 4.010.022a tenāham apaviddhaś ca hṛtadāraś ca rāghava
analyzed: tena aham apaviddhaḥ ca hṛta dāraḥ ca rāghava
tad bhayāt ca mahī kṛtsnā krāntā iyam sa vana arṇavā
ṛśyamūkam giri varam bhāryā haraṇa duḥkhitaḥ
praviṣṭaḥ smi durādharṣam vālinaḥ kāraṇa antare

original: 4.010.024a etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ vairānukathanaṃ mahat
analyzed: etat te sarvam ākhyātam vaira anukathanam mahat

original: 4.010.024c anāgasā mayā prāptaṃ vyasanaṃ paśya rāghava
analyzed: anāgasā mayā prāptam vyasanam paśya rāghava
vālinaḥ tu bhaya ārtasya sarva lokāḥ abhayaṃkara

original: 4.010.025c kartum arhasi me vīra prasādaṃ tasya nigrahāt
analyzed: kartum arhasi me vīra prasādam tasya nigrahāt

original: 4.010.026a evam uktaḥ sa tejasvī dharmajño dharmasaṃhitam
analyzed: evam uktaḥ sa tejasvī dharma jñaḥ dharma saṃhitam

original: 4.010.026c vacanaṃ vaktum ārebhe sugrīvaṃ prahasann iva
analyzed: vacanam vaktum ārebhe sugrīvam prahasan iva
amoghāḥ sūrya saṃkāśāḥ mama ime niśitāḥ śarāḥ
tasmin vālini durvṛtte patiṣyanti ruṣā anvitāḥ

original: 4.010.028a yāvat taṃ na hi paśyeyaṃ tava bhāryāpahāriṇam
analyzed: yāvat tam na hi paśyeyam tava bhāryā apahāriṇam

original: 4.010.028c tāvat sa jīvet pāpātmā vālī cāritradūṣakaḥ
analyzed: tāvat sa jīvet pāpa ātmā vālī cāritra dūṣakaḥ
ātma anumānāt paśyāmi magnam tvām śoka sāgare

original: 4.010.029c tvām ahaṃ tārayiṣyāmi kāmaṃ prāpsyasi puṣkalam
analyzed: tvām aham tārayiṣyāmi kāmam prāpsyasi puṣkalam
rāmasya vacanam śrutvā harṣa pauruṣa vardhanam

original: 4.011.001c sugrīvaḥ pūjayāṃ cakre rāghavaṃ praśaśaṃsa ca
analyzed: sugrīvaḥ cakre rāghavam praśaśaṃsa ca
asaṃśayam prajvalitaiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ marma atigaiḥ śaraiḥ

original: 4.011.002c tvaṃ daheḥ kupito lokān yugānta iva bhāskaraḥ
analyzed: tvam daheḥ kupitaḥ lokān yugānte iva bhāskaraḥ

original: 4.011.003a vālinaḥ pauruṣaṃ yat tad yac ca vīryaṃ dhṛtiś ca yā
analyzed: vālinaḥ pauruṣam yat tat yat ca vīryam dhṛtiḥ ca yā
tat mama ekamanāḥ śrutvā vidhatsva yat anantaram

original: 4.011.004a samudrāt paścimāt pūrvaṃ dakṣiṇād api cottaram
analyzed: samudrāt paścimāt pūrvam dakṣiṇāt api ca uttaram
krāmati anudite sūrye vālī vyapagata klamaḥ

original: 4.011.005a agrāṇy āruhya śailānāṃ śikharāṇi mahānty api
analyzed: agrāṇi āruhya śailānām śikharāṇi mahānti api
ūrdhvam utkṣipya tarasā pratigṛhṇāti vīryavān

original: 4.011.006a bahavaḥ sāravantaś ca vaneṣu vividhā drumāḥ
analyzed: bahavaḥ sāravantaḥ ca vaneṣu vividhāḥ drumāḥ
vālinā tarasā bhagnāḥ balam prathayatā ātmanaḥ
mahiṣaḥ dundubhiḥ nāma kailāsa śikhara prabhaḥ
balam nāga sahasrasya dhārayām āsa vīryavān
vīrya utsekena duṣṭa ātmā vara dānāt ca mohitaḥ

original: 4.011.008c jagāma sa mahākāyaḥ samudraṃ saritāṃ patim
analyzed: jagāma sa mahā kāyaḥ samudram saritām patim
ūrmimantam atikramya sāgaram ratna saṃcayam

original: 4.011.009c mama yuddhaṃ prayaccheti tam uvāca mahārṇavam
analyzed: mama yuddham prayaccha iti tam uvāca mahā arṇavam
tatas samudraḥ dharma ātmā samutthāya mahā balaḥ
abravīt vacanam rājan asuram kāla coditam

original: 4.011.011a samartho nāsmi te dātuṃ yuddhaṃ yuddhaviśārada
analyzed: samarthaḥ nā asmi te dātum yuddham yuddha viśārada

original: 4.011.011c śrūyatām abhidhāsyāmi yas te yuddhaṃ pradāsyati
analyzed: śrūyatām abhidhāsyāmi yaḥ te yuddham pradāsyati
śailarājaḥ mahā araṇye tapasvi śaraṇam param
śaṃkaraśvaśuraḥ nāmnā himavān iti viśrutaḥ
guhā prasravaṇa upetaḥ bahu kandara nirjharaḥ

original: 4.011.013c sa samarthas tava prītim atulāṃ kartum āhave
analyzed: sa samarthaḥ tava prītim atulām kartum āhave

original: 4.011.014a taṃ bhītam iti vijñāya samudram asurottamaḥ
analyzed: tam bhītam iti vijñāya samudram asura uttamaḥ

original: 4.011.014c himavadvanam āgacchac charaś cāpād iva cyutaḥ
analyzed: himavat vanam āgacchat śaraḥ cāpāt iva cyutaḥ

original: 4.011.015a tatas tasya gireḥ śvetā gajendravipulāḥ śilāḥ
analyzed: tatas tasya gireḥ śvetāḥ gaja indra vipulāḥ śilāḥ

original: 4.011.015c cikṣepa bahudhā bhūmau dundubhir vinanāda ca
analyzed: cikṣepa bahudhā bhūmau dundubhiḥ vinanāda ca
tatas śveta ambuda ākāraḥ saumyaḥ prīti kara ākṛtiḥ

original: 4.011.016c himavān abravīd vākyaṃ sva eva śikhare sthitaḥ
analyzed: himavān abravīt vākyam sve eva śikhare sthitaḥ

original: 4.011.017a kleṣṭum arhasi māṃ na tvaṃ dundubhe dharmavatsala
analyzed: kleṣṭum arhasi mām na tvam dundubhe dharma vatsala
raṇa karmasu akuśalaḥ tapasvi śaraṇam hi aham
tasya tat vacanam śrutvā giri rājasya dhīmataḥ
uvāca dundubhiḥ vākyam krodhāt saṃrakta locanaḥ

original: 4.011.019a yadi yuddhe 'samarthas tvaṃ madbhayād vā nirudyamaḥ
analyzed: yadi yuddhe samarthaḥ tvam mad bhayāt vā nirudyamaḥ

original: 4.011.019c tam ācakṣva pradadyān me yo 'dya yuddhaṃ yuyutsataḥ
analyzed: tam ācakṣva pradadyāt me yaḥ dya yuddham yuyutsataḥ
himavān abravīt vākyam śrutvā vākya viśāradaḥ
an ukta pūrvam dharma ātmā krodhāt tam asura uttamam
vālī nāma mahā prājñaḥ śakra tulya parākramaḥ
adhyāste vānaraḥ śrīmān kiṣkindhām atula prabhām
sa samarthaḥ mahā prājñaḥ tava yuddha viśāradaḥ

original: 4.011.022c dvandvayuddhaṃ mahad dātuṃ namucer iva vāsavaḥ
analyzed: dvandva yuddham mahat dātum namuceḥ iva vāsavaḥ

original: 4.011.023a taṃ śīghram abhigaccha tvaṃ yadi yuddham ihecchasi
analyzed: tam śīghram abhigaccha tvam yadi yuddham iha icchasi

original: 4.011.023c sa hi durdharṣaṇo nityaṃ śūraḥ samarakarmaṇi
analyzed: sa hi durdharṣaṇaḥ nityam śūraḥ samara karmaṇi

original: 4.011.024a śrutvā himavato vākyaṃ krodhāviṣṭaḥ sa dundubhiḥ
analyzed: śrutvā himavataḥ vākyam krodha āviṣṭaḥ sa dundubhiḥ

original: 4.011.024c jagāma tāṃ purīṃ tasya kiṣkindhāṃ vālinas tadā
analyzed: jagāma tām purīm tasya kiṣkindhām vālinaḥ tadā
dhārayan māhiṣam rūpam tīkṣṇa śṛṅgaḥ bhaya āvahaḥ
prāvṛṣi iva mahā meghaḥ toya pūrṇaḥ nabhastale

original: 4.011.026a tatas tu dvāram āgamya kiṣkindhāyā mahābalaḥ
analyzed: tatas tu dvāram āgamya kiṣkindhāyāḥ mahā balaḥ

original: 4.011.026c nanarda kampayan bhūmiṃ dundubhir dundubhir yathā
analyzed: nanarda kampayan bhūmim dundubhiḥ dundubhiḥ yathā

original: 4.011.027a samīpajān drumān bhañjan vasudhāṃ dārayan khuraiḥ
analyzed: samīpa jān drumān bhañjan vasudhām dārayan khuraiḥ
viṣāṇena ullekhan darpāt tad dvāram dviradaḥ yathā
antaḥpura gataḥ vālī śrutvā śabdam amarṣaṇaḥ

original: 4.011.028c niṣpapāta saha strībhis tārābhir iva candramāḥ
analyzed: niṣpapāta saha strībhiḥ tārābhiḥ iva candramāḥ

original: 4.011.029a mitaṃ vyaktākṣarapadaṃ tam uvāca sa dundubhim
analyzed: mitam vyakta akṣara padam tam uvāca sa dundubhim
harīṇām īśvaraḥ vālī sarveṣām vana cāriṇām
kimartham nagara dvāram idam ruddhvā vinardasi

original: 4.011.030c dundubhe vidito me 'si rakṣa prāṇān mahābala
analyzed: dundubhe viditaḥ me si rakṣa prāṇān mahā bala
tasya tat vacanam śrutvā vānara indrasya dhīmataḥ
uvāca dundubhiḥ vākyam krodhāt saṃrakta locanaḥ

original: 4.011.032a na tvaṃ strīsaṃnidhau vīra vacanaṃ vaktum arhasi
analyzed: na tvam strī saṃnidhau vīra vacanam vaktum arhasi

original: 4.011.032c mama yuddhaṃ prayaccha tvaṃ tato jñāsyāmi te balam
analyzed: mama yuddham prayaccha tvam tatas jñāsyāmi te balam

original: 4.011.033a atha vā dhārayiṣyāmi krodham adya niśām imām
analyzed: atha vā dhārayiṣyāmi krodham adya niśām imām
gṛhyatām udayaḥ svairam kāma bhogeṣu vānara

original: 4.011.034a yo hi mattaṃ pramattaṃ vā suptaṃ vā rahitaṃ bhṛśam
analyzed: yaḥ hi mattam pramattam vā suptam vā rahitam bhṛśam

original: 4.011.034c hanyāt sa bhrūṇahā loke tvadvidhaṃ madamohitam
analyzed: hanyāt sa bhrūṇa hā loke tvadvidham mada mohitam

original: 4.011.035a sa prahasyābravīn mandaṃ krodhāt tam asurottamam
analyzed: sa prahasya abravīt mandam krodhāt tam asura uttamam

original: 4.011.035c visṛjya tāḥ striyaḥ sarvās tārā prabhiṛtikās tadā
analyzed: visṛjya tāḥ striyaḥ sarvāḥ tārā prabhiṛtikāḥ tadā

original: 4.011.036a matto 'yam iti mā maṃsthā yady abhīto 'si saṃyuge
analyzed: mattaḥ yam iti mā maṃsthāḥ yadi abhītaḥ si saṃyuge
madaḥ yam saṃprahāre smin vīrapānam samarthyatām

original: 4.011.037a tam evam uktvā saṃkruddho mālām utkṣipya kāñcanīm
analyzed: tam evam uktvā saṃkruddhaḥ mālām utkṣipya kāñcanīm
pitrā dattām mahā indreṇa yuddhāya vyavatiṣṭhata
viṣāṇayoḥ gṛhītvā tam dundubhim giri saṃnibham

original: 4.011.038c vālī vyāpātayāṃ cakre nanarda ca mahāsvanam
analyzed: vālī vyāpātayām cakre nanarda ca mahā svanam

original: 4.011.039a yuddhe prāṇahare tasmin niṣpiṣṭo dundubhis tadā
analyzed: yuddhe prāṇa hare tasmin niṣpiṣṭaḥ dundubhiḥ tadā

original: 4.011.039c śrotrābhyām atha raktaṃ tu tasya susrāva pātyataḥ
analyzed: śrotrābhyām atha raktam tu tasya susrāva

original: 4.011.039e papāta ca mahākāyaḥ kṣitau pañcatvam āgataḥ
analyzed: papāta ca mahā kāyaḥ kṣitau pañcatvam āgataḥ
tam tolayitvā bāhubhyām gata sattvam acetanam
cikṣepa vegavān vālī vegena ekena yojanam
tasya vega praviddhasya vaktrāt kṣataja bindavaḥ
prapetuḥ māruta utkṣiptāḥ mataṅgasya āśramam prati

original: 4.011.042a tān dṛṣṭvā patitāṃs tatra muniḥ śoṇitavipruṣaḥ
analyzed: tān dṛṣṭvā patitān tatra muniḥ śoṇita vipruṣaḥ
utsasarja mahā śāpam kṣeptāram vālinam prati
iha tena a praveṣṭavyam praviṣṭasya badhaḥ bhavet

original: 4.011.043a sa maharṣiṃ samāsādya yācate sma kṛtāñjaliḥ
analyzed: sa mahā ṛṣim samāsādya yācate sma kṛtāñjaliḥ
tatas śāpa bhayāt bhītaḥ ṛśyamūkam mahā girim

original: 4.011.044c praveṣṭuṃ necchati harir draṣṭuṃ vāpi nareśvara
analyzed: praveṣṭum nā icchati hariḥ draṣṭum vā api nareśvara
tasya apraveśam jñātvā aham idam rāma mahā vanam
vicarāmi sahāmātyaḥ viṣādena vivarjitaḥ
eṣaḥ u sthi nicayaḥ tasya dundubheḥ saṃprakāśate
vīrya utsekān nirastasya giri kūṭa nibhaḥ mahān

original: 4.011.047a ime ca vipulāḥ sālāḥ sapta śākhāvalambinaḥ
analyzed: ime ca vipulāḥ sālāḥ sapta śākhā avalambinaḥ
yatra ekam ghaṭate vālī niṣpatrayitum ojasā

original: 4.011.048a etad asyāsamaṃ vīryaṃ mayā rāma prakāśitam
analyzed: etat asya asamam vīryam mayā rāma prakāśitam

original: 4.011.048c kathaṃ taṃ vālinaṃ hantuṃ samare śakṣyase nṛpa
analyzed: katham tam vālinam hantum samare śakṣyase nṛpa

original: 4.011.049a yadi bhindyād bhavān sālān imāṃs tv ekeṣuṇā tataḥ
analyzed: yadi bhindyāt bhavān sālān imān tu eka iṣuṇā tatas

original: 4.011.049c jānīyāṃ tvāṃ mahābāho samarthaṃ vālino vadhe
analyzed: jānīyām tvām mahā bāho samartham vālinaḥ vadhe
tasya tat vacanam śrutvā sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ
rāghavaḥ dundubheḥ kāyam pādāṅguṣṭhena līlayā
tolayitvā mahā bāhuḥ cikṣepa daśa yojanam

original: 4.011.051a kṣiptaṃ dṛṣṭvā tataḥ kāyaṃ sugrīvaḥ punar abravīt
analyzed: kṣiptam dṛṣṭvā tatas kāyam sugrīvaḥ punar abravīt
lakṣmaṇasya agratas rāmam idam vacanam arthavat

original: 4.011.052a ārdraḥ samāṃsapratyagraḥ kṣiptaḥ kāyaḥ purā sakhe
analyzed: ārdraḥ sa māṃsa pratyagraḥ kṣiptaḥ kāyaḥ purā sakhe

original: 4.011.052c laghuḥ saṃprati nirmāṃsas tṛṇabhūtaś ca rāghava
analyzed: laghuḥ saṃprati nirmāṃsaḥ tṛṇa bhūtaḥ ca rāghava

original: 4.011.052e nātra śakyaṃ balaṃ jñātuṃ tava vā tasya vādhikam
analyzed: na atra śakyam balam jñātum tava vā tasya vā adhikam

original: 4.012.001a etac ca vacanaṃ śrutvā sugrīveṇa subhāṣitam
analyzed: etat ca vacanam śrutvā sugrīveṇa subhāṣitam
pratyaya artham mahā tejāḥ rāmaḥ jagrāha kārmukam

original: 4.012.002a sa gṛhītvā dhanur ghoraṃ śaram ekaṃ ca mānadaḥ
analyzed: sa gṛhītvā dhanuḥ ghoram śaram ekam ca mānadaḥ

original: 4.012.002c sālān uddiśya cikṣepa jyāsvanaiḥ pūrayan diśaḥ
analyzed: sālān uddiśya cikṣepa jyā svanaiḥ pūrayan diśaḥ
sa visṛṣṭaḥ balavatā bāṇaḥ svarṇa pariṣkṛtaḥ

original: 4.012.003c bhittvā sālān giriprasthe sapta bhūmiṃ viveśa ha
analyzed: bhittvā sālān giri prasthe sapta bhūmim viveśa ha

original: 4.012.004a praviṣṭas tu muhūrtena rasāṃ bhittvā mahājavaḥ
analyzed: praviṣṭaḥ tu muhūrtena rasām bhittvā mahā javaḥ

original: 4.012.004c niṣpatya ca punas tūrṇaṃ svatūṇīṃ praviveśa ha
analyzed: niṣpatya ca punar tūrṇam sva tūṇīm praviveśa ha

original: 4.012.005a tān dṛṣṭvā sapta nirbhinnān sālān vānarapuṃgavaḥ
analyzed: tān dṛṣṭvā sapta nirbhinnān sālān vānara puṃgavaḥ
rāmasya śara vegena vismayam paramam gataḥ
sa mūrdhnā nyapatat bhūmau pralambīkṛta bhūṣaṇaḥ
sugrīvaḥ parama prītaḥ rāghavāya kṛta añjaliḥ

original: 4.012.007a idaṃ covāca dharmajñaṃ karmaṇā tena harṣitaḥ
analyzed: idam ca uvāca dharma jñam karmaṇā tena harṣitaḥ
rāmam sarva astra viduṣām śreṣṭham śūram avasthitam

original: 4.012.008a sendrān api surān sarvāṃs tvaṃ bāṇaiḥ puruṣarṣabha
analyzed: sa indrān api surān sarvān tvam bāṇaiḥ puruṣa ṛṣabha

original: 4.012.008c samarthaḥ samare hantuṃ kiṃ punar vālinaṃ prabho
analyzed: samarthaḥ samare hantum kim punar vālinam prabho

original: 4.012.009a yena sapta mahāsālā girir bhūmiś ca dāritāḥ
analyzed: yena sapta mahā sālāḥ giriḥ bhūmiḥ ca dāritāḥ

original: 4.012.009c bāṇenaikena kākutstha sthātā te ko raṇāgrataḥ
analyzed: bāṇena ekena kākutstha sthātā te kaḥ raṇa agrataḥ

original: 4.012.010a adya me vigataḥ śokaḥ prītir adya parā mama
analyzed: adya me vigataḥ śokaḥ prītiḥ adya parā mama
suhṛdam tvām samāsādya mahā indra varuṇa upamam

original: 4.012.011a tam adyaiva priyārthaṃ me vairiṇaṃ bhrātṛrūpiṇam
analyzed: tam adyā eva priya artham me vairiṇam bhrātṛ rūpiṇam

original: 4.012.011c vālinaṃ jahi kākutstha mayā baddho 'yam añjaliḥ
analyzed: vālinam jahi kākutstha mayā baddhaḥ yam añjaliḥ
tatas rāmaḥ pariṣvajya sugrīvam priya darśanam
pratyuvāca mahā prājñaḥ lakṣmaṇa anumatam vacaḥ

original: 4.012.013a asmād gacchāma kiṣkindhāṃ kṣipraṃ gaccha tvam agrataḥ
analyzed: asmāt gacchāma kiṣkindhām kṣipram gaccha tvam agratas
gatvā ca āhvaya sugrīva vālinam bhrātṛ gandhinam

original: 4.012.014a sarve te tvaritaṃ gatvā kiṣkindhāṃ vālinaḥ purīm
analyzed: sarve te tvaritam gatvā kiṣkindhām vālinaḥ purīm

original: 4.012.014c vṛkṣair ātmānam āvṛtya vyatiṣṭhan gahane vane
analyzed: vṛkṣaiḥ ātmānam āvṛtya vyatiṣṭhan gahane vane
sugrīvaḥ vyanadat ghoram vālinaḥ hvāna kāraṇāt

original: 4.012.015c gāḍhaṃ parihito vegān nādair bhindann ivāmbaram
analyzed: gāḍham parihitaḥ vegāt nādaiḥ bhindan iva ambaram

original: 4.012.016a taṃ śrutvā ninadaṃ bhrātuḥ kruddho vālī mahābalaḥ
analyzed: tam śrutvā ninadam bhrātuḥ kruddhaḥ vālī mahā balaḥ
niṣpapāta su saṃrabdhaḥ bhāskaraḥ sta taṭāt iva
tatas su tumulam yuddham vāli sugrīvayoḥ abhūt
gagane grahayoḥ ghoram budha aṅgārakayoḥ iva

original: 4.012.018a talair aśanikalpaiś ca vajrakalpaiś ca muṣṭibhiḥ
analyzed: talaiḥ aśani kalpaiḥ ca vajra kalpaiḥ ca muṣṭibhiḥ
jaghnatuḥ samare nyonyam bhrātarau krodha mūrchitau

original: 4.012.019a tato rāmo dhanuṣpāṇis tāv ubhau samudīkṣya tu
analyzed: tatas rāmaḥ dhanuṣpāṇiḥ tau ubhau samudīkṣya tu
anyonya sadṛśau vīrau ubhau devau iva aśvinau

original: 4.012.020a yan nāvagacchat sugrīvaṃ vālinaṃ vāpi rāghavaḥ
analyzed: yat na avagacchat sugrīvam vālinam vā api rāghavaḥ

original: 4.012.020c tato na kṛtavān buddhiṃ moktum antakaraṃ śaram
analyzed: tatas na kṛtavān buddhim moktum anta karam śaram

original: 4.012.021a etasminn antare bhagnaḥ sugrīvas tena vālinā
analyzed: etasmin antare bhagnaḥ sugrīvaḥ tena vālinā
apaśyan rāghavam nātham ṛśyamūkam pradudruve
klāntaḥ rudhira sikta aṅgaḥ prahāraiḥ jarjarīkṛtaḥ
vālinā abhidrutaḥ krodhāt praviveśa mahā vanam

original: 4.012.023a taṃ praviṣṭaṃ vanaṃ dṛṣṭvā vālī śāpabhayāt tataḥ
analyzed: tam praviṣṭam vanam dṛṣṭvā vālī śāpa bhayāt tatas

original: 4.012.023c mukto hy asi tvam ity uktvā sa nivṛtto mahābalaḥ
analyzed: muktaḥ hi asi tvam iti uktvā sa nivṛttaḥ mahā balaḥ

original: 4.012.024a rāghavo 'pi saha bhrātrā saha caiva hanūmatā
analyzed: rāghavaḥ saha bhrātrā saha ca eva hanūmatā

original: 4.012.024c tad eva vanam āgacchat sugrīvo yatra vānaraḥ
analyzed: tat eva vanam āgacchat sugrīvaḥ yatra vānaraḥ
tam samīkṣya āgatam rāmam sugrīvaḥ sahalakṣmaṇam
hrīmān dīnam uvāca idam vasudhām avalokayan

original: 4.012.026a āhvayasveti mām uktvā darśayitvā ca vikramam
analyzed: āhvayasva iti mām uktvā darśayitvā ca vikramam

original: 4.012.026c vairiṇā ghātayitvā ca kim idānīṃ tvayā kṛtam
analyzed: vairiṇā ghātayitvā ca kim idānīm tvayā kṛtam

original: 4.012.027a tām eva velāṃ vaktavyaṃ tvayā rāghava tattvataḥ
analyzed: tām eva velām vaktavyam tvayā rāghava tattvataḥ

original: 4.012.027c vālinaṃ na nihanmīti tato nāham ito vraje
analyzed: vālinam na nihanmi iti tatas na aham itas vraje
tasya ca evam bruvāṇasya sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 4.012.028c karuṇaṃ dīnayā vācā rāghavaḥ punar abravīt
analyzed: karuṇam dīnayā vācā rāghavaḥ punar abravīt

original: 4.012.029a sugrīva śrūyatāṃ tātaḥ krodhaś ca vyapanīyatām
analyzed: sugrīva śrūyatām tātaḥ krodhaḥ ca vyapanīyatām

original: 4.012.029c kāraṇaṃ yena bāṇo 'yaṃ na mayā sa visarjitaḥ
analyzed: kāraṇam yena bāṇaḥ yam na mayā sa visarjitaḥ
alaṃkāreṇa veṣeṇa pramāṇena gatena ca

original: 4.012.030c tvaṃ ca sugrīva vālī ca sadṛśau sthaḥ parasparam
analyzed: tvam ca sugrīva vālī ca sadṛśau sthaḥ parasparam

original: 4.012.031a svareṇa varcasā caiva prekṣitena ca vānara
analyzed: svareṇa varcasā ca eva prekṣitena ca vānara

original: 4.012.031c vikrameṇa ca vākyaiś ca vyaktiṃ vāṃ nopalakṣaye
analyzed: vikrameṇa ca vākyaiḥ ca vyaktim vām na upalakṣaye
tatas ham rūpa sādṛśyāt mohitaḥ vānara uttama
na utsṛjāmi mahā vegam śaram śatru nibarhaṇam

original: 4.012.033a etanmuhūrte tu mayā paśya vālinam āhave
analyzed: etad muhūrte tu mayā paśya vālinam āhave
nirastam iṣuṇā ekena veṣṭamānam mahī tale
abhijñānam kuruṣva tvam ātmanaḥ vānara īśvara
yena tvām abhijānīyām dvandva yuddham upāgatam
gajapuṣpīm imām phullām utpāṭya śubha lakṣaṇām
kuru lakṣmaṇa kaṇṭhe sya sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ
tatas giri taṭe jātām utpāṭya kusuma āyutām

original: 4.012.036c lakṣmaṇo gajapuṣpīṃ tāṃ tasya kaṇṭhe vyasarjayat
analyzed: lakṣmaṇaḥ gajapuṣpīm tām tasya kaṇṭhe vyasarjayat

original: 4.012.037a sa tathā śuśubhe śrīmāṃl latayā kaṇṭhasaktayā
analyzed: sa tathā śuśubhe śrīmān latayā kaṇṭha saktayā
mālayā iva balākānām sa saṃdhyaḥ iva toyadaḥ
vibhrājamānaḥ vapuṣā rāma vākya samāhitaḥ
jagāma saha rāmeṇa kiṣkindhām vāli pālitām
ṛśyamūkāt sa dharma ātmā kiṣkindhām lakṣmaṇa agrajaḥ
jagāma saha sugrīvaḥ vāli vikrama pālitām
samudyamya mahat cāpam rāmaḥ kāñcana bhūṣitam
śarān ca āditya saṃkāśān gṛhītvā raṇa sādhakān

original: 4.013.003a agratas tu yayau tasya rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: agratas tu yayau tasya rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ
sugrīvaḥ saṃhata grīvaḥ lakṣmaṇaḥ ca mahā balaḥ

original: 4.013.004a pṛṣṭhato hanumān vīro nalo nīlaś ca vānaraḥ
analyzed: pṛṣṭhatas hanumān vīraḥ nalaḥ nīlaḥ ca vānaraḥ
tāraḥ ca eva mahā tejāḥ hari yūthapa yūthapāḥ
te vīkṣamāṇāḥ vṛkṣān ca puṣpa bhāra avalambinaḥ
prasanna ambu vahāḥ ca eva saritaḥ sāgaram gamāḥ

original: 4.013.006a kandarāṇi ca śailāṃś ca nirjharāṇi guhās tathā
analyzed: kandarāṇi ca śailān ca nirjharāṇi guhāḥ tathā

original: 4.013.006c śikharāṇi ca mukhyāni darīś ca priyadarśanāḥ
analyzed: śikharāṇi ca mukhyāni darīḥ ca priya darśanāḥ
vaidūrya vimalaiḥ parṇaiḥ padmaiḥ ca ākāśa kuḍmalaiḥ

original: 4.013.007c śobhitān sajalān mārge taṭākāṃś ca vyalokayan
analyzed: śobhitān sa jalān mārge taṭākān ca vyalokayan
kāraṇḍaiḥ sārasaiḥ haṃsaiḥ vañjūlaiḥ jalakukkuṭaiḥ
cakravākaiḥ tathā ca anyaiḥ śakunaiḥ pratināditān
mṛdu śaṣpa aṅkura āhārān nirbhayān vana gocarān
carataḥ sarvatas paśyan sthalīṣu hariṇān sthitān
taṭāka vairiṇaḥ ca api śukla danta vibhūṣitān
ghorān ekacarān vanyān dviradān kūla ghātinaḥ

original: 4.013.011a vane vanacarāṃś cānyān khecarāṃś ca vihaṃgamān
analyzed: vane vana carān ca anyān khecarān ca vihaṃgamān
paśyantaḥ tvaritāḥ jagmuḥ sugrīva vaśa vartinaḥ

original: 4.013.012a teṣāṃ tu gacchatāṃ tatra tvaritaṃ raghunandanaḥ
analyzed: teṣām tu gacchatām tatra tvaritam raghunandanaḥ

original: 4.013.012c drumaṣaṇḍaṃ vanaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmaḥ sugrīvam abravīt
analyzed: druma ṣaṇḍam vanam dṛṣṭvā rāmaḥ sugrīvam abravīt
eṣa meghaḥ iva ākāśe vṛkṣa ṣaṇḍaḥ prakāśate

original: 4.013.014a kim etaj jñātum icchāmi sakhe kautūhalaṃ mama
analyzed: kim etat jñātum icchāmi sakhe kautūhalam mama
kautūhala apanayanam kartum icchāmi aham tvayā
tasya tat vacanam śrutvā rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 4.013.015c gacchann evācacakṣe 'tha sugrīvas tan mahad vanam
analyzed: gacchan eva ācacakṣe tha sugrīvaḥ tat mahat vanam
etat rāghava vistīrṇam āśramam śrama nāśanam
udyāna vana saṃpannam svādu mūla phala udakam
atra saptajanāḥ nāma munayaḥ saṃśita vratāḥ
sapta eva āsan adhaḥśīrṣāḥ niyatam jala śāyinaḥ
sapta rātra kṛta āhārāḥ vāyunā vana vāsinaḥ
divam varṣa śataiḥ yātāḥ saptabhiḥ sa kalevarāḥ
teṣām evam prabhāvena druma prākāra saṃvṛtam
āśramam su durādharṣam api sa indraiḥ sura asuraiḥ
pakṣiṇaḥ varjayanti etat tathā anye vana cāriṇaḥ

original: 4.013.020c viśanti mohād ye 'py atra nivartante na te punaḥ
analyzed: viśanti mohāt ye pi atra nivartante na te punar
vibhūṣaṇa ravāḥ ca atra śrūyante sakala akṣarāḥ

original: 4.013.021c tūryagītasvanāś cāpi gandho divyaś ca rāghava
analyzed: tūrya gīta svanāḥ ca api gandhaḥ divyaḥ ca rāghava

original: 4.013.022a tretāgnayo 'pi dīpyante dhūmo hy eṣa pradṛśyate
analyzed: tretāgnayaḥ pi dīpyante dhūmaḥ hi eṣa pradṛśyate
veṣṭayan iva vṛkṣa agrān kapota aṅga aruṇaḥ ghanaḥ

original: 4.013.023a kuru praṇāmaṃ dharmātmaṃs tān samuddiśya rāghavaḥ
analyzed: kuru praṇāmam dharma ātman tān samuddiśya rāghavaḥ
lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā prayataḥ saṃyata añjaliḥ

original: 4.013.024a praṇamanti hi ye teṣām ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvitātmanām
analyzed: praṇamanti hi ye teṣām ṛṣīṇām bhāvitātmanām

original: 4.013.024c na teṣām aśubhaṃ kiṃ cic charīre rāma dṛśyate
analyzed: na teṣām aśubham kim cit śarīre rāma dṛśyate

original: 4.013.025a tato rāmaḥ saha bhrātrā lakṣmaṇena kṛtāñjaliḥ
analyzed: tatas rāmaḥ saha bhrātrā lakṣmaṇena kṛta añjaliḥ
samuddiśya mahātmānaḥ tān ṛṣīn abhyavādayat

original: 4.013.026a abhivādya ca dharmātmā rāmo bhrātā ca lakṣmaṇaḥ
analyzed: abhivādya ca dharma ātmā rāmaḥ bhrātā ca lakṣmaṇaḥ
sugrīvaḥ vānarāḥ ca eva jagmuḥ saṃhṛṣṭa mānasāḥ

original: 4.013.027a te gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ tasmāt saptajanāśramāt
analyzed: te gatvā dūram adhvānam tasmāt saptajana āśramāt
dadṛśuḥ tām durādharṣām kiṣkindhām vāli pālitām

original: 4.014.001a sarve te tvaritaṃ gatvā kiṣkindhāṃ vālipālitām
analyzed: sarve te tvaritam gatvā kiṣkindhām vāli pālitām

original: 4.014.001c vṛkṣair ātmānam āvṛtya vyatiṣṭhan gahane vane
analyzed: vṛkṣaiḥ ātmānam āvṛtya vyatiṣṭhan gahane vane
vicārya sarvatas dṛṣṭim kānane kānana priyaḥ
sugrīvaḥ vipula grīvaḥ krodham āhārayat bhṛśam

original: 4.014.003a tataḥ sa ninadaṃ ghoraṃ kṛtvā yuddhāya cāhvayat
analyzed: tatas sa ninadam ghoram kṛtvā yuddhāya ca āhvayat
parivāraiḥ parivṛtaḥ nādaiḥ bhindan iva ambaram
atha bāla arka sadṛśaḥ dṛpta siṃha gatiḥ tadā

original: 4.014.004c dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ kriyādakṣaṃ sugrīvo vākyam abravīt
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā rāmam kriyā dakṣam sugrīvaḥ vākyam abravīt
hari vāgurayā vyāptam tapta kāñcana toraṇām

original: 4.014.005c prāptāḥ sma dhvajayantrāḍhyāṃ kiṣkindhāṃ vālinaḥ purīm
analyzed: prāptāḥ sma dhvaja yantra āḍhyām kiṣkindhām vālinaḥ purīm

original: 4.014.006a pratijñā yā tvayā vīra kṛtā vālivadhe purā
analyzed: pratijñā yā tvayā vīra kṛtā vāli vadhe purā

original: 4.014.006c saphalāṃ tāṃ kuru kṣipraṃ latāṃ kāla ivāgataḥ
analyzed: saphalām tām kuru kṣipram latām kālaḥ iva āgataḥ

original: 4.014.007a evam uktas tu dharmātmā sugrīveṇa sa rāghavaḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu dharma ātmā sugrīveṇa sa rāghavaḥ
tam athā uvāca sugrīvam vacanam śatru sūdanaḥ
kṛta abhijñāna cihnaḥ tvam anayā gajasāhvayā
viparītaḥ iva ākāśe sūryaḥ nakṣatra mālayā

original: 4.014.009a adya vālisamutthaṃ te bhayaṃ vairaṃ ca vānara
analyzed: adya vāli samuttham te bhayam vairam ca vānara
ekena aham pramokṣyāmi bāṇa mokṣeṇa saṃyuge
mama darśaya sugrīva vairiṇam bhrātṛ rūpiṇam

original: 4.014.010c vālī vinihato yāvad vane pāṃsuṣu veṣṭate
analyzed: vālī vinihataḥ yāvat vane pāṃsuṣu veṣṭate

original: 4.014.011a yadi dṛṣṭipathaṃ prāpto jīvan sa vinivartate
analyzed: yadi dṛṣṭi patham prāptaḥ jīvan sa vinivartate

original: 4.014.011c tato doṣeṇa mā gacchet sadyo garhec ca mā bhavān
analyzed: tatas doṣeṇa mā gacchet sadyas garhet ca mā bhavān

original: 4.014.012a pratyakṣaṃ sapta te sālā mayā bāṇena dāritāḥ
analyzed: pratyakṣam sapta te sālāḥ mayā bāṇena dāritāḥ

original: 4.014.012c tato vetsi balenādya bālinaṃ nihataṃ mayā
analyzed: tatas vetsi balena adya bālinam nihatam mayā

original: 4.014.013a anṛtaṃ noktapūrvaṃ me vīra kṛcchre 'pi tiṣṭhatā
analyzed: anṛtam na ukta pūrvam me vīra kṛcchre tiṣṭhatā

original: 4.014.013c dharmalobhaparītena na ca vakṣye kathaṃ cana
analyzed: dharma lobha parītena na ca vakṣye katham cana

original: 4.014.014a saphalāṃ ca kariṣyāmi pratijñāṃ jahi saṃbhramam
analyzed: saphalām ca kariṣyāmi pratijñām jahi saṃbhramam
prasūtam kalamam kṣetre varṣeṇa iva śatakratuḥ
tad āhvāna nimittam tvam vālinaḥ hema mālinaḥ

original: 4.014.015c sugrīva kuru taṃ śabdaṃ niṣpated yena vānaraḥ
analyzed: sugrīva kuru tam śabdam niṣpatet yena vānaraḥ
jitakāśī jaya ślāghī tvayā ca ādharṣitaḥ purāt
niṣpatiṣyati asaṃgena vālī sa priya saṃyugaḥ

original: 4.014.017a ripūṇāṃ dharṣaṇaṃ śūrā marṣayanti na saṃyuge
analyzed: ripūṇām dharṣaṇam śūrāḥ marṣayanti na saṃyuge

original: 4.014.017c jānantas tu svakaṃ vīryaṃ strīsamakṣaṃ viśeṣataḥ
analyzed: jānantaḥ tu svakam vīryam strī samakṣam viśeṣataḥ

original: 4.014.018a sa tu rāmavacaḥ śrutvā sugrīvo hemapiṅgalaḥ
analyzed: sa tu rāma vacaḥ śrutvā sugrīvaḥ hema piṅgalaḥ
nanarda krūra nādena vinirbhindan iva ambaram

original: 4.014.019a tasya śabdena vitrastā gāvo yānti hataprabhāḥ
analyzed: tasya śabdena vitrastāḥ gāvaḥ yānti hata prabhāḥ
rāja doṣa parāmṛṣṭāḥ kulastriyaḥ iva ākulāḥ

original: 4.014.020a dravanti ca mṛgāḥ śīghraṃ bhagnā iva raṇe hayāḥ
analyzed: dravanti ca mṛgāḥ śīghram bhagnāḥ iva raṇe hayāḥ

original: 4.014.020c patanti ca khagā bhūmau kṣīṇapuṇyā iva grahāḥ
analyzed: patanti ca khagāḥ bhūmau kṣīṇa puṇyāḥ iva grahāḥ
tatas sa jīmūta gaṇa praṇādaḥ
nādam vyamuñcat tvarayā pratītaḥ
saritpatiḥ vā anila cañcala ūrmiḥ

original: 4.015.001a atha tasya ninādaṃ taṃ sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: atha tasya ninādam tam sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ
śuśrāva antaḥpura gataḥ vālī bhrātuḥ amarṣaṇaḥ
śrutvā tu tasya ninadam sarva bhūta prakampanam

original: 4.015.002c madaś caikapade naṣṭaḥ krodhaś cāpatito mahān
analyzed: madaḥ ca ekapade naṣṭaḥ krodhaḥ ca āpatitaḥ mahān
sa tu roṣa parīta aṅgaḥ vālī saṃdhyā ātapa prabhaḥ
uparaktaḥ iva ādityaḥ sadyas niṣprabha tām gataḥ

original: 4.015.004a vālī daṃṣṭrā karālas tu krodhād dīptāgnisaṃnibhaḥ
analyzed: vālī daṃṣṭrā karālaḥ tu krodhāt dīpta agni saṃnibhaḥ
bhāti utpatita padma ābhaḥ samṛṇālaḥ iva hradaḥ

original: 4.015.005a śabdaṃ durmarṣaṇaṃ śrutvā niṣpapāta tato hariḥ
analyzed: śabdam durmarṣaṇam śrutvā niṣpapāta tatas hariḥ
vegena caraṇa nyāsaiḥ dārayan iva medinīm

original: 4.015.006a taṃ tu tārā pariṣvajya snehād darśitasauhṛdā
analyzed: tam tu tārā pariṣvajya snehāt darśita sauhṛdā
uvāca trasta saṃbhrāntā hita udarkam idam vacaḥ

original: 4.015.007a sādhu krodham imaṃ vīra nadī vegam ivāgatam
analyzed: sādhu krodham imam vīra nadī vegam iva āgatam

original: 4.015.007c śayanād utthitaḥ kālyaṃ tyaja bhuktām iva srajam
analyzed: śayanāt utthitaḥ kālyam tyaja bhuktām iva srajam

original: 4.015.008a sahasā tava niṣkrāmo mama tāvan na rocate
analyzed: sahasā tava niṣkrāmaḥ mama tāvat na rocate
śrūyatām abhidhāsyāmi yat nimittam nivāryase

original: 4.015.009a pūrvam āpatitaḥ krodhāt sa tvām āhvayate yudhi
analyzed: pūrvam āpatitaḥ krodhāt sa tvām āhvayate yudhi

original: 4.015.009c niṣpatya ca nirastas te hanyamāno diśo gataḥ
analyzed: niṣpatya ca nirastaḥ te hanyamānaḥ diśaḥ gataḥ
tvayā tasya nirastasya pīḍitasya viśeṣataḥ

original: 4.015.010c ihaitya punar āhvānaṃ śaṅkāṃ janayatīva me
analyzed: iha etya punar āhvānam śaṅkām janayati iva me

original: 4.015.011a darpaś ca vyavasāyaś ca yādṛśas tasya nardataḥ
analyzed: darpaḥ ca vyavasāyaḥ ca yādṛśaḥ tasya nardataḥ

original: 4.015.011c ninādasya ca saṃrambho naitad alpaṃ hi kāraṇam
analyzed: ninādasya ca saṃrambhaḥ na etat alpam hi kāraṇam

original: 4.015.012a nāsahāyam ahaṃ manye sugrīvaṃ tam ihāgatam
analyzed: na asahāyam aham manye sugrīvam tam iha āgatam
avaṣṭabdha sahāyaḥ ca yam āśritya eṣa garjati

original: 4.015.013a prakṛtyā nipuṇaś caiva buddhimāṃś caiva vānaraḥ
analyzed: prakṛtyā nipuṇaḥ ca eva buddhimān ca eva vānaraḥ
aparīkṣita vīryeṇa sugrīvaḥ saha nā eṣyati

original: 4.015.014a pūrvam eva mayā vīra śrutaṃ kathayato vacaḥ
analyzed: pūrvam eva mayā vīra śrutam kathayataḥ vacaḥ

original: 4.015.014c aṅgadasya kumārasya vakṣyāmi tvā hitaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: aṅgadasya kumārasya vakṣyāmi tvā hitam vacaḥ

original: 4.015.015a tava bhrātur hi vikhyātaḥ sahāyo raṇakarkaśaḥ
analyzed: tava bhrātuḥ hi vikhyātaḥ sahāyaḥ raṇa karkaśaḥ
rāmaḥ para bala āmardī yugānta agniḥ iva utthitaḥ
nivāsa vṛkṣaḥ sādhūnām āpannānām parā gatiḥ
ārtānām saṃśrayaḥ ca eva yaśasaḥ ca eka bhājanam
jñāna vijñāna saṃpannaḥ nideśaḥ nirataḥ pituḥ

original: 4.015.017c dhātūnām iva śailendro guṇānām ākaro mahān
analyzed: dhātūnām iva śailendraḥ guṇānām ākaraḥ mahān

original: 4.015.018a tatkṣamaṃ na virodhas te saha tena mahātmanā
analyzed: tad kṣamam na virodhaḥ te saha tena mahātmanā
durjayena aprameyena rāmeṇa raṇa karmasu

original: 4.015.019a śūra vakṣyāmi te kiṃ cin na cecchāmy abhyasūyitum
analyzed: śūra vakṣyāmi te kim cit na ca icchāmi abhyasūyitum

original: 4.015.019c śrūyatāṃ kriyatāṃ caiva tava vakṣyāmi yad dhitam
analyzed: śrūyatām kriyatām ca eva tava vakṣyāmi yat hitam
yauvarājyena sugrīvam tūrṇam sādhu abhiṣecaya

original: 4.015.020c vigrahaṃ mā kṛthā vīra bhrātrā rājan balīyasā
analyzed: vigraham mā kṛthāḥ vīra bhrātrā rājan balīyasā

original: 4.015.021a ahaṃ hi te kṣamaṃ manye tava rāmeṇa sauhṛdam
analyzed: aham hi te kṣamam manye tava rāmeṇa sauhṛdam

original: 4.015.021c sugrīveṇa ca saṃprītiṃ vairam utsṛjya dūrataḥ
analyzed: sugrīveṇa ca saṃprītim vairam utsṛjya dūratas

original: 4.015.022a lālanīyo hi te bhrātā yavīyān eṣa vānaraḥ
analyzed: lālanīyaḥ hi te bhrātā yavīyān eṣa vānaraḥ

original: 4.015.022c tatra vā sann ihastho vā sarvathā bandhur eva te
analyzed: tatra vā san ihasthaḥ vā sarvathā bandhuḥ eva te

original: 4.015.023a yadi te matpriyaṃ kāryaṃ yadi cāvaiṣi māṃ hitām
analyzed: yadi te mad priyam kāryam yadi ca avaiṣi mām hitām

original: 4.015.023c yācyamānaḥ prayatnena sādhu vākyaṃ kuruṣva me
analyzed: yācyamānaḥ prayatnena sādhu vākyam kuruṣva me
tām evam bruvatīm tārām tārādhipa nibha ānanām
