original: 4.016.001c vālī nirbhartsayām āsa vacanaṃ cedam abravīt
analyzed: vālī nirbhartsayām āsa vacanam ca idam abravīt

original: 4.016.002a garjato 'sya ca saṃrambhaṃ bhrātuḥ śatror viśeṣataḥ
analyzed: garjataḥ ca saṃrambham bhrātuḥ śatroḥ viśeṣataḥ
marṣayiṣyāmi aham kena kāraṇena varānane
a dharṣitānām śūrāṇām samareṣu anivartinām
dharṣaṇa amarṣaṇam bhīru maraṇāt atiricyate

original: 4.016.004a soḍhuṃ na ca samartho 'haṃ yuddhakāmasya saṃyuge
analyzed: soḍhum na ca samarthaḥ ham yuddha kāmasya saṃyuge
sugrīvasya ca saṃrambham hīna grīvasya garjataḥ

original: 4.016.005a na ca kāryo viṣādas te rāghavaṃ prati matkṛte
analyzed: na ca kāryaḥ viṣādaḥ te rāghavam prati mad kṛte

original: 4.016.005c dharmajñaś ca kṛtajñaś ca kathaṃ pāpaṃ kariṣyati
analyzed: dharma jñaḥ ca kṛtajñaḥ ca katham pāpam kariṣyati
nivartasva saha strībhiḥ katham bhūyas nugacchasi

original: 4.016.006c sauhṛdaṃ darśitaṃ tāre mayi bhaktiḥ kṛtā tvayā
analyzed: sauhṛdam darśitam tāre mayi bhaktiḥ kṛtā tvayā

original: 4.016.007a pratiyotsyāmy ahaṃ gatvā sugrīvaṃ jahi saṃbhramam
analyzed: pratiyotsyāmi aham gatvā sugrīvam jahi saṃbhramam

original: 4.016.007c darpaṃ cāsya vineṣyāmi na ca prāṇair vimokṣyate
analyzed: darpam ca asya vineṣyāmi na ca prāṇaiḥ vimokṣyate

original: 4.016.008a śāpitāsi mama prāṇair nivartasva jayena ca
analyzed: śāpitāsi mama prāṇaiḥ nivartasva jayena ca

original: 4.016.008c ahaṃ jitvā nivartiṣye tam alaṃ bhrātaraṃ raṇe
analyzed: aham jitvā nivartiṣye tam alam bhrātaram raṇe

original: 4.016.009a taṃ tu tārā pariṣvajya vālinaṃ priyavādinī
analyzed: tam tu tārā pariṣvajya vālinam priya vādinī

original: 4.016.009c cakāra rudatī mandaṃ dakṣiṇā sā pradakṣiṇam
analyzed: cakāra rudatī mandam dakṣiṇā sā pradakṣiṇam
tatas svastyayanam kṛtvā mantravat vijaya eṣiṇī
antaḥpuram saha strībhiḥ praviṣṭā śoka mohitā

original: 4.016.011a praviṣṭāyāṃ tu tārāyāṃ saha strībhiḥ svam ālayam
analyzed: praviṣṭāyām tu tārāyām saha strībhiḥ svam ālayam

original: 4.016.011c nagarān niryayau kruddho mahāsarpa iva śvasan
analyzed: nagarāt niryayau kruddhaḥ mahā sarpaḥ iva śvasan
sa niḥśvasya mahā vegaḥ vālī parama roṣaṇaḥ
sarvatas cārayan dṛṣṭim śatru darśana kāṅkṣayā

original: 4.016.013a sa dadarśa tataḥ śrīmān sugrīvaṃ hemapiṅgalam
analyzed: sa dadarśa tatas śrīmān sugrīvam hema piṅgalam
su saṃvītam avaṣṭabdham dīpyamānam iva analam

original: 4.016.014a sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā mahāvīryaṃ sugrīvaṃ paryavasthitam
analyzed: sa tam dṛṣṭvā mahā vīryam sugrīvam paryavasthitam
gāḍham paridadhe vāsaḥ vālī parama roṣaṇaḥ

original: 4.016.015a sa vālī gāḍhasaṃvīto muṣṭim udyamya vīryavān
analyzed: sa vālī gāḍha saṃvītaḥ muṣṭim udyamya vīryavān
sugrīvam eva abhimukhaḥ yayau yoddhum kṛtakṣaṇaḥ
śliṣṭa muṣṭim samudyamya saṃrabdhataram āgataḥ
sugrīvaḥ pi samuddiśya vālinam hema mālinam
tam vālī krodha tāmra akṣaḥ sugrīvam raṇa paṇḍitam
āpatantam mahā vegam idam vacanam abravīt

original: 4.016.018a eṣa muṣṭir mayā baddho gāḍhaḥ sunihitāṅguliḥ
analyzed: eṣa muṣṭiḥ mayā baddhaḥ gāḍhaḥ su nihita aṅguliḥ

original: 4.016.018c mayā vegavimuktas te prāṇān ādāya yāsyati
analyzed: mayā vega vimuktaḥ te prāṇān ādāya yāsyati

original: 4.016.019a evam uktas tu sugrīvaḥ kruddho vālinam abravīt
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu sugrīvaḥ kruddhaḥ vālinam abravīt

original: 4.016.019c tavaiva ca haran prāṇān muṣṭiḥ patatu mūrdhani
analyzed: tava eva ca haran prāṇān muṣṭiḥ patatu mūrdhani
tāḍitaḥ tena saṃkruddhaḥ samabhikramya vegataḥ
abhavat śoṇita udgārī sa utpīḍaḥ iva parvataḥ

original: 4.016.021a sugrīveṇa tu niḥsaṃgaṃ sālam utpāṭya tejasā
analyzed: sugrīveṇa tu niḥsaṃgam sālam utpāṭya tejasā
gātreṣu abhihataḥ vālī vajreṇa iva mahā giriḥ
sa tu vālī pracaritaḥ sāla tāḍana vihvalaḥ
guru bhāra samākrāntā sāgare nauḥ iva abhavat
tau bhīma bala vikrāntau suparṇa sama veginau
pravṛddhau ghora vapuṣau candra sūryau iva ambare
vālinā bhagna darpaḥ tu sugrīvaḥ manda vikramaḥ

original: 4.016.024c vālinaṃ prati sāmarṣo darśayām āsa lāghavam
analyzed: vālinam prati sa amarṣaḥ darśayām āsa lāghavam
tatas dhanuṣi saṃdhāya śaram āśīviṣa upamam
rāghaveṇa mahā bāṇaḥ vāli vakṣasi pātitaḥ
vegena abhihataḥ vālī nipapāta mahī tale
atha ukṣitaḥ śoṇita toya visravaiḥ
su puṣpita aśokaḥ iva anila uddhataḥ
vicetanaḥ vāsava sūnuḥ āhave
prabhraṃśita indra dhvaja vat kṣitim gataḥ
tatas śareṇa abhihataḥ rāmeṇa raṇa karkaśaḥ

original: 4.017.001c papāta sahasā vālī nikṛtta iva pādapaḥ
analyzed: papāta sahasā vālī nikṛttaḥ iva pādapaḥ
sa bhūmau nyasta sarva aṅgaḥ tapta kāñcana bhūṣaṇaḥ
apatat devarājasya mukta raśmiḥ iva dhvajaḥ
tasmin nipatite bhūmau hari ṛṣāṇām gaṇeśvare

original: 4.017.003c naṣṭacandram iva vyoma na vyarājata bhūtalam
analyzed: naṣṭa candram iva vyoma na vyarājata bhū talam
bhūmau nipatitasya api tasya deham mahātmanaḥ

original: 4.017.004c na śrīr jahāti na prāṇā na tejo na parākramaḥ
analyzed: na śrīḥ jahāti na prāṇāḥ na tejaḥ na parākramaḥ
śakra dattā varā mālā kāñcanī ratna bhūṣitā

original: 4.017.005c dadhāra harimukhyasya prāṇāṃs tejaḥ śriyaṃ ca sā
analyzed: dadhāra hari mukhyasya prāṇān tejaḥ śriyam ca sā

original: 4.017.006a sa tayā mālayā vīro haimayā hariyūthapaḥ
analyzed: sa tayā mālayā vīraḥ haimayā hari yūthapaḥ
saṃdhyā anugata paryantaḥ payodharaḥ iva abhavat

original: 4.017.007a tasya mālā ca dehaś ca marmaghātī ca yaḥ śaraḥ
analyzed: tasya mālā ca dehaḥ ca marma ghātī ca yaḥ śaraḥ
tridhā iva racitā lakṣmīḥ patitasya api śobhate
tat astram tasya vīrasya svarga mārga prabhāvanam
rāma bāṇāsana kṣiptam āvahat paramām gatim

original: 4.017.009a taṃ tathā patitaṃ saṃkhye gatārciṣam ivānalam
analyzed: tam tathā patitam saṃkhye gata   iva analam
yayātim iva puṇya ante deva lokāt paricyutam

original: 4.017.010a ādityam iva kālena yugānte bhuvi pātitam
analyzed: ādityam iva kālena yuga ante bhuvi pātitam

original: 4.017.010c mahendram iva durdharṣaṃ mahendram iva duḥsaham
analyzed: mahā indram iva durdharṣam mahā indram iva duḥsaham
mahā indra putram patitam vālinam hema mālinam
siṃha uraskam mahā bāhum dīpta āsyam hari locanam
lakṣmaṇa anugataḥ rāmaḥ dadarśa upasasarpa ca

original: 4.017.012a sa dṛṣṭvā rāghavaṃ vālī lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābalam
analyzed: sa dṛṣṭvā rāghavam vālī lakṣmaṇam ca mahā balam
abravīt praśritam vākyam paruṣam dharma saṃhitam

original: 4.017.013a parāṅmukhavadhaṃ kṛtvā ko nu prāptas tvayā guṇaḥ
analyzed: parāṅmukha vadham kṛtvā kaḥ nu prāptaḥ tvayā guṇaḥ

original: 4.017.013c yad ahaṃ yuddhasaṃrabdhas tvatkṛte nidhanaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: yat aham yuddha saṃrabdhaḥ tvad kṛte nidhanam gataḥ
kulīnaḥ sattva saṃpannaḥ tejasvī carita vrataḥ

original: 4.017.014c rāmaḥ karuṇavedī ca prajānāṃ ca hite rataḥ
analyzed: rāmaḥ karuṇa vedī ca prajānām ca hite rataḥ
sa anukrośaḥ mahā utsāhaḥ samaya jñaḥ dṛḍha vrataḥ

original: 4.017.015c iti te sarvabhūtāni kathayanti yaśo bhuvi
analyzed: iti te sarva bhūtāni kathayanti yaśaḥ bhuvi

original: 4.017.016a tān guṇān saṃpradhāryāham agryaṃ cābhijanaṃ tava
analyzed: tān guṇān saṃpradhārya aham agryam ca abhijanam tava
tārayā pratiṣiddhaḥ san sugrīveṇa samāgataḥ

original: 4.017.017a na mām anyena saṃrabdhaṃ pramattaṃ veddhum arhasi
analyzed: na mām anyena saṃrabdham pramattam veddhum arhasi

original: 4.017.017c iti me buddhir utpannā babhūvādarśane tava
analyzed: iti me buddhiḥ utpannā babhūva adarśane tava
na tvām vinihata ātmānam dharma dhvajam adhārmikam
jāne pāpa samācāram tṛṇaiḥ kūpam iva āvṛtam

original: 4.017.019a satāṃ veṣadharaṃ pāpaṃ pracchannam iva pāvakam
analyzed: satām veṣa dharam pāpam pracchannam iva pāvakam
na aham tvām abhijānāni dharma chadma abhisaṃvṛtam

original: 4.017.020a viṣaye vā pure vā te yadā nāpakaromy aham
analyzed: viṣaye vā pure vā te yadā na apakaromi aham

original: 4.017.020c na ca tvāṃ pratijāne 'haṃ kasmāt tvaṃ haṃsy akilbiṣam
analyzed: na ca tvām pratijāne ham kasmāt tvam haṃsi a kilbiṣam
phala mūla aśanam nityam vānaram vana gocaram
mām iha a pratiyudhyantam anyena ca samāgatam
tvam narādhipateḥ putraḥ pratītaḥ priya darśanaḥ

original: 4.017.022c liṅgam apy asti te rājan dṛśyate dharmasaṃhitam
analyzed: liṅgam api asti te rājan dṛśyate dharma saṃhitam
kaḥ kṣatriya kule jātaḥ śrutavān naṣṭa saṃśayaḥ
dharma liṅga praticchannaḥ krūram karma samācaret

original: 4.017.024a rāma rājakule jāto dharmavān iti viśrutaḥ
analyzed: rāma rāja kule jātaḥ dharmavān iti viśrutaḥ
abhavyaḥ bhavya rūpeṇa kimartham paridhāvasi

original: 4.017.025a sāma dānaṃ kṣamā dharmaḥ satyaṃ dhṛtiparākramau
analyzed: sāma dānam kṣamā dharmaḥ satyam dhṛti parākramau

original: 4.017.025c pārthivānāṃ guṇā rājan daṇḍaś cāpy apakāriṣu
analyzed: pārthivānām guṇāḥ rājan daṇḍaḥ ca api apakāriṣu
vayam vana carāḥ rāma mṛgāḥ mūla phala aśanāḥ

original: 4.017.026c eṣā prakṛtir asmākaṃ puruṣas tvaṃ nareśvaraḥ
analyzed: eṣā prakṛtiḥ asmākam puruṣaḥ tvam nareśvaraḥ

original: 4.017.027a bhūmir hiraṇyaṃ rūpyaṃ ca nigrahe kāraṇāni ca
analyzed: bhūmiḥ hiraṇyam rūpyam ca nigrahe kāraṇāni ca

original: 4.017.027c tatra kas te vane lobho madīyeṣu phaleṣu vā
analyzed: tatra kaḥ te vane lobhaḥ madīyeṣu phaleṣu vā

original: 4.017.028a nayaś ca vinayaś cobhau nigrahānugrahāv api
analyzed: nayaḥ ca vinayaḥ ca ubhau nigraha anugrahau api
rāja vṛttiḥ asaṃkīrṇā na nṛpāḥ kāma vṛttayaḥ

original: 4.017.029a tvaṃ tu kāmapradhānaś ca kopanaś cānavasthitaḥ
analyzed: tvam tu kāma pradhānaḥ ca kopanaḥ ca anavasthitaḥ
rāja vṛttaiḥ ca saṃkīrṇaḥ śarāsana parāyaṇaḥ

original: 4.017.030a na te 'sty apacitir dharme nārthe buddhir avasthitā
analyzed: na te sti apacitiḥ dharme na arthe buddhiḥ avasthitā
indriyaiḥ kāma vṛttaḥ san kṛṣyase manuja īśvara
hatvā bāṇena kākutstha mām iha anaparādhinam

original: 4.017.031c kiṃ vakṣyasi satāṃ madhye karma kṛtvā jugupsitam
analyzed: kim vakṣyasi satām madhye karma kṛtvā jugupsitam

original: 4.017.032a rājahā brahmahā goghnaś coraḥ prāṇivadhe rataḥ
analyzed: rāja hā brahma hā go ghnaḥ coraḥ prāṇi vadhe rataḥ
nāstikaḥ parivettā ca sarve niraya gāminaḥ

original: 4.017.033a adhāryaṃ carma me sadbhī romāṇy asthi ca varjitam
analyzed: a dhāryam carma me sadbhiḥ romāṇi asthi ca varjitam
abhakṣyāṇi ca māṃsāni tvadvidhaiḥ dharma cāribhiḥ
pañca pañcanakhāḥ bhakṣyāḥ brahma kṣatreṇa rāghava

original: 4.017.034c śalyakaḥ śvāvidho godhā śaśaḥ kūrmaś ca pañcamaḥ
analyzed: śalyakaḥ śvāvidhaḥ godhā śaśaḥ kūrmaḥ ca pañcamaḥ

original: 4.017.035a carma cāsthi ca me rājan na spṛśanti manīṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: carma ca asthi ca me rājan na spṛśanti manīṣiṇaḥ

original: 4.017.035c abhakṣyāṇi ca māṃsāni so 'haṃ pañcanakho hataḥ
analyzed: abhakṣyāṇi ca māṃsāni saḥ ham pañcanakhaḥ hataḥ

original: 4.017.036a tvayā nāthena kākutstha na sanāthā vasuṃdharā
analyzed: tvayā nāthena kākutstha na sa nāthā vasuṃdharā
pramadā śīla saṃpannā dhūrtena patitā yathā
śaṭhaḥ naikṛtikaḥ kṣudraḥ mithyā praśrita mānasaḥ

original: 4.017.037c kathaṃ daśarathena tvaṃ jātaḥ pāpo mahātmanā
analyzed: katham daśarathena tvam jātaḥ pāpaḥ mahātmanā
chinna cāritrya kakṣyeṇa satām dharma ativartinā
tyakta dharma aṅkuśena aham nihataḥ rāma hastinā

original: 4.017.039a dṛśyamānas tu yudhyethā mayā yudhi nṛpātmaja
analyzed: dṛśyamānaḥ tu yudhyethāḥ mayā yudhi nṛpa ātmaja

original: 4.017.039c adya vaivasvataṃ devaṃ paśyes tvaṃ nihato mayā
analyzed: adya vaivasvatam devam paśyeḥ tvam nihataḥ mayā
tvayā adṛśyena tu raṇe nihataḥ ham durāsadaḥ
prasuptaḥ pannagena iva naraḥ pāna vaśam gataḥ
sugrīva priya kāmena yat aham nihataḥ tvayā

original: 4.017.041c kaṇṭhe baddhvā pradadyāṃ te 'nihataṃ rāvaṇaṃ raṇe
analyzed: kaṇṭhe baddhvā pradadyām te nihatam rāvaṇam raṇe

original: 4.017.042a nyastāṃ sāgaratoye vā pātāle vāpi maithilīm
analyzed: nyastām sāgara toye vā pātāle vā api maithilīm
jānayeyam tava ādeśāt śvetām aśvatarīm iva

original: 4.017.043a yuktaṃ yat prapnuyād rājyaṃ sugrīvaḥ svargate mayi
analyzed: yuktam yat prapnuyāt rājyam sugrīvaḥ svargate mayi

original: 4.017.043c ayuktaṃ yad adharmeṇa tvayāhaṃ nihato raṇe
analyzed: ayuktam yat adharmeṇa tvayā aham nihataḥ raṇe
kāmam evaṃvidham lokaḥ kālena viniyujyate

original: 4.017.044c kṣamaṃ ced bhavatā prāptam uttaraṃ sādhu cintyatām
analyzed: kṣamam ced bhavatā prāptam uttaram sādhu cintyatām
iti evam uktvā pariśuṣka vaktraḥ
śara abhighātāt vyathitaḥ mahātmā
samīkṣya rāmam ravi saṃnikāśam
tūṣṇīm babhūva amara rāja sūnuḥ

original: 4.018.001a ity uktaḥ praśritaṃ vākyaṃ dharmārthasahitaṃ hitam
analyzed: iti uktaḥ praśritam vākyam dharma artha sahitam hitam
paruṣam vālinā rāmaḥ nihatena vicetasā
tam niṣprabham iva ādityam mukta toyam iva ambudam
ukta vākyam hari śreṣṭham upaśāntam iva analam
dharma artha guṇa saṃpannam hari īśvaram anuttamam

original: 4.018.003c adhikṣiptas tadā rāmaḥ paścād vālinam abravīt
analyzed: adhikṣiptaḥ tadā rāmaḥ paścāt vālinam abravīt

original: 4.018.004a dharmam arthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca samayaṃ cāpi laukikam
analyzed: dharmam artham ca kāmam ca samayam ca api laukikam

original: 4.018.004c avijñāya kathaṃ bālyān mām ihādya vigarhase
analyzed: a vijñāya katham bālyāt mām iha adya vigarhase
a pṛṣṭvā buddhi saṃpannān vṛddhān ācārya saṃmatān

original: 4.018.005c saumya vānaracāpalyāt tvaṃ māṃ vaktum ihecchasi
analyzed: saumya vānara cāpalyāt tvam mām vaktum iha icchasi
ikṣvākūṇām iyam bhūmiḥ sa śaila vana kānanā
mṛga pakṣi manuṣyāṇām nigraha anugrahau api

original: 4.018.007a tāṃ pālayati dharmātmā bharataḥ satyavāg ṛjuḥ
analyzed: tām pālayati dharma ātmā bharataḥ satya vāc ṛjuḥ

original: 4.018.008a nayaś ca vinayaś cobhau yasmin satyaṃ ca susthitam
analyzed: nayaḥ ca vinayaḥ ca ubhau yasmin satyam ca susthitam

original: 4.018.008c vikramaś ca yathā dṛṣṭaḥ sa rājā deśakālavit
analyzed: vikramaḥ ca yathā dṛṣṭaḥ sa rājā deśa kāla vid

original: 4.018.009a tasya dharmakṛtādeśā vayam anye ca pārthivaḥ
analyzed: tasya dharma kṛta ādeśāḥ vayam anye ca pārthivaḥ
carāmaḥ vasudhām kṛtsnām dharma saṃtānam icchavaḥ
tasmin nṛpati śārdūla bharate dharma vatsale

original: 4.018.010c pālayaty akhilāṃ bhūmiṃ kaś cared dharmanigraham
analyzed: pālayati akhilām bhūmim kaḥ caret dharma nigraham

original: 4.018.011a te vayaṃ mārgavibhraṣṭaṃ svadharme parame sthitāḥ
analyzed: te vayam mārga vibhraṣṭam svadharme parame sthitāḥ
bharata ājñām puraskṛtya nigṛhṇīmaḥ yathāvidhi

original: 4.018.012a tvaṃ tu saṃkliṣṭadharmā ca karmaṇā ca vigarhitaḥ
analyzed: tvam tu saṃkliṣṭa dharmā ca karmaṇā ca vigarhitaḥ
kāmatantra pradhānaḥ ca na sthitaḥ rāja vartmani

original: 4.018.013a jyeṣṭho bhrātā pitā caiva yaś ca vidyāṃ prayacchati
analyzed: jyeṣṭhaḥ bhrātā pitā ca eva yaḥ ca vidyām prayacchati

original: 4.018.013c trayas te pitaro jñeyā dharme ca pathi vartinaḥ
analyzed: trayaḥ te pitaraḥ jñeyāḥ dharme ca pathi vartinaḥ

original: 4.018.014a yavīyān ātmanaḥ putraḥ śiṣyaś cāpi guṇoditaḥ
analyzed: yavīyān ātmanaḥ putraḥ śiṣyaḥ ca api guṇa uditaḥ

original: 4.018.014c putravat te trayaś cintyā dharmaś ced atra kāraṇam
analyzed: putra vat te trayaḥ cintyāḥ dharmaḥ ced atra kāraṇam
sūkṣmaḥ parama durjñeyaḥ satām dharmaḥ plavaṃgama
hṛdisthaḥ sarva bhūtānām ātmā veda śubha aśubham
capalaḥ capalaiḥ sārdham vānaraiḥ akṛtātmabhiḥ

original: 4.018.016c jātyandha iva jātyandhair mantrayan drakṣyase nu kim
analyzed: jātyandhaḥ iva jātyandhaiḥ mantrayan drakṣyase nu kim

original: 4.018.017a ahaṃ tu vyaktatām asya vacanasya bravīmi te
analyzed: aham tu vyakta tām asya vacanasya bravīmi te

original: 4.018.017c na hi māṃ kevalaṃ roṣāt tvaṃ vigarhitum arhasi
analyzed: na hi mām kevalam roṣāt tvam vigarhitum arhasi

original: 4.018.018a tad etat kāraṇaṃ paśya yadarthaṃ tvaṃ mayā hataḥ
analyzed: tat etat kāraṇam paśya yad artham tvam mayā hataḥ

original: 4.018.018c bhrātur vartasi bhāryāyāṃ tyaktvā dharmaṃ sanātanam
analyzed: bhrātuḥ vartasi bhāryāyām tyaktvā dharmam sanātanam
asya tvam dharamāṇasya sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ
rumāyām vartase kāmāt snuṣāyām pāpa karma kṛt

original: 4.018.020a tad vyatītasya te dharmāt kāmavṛttasya vānara
analyzed: tat vyatītasya te dharmāt kāma vṛttasya vānara
bhrātṛ bhāryā abhimarśe smin daṇḍaḥ yam pratipāditaḥ
na hi dharma viruddhasya loka vṛttāt apeyuṣaḥ
daṇḍāt anyatra paśyāmi nigraham hari yūthapa

original: 4.018.022a aurasīṃ bhaginīṃ vāpi bhāryāṃ vāpy anujasya yaḥ
analyzed: aurasīm bhaginīm vā api bhāryām vā api anujasya yaḥ

original: 4.018.022c pracareta naraḥ kāmāt tasya daṇḍo vadhaḥ smṛtaḥ
analyzed: pracareta naraḥ kāmāt tasya daṇḍaḥ vadhaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: 4.018.023a bharatas tu mahīpālo vayaṃ tv ādeśavartinaḥ
analyzed: bharataḥ tu mahīpālaḥ vayam tu ādeśa vartinaḥ

original: 4.018.023c tvaṃ ca dharmād atikrāntaḥ kathaṃ śakyam upekṣitum
analyzed: tvam ca dharmāt atikrāntaḥ katham śakyam upekṣitum
guru dharma vyatikrāntam prājñaḥ dharmeṇa pālayan
bharataḥ kāma vṛttānām nigrahe paryavasthitaḥ

original: 4.018.025a vayaṃ tu bharatādeśaṃ vidhiṃ kṛtvā harīśvara
analyzed: vayam tu bharata ādeśam vidhim kṛtvā hari īśvara
tvadvidhān bhinna maryādān niyantum paryavasthitāḥ

original: 4.018.026a sugrīveṇa ca me sakhyaṃ lakṣmaṇena yathā tathā
analyzed: sugrīveṇa ca me sakhyam lakṣmaṇena yathā tathā

original: 4.018.026c dārarājyanimittaṃ ca niḥśreyasi rataḥ sa me
analyzed: dāra rājya nimittam ca niḥśreyasi rataḥ sa me

original: 4.018.027a pratijñā ca mayā dattā tadā vānarasaṃnidhau
analyzed: pratijñā ca mayā dattā tadā vānara saṃnidhau
pratijñā ca katham śakyā madvidhena an avekṣitum

original: 4.018.028a tad ebhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ sarvair mahadbhir dharmasaṃhitaiḥ
analyzed: tat ebhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ mahadbhiḥ dharma saṃhitaiḥ

original: 4.018.028c śāsanaṃ tava yad yuktaṃ tad bhavān anumanyatām
analyzed: śāsanam tava yat yuktam tat bhavān anumanyatām

original: 4.018.029a sarvathā dharma ity eva draṣṭavyas tava nigrahaḥ
analyzed: sarvathā dharmaḥ iti eva draṣṭavyaḥ tava nigrahaḥ
vayasyasya upakartavyam dharmam eva anupaśyatā

original: 4.018.030a rājabhir dhṛtadaṇḍās tu kṛtvā pāpāni mānavāḥ
analyzed: rājabhiḥ dhṛta daṇḍāḥ tu kṛtvā pāpāni mānavāḥ

original: 4.018.030c nirmalāḥ svargam āyānti santaḥ sukṛtino yathā
analyzed: nirmalāḥ svargam āyānti santaḥ sukṛtinaḥ yathā

original: 4.018.031a āryeṇa mama māndhātrā vyasanaṃ ghoram īpsitam
analyzed: āryeṇa mama māndhātrā vyasanam ghoram īpsitam

original: 4.018.031c śramaṇena kṛte pāpe yathā pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ tvayā
analyzed: śramaṇena kṛte pāpe yathā pāpam kṛtam tvayā

original: 4.018.032a anyair api kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ pramattair vasudhādhipaiḥ
analyzed: anyaiḥ api kṛtam pāpam pramattaiḥ vasudhā adhipaiḥ

original: 4.018.032c prāyaścittaṃ ca kurvanti tena tac chāmyate rajaḥ
analyzed: prāyaścittam ca kurvanti tena tat śāmyate rajaḥ
tat alam paritāpena dharmataḥ parikalpitaḥ

original: 4.018.033c vadho vānaraśārdūla na vayaṃ svavaśe sthitāḥ
analyzed: vadhaḥ vānara śārdūla na vayam sva vaśe sthitāḥ

original: 4.018.034a vāgurābhiś ca pāśaiś ca kūṭaiś ca vividhair narāḥ
analyzed: vāgurābhiḥ ca pāśaiḥ ca kūṭaiḥ ca vividhaiḥ narāḥ

original: 4.018.034c praticchannāś ca dṛśyāś ca gṛhṇanti subahūn mṛgān
analyzed: praticchannāḥ ca dṛśyāḥ ca gṛhṇanti su bahūn mṛgān
pradhāvitān vā vitrastān visrabdhān ati viṣṭhitān

original: 4.018.035a pramattān apramattān vā narā māṃsārthino bhṛśam
analyzed: pramattān apramattān vā narāḥ māṃsa arthinaḥ bhṛśam

original: 4.018.035c vidhyanti vimukhāṃś cāpi na ca doṣo 'tra vidyate
analyzed: vidhyanti vimukhān ca api na ca doṣaḥ vidyate
yānti rājarṣayaḥ ca atra mṛgayām dharma kovidāḥ

original: 4.018.036c tasmāt tvaṃ nihato yuddhe mayā bāṇena vānara
analyzed: tasmāt tvam nihataḥ yuddhe mayā bāṇena vānara

original: 4.018.036e ayudhyan pratiyudhyan vā yasmāc chākhāmṛgo hy asi
analyzed: a yudhyan pratiyudhyan vā yasmāt śākhāmṛgaḥ hi asi

original: 4.018.037a durlabhasya ca dharmasya jīvitasya śubhasya ca
analyzed: durlabhasya ca dharmasya jīvitasya śubhasya ca
rājānaḥ vānara śreṣṭha pradātāraḥ na saṃśayaḥ

original: 4.018.038a tān na hiṃsyān na cākrośen nākṣipen nāpriyaṃ vadet
analyzed: tān na hiṃsyāt na ca ākrośet na ākṣipet na apriyam vadet
devāḥ mānuṣa rūpeṇa caranti ete mahī tale

original: 4.018.039a tvaṃ tu dharmam avijñāya kevalaṃ roṣam āsthitaḥ
analyzed: tvam tu dharmam a vijñāya kevalam roṣam āsthitaḥ
pradūṣayasi mām dharme pitṛpaitāmahe sthitam

original: 4.018.040a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa vālī pravyathito bhṛśam
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu rāmeṇa vālī pravyathitaḥ bhṛśam
pratyuvāca tatas rāmam prāñjaliḥ vānara īśvaraḥ

original: 4.018.041a yat tvam āttha naraśreṣṭha tad evaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: yat tvam āttha nara śreṣṭha tat evam na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: 4.018.041c prativaktuṃ prakṛṣṭe hi nāpakṛṣṭas tu śaknuyāt
analyzed: prativaktum prakṛṣṭe hi na apakṛṣṭaḥ tu śaknuyāt

original: 4.018.042a yad ayuktaṃ mayā pūrvaṃ pramādād vākyam apriyam
analyzed: yat ayuktam mayā pūrvam pramādāt vākyam apriyam

original: 4.018.042c tatrāpi khalu me doṣaṃ kartuṃ nārhasi rāghava
analyzed: tatra api khalu me doṣam kartum nā arhasi rāghava

original: 4.018.043a tvaṃ hi dṛṣṭārthatattvajñaḥ prajānāṃ ca hite rataḥ
analyzed: tvam hi dṛṣṭārtha tattva jñaḥ prajānām ca hite rataḥ
kārya kāraṇa siddhau te prasannā buddhiḥ avyayā
mām api avagatam dharmāt vyatikrānta puraskṛtam
dharma saṃhitayā vācā dharma jña paripālaya
bāṣpa saṃruddha kaṇṭhaḥ tu vālī sārtaravaḥ śanais

original: 4.018.045c uvāca rāmaṃ saṃprekṣya paṅkalagna iva dvipaḥ
analyzed: uvāca rāmam saṃprekṣya paṅka lagnaḥ iva dvipaḥ

original: 4.018.046a na tv ātmānam ahaṃ śoce na tārāṃ nāpi bāndhavān
analyzed: na tu ātmānam aham śoce na tārām nā api bāndhavān
yathā putram guṇa śreṣṭham aṅgadam kanaka aṅgadam

original: 4.018.047a sa mamādarśanād dīno bālyāt prabhṛti lālitaḥ
analyzed: sa mama adarśanāt dīnaḥ bālyāt prabhṛti lālitaḥ
taṭākaḥ iva pīta ambuḥ upaśoṣam gamiṣyati

original: 4.018.048a sugrīve cāṅgade caiva vidhatsva matim uttamām
analyzed: sugrīve ca aṅgade ca eva vidhatsva matim uttamām

original: 4.018.048c tvaṃ hi śāstā ca goptā ca kāryākāryavidhau sthitaḥ
analyzed: tvam hi śāstā ca goptā ca kārya akārya vidhau sthitaḥ

original: 4.018.049a yā te narapate vṛttir bharate lakṣmaṇe ca yā
analyzed: yā te narapate vṛttiḥ bharate lakṣmaṇe ca yā

original: 4.018.049c sugrīve cāṅgade rājaṃs tāṃ cintayitum arhasi
analyzed: sugrīve ca aṅgade rājan tām cintayitum arhasi
mad doṣa kṛta doṣām tām yathā tārām tapasvinīm
sugrīvaḥ na avamanyeta tathā avasthātum arhasi

original: 4.018.051a tvayā hy anugṛhītena śakyaṃ rājyam upāsitum
analyzed: tvayā hi anugṛhītena śakyam rājyam upāsitum
tvad vaśe vartamānena tava citta anuvartinā

original: 4.018.052a sa tam āśvāsayad rāmo vālinaṃ vyaktadarśanam
analyzed: sa tam āśvāsayat rāmaḥ vālinam vyakta darśanam

original: 4.018.053a na vayaṃ bhavatā cintyā nāpy ātmā harisattama
analyzed: na vayam bhavatā cintyāḥ na api ātmā hari sattama
vayam bhavat viśeṣeṇa dharmataḥ kṛta niścayāḥ

original: 4.018.054a daṇḍye yaḥ pātayed daṇḍaṃ daṇḍyo yaś cāpi daṇḍyate
analyzed: daṇḍye yaḥ pātayet daṇḍam daṇḍyaḥ yaḥ ca api daṇḍyate
kārya kāraṇa siddhārthau ubhau tau na avasīdataḥ
tat bhavān daṇḍa saṃyogāt asmāt vigata kalmaṣaḥ

original: 4.018.055c gataḥ svāṃ prakṛtiṃ dharmyāṃ dharmadṛṣṭtena vartmanā
analyzed: gataḥ svām prakṛtim dharmyām dharma dṛṣṭtena vartmanā
sa tasya vākyam madhuram mahātmanaḥ
samāhitam dharma patha anuvartinaḥ
niśamya rāmasya raṇa avamardinaḥ
vacaḥ su yuktam nijagāda vānaraḥ
śara abhitaptena vicetasā mayā
pradūṣitaḥ tvam yat a jānatā prabho
idam mahā indra upama bhīma vikrama
prasāditaḥ tvam kṣama me mahīśvara
sa vānara mahā rājaḥ śayānaḥ śara vikṣataḥ
pratyuktaḥ hetumat vākyaiḥ na uttaram pratyapadyata
aśmabhiḥ paribhinna aṅgaḥ pādapaiḥ āhataḥ bhṛśam
rāma bāṇena ca ākrāntaḥ jīvitānte mumoha saḥ
tam bhāryā bāṇa mokṣeṇa rāmadattena saṃyuge
hatam plavaga śārdūlam tārā śuśrāva vālinam

original: 4.019.004a sā saputrāpriyaṃ śrutvā vadhaṃ bhartuḥ sudāruṇam
analyzed: sā sa putrā apriyam śrutvā vadham bhartuḥ su dāruṇam
niṣpapāta bhṛśam trastā vividhāt giri gahvarāt

original: 4.019.005a ye tv aṅgadaparīvārā vānarā hi mahābalāḥ
analyzed: ye tu aṅgada parīvārāḥ vānarāḥ hi mahā balāḥ

original: 4.019.005c te sakārmukam ālokya rāmaṃ trastāḥ pradudruvuḥ
analyzed: te sa kārmukam ālokya rāmam trastāḥ pradudruvuḥ

original: 4.019.006a sā dadarśa tatas trastān harīn āpatato drutam
analyzed: sā dadarśa tatas trastān harīn āpatataḥ drutam
yūthāt iva paribhraṣṭān mṛgān nihata yūthapān

original: 4.019.007a tān uvāca samāsādya duḥkhitān duḥkhitā satī
analyzed: tān uvāca samāsādya duḥkhitān duḥkhitā satī
rāma vitrāsitān sarvān anubaddhān iva iṣubhiḥ
vānarāḥ rāja siṃhasya yasya yūyam puraḥsarāḥ

original: 4.019.008c taṃ vihāya suvitrastāḥ kasmād dravata durgatāḥ
analyzed: tam vihāya suvitrastāḥ kasmāt dravata durgatāḥ

original: 4.019.009a rājyahetoḥ sa ced bhrātā bhrātā raudreṇa pātitaḥ
analyzed: rājya hetoḥ sa ced bhrātā bhrātā raudreṇa pātitaḥ

original: 4.019.009c rāmeṇa prasṛtair dūrān mārgaṇair dūra pātibhiḥ
analyzed: rāmeṇa prasṛtaiḥ dūrāt mārgaṇaiḥ dūra pātibhiḥ
kapi patnyāḥ vacaḥ śrutvā kapayaḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ
prāpta kālam aviśliṣṭam ūcuḥ vacanam aṅganām

original: 4.019.011a jīva putre nivartasya putraṃ rakṣasva cāndagam
analyzed: jīva putre nivartasya putram rakṣasva cāndagam

original: 4.019.011c antako rāma rūpeṇa hatvā nayati vālinam
analyzed: antakaḥ rāma rūpeṇa hatvā nayati vālinam

original: 4.019.012a kṣiptān vṛkṣān samāvidhya vipulāś ca śilās tathā
analyzed: kṣiptān vṛkṣān samāvidhya vipulāḥ ca śilāḥ tathā
vālī vajra samaiḥ bāṇaiḥ vajreṇa iva nipātitaḥ

original: 4.019.013a abhidrutam idaṃ sarvaṃ vidrutaṃ prasṛtaṃ balam
analyzed: abhidrutam idam sarvam vidrutam prasṛtam balam
asmin plavaga śārdūle hate śakra sama prabhe
rakṣyatām nagaram śūraiḥ aṅgadaḥ ca abhiṣicyatām
pada stham vālinaḥ putram bhajiṣyanti plavaṃgamāḥ

original: 4.019.015a atha vā ruciraṃ sthānam iha te rucirānane
analyzed: atha vā ruciram sthānam iha te rucira ānane

original: 4.019.015c āviśanti hi durgāṇi kṣipram adyaiva vānarāḥ
analyzed: āviśanti hi durgāṇi kṣipram adya eva vānarāḥ

original: 4.019.016a abhāryāḥ saha bhāryāś ca santy atra vanacāriṇaḥ
analyzed: abhāryāḥ saha bhāryāḥ ca santi atra vana cāriṇaḥ

original: 4.019.016c lubdhebhyo viprayuktebhyaḥ svebhyo nas tumulaṃ bhayam
analyzed: lubdhebhyaḥ viprayuktebhyaḥ svebhyaḥ naḥ tumulam bhayam
alpa antara gatānām tu śrutvā vacanam aṅganā
ātmanaḥ pratirūpam sā babhāṣe cāru hāsinī

original: 4.019.018a putreṇa mama kiṃ kāryaṃ kiṃ rājyena kim ātmanā
analyzed: putreṇa mama kim kāryam kim rājyena kim ātmanā
kapi siṃhe mahābhāge tasmin bhartari naśyati
pāda mūlam gamiṣyāmi tasya eva aham mahātmanaḥ
rāma prayuktena śareṇa vinipātitaḥ
evam uktvā pradudrāva rudatī śoka karśitā

original: 4.019.020c śiraś coraś ca bāhubhyāṃ duḥkhena samabhighnatī
analyzed: śiraḥ ca uraḥ ca bāhubhyām duḥkhena samabhighnatī
āvrajantī dadarśa atha patim nipatitam bhuvi
hantāram dānava indrāṇām samareṣu anivartinām
kṣeptāram parvata indrāṇām vajrāṇām iva vāsavam
mahā vāta samāviṣṭam mahā megha ogha niḥsvanam
śakra tulya parākrāntam vṛṣṭvā iva uparatam ghanam

original: 4.019.023c nardantaṃ nardatāṃ bhīmaṃ śūraṃ śūreṇa pātitam
analyzed: nardantam nardatām bhīmam śūram śūreṇa pātitam
śārdūlena āmiṣasya arthe mṛga rājam yathā hatam
arcitam sarva lokasya sa patākam sa vedikam
nāga hetoḥ suparṇena caityam unmathitam yathā
avaṣṭabhya avatiṣṭhantam dadarśa dhanuḥ ūrjitam

original: 4.019.026a rāmaṃ rāmānujaṃ caiva bhartuś caivānujaṃ śubhā
analyzed: rāmam rāma anujam ca eva bhartuḥ ca eva anujam śubhā

original: 4.019.026c tān atītya samāsādya bhartāraṃ nihataṃ raṇe
analyzed: tān atītya samāsādya bhartāram nihatam raṇe

original: 4.019.027a samīkṣya vyathitā bhūmau saṃbhrāntā nipapāta ha
analyzed: samīkṣya vyathitā bhūmau saṃbhrāntā nipapāta ha
suptā iva punar utthāya ārya putra iti krośatī

original: 4.019.028a ruroda sā patiṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃditaṃ mṛtyudāmabhiḥ
analyzed: ruroda sā patim dṛṣṭvā saṃditam mṛtyu dāmabhiḥ

original: 4.019.028c tām avekṣya tu sugrīvaḥ krośantīṃ kurarīm iva
analyzed: tām avekṣya tu sugrīvaḥ krośantīm kurarīm iva

original: 4.019.029a viṣādam agamat kaṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭvā cāṅgadam āgatam
analyzed: viṣādam agamat kaṣṭam dṛṣṭvā ca aṅgadam āgatam
rāma cāpa visṛṣṭena śareṇa anta kareṇa tam
dṛṣṭvā vinihatam bhūmau tārā tārādhipa ānanā
sā samāsādya bhartāram paryaṣvajata bhāminī
iṣuṇā abhihatam dṛṣṭvā vālinam kuñjara upamam
vānara indram mahā indra ābham śoka saṃtapta mānasā
tārā tarum iva unmūlam paryadevayat āturā
raṇe dāruṇa vikrānta pravīra plavatām vara

original: 4.020.004c kiṃ dīnām apurobhāgām adya tvaṃ nābhibhāṣase
analyzed: kim dīnām a purobhāgām adya tvam na abhibhāṣase
uttiṣṭha hari śārdūla bhajasva śayana uttamam
na evaṃvidhāḥ śerate hi bhūmau nṛpati sattamāḥ

original: 4.020.006a atīva khalu te kāntā vasudhā vasudhādhipa
analyzed: atīva khalu te kāntā vasudhā vasudhādhipa

original: 4.020.006c gatāsur api yāṃ gātrair māṃ vihāya niṣevase
analyzed: gatāsuḥ api yām gātraiḥ mām vihāya niṣevase

original: 4.020.007a vyaktam anyā tvayā vīra dharmataḥ saṃpravartatā
analyzed: vyaktam anyā tvayā vīra dharmataḥ saṃpravartatā
kiṣkindhā iva purī ramyā svarga mārge vinirmitā

original: 4.020.008a yāny asmābhis tvayā sārdhaṃ vaneṣu madhugandhiṣu
analyzed: yāni asmābhiḥ tvayā sārdham vaneṣu madhu gandhiṣu

original: 4.020.008c vihṛtāni tvayā kāle teṣām uparamaḥ kṛtaḥ
analyzed: vihṛtāni tvayā kāle teṣām uparamaḥ kṛtaḥ
nirānandā nirāśā aham nimagnā śoka sāgare
tvayi pañcatvam āpanne mahā yūthapa yūthape

original: 4.020.010a hṛdayaṃ susthiraṃ mahyaṃ dṛṣṭvā vinihataṃ bhuvi
analyzed: hṛdayam su sthiram mahyam dṛṣṭvā vinihatam bhuvi
yat na śoka abhisaṃtaptam sphuṭate sahasradhā

original: 4.020.011a sugrīvasya tvayā bhāryā hṛtā sa ca vivāsitaḥ
analyzed: sugrīvasya tvayā bhāryā hṛtā sa ca vivāsitaḥ

original: 4.020.011c yat tat tasya tvayā vyuṣṭiḥ prāpteyaṃ plavagādhipa
analyzed: yat tat tasya tvayā vyuṣṭiḥ prāptā iyam plavaga adhipa
niḥśreyasa parā mohāt tvayā ca aham vigarhitā
yā eṣā abruvam hitam vākyam vānara indra hita eṣiṇī
kālaḥ niḥsaṃśayaḥ nūnam jīvita anta karaḥ tava
balāt yena avapat na u si sugrīvasya avaśaḥ vaśam
vaidhavyam śoka saṃtāpam kṛpaṇam kṛpaṇā satī
aduḥkha upacitā pūrvam vartayiṣyāmi anātha vat

original: 4.020.015c vatsyate kām avasthāṃ me pitṛvye krodhamūrchite
analyzed: vatsyate kām avasthām me pitṛvye krodha mūrchite
kuruṣva pitaram putra su dṛṣṭam dharma vatsalam

original: 4.020.016c durlabhaṃ darśanaṃ tv asya tava vatsa bhaviṣyati
analyzed: durlabham darśanam tu asya tava vatsa bhaviṣyati

original: 4.020.017a samāśvāsaya putraṃ tvaṃ saṃdeśaṃ saṃdiśasva ca
analyzed: samāśvāsaya putram tvam saṃdeśam saṃdiśasva ca

original: 4.020.017c mūrdhni cainaṃ samāghrāya pravāsaṃ prasthito hy asi
analyzed: mūrdhni ca enam samāghrāya pravāsam prasthitaḥ hi asi

original: 4.020.018a rāmeṇa hi mahat karma kṛtaṃ tvām abhinighnatā
analyzed: rāmeṇa hi mahat karma kṛtam tvām abhinighnatā

original: 4.020.018c ānṛṇyaṃ tu gataṃ tasya sugrīvasya pratiśrave
analyzed: ānṛṇyam tu gatam tasya sugrīvasya pratiśrave

original: 4.020.019a sakāmo bhava sugrīva rumāṃ tvaṃ pratipatsyase
analyzed: sa kāmaḥ bhava sugrīva rumām tvam pratipatsyase

original: 4.020.019c bhuṅkṣva rājyam anudvignaḥ śasto bhrātā ripus tava
analyzed: bhuṅkṣva rājyam anudvignaḥ śastaḥ bhrātā ripuḥ tava

original: 4.020.020a kiṃ mām evaṃ vilapatīṃ preṃṇā tvaṃ nābhibhāṣase
analyzed: kim mām evam vilapatīm preṃṇā tvam na abhibhāṣase

original: 4.020.020c imāḥ paśya varā bahvīr bhāryās te vānareśvara
analyzed: imāḥ paśya varāḥ bahvīḥ bhāryāḥ te vānara īśvara

original: 4.020.021a tasyā vilapitaṃ śrutvā vānaryaḥ sarvataś ca tāḥ
analyzed: tasyāḥ vilapitam śrutvā vānaryaḥ sarvatas ca tāḥ
parigṛhya aṅgadam dīnam duḥkha ārtāḥ paricukruśuḥ
kim aṅgadam sa aṅgada vīra bāho
vihāya yāsi adya cira pravāsam
na yuktam evam guṇa saṃnikṛṣṭam
vihāya putram priya putra gantum
kim apriyam te priya cāru veṣa

original: kṛtaṃ mayā nātha sutena vā te
analyzed: kṛtam mayā nātha sutena vā te
sahāyinīm adya vihāya vīra
yama kṣayam gacchasi durvinītam
yadi apriyam kim cit a saṃpradhārya
kṛtam mayā syāt tava dīrgha bāho
kṣamasva me tat harivaṃśa nātha
vrajāmi mūrdhnā tava vīra pādau
tathā tu tārā karuṇam rudantī
bhartuḥ samīpe saha vānarībhiḥ
vyavasyata prāyam anindya varṇā
upopaveṣṭum bhuvi yatra vālī

original: 4.021.001a tato nipatitāṃ tārāṃ cyutāṃ tārām ivāmbarāt
analyzed: tatas nipatitām tārām cyutām tārām iva ambarāt
śanais āśvāsayām āsa hanūmān hari yūthapaḥ
guṇa doṣa kṛtam jantuḥ sva karma phala hetukam

original: 4.021.002c avyagras tad avāpnoti sarvaṃ pretya śubhāśubham
analyzed: avyagraḥ tat avāpnoti sarvam pretya śubha aśubham

original: 4.021.003a śocyā śocasi kaṃ śocyaṃ dīnaṃ dīnānukampase
analyzed: śocyā śocasi kam śocyam dīnam dīnā anukampase
kaḥ ca kasya anuśocyaḥ sti dehe smin budbuda upame
aṅgadaḥ tu kumāraḥ yam draṣṭavyaḥ jīva putrayā

original: 4.021.004c āyatyā ca vidheyāni samarthāny asya cintaya
analyzed: āyatyā ca vidheyāni samarthāni asya cintaya

original: 4.021.005a jānāsy aniyatām evaṃ bhūtānām āgatiṃ gatim
analyzed: jānāsi aniyatām evam bhūtānām āgatim gatim

original: 4.021.005c tasmāc chubhaṃ hi kartavyaṃ paṇḍite naihalaukikam
analyzed: tasmāt śubham hi kartavyam paṇḍite na aihalaukikam
yasmin hari sahasrāṇi prayutāni arbudāni ca
vartayanti kṛta aṃśāni saḥ yam diṣṭāntam āgataḥ
yat ayam nyāya dṛṣṭārthaḥ sāma dāna kṣamā paraḥ

original: 4.021.007c gato dharmajitāṃ bhūmiṃ nainaṃ śocitum arhasi
analyzed: gataḥ dharma jitām bhūmim na enam śocitum arhasi

original: 4.021.008a sarve ca hariśārdūla putraś cāyaṃ tavāṅgadaḥ
analyzed: sarve ca hari śārdūla putraḥ ca ayam tava aṅgadaḥ
hari ṛṣka pati rājyam ca tvad sanātham anindite

original: 4.021.009a tāv imau śokasaṃtaptau śanaiḥ preraya bhāmini
analyzed: tau imau śoka saṃtaptau śanais preraya bhāmini
tvayā parigṛhītaḥ yam aṅgadaḥ śāstu medinīm

original: 4.021.010a saṃtatiś ca yathādṛṣṭā kṛtyaṃ yac cāpi sāmpratam
analyzed: saṃtatiḥ ca yathā dṛṣṭā kṛtyam yat ca api sāmpratam

original: 4.021.010c rājñas tat kriyatāṃ sarvam eṣa kālasya niścayaḥ
analyzed: rājñaḥ tat kriyatām sarvam eṣa kālasya niścayaḥ
saṃskāryaḥ hari rājaḥ tu aṅgadaḥ ca abhiṣicyatām
siṃhāsana gatam putram paśyantī śāntim eṣyasi
sā tasya vacanam śrutvā bhartṛ vyasana pīḍitā
abravīt uttaram tārā hanūmantam avasthitam
aṅgada pratirūpāṇām putrāṇām ekatas śatam
hatasya api asya vīrasya gātra saṃśleṣaṇam varam

original: 4.021.014a na cāhaṃ harirājasya prabhavāmy aṅgadasya vā
analyzed: na ca aham hari rājasya prabhavāmi aṅgadasya vā
pitṛ vyastasya sugrīvaḥ sarva kāryeṣu anantaraḥ

original: 4.021.015a na hy eṣā buddhir āstheyā hanūmann aṅgadaṃ prati
analyzed: na hi eṣā buddhiḥ āstheyā hanūman aṅgadam prati

original: 4.021.015c pitā hi bandhuḥ putrasya na mātā harisattama
analyzed: pitā hi bandhuḥ putrasya na mātā hari sattama
na hi mama hari rāja saṃśrayāt
kṣamataram asti paratra ca iha vā
abhimukha hata vīra sevitam
śayanam idam mama sevitum kṣamam

original: 4.022.001a vīkṣamāṇas tu mandāsuḥ sarvato mandam ucchvasan
analyzed: vīkṣamāṇaḥ tu mandāsuḥ sarvatas mandam ucchvasan

original: 4.022.001c ādāv eva tu sugrīvaṃ dadarśa tv ātmajāgrataḥ
analyzed: ādau eva tu sugrīvam dadarśa tu ātmaja agrataḥ
tam prāpta vijayam vālī sugrīvam plavaga īśvaram

original: 4.022.002c ābhāṣya vyaktayā vācā sasneham idam abravīt
analyzed: ābhāṣya vyaktayā vācā sa sneham idam abravīt

original: 4.022.003a sugrīvadoṣeṇa na māṃ gantum arhasi kilbiṣāt
analyzed: sugrīva doṣeṇa na mām gantum arhasi kilbiṣāt
kṛṣyamāṇam bhaviṣyeṇa buddhi mohena mām balāt

original: 4.022.004a yugapadvihitaṃ tāta na manye sukham āvayoḥ
analyzed: yugapad vihitam tāta na manye sukham āvayoḥ

original: 4.022.004c sauhārdaṃ bhrātṛyuktaṃ hi tad idaṃ jātam anyathā
analyzed: sauhārdam bhrātṛ yuktam hi tat idam jātam anyathā

original: 4.022.005a pratipadya tvam adyaiva rājyam eṣāṃ vanaukasām
analyzed: pratipadya tvam adyā eva rājyam eṣām vanaukasām

original: 4.022.005c mām apy adyaiva gacchantaṃ viddhi vaivasvatakṣayam
analyzed: mām api adyā eva gacchantam viddhi vaivasvata kṣayam

original: 4.022.006a jīvitaṃ ca hi rājyaṃ ca śriyaṃ ca vipulām imām
analyzed: jīvitam ca hi rājyam ca śriyam ca vipulām imām

original: 4.022.006c prajahāmy eṣa vai tūrṇaṃ mahac cāgarhitaṃ yaśaḥ
analyzed: prajahāmi eṣa vai tūrṇam mahat ca agarhitam yaśaḥ

original: 4.022.007a asyāṃ tv aham avasthāyāṃ vīra vakṣyāmi yad vacaḥ
analyzed: asyām tu aham avasthāyām vīra vakṣyāmi yat vacaḥ

original: 4.022.007c yady apy asukaraṃ rājan kartum eva tad arhasi
analyzed: yadi api asukaram rājan kartum eva tat arhasi
sukha arham sukha saṃvṛddham bālam enam a bāliśam
bāṣpa pūrṇa mukham paśya bhūmau patitam aṅgadam

original: 4.022.009a mama prāṇaiḥ priyataraṃ putraṃ putram ivaurasaṃ
analyzed: mama prāṇaiḥ priyataram putram putram iva aurasam
mayā hīnam ahīna artham sarvatas paripālaya

original: 4.022.010a tvam apy asya hi dātā ca paritrātā ca sarvataḥ
analyzed: tvam api asya hi dātā ca paritrātā ca sarvatas
bhayeṣu abhaya daḥ ca eva yathā aham plavaga īśvara
eṣa tārā ātmajaḥ śrīmān tvayā tulya parākramaḥ

original: 4.022.011c rakṣasāṃ tu vadhe teṣām agratas te bhaviṣyati
analyzed: rakṣasām tu vadhe teṣām agratas te bhaviṣyati
anurūpāṇi karmāṇi vikramya balavān raṇe
kariṣyati eṣa tāreyaḥ tarasvī taruṇaḥ ṅgadaḥ
suṣeṇa duhitā ca iyam artha sūkṣma viniścaye
autpātike ca vividhe sarvatas pariniṣṭhitā

original: 4.022.014a yad eṣā sādhv iti brūyāt kāryaṃ tan muktasaṃśayam
analyzed: yat eṣā sādhu iti brūyāt kāryam tat mukta saṃśayam

original: 4.022.014c na hi tārāmataṃ kiṃ cid anyathā parivartate
analyzed: na hi tārā matam kim cit anyathā parivartate

original: 4.022.015a rāghavasya ca te kāryaṃ kartavyam aviśaṅkayā
analyzed: rāghavasya ca te kāryam kartavyam aviśaṅkayā

original: 4.022.015c syād adharmo hy akaraṇe tvāṃ ca hiṃsyād vimānitaḥ
analyzed: syāt adharmaḥ hi akaraṇe tvām ca hiṃsyāt vimānitaḥ

original: 4.022.016a imāṃ ca mālām ādhatsva divyāṃ sugrīvakāñcanīm
analyzed: imām ca mālām ādhatsva divyām sugrīva kāñcanīm

original: 4.022.016c udārā śrīḥ sthitā hy asyāṃ saṃprajahyān mṛte mayi
analyzed: udārā śrīḥ sthitā hi asyām saṃprajahyāt mṛte mayi

original: 4.022.017a ity evam uktaḥ sugrīvo vālinā bhrātṛsauhṛdāt
analyzed: iti evam uktaḥ sugrīvaḥ vālinā bhrātṛ sauhṛdāt

original: 4.022.017c harṣaṃ tyaktvā punar dīno grahagrasta ivoḍurāṭ
analyzed: harṣam tyaktvā punar dīnaḥ graha grastaḥ iva uḍurāj

original: 4.022.018a tad vālivacanāc chāntaḥ kurvan yuktam atandritaḥ
analyzed: tat vāli vacanāt śāntaḥ kurvan yuktam atandritaḥ

original: 4.022.018c jagrāha so 'bhyanujñāto mālāṃ tāṃ caiva kāñcanīm
analyzed: jagrāha saḥ bhyanujñātaḥ mālām tām ca eva kāñcanīm

original: 4.022.019a tāṃ mālāṃ kāñcanīṃ dattvā vālī dṛṣṭvātmajaṃ sthitam
analyzed: tām mālām kāñcanīm dattvā vālī dṛṣṭvā ātmajam sthitam

original: 4.022.019c saṃsiddhaḥ pretya bhāvāya snehād aṅgadam abravīt
analyzed: saṃsiddhaḥ pretya bhāvāya snehāt aṅgadam abravīt
deśa kālau bhajasva adya kṣamamāṇaḥ priya apriye
sukha duḥkha sahaḥ kāle sugrīva vaśa gaḥ bhava

original: 4.022.021a yathā hi tvaṃ mahābāho lālitaḥ satataṃ mayā
analyzed: yathā hi tvam mahā bāho lālitaḥ satatam mayā

original: 4.022.021c na tathā vartamānaṃ tvāṃ sugrīvo bahu maṃsyate
analyzed: na tathā vartamānam tvām sugrīvaḥ bahu maṃsyate

original: 4.022.022a māsyāmitrair gataṃ gaccher mā śatrubhir ariṃdama
analyzed: mā asya amitraiḥ gatam gaccheḥ mā śatrubhiḥ ariṃdama
bhartuḥ artha paraḥ dāntaḥ sugrīva vaśa gaḥ bhava

original: 4.022.023a na cātipraṇayaḥ kāryaḥ kartavyo 'praṇayaś ca te
analyzed: na ca atipraṇayaḥ kāryaḥ praṇayaḥ ca te

original: 4.022.023c ubhayaṃ hi mahādoṣaṃ tasmād antaradṛg bhava
analyzed: ubhayam hi mahā doṣam tasmāt antara dṛś bhava
iti uktvā atha vivṛtta akṣaḥ śara saṃpīḍitaḥ bhṛśam
vivṛtaiḥ daśanaiḥ bhīmaiḥ babhūva utkrānta jīvitaḥ
hate tu vīre plavaga adhipe tadā
plavaṃgamāḥ tatra na śarma lebhire
vanecarāḥ siṃha yute mahā vane

original: yathā hi gāvo nihate gavāṃ patau
analyzed: yathā hi gāvaḥ nihate gavām patau
tatas tu tārā vyasana arṇava plutā
mṛtasyāḥ bhartuḥ vadanam samīkṣya sā
jagāma bhūmim parirabhya vālinam
mahā drumam chinnam iva āśritā latā
tatas samupajighrantī kapi rājasya tat mukham

original: 4.023.001c patiṃ lokāc cyutaṃ tārā mṛtaṃ vacanam abravīt
analyzed: patim lokāt cyutam tārā mṛtam vacanam abravīt

original: 4.023.002a śeṣe tvaṃ viṣame duḥkham akṛtvā vacanaṃ mama
analyzed: śeṣe tvam viṣame duḥkham a kṛtvā vacanam mama
upala upacite vīra su duḥkhe vasudhā tale

original: 4.023.003a mattaḥ priyatarā nūnaṃ vānarendra mahī tava
analyzed: mattaḥ priyatarā nūnam vānara indra mahī tava

original: 4.023.003c śeṣe hi tāṃ pariṣvajya māṃ ca na pratibhāṣase
analyzed: śeṣe hi tām pariṣvajya mām ca na pratibhāṣase

original: 4.023.004a sugrīva eva vikrānto vīra sāhasika priya
analyzed: sugrīvaḥ eva vikrāntaḥ vīra sāhasika priya
ṛkṣa vānara mukhyāḥ tvām balinam paryupāsate

original: 4.023.005a eṣāṃ vilapitaṃ kṛcchram aṅgadasya ca śocataḥ
analyzed: eṣām vilapitam kṛcchram aṅgadasya ca śocataḥ

original: 4.023.005c mama cemāṃ giraṃ śrutvā kiṃ tvaṃ na pratibudhyase
analyzed: mama ca imām giram śrutvā kim tvam na pratibudhyase

original: 4.023.006a idaṃ tac chūraśayanaṃ yatra śeṣe hato yudhi
analyzed: idam tat śūra śayanam yatra śeṣe hataḥ yudhi

original: 4.023.006c śāyitā nihatā yatra tvayaiva ripavaḥ purā
analyzed: śāyitāḥ nihatāḥ yatra tvayā eva ripavaḥ purā
viśuddha sattva abhijana priya yuddha mama priya

original: 4.023.007c mām anāthāṃ vihāyaikāṃ gatas tvam asi mānada
analyzed: mām anāthām vihāya ekām gataḥ tvam asi mānada

original: 4.023.008a śūrāya na pradātavyā kanyā khalu vipaścitā
analyzed: śūrāya na pradātavyā kanyā khalu vipaścitā

original: 4.023.008c śūrabhāryāṃ hatāṃ paśya sadyo māṃ vidhavāṃ kṛtām
analyzed: śūra bhāryām hatām paśya sadyas mām vidhavām kṛtām

original: 4.023.009a avabhagnaś ca me māno bhagnā me śāśvatī gatiḥ
analyzed: avabhagnaḥ ca me mānaḥ bhagnā me śāśvatī gatiḥ
agādhe ca nimagnā asmi vipule śoka sāgare

original: 4.023.010a aśmasāramayaṃ nūnam idaṃ me hṛdayaṃ dṛḍham
analyzed: aśmasāra mayam nūnam idam me hṛdayam dṛḍham

original: 4.023.010c bhartāraṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā yan nādya śatadhā gatam
analyzed: bhartāram nihatam dṛṣṭvā yat na adya śatadhā gatam

original: 4.023.011a suhṛc caiva hi bhartā ca prakṛtyā ca mama priyaḥ
analyzed: suhṛd ca eva hi bhartā ca prakṛtyā ca mama priyaḥ

original: 4.023.011c āhave ca parākrāntaḥ śūraḥ pañcatvam āgataḥ
analyzed: āhave ca parākrāntaḥ śūraḥ pañcatvam āgataḥ

original: 4.023.012a patihīnā tu yā nārī kāmaṃ bhavatu putriṇī
analyzed: pati hīnā tu yā nārī kāmam bhavatu putriṇī
dhana dhānyaiḥ su pūrṇā api vidhavā iti ucyate budhaiḥ
sva gātra prabhave vīra śeṣe rudhira maṇḍale
kṛmirāgaparistome tvam evam śayane yathā
reṇu śoṇita saṃvītam gātram tava samantataḥ
parirabdhum na śaknomi bhujābhyām plavaga ṛṣabha
kṛtakṛtyaḥ sugrīvaḥ vaire smin ati dāruṇe
yasya rāma vimuktena hṛtam eka iṣuṇā bhayam
śareṇa hṛdi lagnena gātra saṃsparśane tava

original: 4.023.016c vāryāmi tvāṃ nirīkṣantī tvayi pañcatvam āgate
analyzed: tvām nirīkṣantī tvayi pañcatvam āgate

original: 4.023.017a udbabarha śaraṃ nīlas tasya gātragataṃ tadā
analyzed: śaram nīlaḥ tasya gātra gatam tadā
giri gahvara saṃlīnam dīptam āśīviṣam yathā

original: 4.023.018a tasya niṣkṛṣyamāṇasya bāṇasya ca babhau dyutiḥ
analyzed: tasya niṣkṛṣyamāṇasya bāṇasya ca babhau dyutiḥ
asta mastaka saṃruddhaḥ raśmiḥ dinakarāt iva

original: 4.023.019a petuḥ kṣatajadhārās tu vraṇebhyas tasya sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: petuḥ kṣataja dhārāḥ tu vraṇebhyaḥ tasya sarvaśas
tāmra gairika saṃpṛktāḥ dhārāḥ iva dharādharāt
avakīrṇam vimārjantī bhartāram raṇa reṇunā
asraiḥ nayana jaiḥ śūram siṣeca astra samāhatam
rudhira ukṣita sarva aṅgam dṛṣṭvā vinihatam patim

original: 4.023.021c uvāca tārā piṅgākṣaṃ putram aṅgadam aṅganā
analyzed: uvāca tārā piṅga akṣam putram aṅgadam aṅganā

original: 4.023.022a avasthāṃ paścimāṃ paśya pituḥ putra sudāruṇām
analyzed: avasthām paścimām paśya pituḥ putra su dāruṇām
saṃprasaktasya vairasya gataḥ ntaḥ pāpa karmaṇā
bāla sūrya udaya tanum prayāntam yama sādanam
abhivādaya rājānam pitaram putra mānadam

original: 4.023.024a evam uktaḥ samutthāya jagrāha caraṇau pituḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ samutthāya jagrāha caraṇau pituḥ
bhujābhyām pīna vṛtābhyām aṅgadaḥ ham iti bruvan
abhivādayamānam tvām aṅgadam tvam yathā purā
dīrgha āyuḥ bhava putra iti kimartham na abhibhāṣase
aham putra sahāyā tvām upāse gata cetanam

original: 4.023.026c siṃhena nihataṃ sadyo gauḥ savatseva govṛṣam
analyzed: siṃhena nihatam sadyas gauḥ sa vatsā iva go vṛṣam
iṣṭvā saṃgrāma yajñena nānā praharaṇa ambhasā

original: 4.023.027c asminn avabhṛthe snātaḥ kathaṃ patnyā mayā vinā
analyzed: asmin avabhṛthe snātaḥ katham patnyā mayā vinā

original: 4.023.028a yā dattā devarājena tava tuṣṭena saṃyuge
analyzed: yā dattā devarājena tava tuṣṭena saṃyuge

original: 4.023.028c śātakumbhamayīṃ mālāṃ tāṃ te paśyāmi neha kim
analyzed: śātakumbha mayīm mālām tām te paśyāmi na iha kim

original: 4.023.029a rājaśrīr na jahāti tvāṃ gatāsum api mānada
analyzed: rāja śrīḥ na jahāti tvām gatāsum api mānada
sūryasya āvartamānasya śailarājam iva prabhā

original: 4.023.030a na me vacaḥ pathyam idaṃ tvayā kṛtaṃ;
analyzed: na me vacaḥ pathyam idam tvayā kṛtam

original: na cāsmi śaktā hi nivāraṇe tava
analyzed: na ca asmi śaktā hi nivāraṇe tava
hatā sa putrā asmi hatena saṃyuge

original: saha tvayā śrīr vijahāti mām iha
analyzed: saha tvayā śrīḥ vijahāti mām iha
gatāsum vālinam dṛṣṭvā rāghavaḥ tad anantaram
abravīt praśritam vākyam sugrīvam śatru tāpanaḥ
na śoka paritāpena śreyasā yujyate mṛtaḥ

original: 4.024.002c yad atrānantaraṃ kāryaṃ tat samādhātum arhatha
analyzed: yat atra anantaram kāryam tat samādhātum arhatha
loka vṛttam anuṣṭheyam kṛtam vaḥ bāṣpa mokṣaṇam

original: 4.024.003c na kālād uttaraṃ kiṃ cit karma śakyam upāsitum
analyzed: na kālāt uttaram kim cit karma śakyam upāsitum
niyataḥ kāraṇam loke niyatiḥ karma sādhanam
niyatiḥ sarva bhūtānām niyogeṣu iha kāraṇam

original: 4.024.005a na kartā kasya cit kaś cin niyoge cāpi neśvaraḥ
analyzed: na kartā kasya cit kaḥ cit niyoge ca api na īśvaraḥ

original: 4.024.005c svabhāve vartate lokas tasya kālaḥ parāyaṇam
analyzed: svabhāve vartate lokaḥ tasya kālaḥ parāyaṇam

original: 4.024.006a na kālaḥ kālam atyeti na kālaḥ parihīyate
analyzed: na kālaḥ kālam atyeti na kālaḥ parihīyate

original: 4.024.006c svabhāvaṃ vā samāsādya na kaś cid ativartate
analyzed: svabhāvam vā samāsādya na kaḥ cit ativartate

original: 4.024.007a na kālasyāsti bandhutvaṃ na hetur na parākramaḥ
analyzed: na kālasya asti bandhu tvam na hetuḥ na parākramaḥ
na mitra jñāti saṃbandhaḥ kāraṇam na ātmanaḥ vaśaḥ

original: 4.024.008a kiṃ tu kāla parīṇāmo draṣṭavyaḥ sādhu paśyatā
analyzed: kim tu kāla parīṇāmaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ sādhu paśyatā

original: 4.024.008c dharmaś cārthaś ca kāmaś ca kālakramasamāhitāḥ
analyzed: dharmaḥ ca arthaḥ ca kāmaḥ ca kāla krama samāhitāḥ

original: 4.024.009a itaḥ svāṃ prakṛtiṃ vālī gataḥ prāptaḥ kriyāphalam
analyzed: itas svām prakṛtim vālī gataḥ prāptaḥ kriyā phalam
dharma artha kāma saṃyogaiḥ pavitram plavaga īśvara

original: 4.024.010a svadharmasya ca saṃyogāj jitas tena mahātmanā
analyzed: svadharmasya ca saṃyogāt jitaḥ tena mahātmanā
svargaḥ parigṛhītaḥ ca prāṇān a parirakṣatā

original: 4.024.011a eṣā vai niyatiḥ śreṣṭhā yāṃ gato hariyūthapaḥ
analyzed: eṣā vai niyatiḥ śreṣṭhā yām gataḥ hari yūthapaḥ
tat alam paritāpena prāpta kālam upāsyatām
vacana ante tu rāmasya lakṣmaṇaḥ para vīra hā
avadat praśritam vākyam sugrīvam gata cetasam

original: 4.024.013a kuru tvam asya sugrīva pretakāryam anantaram
analyzed: kuru tvam asya sugrīva pretakāryam anantaram
tārā aṅgadābhyām sahitaḥ vālinaḥ dahanam prati

original: 4.024.014a samājñāpaya kāṣṭhāni śuṣkāṇi ca bahūni ca
analyzed: samājñāpaya kāṣṭhāni śuṣkāṇi ca bahūni ca
candanāni ca divyāni vāli saṃskāra kāraṇāt
samāśvāsaya ca enam tvam aṅgadam dīna cetasam

original: 4.024.015c mā bhūr bāliśabuddhis tvaṃ tvadadhīnam idaṃ puram
analyzed: mā bhūḥ bāliśa buddhiḥ tvam tvad adhīnam idam puram

original: 4.024.016a aṅgadas tv ānayen mālyaṃ vastrāṇi vividhāni ca
analyzed: aṅgadaḥ tu ānayet mālyam vastrāṇi vividhāni ca

original: 4.024.016c ghṛtaṃ tailam atho gandhān yac cātra samanantaram
analyzed: ghṛtam tailam atho gandhān yat ca atra samanantaram

original: 4.024.017a tvaṃ tāra śibikāṃ śīghram ādāyāgaccha saṃbhramāt
analyzed: tvam tāra śibikām śīghram ādāya āgaccha saṃbhramāt

original: 4.024.017c tvarā guṇavatī yuktā hy asmin kāle viśeṣataḥ
analyzed: tvarā guṇavatī yuktā hi asmin kāle viśeṣataḥ
sajjībhavantu plavagāḥ śibikā vāhana ucitāḥ
samarthāḥ balinaḥ ca eva nirhariṣyanti vālinam
evam uktvā tu sugrīvam sumitrā ānanda vardhanaḥ
tasthau bhrātṛ samīpa sthaḥ lakṣmaṇaḥ para vīra hā
lakṣmaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā tāraḥ saṃbhrānta mānasaḥ
praviveśa guhām śīghram śibikā sakta mānasaḥ

original: 4.024.021a ādāya śibikāṃ tāraḥ sa tu paryāpayat punaḥ
analyzed: ādāya śibikām tāraḥ sa tu paryāpayat punar
vānaraiḥ uhyamānām tām śūraiḥ udvahana ucitaiḥ

original: 4.024.022a tato vālinam udyamya sugrīvaḥ śibikāṃ tadā
analyzed: tatas vālinam udyamya sugrīvaḥ śibikām tadā
āropayata vikrośan aṅgadena saha eva tu
āropya śibikām ca eva vālinam gata jīvitam

original: 4.024.023c alaṃkāraiś ca vividhair mālyair vastraiś ca bhūṣitam
analyzed: alaṃkāraiḥ ca vividhaiḥ mālyaiḥ vastraiḥ ca bhūṣitam
ājñāpayat tadā rājā sugrīvaḥ plavaga īśvaraḥ
aurdhvadehikam āryasya kriyatām anurūpatas
ratnāni vividhāni bahūni ca
agratas plavagāḥ yāntu śibikā tad anantaram

original: 4.024.026a rājñām ṛddhiviśeṣā hi dṛśyante bhuvi yādṛśāḥ
analyzed: rājñām ṛddhi viśeṣāḥ hi dṛśyante bhuvi yādṛśāḥ
tādṛśam vālinaḥ kṣipram prākurvan aurdhvadehikam
aṅgadam a prigṛhya āśu tāra prabhṛtayaḥ tathā
krośantaḥ prayayuḥ sarve vānarāḥ hata bāndhavāḥ
tārā prabhṛtayaḥ sarvāḥ vānaryaḥ hata yūthapāḥ
anujagmuḥ hi bhartāram krośantyaḥ karuṇa svanāḥ
tāsām rudita śabdena vānarīṇām vana antare
vanāni girayaḥ sarve vikrośanti iva sarvatas
puline giri nadyāḥ tu vivikte jala saṃvṛte
citām cakruḥ su bahavaḥ vānarāḥ vana cāriṇaḥ
avaropya tatas skandhāt śibikām vahana ucitāḥ
tasthuḥ ekāntam āśritya sarve śoka samanvitāḥ
tatas tārā patim dṛṣṭvā śibikā tala śāyinam
āropya aṅke śiraḥ tasya vilalāpa su duḥkhitā

original: 4.024.033a janaṃ ca paśyasīmaṃ tvaṃ kasmāc chokābhipīḍitam
analyzed: janam ca paśyasi imam tvam kasmāt śoka abhipīḍitam

original: 4.024.033c prahṛṣṭam iva te vaktraṃ gatāsor api mānada
analyzed: prahṛṣṭam iva te vaktram gatāsoḥ api mānada
asta arka sama varṇam ca lakṣyate jīvataḥ yathā

original: 4.024.034a eṣa tvāṃ rāmarūpeṇa kālaḥ karṣati vānara
analyzed: eṣa tvām rāma rūpeṇa kālaḥ karṣati vānara

original: 4.024.034c yena sma vidhavāḥ sarvāḥ kṛtā ekeṣuṇā raṇe
analyzed: yena sma vidhavāḥ sarvāḥ kṛtāḥ eka iṣuṇā raṇe

original: 4.024.035a imās tās tava rājendravānaryo vallabhāḥ sadā
analyzed: imāḥ tāḥ tava rāja indra vānaryaḥ vallabhāḥ sadā

original: 4.024.035c pādair vikṛṣṭam adhvānam āgatāḥ kiṃ na budhyase
analyzed: pādaiḥ vikṛṣṭam adhvānam āgatāḥ kim na budhyase
tava iṣṭāḥ nanu nāma etāḥ bhāryāḥ candra nibha ānanāḥ
idānīm nā īkṣase kasmāt sugrīvam plavaga īśvaram

original: 4.024.037a ete hi sacivā rājaṃs tāraprabhṛtayas tava
analyzed: ete hi sacivāḥ rājan tāra prabhṛtayaḥ tava
pura vāsi janaḥ ca ayam parivārya āsate nagha
visarjaya enān pravalān yathocitam ariṃdama
tatas krīḍāmahe sarvāḥ vaneṣu madirā utkaṭāḥ
evam vilapatīm tārām pati śoka pariplutām
utthāpayanti sma tadā vānaryaḥ śoka karśitāḥ

original: 4.024.040a sugrīveṇa tataḥ sārdham aṅgadaḥ pitaraṃ rudan
analyzed: sugrīveṇa tatas sārdham aṅgadaḥ pitaram rudan
citām āropayām āsa śokena abhihata indriyaḥ

original: 4.024.041a tato 'gniṃ vidhivad dattvā so 'pasavyaṃ cakāra ha
analyzed: tatas gnim vidhivat dattvā saḥ pasavyam cakāra ha
pitaram dīrgham adhvānam prasthitam vyākula indriyaḥ

original: 4.024.042a saṃskṛtya vālinaṃ te tu vidhipūrvaṃ plavaṃgamāḥ
analyzed: saṃskṛtya vālinam te tu vidhi pūrvam plavaṃgamāḥ

original: 4.024.042c ājagmur udakaṃ kartuṃ nadīṃ śītajalāṃ śubhām
analyzed: ājagmuḥ udakam kartum nadīm śīta jalām śubhām

original: 4.024.043a tatas te sahitās tatra aṅgadaṃ sthāpya cāgrataḥ
analyzed: tatas te sahitāḥ tatra aṅgadam sthāpya ca agratas
sugrīva tārā sahitāḥ siṣicuḥ vāline jalam
sugrīveṇa eva dīnena dīnaḥ bhūtvā mahā balaḥ
samāna śokaḥ kākutsthaḥ pretakāryāṇi akārayat
tatas śoka abhisaṃtaptam sugrīvam klinna vāsanam
śākhāmṛga mahāmātrāḥ parivārya upatasthire
abhigamya mahā bāhum rāmam akliṣṭa kāriṇam
sthitāḥ prāñjalayaḥ sarve pitāmaham iva ṛṣayaḥ
tatas kāñcana śaila ābhaḥ taruṇa arka nibha ānanaḥ
abravīt prāñjaliḥ vākyam hanumān mārutātmajaḥ
bhavat prasādāt sugrīvaḥ pitṛpaitāmaham mahat

original: 4.025.004c vānarāṇāṃ suduṣprāpaṃ prāpto rājyam idaṃ prabho
analyzed: vānarāṇām suduṣprāpam prāptaḥ rājyam idam prabho
bhavatā samanujñātaḥ praviśya nagaram śubham
saṃvidhāsyati kāryāṇi sarvāṇi sa suhṛd janaḥ

original: 4.025.006a snāto 'yaṃ vividhair gandhair auṣadhaiś ca yathāvidhi
analyzed: snātaḥ yam vividhaiḥ gandhaiḥ auṣadhaiḥ ca yathāvidhi

original: 4.025.006c arcayiṣyati ratnaiś ca mālyaiś ca tvāṃ viśeṣataḥ
analyzed: arcayiṣyati ratnaiḥ ca mālyaiḥ ca tvām viśeṣataḥ
imām giri guhām ramyām abhigantum itas rhasi
kuruṣva svāmi saṃbandham vānarān saṃpraharṣayan
evam uktaḥ hanumatā rāghavaḥ para vīra hā
pratyuvāca hanūmantam buddhimān vākya kovidaḥ

original: 4.025.009a caturdaśasamāḥ saumya grāmaṃ vā yadi vā puram
analyzed: caturdaśa samāḥ saumya grāmam vā yadi vā puram
na pravekṣyāmi hanuman pituḥ nirdeśa pālakaḥ
su samṛddhām guhām divyām sugrīvaḥ vānara ṛṣabhaḥ
praviṣṭaḥ vidhivat vīraḥ kṣipram rājye bhiṣicyatām

original: 4.025.011a evam uktvā hanūmantaṃ rāmaḥ sugrīvam abravīt
analyzed: evam uktvā hanūmantam rāmaḥ sugrīvam abravīt
imam api aṅgadam vīra yauvarājye bhiṣecaya
pūrvaḥ yam vārṣikaḥ māsaḥ śrāvaṇaḥ salila āgamaḥ
pravṛttāḥ saumya catvāraḥ māsāḥ vārṣika saṃjñitāḥ

original: 4.025.013a nāyam udyogasamayaḥ praviśa tvaṃ purīṃ śubhām
analyzed: na ayam udyoga samayaḥ praviśa tvam purīm śubhām

original: 4.025.013c asmin vatsyāmy ahaṃ saumya parvate sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
analyzed: asmin vatsyāmi aham saumya parvate sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
iyam giri guhā ramyā viśālā yukta mārutā
prabhūta salilā saumya prabhūta kamala utpalā
kārtike samanuprāpte tvam rāvaṇa vadhe yata

original: 4.025.015c eṣa naḥ samayaḥ saumya praviśa tvaṃ svam ālayam
analyzed: eṣa naḥ samayaḥ saumya praviśa tvam svam ālayam
abhiṣiñcasva rājye ca suhṛdaḥ saṃpraharṣaya
iti rāma abhyanujñātaḥ sugrīvaḥ vānara ṛṣabhaḥ
praviveśa purīm ramyām kiṣkindhām vāli pālitām
tam vānara sahasrāṇi praviṣṭam vānara īśvaram
abhivādya prahṛṣṭāni sarvatas paryavārayan
tatas prakṛtayaḥ sarvāḥ dṛṣṭvā hari gaṇa īśvaram
praṇamya mūrdhnā patitāḥ vasudhāyām samāhitāḥ
sugrīvaḥ prakṛtīḥ sarvāḥ saṃbhāṣya utthāpya vīryavān
bhrātuḥ antaḥpuram saumyam praviveśa mahā balaḥ
praviśya tu abhiniṣkrāntam sugrīvam vānara ṛṣabham
abhyaṣiñcanta suhṛdaḥ sahasrākṣam iva amarāḥ
tasya pāṇḍuram ājahruḥ chatram hema pariṣkṛtam
śukle ca bāla vyajane hema daṇḍe yaśaskare
tathā sarvāṇi ratnāni sarva bīja auṣadhāni ca

original: 4.025.022c sakṣīrāṇāṃ ca vṛkṣāṇāṃ prarohān kusumāni ca
analyzed: sa kṣīrāṇām ca vṛkṣāṇām prarohān kusumāni ca
śuklāni ca eva vastrāṇi śvetam ca eva anulepanam

original: 4.025.023c sugandhīni ca mālyāni sthalajāny ambujāni ca
analyzed: sugandhīni ca mālyāni sthala jāni ambu jāni ca

original: 4.025.024a candanāni ca divyāni gandhāṃś ca vividhān bahūn
analyzed: candanāni ca divyāni gandhān ca vividhān bahūn
akṣatam jātarūpam ca priyaṅgu madhu sarpiṣī

original: 4.025.025a dadhicarma ca vaiyāghraṃ vārāhī cāpy upānahau
analyzed: dadhi carma ca vaiyāghram vārāhī ca api upānahau
samālambhanam ādāya rocanām samanaḥśilām

original: 4.025.025e ājagmus tatra muditā varāḥ kanyās tu ṣoḍaśa
analyzed: ājagmuḥ tatra muditāḥ varāḥ kanyāḥ tu ṣoḍaśa
tatas te vānara śreṣṭham yathākālam yathāvidhi

original: 4.025.026c ratnair vastraiś ca bhakṣyaiś ca toṣayitvā dvijarṣabhān
analyzed: ratnaiḥ vastraiḥ ca bhakṣyaiḥ ca toṣayitvā dvijarṣabhān
tatas kuśa paristīrṇam samiddham jātavedasam
mantra pūtena haviṣā hutvā mantra vidaḥ janāḥ
tatas hema pratiṣṭhāne vara āstaraṇa saṃvṛte
prāsāda śikhare ramye citra mālya upaśobhite
prāc mukham mantraiḥ sthāpayitvā varāsane
nadīnadebhyaḥ saṃhṛtya tīrthebhyaḥ ca samantataḥ
āhṛtya ca samudrebhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ vānara ṛṣabhāḥ
apaḥ kanaka kumbheṣu nidhāya vimalāḥ śubhāḥ

original: 4.025.031a śubhair vṛṣabhaśṛṅgaiś ca kalaśaiś cāpi kāñcanaiḥ
analyzed: śubhaiḥ vṛṣabha śṛṅgaiḥ ca kalaśaiḥ ca api kāñcanaiḥ
śāstra dṛṣṭena vidhinā mahā ṛṣi vihitena ca
gajaḥ gavākṣaḥ gavayaḥ śarabhaḥ gandhamādanaḥ

original: 4.025.032c maindaś ca dvividaś caiva hanūmāñ jāmbavān nalaḥ
analyzed: maindaḥ ca dvividaḥ ca eva hanumān jāmbavān nalaḥ
abhyaṣiñcanta sugrīvam prasannena sugandhinā
salilena sahasra akṣam vasavaḥ vāsavam yathā
abhiṣikte tu sugrīve sarve vānara puṃgavāḥ
pracukruśuḥ mahātmānaḥ hṛṣṭāḥ tatra sahasraśas

original: 4.025.035a rāmasya tu vacaḥ kurvan sugrīvo haripuṃgavaḥ
analyzed: rāmasya tu vacaḥ kurvan sugrīvaḥ hari puṃgavaḥ
aṅgadam saṃpariṣvajya yauvarājye bhiṣecayat
aṅgade ca abhiṣikte tu sa anukrośāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
sādhu sādhu iti sugrīvam mahātmānaḥ bhyapūjayan
hṛṣṭa puṣṭa jana ākīrṇā patākā dhvaja śobhitā
babhūva nagarī ramyā kṣikindhā giri gahvare
nivedya rāmāya tadā mahātmane
mahā abhiṣekam kapi vāhinīpatiḥ
rumām ca bhāryām pratilabhya vīryavān
avāpa rājyam tridaśādhipaḥ yathā

original: 4.026.001a abhiṣikte tu sugrīve praviṣṭe vānare guhām
analyzed: abhiṣikte tu sugrīve praviṣṭe vānare guhām

original: 4.026.001c ājagāma saha bhrātrā rāmaḥ prasravaṇaṃ girim
analyzed: ājagāma saha bhrātrā rāmaḥ prasravaṇam girim
śārdūla mṛga saṃghuṣṭam siṃhaiḥ bhīma ravaiḥ vṛtam
nānā gulma latā gūḍham bahu pādapa saṃkulam
ṛkṣa vānara gopucchaiḥ mārjāraiḥ ca niṣevitam
megha rāśi nibham śailam nityam śuci jala āśrayam

original: 4.026.004a tasya śailasya śikhare mahatīm āyatāṃ guhām
analyzed: tasya śailasya śikhare mahatīm āyatām guhām
pratyagṛhṇata vāsa artham rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha
avasat tatra dharma ātmā rāghavaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
bahu dṛśya darī kuñje tasmin prasravaṇe girau
su sukhe bahu dravye tasmin hi dharaṇīdhare

original: 4.026.006c vasatas tasya rāmasya ratir alpāpi nābhavat
analyzed: vasataḥ tasya rāmasya ratiḥ alpā api nā abhavat

original: 4.026.006e hṛtāṃ hi bhāryāṃ smarataḥ prāṇebhyo 'pi garīyasīm
analyzed: hṛtām hi bhāryām smarataḥ prāṇebhyaḥ pi garīyasīm
udaya abhyuditam dṛṣṭvā śaśāṅkam ca viśeṣataḥ

original: 4.026.007c āviveśa na taṃ nidrā niśāsu śayanaṃ gatam
analyzed: āviveśa na tam nidrā niśāsu śayanam gatam
tat samutthena śokena bāṣpa upahata cetasam
tam śocamānam kākutstham nityam śoka parāyaṇam
tulya duḥkhaḥ bravīt bhrātā lakṣmaṇaḥ nunayan vacaḥ

original: 4.026.009a alaṃ vīra vyathāṃ gatvā na tvaṃ śocitum arhasi
analyzed: alam vīra vyathām gatvā na tvam śocitum arhasi

original: 4.026.009c śocato hy avasīdanti sarvārthā viditaṃ hi te
analyzed: śocataḥ hi avasīdanti sarva arthāḥ viditam hi te
bhavān kriyā paraḥ loke bhavān deva parāyaṇaḥ

original: 4.026.010c āstiko dharmaśīlaś ca vyavasāyī ca rāghava
analyzed: āstikaḥ dharma śīlaḥ ca vyavasāyī ca rāghava

original: 4.026.011a na hy avyavasitaḥ śatruṃ rākṣasaṃ taṃ viśeṣataḥ
analyzed: na hi a vyavasitaḥ śatrum rākṣasam tam viśeṣataḥ

original: 4.026.011c samarthas tvaṃ raṇe hantuṃ vikramair jihmakāriṇam
analyzed: samarthaḥ tvam raṇe hantum vikramaiḥ jihma kāriṇam

original: 4.026.012a samunmūlaya śokaṃ tvaṃ vyavasāyaṃ sthiraṃ kuru
analyzed: samunmūlaya śokam tvam vyavasāyam sthiram kuru

original: 4.026.012c tataḥ saparivāraṃ taṃ nirmūlaṃ kuru rākṣasaṃ
analyzed: tatas sa parivāram tam nirmūlam kuru rākṣasam
pṛthivīm api kākutstha sa sāgara vana acalām

original: 4.026.013c parivartayituṃ śaktaḥ kim aṅga puna rāvaṇam
analyzed: parivartayitum śaktaḥ kim aṅga punar rāvaṇam

original: 4.026.014a ahaṃ tu khalu te vīryaṃ prasuptaṃ pratibodhaye
analyzed: aham tu khalu te vīryam prasuptam pratibodhaye

original: 4.026.014c dīptair āhutibhiḥ kāle bhasmac channam ivānalam
analyzed: dīptaiḥ āhutibhiḥ kāle bhasma channam iva analam

original: 4.026.015a lakṣmaṇasya tu tad vākyaṃ pratipūjya hitaṃ śubham
analyzed: lakṣmaṇasya tu tat vākyam pratipūjya hitam śubham

original: 4.026.015c rāghavaḥ suhṛdaṃ snigdham idaṃ vacanam abravīt
analyzed: rāghavaḥ suhṛdam snigdham idam vacanam abravīt

original: 4.026.016a vācyaṃ yad anuraktena snigdhena ca hitena ca
analyzed: vācyam yat anuraktena snigdhena ca hitena ca

original: 4.026.016c satyavikrama yuktena tad uktaṃ lakṣmaṇa tvayā
analyzed: satya vikrama yuktena tat uktam lakṣmaṇa tvayā
eṣa śokaḥ parityaktaḥ sarva kārya avasādakaḥ
vikrameṣu apratihatam tejaḥ protsāhayāmi aham
śarad kālam pratīkṣe ham iyam prāvṛṣ upasthitā

original: 4.026.018c tataḥ sarāṣṭraṃ sagaṇaṃ rākṣasaṃ taṃ nihanmy aham
analyzed: tatas sa rāṣṭram sa gaṇam rākṣasam tam nihanmi aham

original: 4.026.019a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā hṛṣṭo rāmasya lakṣmaṇaḥ
analyzed: tasya tat vacanam śrutvā hṛṣṭaḥ rāmasya lakṣmaṇaḥ
punar eva abravīt vākyam saumitriḥ mitra nandanaḥ

original: 4.026.020a etat te sadṛśaṃ vākyam uktaṃ śatrunibarhaṇa
analyzed: etat te sadṛśam vākyam uktam śatru nibarhaṇa

original: 4.026.020c idānīm asi kākutstha prakṛtiṃ svām upāgataḥ
analyzed: idānīm asi kākutstha prakṛtim svām upāgataḥ

original: 4.026.021a vijñāya hy ātmano vīryaṃ tathyaṃ bhavitum arhasi
analyzed: vijñāya hi ātmanaḥ vīryam tathyam bhavitum arhasi

original: 4.026.021c etat sadṛśam uktaṃ te śrutasyābhijanasya ca
analyzed: etat sadṛśam uktam te śrutasya abhijanasya ca
tasmāt puruṣa śārdūla cintayam śatru nigraham
varṣārātram anuprāptam atikrāmaya rāghava
niyamya kopam pratipālyatām śarad
kṣamasva māsān caturaḥ mayā saha
vasa acale smin mṛgarāja sevite
saṃvardhayam śatru vadhe samudyataḥ

original: 4.027.001a sa tadā vālinaṃ hatvā sugrīvam abhiṣicya ca
analyzed: sa tadā vālinam hatvā sugrīvam abhiṣicya ca

original: 4.027.001c vasan mālyavataḥ pṛṣṭe rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
analyzed: vasan mālyavataḥ pṛṣṭe rāmaḥ lakṣmaṇam abravīt

original: 4.027.002a ayaṃ sa kālaḥ saṃprāptaḥ samayo 'dya jalāgamaḥ
analyzed: ayam sa kālaḥ saṃprāptaḥ samayaḥ jalāgamaḥ

original: 4.027.002c saṃpaśya tvaṃ nabho meghaiḥ saṃvṛtaṃ girisaṃnibhaiḥ
analyzed: saṃpaśya tvam nabhaḥ meghaiḥ saṃvṛtam giri saṃnibhaiḥ

original: 4.027.003a nava māsa dhṛtaṃ garbhaṃ bhāskārasya gabhastibhiḥ
analyzed: nava māsa dhṛtam garbham bhāskārasya gabhastibhiḥ

original: 4.027.003c pītvā rasaṃ samudrāṇāṃ dyauḥ prasūte rasāyanam
analyzed: pītvā rasam samudrāṇām dyauḥ prasūte rasāyanam
śakyam ambaram āruhya megha sopāna paṅktibhiḥ
kuṭaja arjuna mālābhiḥ alaṃkartum divākaram
saṃdhyā rāga utthitaiḥ tāmraiḥ anteṣu adhika pāṇḍuraiḥ
snigdhaiḥ abhra paṭa chadaiḥ baddha vraṇam iva ambaram
āpāṇḍu jaladam bhāti kāma āturam iva ambaram
eṣā dharma parikliṣṭā nava vāri pariplutā
sītā iva śoka saṃtaptā mahī bāṣpam vimuñcati
śakyam añjalibhiḥ pātum vātāḥ ketaki gandhinaḥ
eṣa phulla arjunaḥ śailaḥ ketakaiḥ adhivāsitaḥ
sugrīvaḥ iva śānta ariḥ dhārābhiḥ abhiṣicyate
megha kṛṣṇa ajina dharāḥ dhārā yajña upavītinaḥ
māruta āpūrita guhāḥ prādhītāḥ iva parvatāḥ

original: 4.027.011a kaśābhir iva haimībhir vidyudbhir iva tāḍitam
analyzed: kaśābhiḥ iva haimībhiḥ vidyudbhiḥ iva tāḍitam
antar stanita nirghoṣam sa vedanam iva ambaram
nīla megha āśritā vidyut sphurantī pratibhāti me
sphurantī rāvaṇasya aṅke vaidehī iva tapasvinī

original: 4.027.013a imās tā manmathavatāṃ hitāḥ pratihatā diśaḥ
analyzed: imāḥ tāḥ manmathavatām hitāḥ pratihatāḥ diśaḥ
anuliptāḥ iva ghanaiḥ naṣṭa graha niśākarāḥ
kva cit bāṣpa abhisaṃruddhān varṣāgama samutsukān
kuṭajān paśya saumitre puṣṭitān giri sānuṣu
mama śoka abhibhūtasya kāma saṃdīpanān sthitān
rajaḥ praśāntam sahimaḥ vāyuḥ
nidāgha doṣa prasarāḥ praśāntāḥ
sthitā hi yātrā vasudhā adhipānām
pravāsinaḥ yānti narāḥ sva deśān
saṃprasthitāḥ mānasa vāsa lubdhāḥ
priya anvitāḥ saṃprati cakravākaḥ
abhīkṣṇa varṣa udaka vikṣateṣu
yānāni mārgeṣu na saṃpatanti

original: 4.027.017a kva cit prakāśaṃ kva cid aprakāśaṃ;
analyzed: kva cit prakāśam kva cit aprakāśam
nabhaḥ prakīrṇa ambudharam vibhāti
kva cit kva cit parvata saṃniruddham
rūpam yathā śānta mahā arṇavasya
vyāmiśritam sarja kadamba puṣpaiḥ
navam jalam parvata dhātu tāmram
mayūra kekābhiḥ anuprayātam
śaila āpagāḥ śīghrataram vahanti
rasa ākulam ṣaṭpada saṃnikāśam
prabhujyate jambu phalam prakāmam
aneka varṇam pavana avadhūtam
bhūmau patati āmra phalam vipakvam
vidyutpatākāḥ sabalāka mālāḥ
śailendra kūṭa ākṛti saṃnikāśāḥ
garjanti meghāḥ samudīrṇa nādā
matta gaja indrāḥ iva saṃyuga sthaḥ
megha abhikāmī parisaṃpatantī
saṃmoditā bhāti balāka paṅktiḥ
vātāvadhūtā varapauṇḍarīkī
lambā iva mālā racitā ambarasya
nidrā śanais keśavam abhyupaiti
drutam nadī sāgaram abhyupaiti
hṛṣṭā balākā ghanam abhyupaiti
kāntā sa kāmā priyam abhyupaiti
jātāḥ vana antāḥ śikhi su pranṛttā
jātāḥ kadambāḥ sa kadamba śākhāḥ
jātā vṛṣā goṣu samāna kāmā
jātā mahī sasya vana abhirāmā
vahanti varṣanti nadanti bhānti
dhyāyanti nṛtyanti samāśvasanti
nadyaḥ ghanāḥ matta gajāḥ vana antāḥ
priyā vinīhāḥ śikhinaḥ plavaṃgāḥ
praharṣitāḥ ketaka puṣpa gandham
āghrāya hṛṣṭāḥ vana nirjhareṣu
prapāta śabda ākulitāḥ gajendrāḥ
sārdham mayūraiḥ samadāḥ nadanti
dhārā nipātaiḥ abhihanyamānāḥ
kadamba śākhāsu vilambamānāḥ
kṣaṇa arjitam puṣpa rasa avagāḍham
śanais madam ṣaṣ caraṇāḥ tyajanti
aṅgāra cūrṇa utkara saṃnikāśaiḥ
phalaiḥ suparyāpta rasaiḥ samṛddhaiḥ
jambu drumāṇām pravibhānti śākhāḥ
nilīyamānāḥ iva ṣaṭpada oghaiḥ
taḍit patākābhiḥ alaṃkṛtānām
udīrṇa gambhīra mahā ravāṇām
vibhānti rūpāṇi balāhakānām
raṇa udyatānām iva vāraṇānām
saṃprasthitaḥ megha ravam niśamya
yuddha abhikāmaḥ pratināga śaṅkī
mattaḥ gaja indraḥ pratisaṃnivṛttaḥ
muktā sakāśam salilam patat vai
su nirmalam patra puṭeṣu lagnam
hṛṣṭāḥ vivarṇa chadanāḥ vihaṃgāḥ
sura indra dattam tṛṣitāḥ pibanti
nīleṣu nīlā nava vāri pūrṇā
megheṣu meghāḥ pravibhānti saktāḥ
dava agni dagdheṣu dava agni dagdhāḥ
śaileṣu śailāḥ iva baddha mūlāḥ
mattāḥ gaja indrā muditāḥ gava indrā
vaneṣu viśrāntatarāḥ mṛgendrāḥ
ramyāḥ naga indrāḥ nibhṛtāḥ naga indrāḥ
prakrīḍitaḥ vāridharaiḥ sura indraḥ
vṛttā yātrā narendrāṇām senā pratinivartate

original: 4.027.033c vairāṇi caiva mārgāś ca salilena samīkṛtāḥ
analyzed: vairāṇi ca eva mārgāḥ ca salilena samīkṛtāḥ
māsi prauṣṭhapade brahma brāhmaṇānām vivakṣatām
ayam adhyāya samayaḥ sāmagānām upasthitaḥ
nivṛtta karma āyatanaḥ nūnam saṃcita saṃcayaḥ
āṣāḍhīm abhyupagataḥ bharataḥ koṣaka adhipaḥ
nūnam āpūryamāṇāyāḥ sarayvāḥ vadhate rayaḥ

original: 4.027.036c māṃ samīkṣya samāyāntam ayodhyāyā iva svanaḥ
analyzed: mām samīkṣya samāyāntam ayodhyāyāḥ iva svanaḥ

original: 4.027.037a imāḥ sphītaguṇā varṣāḥ sugrīvaḥ sukham aśnute
analyzed: imāḥ sphīta guṇāḥ varṣāḥ sugrīvaḥ sukham aśnute

original: 4.027.037c vijitāriḥ sadāraś ca rājye mahati ca sthitaḥ
analyzed: vijita ariḥ sa dāraḥ ca rājye mahati ca sthitaḥ

original: 4.027.038a ahaṃ tu hṛtadāraś ca rājyāc ca mahataś cyutaḥ
analyzed: aham tu hṛta dāraḥ ca rājyāt ca mahataḥ cyutaḥ
nadī kūlam iva klinnam avasīdāmi lakṣmaṇa

original: 4.027.039a śokaś ca mama vistīrṇo varṣāś ca bhṛśadurgamāḥ
analyzed: śokaḥ ca mama vistīrṇaḥ varṣāḥ ca bhṛśa durgamāḥ

original: 4.027.039c rāvaṇaś ca mahāñ śatrur apāraṃ pratibhāti me
analyzed: rāvaṇaḥ ca mahān śatruḥ apāram pratibhāti me

original: 4.027.040a ayātrāṃ caiva dṛṣṭvemāṃ mārgāṃś ca bhṛśadurgamān
analyzed: ayātrām ca eva dṛṣṭvā imām mārgān ca bhṛśa durgamān

original: 4.027.040c praṇate caiva sugrīve na mayā kiṃ cid īritam
analyzed: praṇate ca eva sugrīve na mayā kim cit īritam
api ca ati parikliṣṭam cirāt dāraiḥ samāgatam
ātma kārya garīyaḥ tvāt vaktum nā icchāmi vānaram

original: 4.027.042a svayam eva hi viśramya jñātvā kālam upāgatam
analyzed: svayam eva hi viśramya jñātvā kālam upāgatam

original: 4.027.042c upakāraṃ ca sugrīvo vetsyate nātra saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: upakāram ca sugrīvaḥ vetsyate na atra saṃśayaḥ
tasmāt kāla pratīkṣaḥ ham sthitaḥ smi śubha lakṣaṇa
sugrīvasya nadīnām ca prasādam anupālayan
upakāreṇa vīraḥ hi pratikāreṇa yujyate
pratikṛtaḥ hanti sattvavatām manaḥ
athā evam uktaḥ praṇidhāya lakṣmaṇaḥ
kṛtāñjaliḥ tat pratipūjya bhāṣitam
uvāca rāmam su abhirāma darśanam
pradarśayan darśanam ātmanaḥ śubham
yathā uktam etat tava sarvam īpsitam
narendra kartā nacirāt hari īśvaraḥ
śarad pratīkṣaḥ kṣamatām imam bhavān
jala prapātam ripu nigrahe dhṛtaḥ
samīkṣya vimalam vyoma gata vidyut balāhakam
samṛddha artham ca sugrīvam manda dharma artha saṃgraham
atyartham asatām mārgam ekānta gata mānasam
nivṛtta kāryam siddhārtham pramadā abhiratam sadā
prāptavantam abhipretān sarvān eva manorathān

original: 4.028.004a svāṃ ca pātnīm abhipretāṃ tārāṃ cāpi samīpsitām
analyzed: svām ca pātnīm abhipretām tārām ca api samīpsitām
viharantam ahorātram kṛtārtham vigata jvalam
krīḍantam iva deveśam nandane psarasām gaṇaiḥ
mantriṣu nyasta kāryam ca mantriṇām anavekṣakam
utsanna rājya saṃdeśam kāma vṛttam avasthitam
prasādya vākyaiḥ madhuraiḥ hetumadbhiḥ manoramaiḥ

original: 4.028.008a hitaṃ tathyaṃ ca pathyaṃ ca sāmadharmārthanītimat
analyzed: hitam tathyam ca pathyam ca sāma dharma artha nītimat
praṇaya prīti saṃyuktam viśvāsa kṛta niścayam
hari īśvaram upāgamya hanumān vākyam abravīt

original: 4.028.009a rājyaṃ prāptaṃ yaśaś caiva kaulī śrīr abhivarthitā
analyzed: rājyam prāptam yaśaḥ ca eva kaulī śrīḥ abhivarthitā

original: 4.028.009c mitrāṇāṃ saṃgrahaḥ śeṣas tad bhavān kartum arhati
analyzed: mitrāṇām saṃgrahaḥ śeṣaḥ tat bhavān kartum arhati

original: 4.028.010a yo hi mitreṣu kālajñaḥ satataṃ sādhu vartate
analyzed: yaḥ hi mitreṣu kāla jñaḥ satatam sādhu vartate

original: 4.028.010c tasya rājyaṃ ca kīrtiś ca pratāpaś cābhivardhate
analyzed: tasya rājyam ca kīrtiḥ ca pratāpaḥ ca abhivardhate

original: 4.028.011a yasya kośaś ca daṇḍaś ca mitrāṇy ātmā ca bhūmipa
analyzed: yasya kośaḥ ca daṇḍaḥ ca mitrāṇi ātmā ca bhūmipa

original: 4.028.011c samavetāni sarvāṇi sa rājyaṃ mahad aśnute
analyzed: samavetāni sarvāṇi sa rājyam mahat aśnute

original: 4.028.012a tad bhavān vṛttasaṃpannaḥ sthitaḥ pathi niratyaye
analyzed: tat bhavān vṛtta saṃpannaḥ sthitaḥ pathi niratyaye
mitra artham abhinīta artham yathāvat kartum arhati
yaḥ tu kāla vyatīteṣu mitra kāryeṣu vartate

original: 4.028.013c sa kṛtvā mahato 'py arthān na mitrārthena yujyate
analyzed: sa kṛtvā mahataḥ pi arthān na mitra arthena yujyate
kriyatām rāghavasya etat vaidehyāḥ parimārgaṇam

original: 4.028.014c tad idaṃ vīra kāryaṃ te kālātītam ariṃdama
analyzed: tat idam vīra kāryam te kāla atītam ariṃdama

original: 4.028.015a na ca kālam atītaṃ te nivedayati kālavit
analyzed: na ca kālam atītam te nivedayati kāla vid

original: 4.028.015c tvaramāṇo 'pi san prājñas tava rājan vaśānugaḥ
analyzed: tvaramāṇaḥ pi san prājñaḥ tava rājan vaśa anugaḥ

original: 4.028.016a kulasya ketuḥ sphītasya dīrghabandhuś ca rāghavaḥ
analyzed: kulasya ketuḥ sphītasya dīrgha bandhuḥ ca rāghavaḥ
aprameya prabhāvaḥ ca svayam ca apratimaḥ guṇaiḥ

original: 4.028.017a tasya tvaṃ kuru vai kāryaṃ pūrvaṃ tena kṛtaṃ tava
analyzed: tasya tvam kuru vai kāryam pūrvam tena kṛtam tava
hari īśvara hari śreṣṭhān ājñāpayitum arhasi

original: 4.028.018a na hi tāvad bhavet kālo vyatītaś codanād ṛte
analyzed: na hi tāvat bhavet kālaḥ vyatītaḥ codanāt ṛte
coditasya hi kāryasya bhavet kāla vyatikramaḥ

original: 4.028.019a akartur api kāryasya bhavān kartā harīśvara
analyzed: akartuḥ api kāryasya bhavān kartā hari īśvara

original: 4.028.019c kiṃ punaḥ pratikartus te rājyena ca dhanena ca
analyzed: kim punar pratikartuḥ te rājyena ca dhanena ca
śaktimān asi vikrāntaḥ vānara ṛṣka gaṇeśvara

original: 4.028.020c kartuṃ dāśaratheḥ prītim ājñāyāṃ kiṃ nu sajjase
analyzed: kartum dāśaratheḥ prītim ājñāyām kim nu sajjase
kāmam khalu śaraiḥ śaktaḥ sura asura mahā uragān

original: 4.028.021c vaśe dāśarathiḥ kartuṃ tvatpratijñāṃ tu kāṅkṣate
analyzed: vaśe dāśarathiḥ kartum tvad pratijñām tu kāṅkṣate
prāṇatyāga aviśaṅkena kṛtam tena tava priyam

original: 4.028.022c tasya mārgāma vaidehīṃ pṛthivyām api cāmbare
analyzed: tasya vaidehīm pṛthivyām api ca ambare

original: 4.028.023a na devā na ca gandharvā nāsurā na marudgaṇāḥ
analyzed: na devāḥ na ca gandharvāḥ na asurāḥ na marut gaṇāḥ

original: 4.028.023c na ca yakṣā bhayaṃ tasya kuryuḥ kim uta rākṣasāḥ
analyzed: na ca yakṣāḥ bhayam tasya kuryuḥ kim uta rākṣasāḥ

original: 4.028.024a tad evaṃ śaktiyuktasya pūrvaṃ priyakṛtas tathā
analyzed: tat evam śakti yuktasya pūrvam priya kṛtaḥ tathā
rāmasya arhasi piṅga īśa kartum sarva ātmanā priyam

original: 4.028.025a nādhastād avanau nāpsu gatir nopari cāmbare
analyzed: na adhastāt avanau na apsu gatiḥ na upari ca ambare
kasya cit sajjate smākam kapi īśvara tava ājñayā

original: 4.028.026a tad ājñāpaya kaḥ kiṃ te kṛte vasatu kutra cit
analyzed: tat ājñāpaya kaḥ kim te kṛte vasatu kutra cit

original: 4.028.026c harayo hy apradhṛṣyās te santi koṭyagrato 'nagha
analyzed: harayaḥ hi apradhṛṣyāḥ te santi koṭi agratas nagha
tasya tat vacanam śrutvā kāle sādhu niveditam
sugrīvaḥ sattva saṃpannaḥ cakāra matim uttamām
sa saṃdideśa abhimatam nīlam nitya kṛta udyamam
dikṣu sarvāsu sarveṣām sainyānām upasaṃgrahe

original: 4.028.029a yathā senā samagrā me yūthapālāś ca sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: yathā senā samagrā me yūtha pālāḥ ca sarvaśas
samāgacchanti asaṃgena senā agrāṇi tathā kuru

original: 4.028.030a ye tv antapālāḥ plavagāḥ śīghragā vyavasāyinaḥ
analyzed: ye tu antapālāḥ plavagāḥ śīghragāḥ vyavasāyinaḥ

original: 4.028.030c samānayantu te sainyaṃ tvaritāḥ śāsanān mama
analyzed: samānayantu te sainyam tvaritāḥ śāsanāt mama
svayam ca anantaram sainyam bhavān eva anupaśyatu

original: 4.028.031a tripañcarātrād ūrdhvaṃ yaḥ prāpnuyān neha vānaraḥ
analyzed: tri pañca rātrāt ūrdhvam yaḥ prāpnuyāt na iha vānaraḥ

original: 4.028.031c tasya prāṇāntiko daṇḍo nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
analyzed: tasya prāṇāntikaḥ daṇḍaḥ na atra kāryā vicāraṇā
harīn ca vṛddhān upayātu sa aṅgado
bhavān mama ājñām adhikṛtya niścitām
iti vyavasthām
vidhāya veśma praviveśa vīryavān

original: 4.029.001a guhāṃ praviṣṭe sugrīve vimukte gagane ghanaiḥ
analyzed: guhām praviṣṭe sugrīve vimukte gagane ghanaiḥ
varṣa rātra uṣitaḥ rāmaḥ kāma śoka abhipīḍitaḥ
pāṇḍuram gaganam dṛṣṭvā vimalam candra maṇḍalam
śāradīm rajanīm ca eva dṛṣṭvā jyotsnā anulepanām

original: 4.029.003a kāmavṛttaṃ ca sugrīvaṃ naṣṭāṃ ca janakātmajām
analyzed: kāma vṛttam ca sugrīvam naṣṭām ca janakātmajām

original: 4.029.003c buddhvā kālam atītaṃ ca mumoha paramāturaḥ
analyzed: buddhvā kālam atītam ca mumoha parama āturaḥ

original: 4.029.004a sa tu saṃjñām upāgamya muhūrtān matimān punaḥ
analyzed: sa tu saṃjñām upāgamya muhūrtāt matimān punar

original: 4.029.004c manaḥsthām api vaidehīṃ cintayām āsa rāghavaḥ
analyzed: manaḥ sthām api vaidehīm cintayām āsa rāghavaḥ
āsīnaḥ parvatasya agre hema dhātu vibhūṣite

original: 4.029.005c śāradaṃ gaganaṃ dṛṣṭva jagāma manasā priyām
analyzed: śāradam gaganam dṛṣṭva jagāma manasā priyām
dṛṣṭvā ca vimalam vyoma gata vidyut balāhakam
sārasa ārava saṃghuṣṭam vilalāpa ārtayā girā

original: 4.029.007c yāśrame ramate bālā sādya me ramate katham
analyzed: yā āśrame ramate bālā sā adya me ramate katham

original: 4.029.008a puṣpitāṃś cāsanān dṛṣṭvā kāñcanān iva nirmalān
analyzed: puṣpitān ca asanān dṛṣṭvā kāñcanān iva nirmalān

original: 4.029.008c kathaṃ sa ramate bālā paśyantī mām apaśyatī
analyzed: katham sa ramate bālā paśyantī mām a paśyatī
yā purā kalahaṃsānām svareṇa kala bhāṣiṇī

original: 4.029.009c budhyate cārusarvāṅgī sādya me budhyate katham
analyzed: budhyate cāru sarva aṅgī sā adya me budhyate katham
niḥsvanam cakravākānām niśamya sahacāriṇām
puṇḍarīka viśāla akṣī katham eṣā bhaviṣyati

original: 4.029.011a sarāṃsi sarito vāpīḥ kānanāni vanāni ca
analyzed: sarāṃsi saritaḥ vāpīḥ kānanāni vanāni ca

original: 4.029.011c tāṃ vinā mṛgaśāvākṣīṃ caran nādya sukhaṃ labhe
analyzed: tām vinā mṛgaśāvākṣīm caran na adya sukham labhe

original: 4.029.012a api tāṃ madviyogāc ca saukumāryāc ca bhāminīm
analyzed: api tām mad viyogāt ca saukumāryāt ca bhāminīm
na dūram pīḍayet kāmaḥ śarad guṇa nirantaraḥ
evamādi nara śreṣṭhaḥ vilalāpa nṛpa ātmajaḥ
vihaṃgaḥ iva sāraṅgaḥ salilam tridaśeśvarāt
tatas ramyeṣu phala arthī giri sānuṣu
dadarśa paryupāvṛttaḥ lakṣmīvān lakṣmaṇaḥ grajam
tam cintayā duḥsahayā parītam
visaṃjñam ekam vijane manasvī
bhrātuḥ viṣādāt paritāpa dīnaḥ
samīkṣya saumitriḥ uvāca rāmam
kim ārya kāmasya vaśaṃgatena
kim ātma pauruṣya parābhavena
ayam sadā saṃhṛiyate samādhiḥ
kim atra yogena nivartitena
kriyā abhiyogam manasaḥ prasādam
samādhi yoga anugatam ca kālam
sahāya sāmarthyam adīna sattva
sva karma hetum ca kuruṣva hetum
na jānakī mānava vaṃśanātha
tvayā sanāthā sulabhā pareṇa
na ca agni cūḍām jvalitām upetya
na dahyate vīra vara arha kaḥ cit
sa lakṣmaṇam lakṣmaṇam apradhṛṣyam
svabhāva jam vākyam uvāca rāmaḥ
hitam ca pathyam ca naya prasaktam
sa sāma dharma artha samāhitam ca
niḥsaṃśayam kāryam avekṣitavyam
kriyā viśeṣaḥ hi anuvartitavyaḥ
nanu pravṛttasya durāsadasya
kumāra kāryasya phalam na cintyam
atha padma palāśa akṣīm maithilīm anucintayan
uvāca lakṣmaṇam rāmaḥ mukhena pariśuṣyatā
tarpayitvā sahasrākṣaḥ salilena vasuṃdharām
nirvartayitvā sasyāni kṛtakarmā vyavasthitaḥ
snigdha gambhīra nirghoṣāḥ śaila druma purogamāḥ
visṛjya salilam meghāḥ pariśrāntāḥ nṛpa ātmaja
vimadāḥ iva mātaṅgāḥ śānta vegāḥ payodharāḥ
jala garbhāḥ mahā vegāḥ kuṭaja arjuna gandhinaḥ
caritvā viratāḥ saumya vṛṣṭi vātāḥ samudyatāḥ

original: 4.029.026a ghanānāṃ vāraṇānāṃ ca mayūrāṇāṃ ca lakṣmaṇa
analyzed: ghanānām vāraṇānām ca mayūrāṇām ca lakṣmaṇa
nādaḥ prasravaṇānām ca praśāntaḥ sahasā anagha
abhivṛṣṭāḥ mahā meghaiḥ nirmalāḥ citra sānavaḥ
anuliptāḥ iva ābhānti girayaḥ candra raśmibhiḥ
darśayanti śarad nadyaḥ pulināni śanais śanais
nava saṃgama sa vrīḍāḥ jaghanāni iva yoṣitaḥ
prasanna salilāḥ saumya kurarībhiḥ vināditāḥ
cakravāka gaṇa ākīrṇāḥ vibhānti salilāśayāḥ
anyonya baddhavairāṇām jigīṣūṇām nṛpa ātmaja
udyoga samayaḥ saumya pārthivānām upasthitaḥ

original: 4.029.031a iyaṃ sā prathamā yātrā pārthivānāṃ nṛpātmaja
analyzed: iyam sā prathamā yātrā pārthivānām nṛpa ātmaja

original: 4.029.031c na ca paśyāmi sugrīvam udyogaṃ vā tathāvidham
analyzed: na ca paśyāmi sugrīvam udyogam vā tathāvidham
catvāraḥ vārṣikāḥ māsāḥ gatāḥ varṣa śata upamāḥ
mama śoka abhitaptasya saumya sītām a paśyataḥ
priyā vihīne duḥkha ārte hṛta rājye vivāsite

original: 4.029.033c kṛpāṃ na kurute rājā sugrīvo mayi lakṣmaṇa
analyzed: kṛpām na kurute rājā sugrīvaḥ mayi lakṣmaṇa
anāthaḥ hṛta rājyaḥ yam rāvaṇena ca dharṣitaḥ

original: 4.029.034c dīno dūragṛhaḥ kāmī māṃ caiva śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: dīnaḥ dūragṛhaḥ kāmī mām ca eva śaraṇam gataḥ

original: 4.029.035a ity etaiḥ kāraṇaiḥ saumya sugrīvasya durātmanaḥ
analyzed: iti etaiḥ kāraṇaiḥ saumya sugrīvasya durātmanaḥ
aham vānara rājasya paribhūtaḥ paraṃtapa
sa kālam parisaṃkhyāya sītāyāḥ parimārgaṇe
kṛtārthaḥ samayam kṛtvā durmatiḥ na avabudhyate

original: 4.029.037a tvaṃ praviśya ca kiṣkindhāṃ brūhi vānarapuṃgavam
analyzed: tvam praviśya ca kiṣkindhām brūhi vānara puṃgavam

original: 4.029.037c mūrkhaṃ grāmya sukhe saktaṃ sugrīvaṃ vacanān mama
analyzed: mūrkham grāmya sukhe saktam sugrīvam vacanāt mama
arthinām upapannānām pūrvam ca api upakāriṇām

original: 4.029.038c āśāṃ saṃśrutya yo hanti sa loke puruṣādhamaḥ
analyzed: āśām saṃśrutya yaḥ hanti sa loke puruṣa adhamaḥ

original: 4.029.039a śubhaṃ vā yadi vā pāpaṃ yo hi vākyam udīritam
analyzed: śubham vā yadi vā pāpam yaḥ hi vākyam udīritam
satyena parigṛhṇāti sa vīraḥ puruṣa uttamaḥ

original: 4.029.040a kṛtārthā hy akṛtārthānāṃ mitrāṇāṃ na bhavanti ye
analyzed: kṛtārthāḥ hi a kṛtārthānām mitrāṇām na bhavanti ye

original: 4.029.040c tān mṛtān api kravyādaḥ kṛtaghnān nopabhuñjate
analyzed: tān mṛtān api kravyādaḥ kṛtaghnān na upabhuñjate
nūnam kāñcana pṛṣṭhasya vikṛṣṭasya mayā raṇe
draṣṭum icchanti cāpasya rūpam vidyut gaṇa upamam
ghoram jyā tala nirghoṣam kruddhasya mama saṃyuge

original: 4.029.042c nirghoṣam iva vajrasya punaḥ saṃśrotum icchati
analyzed: nirghoṣam iva vajrasya punar saṃśrotum icchati

original: 4.029.043a kāmam evaṃ gate 'py asya parijñāte parākrame
analyzed: kāmam evam gate pi asya parijñāte parākrame

original: 4.029.043c tvatsahāyasya me vīra na cintā syān nṛpātmaja
analyzed: tvad sahāyasya me vīra na cintā syāt nṛpa ātmaja
yad artham ayam ārambhaḥ kṛtaḥ para puraṃjaya
samayam na abhijānāti kṛtārthaḥ plavaga īśvaraḥ
varṣā samaya kālam tu pratijñāya hari īśvaraḥ
vyatītān caturaḥ māsān viharan na avabudhyate
sa amātya pariṣad krīḍan pānam eva upasevate
śoka dīneṣu na asmāsu sugrīvaḥ kurute dayām

original: 4.029.047a ucyatāṃ gaccha sugrīvas tvayā vatsa mahābala
analyzed: ucyatām gaccha sugrīvaḥ tvayā vatsa mahā bala

original: 4.029.047c mama roṣasya yadrūpaṃ brūyāś cainam idaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: mama roṣasya yad rūpam brūyāḥ ca enam idam vacaḥ

original: 4.029.048a na ca saṃkucitaḥ panthā yena vālī hato gataḥ
