analyzed: na ca saṃkucitaḥ panthāḥ yena vālī hataḥ gataḥ
samaye tiṣṭha sugrīva mā vāli patham anvagāḥ

original: 4.029.049a eka eva raṇe vālī śareṇa nihato mayā
analyzed: ekaḥ eva raṇe vālī śareṇa nihataḥ mayā

original: 4.029.049c tvāṃ tu satyād atikrāntaṃ haniṣyāmi sabāndhavam
analyzed: tvām tu satyāt atikrāntam haniṣyāmi sa bāndhavam

original: 4.029.050a tad evaṃ vihite kārye yad dhitaṃ puruṣarṣabha
analyzed: tat evam vihite kārye yat hitam puruṣa ṛṣabha

original: 4.029.050c tat tad brūhi naraśreṣṭha tvara kālavyatikramaḥ
analyzed: tat tat brūhi nara śreṣṭha tvara kāla vyatikramaḥ
kuruṣva satyam mayi vānara īśvara
pratiśrutam dharmam avekṣya śāśvatam
mā vālinam pretya gataḥ yama kṣayam

original: tvam adya paśyer mama coditaiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: tvam adya paśyeḥ mama ca uditaiḥ śaraiḥ
sa pūrvajam tīvra vivṛddha kopam
lālapyamānam prasamīkṣya dīnam
cakāra tīvrām matim ugra tejāḥ
sa kāminam dīnam adīna sattvaḥ
śoka abhipannam samudīrṇa kopam
narendra sūnuḥ naradeva putram
rāma anujaḥ pūrvajam iti uvāca
na vānaraḥ sthāsyati sādhu vṛtte
na maṃsyate kārya phala anuṣaṅgān
na bhakṣyate vānara rājya lakṣmīm
tathā hi na abhikramate sya buddhiḥ
mati kṣayāt grāmya sukheṣu saktaḥ
tava prasāda a pratikāra buddhiḥ
hataḥ grajam paśyatu vālinam sa
na rājyam evam viguṇasya deyam
na dhāraye kopam udīrṇa vegam
nihanmi sugrīvam asatyam adya
hari pravīraiḥ saha vāli putraḥ
narendra patnyāḥ vicayam karotu
tam ātta bāṇāsanam utpatantam
nivedita artham raṇa caṇḍa kopam
uvaca rāmaḥ para vīra hantā
su avekṣitam sa anunayam ca vākyam

original: 4.030.006a na hi vai tvadvidho loke pāpam evaṃ samācaret
analyzed: na hi vai tvadvidhaḥ loke pāpam evam samācaret

original: 4.030.006c pāpam āryeṇa yo hanti sa vīraḥ puruṣottamaḥ
analyzed: pāpam āryeṇa yaḥ hanti sa vīraḥ puruṣa uttamaḥ

original: 4.030.007a nedam adya tvayā grāhyaṃ sādhuvṛttena lakṣmaṇa
analyzed: na idam adya tvayā grāhyam sādhu vṛttena lakṣmaṇa

original: 4.030.007c tāṃ prītim anuvartasva pūrvavṛttaṃ ca saṃgatam
analyzed: tām prītim anuvartasva pūrva vṛttam ca saṃgatam
sāma upahitayā vācā rūkṣāṇi parivarjayan
vaktum arhasi sugrīvam vyatītam kāla paryaye
saḥ grajena anuśiṣṭa arthaḥ yathāvat puruṣa ṛṣabhaḥ
praviveśa purīm vīraḥ lakṣmaṇaḥ para vīra hā

original: 4.030.010a tataḥ śubhamatiḥ prājño bhrātuḥ priyahite rataḥ
analyzed: tatas śubha matiḥ prājñaḥ bhrātuḥ priya hite rataḥ
lakṣmaṇaḥ pratisaṃrabdhaḥ jagāma bhavanam kapeḥ
śakrabāṇāsana prakhyam dhanuḥ kāla antaka upamaḥ
pragṛhya giri śṛṅga ābham mandaraḥ sānumān iva
yathā ukta kārī vacanam uttaram ca eva sottaram
bṛhaspati samaḥ buddhyā mattvā rāma anujaḥ tadā
kāma krodha samutthena bhrātuḥ kopa agninā vṛtaḥ
prabhañjanaḥ iva a prītaḥ prayayau lakṣmaṇaḥ tadā
sāla tāla aśvakarṇān ca tarasā pātayan bahūn

original: 4.030.014c paryasyan girikūṭāni drumān anyāṃś ca vegataḥ
analyzed: paryasyan giri kūṭāni drumān anyān ca vegataḥ

original: 4.030.015a śilāś ca śakalīkurvan padbhyāṃ gaja ivāśugaḥ
analyzed: śilāḥ ca śakalīkurvan padbhyām gajaḥ iva āśu gaḥ

original: 4.030.015c dūram ekapadaṃ tyaktvā yayau kāryavaśād drutam
analyzed: dūram eka padam tyaktvā yayau kārya vaśāt drutam
tām apaśyat bala ākīrṇām hari rāja mahā purīm
durgām ikṣvāku śārdūlaḥ kiṣkindhām giri saṃkaṭe
roṣāt prasphuramāṇa oṣṭhaḥ sugrīvam prati kalṣmaṇaḥ
dadarśa vānarān bhīmān kiṣkindhāyāḥ bahiścarān
śaila śṛṅgāṇi śataśas pravṛddhān ca mahīruhān
jagṛhuḥ kuñjara prakhyāḥ vānarāḥ parvata antare

original: 4.030.019a tān gṛhītapraharaṇān harīn dṛṣṭvā tu lakṣmaṇaḥ
analyzed: tān gṛhīta praharaṇān harīn dṛṣṭvā tu lakṣmaṇaḥ
babhūva dviguṇam kruddhaḥ bahu indhanaḥ iva analaḥ

original: 4.030.020a taṃ te bhayaparītāṅgāḥ kruddhaṃ dṛṣṭvā plavaṃgamāḥ
analyzed: tam te bhaya parīta aṅgāḥ kruddham dṛṣṭvā plavaṃgamāḥ
kāla mṛtyu yugānta ābham śataśas vidrutāḥ diśaḥ
tatas sugrīva bhavanam praviśya hari puṃgavāḥ
krodham āgamanam ca eva lakṣmaṇasya nyavedayan

original: 4.030.022a tārayā sahitaḥ kāmī saktaḥ kapivṛṣo rahaḥ
analyzed: tārayā sahitaḥ kāmī saktaḥ kapi vṛṣaḥ rahaḥ

original: 4.030.022c na teṣāṃ kapivīrāṇāṃ śuśrāva vacanaṃ tadā
analyzed: na teṣām kapi vīrāṇām śuśrāva vacanam tadā
tatas saciva saṃdiṣṭāḥ harayaḥ romaharṣaṇāḥ
giri kuñjara megha ābhāḥ nagaryāḥ niryayuḥ tadā
nakha daṃṣṭra āyudhāḥ ghorāḥ sarve vikṛta darśanāḥ

original: 4.030.024c sarve śārdūladarpāś ca sarve ca vikṛtānanāḥ
analyzed: sarve śārdūla darpāḥ ca sarve ca vikṛta ānanāḥ

original: 4.030.025a daśanāgabalāḥ ke cit ke cid daśaguṇottarāḥ
analyzed: daśa nāga balāḥ ke cit ke cit daśa guṇa uttarāḥ
ke cit nāga sahasrasya babhūvuḥ tulya vikramāḥ

original: 4.030.026a kṛtsnāṃ hi kapibhir vyāptāṃ drumahastair mahābalaiḥ
analyzed: kṛtsnām hi kapibhiḥ vyāptām druma hastaiḥ mahā balaiḥ

original: 4.030.026c apaśyal lakṣmaṇaḥ kruddhaḥ kiṣkindhāṃ tāṃ durāsadam
analyzed: apaśyat lakṣmaṇaḥ kruddhaḥ kiṣkindhām tām durāsadam
tatas te harayaḥ sarve prākāra parikhā antarāt
niṣkramya udagra sattvāḥ tu tasthuḥ āviṣkṛtam tadā

original: 4.030.028a sugrīvasya pramādaṃ ca pūrvajaṃ cārtam ātmavān
analyzed: sugrīvasya pramādam ca pūrvajam ca ārtam ātmavān

original: 4.030.028c buddhvā kopavaśaṃ vīraḥ punar eva jagāma saḥ
analyzed: buddhvā kopa vaśam vīraḥ punar eva jagāma saḥ
sa dīrgha uṣṇa mahā ucchvāsaḥ kopa saṃrakta locanaḥ
babhūva nara śārdūla sa dhūmaḥ iva pāvakaḥ
bāṇa śalya sphurat jihvaḥ sāyaka āsana bhogavān
sva tejaḥ viṣa saṃghātaḥ pañca āsyaḥ iva pannagaḥ

original: 4.030.031a taṃ dīptam iva kālāgniṃ nāgendram iva kopitam
analyzed: tam dīptam iva kālāgnim nāga indram iva kopitam
samāsādya aṅgadaḥ trāsāt viṣādam agamat bhṛśam
saḥ ṅgadam roṣa tāmra akṣaḥ saṃdideśa mahā yaśāḥ

original: 4.030.032c sugrīvaḥ kathyatāṃ vatsa mamāgamanam ity uta
analyzed: sugrīvaḥ kathyatām vatsa mama āgamanam iti uta
eṣa rāma anujaḥ prāptaḥ tvad sakāśam ariṃdamaḥ
bhrātuḥ vyasana saṃtaptaḥ dvāri tiṣṭhati lakṣmaṇaḥ
lakṣmaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā śoka āviṣṭaḥ ṅgadaḥ bravīt

original: 4.030.034c pituḥ samīpam āgamya saumitrir ayam āgataḥ
analyzed: pituḥ samīpam āgamya saumitriḥ ayam āgataḥ
te mahā ogha nibham dṛṣṭvā vajra aśani sama svanam
siṃha nādam samam cakruḥ lakṣmaṇasya samīpatas
tena śabdena mahatā pratyabudhyata vānaraḥ
atha aṅgada vacaḥ śrutvā tena eva ca samāgatau
mantriṇaḥ vānara indrasya saṃmata udāra darśinau

original: 4.030.038a plakṣaś caiva prabhāvaś ca mantriṇāv arthadharmayoḥ
analyzed: plakṣaḥ ca eva prabhāvaḥ ca mantriṇau artha dharmayoḥ

original: 4.030.038c vaktum uccāvacaṃ prāptaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ tau śaśaṃsatuḥ
analyzed: vaktum uccāvacam prāptam lakṣmaṇam tau śaśaṃsatuḥ
prasādayitvā sugrīvam vacanaiḥ sāma niścitaiḥ
āsīnam paryupāsīnau yathā śakram marutpatim
satya saṃdhau mahābhāgau bhrātarau rāma lakṣmaṇau
vayasya bhāvam saṃprāptau rājya arhau rājya dāyinau

original: 4.030.041a tayor eko dhanuṣpāṇir dvāri tiṣṭhati lakṣmaṇaḥ
analyzed: tayoḥ ekaḥ dhanuṣpāṇiḥ dvāri tiṣṭhati lakṣmaṇaḥ

original: 4.030.041c yasya bhītāḥ pravepante nādān muñcanti vānarāḥ
analyzed: yasya bhītāḥ pravepante nādān muñcanti vānarāḥ
saḥ eṣa rāghava bhrātā lakṣmaṇaḥ vākyasārathiḥ

original: 4.030.042c vyavasāya rathaḥ prāptas tasya rāmasya śāsanāt
analyzed: vyavasāya rathaḥ prāptaḥ tasya rāmasya śāsanāt

original: 4.030.043a tasya mūrdhnā praṇamya tvaṃ saputraḥ saha bandhubhiḥ
analyzed: tasya mūrdhnā praṇamya tvam sa putraḥ saha bandhubhiḥ
rājan tiṣṭha sva samaye bhava satya pratiśravaḥ

original: 4.031.001a aṅgadasya vacaḥ śrutvā sugrīvaḥ sacivaiḥ saha
analyzed: aṅgadasya vacaḥ śrutvā sugrīvaḥ sacivaiḥ saha
lakṣmaṇam kupitam śrutvā mumoca āsanam ātmavān
sacivān abravīt vākyam niścitya gurulāghavam
mantra jñān mantra kuśalaḥ mantreṣu pariniṣṭhitaḥ

original: 4.031.003a na me durvyāhṛtaṃ kiṃ cin nāpi me duranuṣṭhitam
analyzed: na me durvyāhṛtam kim cit na api me duranuṣṭhitam

original: 4.031.003c lakṣmaṇo rāghavabhrātā kruddhaḥ kim iti cintaye
analyzed: lakṣmaṇaḥ rāghava bhrātā kruddhaḥ kim iti cintaye
asuhṛdbhiḥ mama amitraiḥ nityam antara darśibhiḥ
mama doṣān asaṃbhūtām śrāvitaḥ rāghava anujaḥ

original: 4.031.005a atra tāvad yathābuddhi sarvair eva yathāvidhi
analyzed: atra tāvat yathābuddhi sarvaiḥ eva yathāvidhi

original: 4.031.005c bhavadbhir niścayas tasya vijñeyo nipuṇaṃ śanaiḥ
analyzed: bhavadbhiḥ niścayaḥ tasya vijñeyaḥ nipuṇam śanais

original: 4.031.006a na khalv asti mama trāso lakṣmaṇān nāpi rāghavāt
analyzed: na khalu asti mama trāsaḥ lakṣmaṇāt na api rāghavāt

original: 4.031.006c mitraṃ tv asthāna kupitaṃ janayaty eva saṃbhramam
analyzed: mitram tu kupitam janayati eva saṃbhramam
sarvathā sukaram mitram duṣkaram paripālanam

original: 4.031.007c anityatvāt tu cittānāṃ prītir alpe 'pi bhidyate
analyzed: anitya tvāt tu cittānām prītiḥ alpe bhidyate
atonimittam trastaḥ ham rāmeṇa tu mahātmanā

original: 4.031.008c yan mamopakṛtaṃ śakyaṃ pratikartuṃ na tan mayā
analyzed: yat mama upakṛtam śakyam pratikartum na tat mayā
sugrīveṇa evam uktaḥ tu hanumān hari puṃgavaḥ
uvāca svena tarkeṇa madhye vānara mantriṇām

original: 4.031.010a sarvathā naitad āścaryaṃ yat tvaṃ harigaṇeśvara
analyzed: sarvathā nā etat āścaryam yat tvam hari gaṇa īśvara
na vismarasi su snigdham upakāra kṛtam śubham

original: 4.031.011a rāghaveṇa tu śūreṇa bhayam utsṛjya dūrataḥ
analyzed: rāghaveṇa tu śūreṇa bhayam utsṛjya dūratas
tvad priya artham hataḥ vālī śakra tulya parākramaḥ

original: 4.031.012a sarvathā praṇayāt kruddho rāghavo nātra saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: sarvathā praṇayāt kruddhaḥ rāghavaḥ na atra saṃśayaḥ
bhrātaram sa prahitavān lakṣmaṇam lakṣmi vardhanam

original: 4.031.013a tvaṃ pramatto na jānīṣe kālaṃ kalavidāṃ vara
analyzed: tvam pramattaḥ na jānīṣe kālam kala vidām vara
phulla saptacchada śyāmā pravṛttā tu śarad śivā
nirmala graha nakṣatrā dyauḥ pranaṣṭa balāhakā

original: 4.031.014c prasannāś ca diśaḥ sarvāḥ saritaś ca sarāṃsi ca
analyzed: prasannāḥ ca diśaḥ sarvāḥ saritaḥ ca sarāṃsi ca
prāptam udyoga kālam tu na avaiṣi hari puṃgava

original: 4.031.015c tvaṃ pramatta iti vyaktaṃ lakṣmaṇo 'yam ihāgataḥ
analyzed: tvam pramattaḥ iti vyaktam lakṣmaṇaḥ yam iha āgataḥ
ārtasya hṛta dārasya paruṣam puruṣāntarāt
vacanam marṣaṇīyam te rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 4.031.017a kṛtāparādhasya hi te nānyat paśyāmy ahaṃ kṣamam
analyzed: kṛta aparādhasya hi te na anyat paśyāmi aham kṣamam
antareṇa añjalim baddhvā lakṣmaṇasya prasādanāt

original: 4.031.018a niyuktair mantribhir vācyo avaśyaṃ pārthivo hitam
analyzed: niyuktaiḥ mantribhiḥ vācyaḥ avaśyam pārthivaḥ hitam

original: 4.031.018c ata eva bhayaṃ tyaktvā bravīmy avadhṛtaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: atas eva bhayam tyaktvā bravīmi vacaḥ

original: 4.031.019a abhikruddhaḥ samartho hi cāpam udyamya rāghavaḥ
analyzed: abhikruddhaḥ samarthaḥ hi cāpam udyamya rāghavaḥ
sa deva asura gandharvam vaśe sthāpayitum jagat

original: 4.031.020a na sa kṣamaḥ kopayituṃ yaḥ prasādya punar bhavet
analyzed: na sa kṣamaḥ kopayitum yaḥ prasādya punar bhavet
pūrva upakāram smaratā kṛtajñena viśeṣataḥ

original: 4.031.021a tasya mūrdhnā praṇamya tvaṃ saputraḥ sasuhṛjjanaḥ
analyzed: tasya mūrdhnā praṇamya tvam sa putraḥ sa suhṛd janaḥ

original: 4.031.021c rājaṃs tiṣṭha svasamaye bhartur bhāryeva tadvaśe
analyzed: rājan tiṣṭha sva samaye bhartuḥ bhāryā iva tad vaśe
na rāma rāma anuja śāsanam tvayā
kapīndra yuktam manasā api apohitum

original: 4.031.022c mano hi te jñāsyati mānuṣaṃ balaṃ;
analyzed: manaḥ hi te jñāsyati mānuṣam balam
sa rāghavasya asya sura indra varcasaḥ
atha pratisamādiṣṭaḥ lakṣmaṇaḥ para vīra hā
praviveśa guhām ghorām kiṣkindhām rāma śāsanāt
dvāra sthāḥ harayaḥ tatra mahā kāyāḥ mahā balāḥ

original: 4.032.002c babhūvur lakṣmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve prāñjalayaḥ sthitāḥ
analyzed: babhūvuḥ lakṣmaṇam dṛṣṭvā sarve prāñjalayaḥ sthitāḥ

original: 4.032.003a niḥśvasantaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā kruddhaṃ daśarathātmajam
analyzed: niḥśvasantam tu tam dṛṣṭvā kruddham daśaratha ātmajam

original: 4.032.003c babhūvur harayas trastā na cainaṃ paryavārayan
analyzed: babhūvuḥ harayaḥ trastāḥ na ca enam paryavārayan

original: 4.032.004a sa taṃ ratnamayīṃ śrīmān divyāṃ puṣpitakānanām
analyzed: sa tam ratna mayīm śrīmān divyām puṣpita kānanām
ramyām ratna samākīrṇām dadarśa mahatīm guhām
harmya prāsāda saṃbādhām nānā paṇya upaśobhitām
sarva kāma phalaiḥ vṛkṣaiḥ puṣpitaiḥ upaśobhitām
deva gandharva putraiḥ ca vānaraiḥ kāmarūpibhiḥ
divya mālya ambara dhāraiḥ śobhitām priya darśanaiḥ
candana agaru padmānām gandhaiḥ surabhi gandhinām
maireyāṇām madhūnām ca saṃmodita mahā pathām
vindhya meru giri prasthaiḥ prāsādaiḥ na eka bhūmibhiḥ

original: 4.032.008c dadarśa girinadyaś ca vimalās tatra rāghavaḥ
analyzed: dadarśa giri nadyaḥ ca vimalāḥ tatra rāghavaḥ

original: 4.032.009a aṅgadasya gṛhaṃ ramyaṃ maindasya dvividasya ca
analyzed: aṅgadasya gṛham ramyam maindasya dvividasya ca
gavayasya gavākṣasya gajasya śarabhasya ca
vidyunmāleḥ ca saṃpāteḥ sūryākṣasya hanūmataḥ

original: 4.032.010c vīrabāhoḥ subāhoś ca nalasya ca mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: vīrabāhoḥ subāhoḥ ca nalasya ca mahātmanaḥ
kumudasya suṣeṇasya tāra jāmbavatoḥ tathā
dadhivaktrasya nīlasya supāṭala sunetrayoḥ
eteṣām kapi mukhyānām rājamārge mahātmanām
dadarśa gṛha mukhyāni mahā sārāṇi lakṣmaṇaḥ
pāṇḍura abhra prakāśāni divya mālya yutāni ca
prabhūta dhana dhānyāni strī ratnaiḥ śobhitāni ca
pāṇḍureṇa tu śailena parikṣiptam durāsadam
vānara indra gṛham ramyam mahā indra sadana upamam
śulkaiḥ prāsāda śikharaiḥ kailāsa śikhara upamaiḥ
sarva kāma phalaiḥ vṛkṣaiḥ puṣṭitaiḥ upaśobhitam
mahā indra dattaiḥ śrīmadbhiḥ nīla jīmūta saṃnibhaiḥ
divya puṣpa phalaiḥ vṛkṣaiḥ śīta chāyaiḥ manoramaiḥ
haribhiḥ saṃvṛta dvāram balibhiḥ śastra pāṇibhiḥ
divya mālya āvṛtam śubhram tapta kāñcana toraṇam
sugrīvasya gṛham ramyam praviveśa mahā balaḥ
a vāryamāṇaḥ saumitriḥ mahā abhram iva bhāskaraḥ
sa sapta kakṣyāḥ dharma ātmā yāna āsana samāvṛtāḥ
praviśya su mahat guptam dadarśa antaḥpuram mahat
haima rājata paryaṅkaiḥ bahubhiḥ ca varāsanaiḥ
mahārha āstaraṇa upetaiḥ tatra tatra upaśobhitam
praviśan eva satatam śuśrāva madhura svaram
tantrī gīta samākīrṇam sama gīta pada akṣaram
bahvīḥ ca vividha ākārāḥ rūpa yauvana garvitāḥ
striyaḥ sugrīva bhavane dadarśa sa mahā balaḥ
dṛṣṭvā abhijana saṃpannāḥ citra mālya kṛta srajaḥ
vara mālya kṛta vyagrāḥ bhūṣaṇa uttama bhūṣitāḥ
na atṛptān na ati ca vyagrān na anudātta paricchadān
sugrīva anucarān ca api lakṣayām āsa lakṣmaṇaḥ
tatas sugrīvam āsīnam kāñcane parama āsane
mahārha āstaraṇa upete dadarśa āditya saṃnibham
divya ābharaṇa citra aṅgam divya rūpam yaśasvinam
divya mālya ambara dharam mahā indram iva durjayam
divya ābharaṇa mālyābhiḥ pramadābhiḥ samāvṛtam
rumām tu vīraḥ parirabhya gāḍham
dadarśa saumitrim adīna sattvam
viśāla netraḥ su viśāla netram
tam a pratihatam kruddham praviṣṭam puruṣa ṛṣabham
sugrīvaḥ lakṣmaṇam dṛṣṭvā babhūva vyathita indriyaḥ

original: 4.033.002a kruddhaṃ niḥśvasamānaṃ taṃ pradīptam iva tejasā
analyzed: kruddham niḥśvasamānam tam pradīptam iva tejasā
bhrātuḥ vyasana saṃtaptam dṛṣṭvā daśaratha ātmajam
utpapāta hari śreṣṭhaḥ hitvā sauvarṇam āsanam

original: 4.033.003c mahān mahendrasya yathā svalaṃkṛta iva dhvajaḥ
analyzed: mahān mahā indrasya yathā su alaṃkṛtaḥ iva dhvajaḥ
utpatantam anūtpetuḥ rumā prabhṛtayaḥ striyaḥ

original: 4.033.004c sugrīvaṃ gagane pūrṇaṃ candraṃ tārāgaṇā iva
analyzed: sugrīvam gagane pūrṇam candram tārā gaṇāḥ iva
saṃrakta nayanaḥ śrīmān vicacāla kṛtāñjaliḥ
babhūva avasthitaḥ tatra kalpavṛkṣaḥ mahān iva
rumāḥ dvitīyam sugrīvam nārī madhya gatam sthitam

original: 4.033.006c abravīl lakṣmaṇaḥ kruddhaḥ satāraṃ śaśinaṃ yathā
analyzed: abravīt lakṣmaṇaḥ kruddhaḥ sa tāram śaśinam yathā
sattva abhijana saṃpannaḥ sa anukrośaḥ jita indriyaḥ

original: 4.033.007c kṛtajñaḥ satyavādī ca rājā loke mahīyate
analyzed: kṛtajñaḥ satya vādī ca rājā loke mahīyate

original: 4.033.008a yas tu rājā sthito 'dharme mitrāṇām upakāriṇām
analyzed: yaḥ tu rājā sthitaḥ dharme mitrāṇām upakāriṇām
mithyāpratijñām kurute kaḥ nṛśaṃsataraḥ tatas

original: 4.033.009a śatam aśvānṛte hanti sahasraṃ tu gavānṛte
analyzed: śatam aśva anṛte hanti sahasram tu gava anṛte
ātmānam sva janam hanti puruṣaḥ puruṣa anṛte

original: 4.033.010a pūrvaṃ kṛtārtho mitrāṇāṃ na tat pratikaroti yaḥ
analyzed: pūrvam kṛtārthaḥ mitrāṇām na tat pratikaroti yaḥ
kṛtaghnaḥ sarva bhūtānām sa vadhyaḥ plavaga īśvara
gītaḥ yam brahmaṇā ślokaḥ sarva loka namaskṛtaḥ

original: 4.033.011c dṛṣṭvā kṛtaghnaṃ kruddhena taṃ nibodha plavaṃgama
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā kṛtaghnam kruddhena tam nibodha plavaṃgama

original: 4.033.012a brahmaghne ca surāpe ca core bhagnavrate tathā
analyzed: brahma ghne ca surā pe ca core bhagna vrate tathā

original: 4.033.012c niṣkṛtir vihitā sadbhiḥ kṛtaghne nāsti niṣkṛtiḥ
analyzed: niṣkṛtiḥ vihitā sadbhiḥ kṛtaghne na asti niṣkṛtiḥ

original: 4.033.013a anāryas tvaṃ kṛtaghnaś ca mithyāvādī ca vānara
analyzed: anāryaḥ tvam kṛtaghnaḥ ca mithyāvādī ca vānara

original: 4.033.013c pūrvaṃ kṛtārtho rāmasya na tat pratikaroṣi yat
analyzed: pūrvam kṛtārthaḥ rāmasya na tat pratikaroṣi yat

original: 4.033.014a nanu nāma kṛtārthena tvayā rāmasya vānara
analyzed: nanu nāma kṛtārthena tvayā rāmasya vānara

original: 4.033.014c sītāyā mārgaṇe yatnaḥ kartavyaḥ kṛtam icchatā
analyzed: sītāyāḥ mārgaṇe yatnaḥ kartavyaḥ kṛtam icchatā

original: 4.033.015a sa tvaṃ grāmyeṣu bhogeṣu sakto mithyā pratiśravaḥ
analyzed: sa tvam grāmyeṣu bhogeṣu saktaḥ mithyā pratiśravaḥ

original: 4.033.015c na tvāṃ rāmo vijānīte sarpaṃ maṇḍūkarāviṇam
analyzed: na tvām rāmaḥ vijānīte sarpam maṇḍūka rāviṇam
mahābhāgena rāmeṇa pāpaḥ karuṇa vedinā

original: 4.033.016c harīṇāṃ prāpito rājyaṃ tvaṃ durātmā mahātmanā
analyzed: harīṇām prāpitaḥ rājyam tvam durātmā mahātmanā
kṛtam ced na abhijānīṣe rāmasya akliṣṭa karmaṇaḥ

original: 4.033.017c sadyas tvaṃ niśitair bāṇair hato drakṣyasi vālinam
analyzed: sadyas tvam niśitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ hataḥ drakṣyasi vālinam

original: 4.033.018a na ca saṃkucitaḥ panthā yena vālī hato gataḥ
analyzed: na ca saṃkucitaḥ panthāḥ yena vālī hataḥ gataḥ

original: 4.033.018c samaye tiṣṭha sugrīva mā vālipatham anvagāḥ
analyzed: samaye tiṣṭha sugrīva mā vāli patham anvagāḥ
na nūnam ikṣvāku varasya kārmukāt
cyutām śarān paśyasi vajra saṃnibhān
tatas sukham nāma niṣevase sukhī
na rāma kāryam manasā api avekṣase

original: 4.034.001a tathā bruvāṇaṃ saumitriṃ pradīptam iva tejasā
analyzed: tathā bruvāṇam saumitrim pradīptam iva tejasā
abravīt lakṣmaṇam tārā tārādhipa nibha ānanā

original: 4.034.002a naivaṃ lakṣmaṇa vaktavyo nāyaṃ paruṣam arhati
analyzed: na evam lakṣmaṇa vaktavyaḥ na ayam paruṣam arhati

original: 4.034.002c harīṇām īśvaraḥ śrotuṃ tava vaktrād viśeṣataḥ
analyzed: harīṇām īśvaraḥ śrotum tava vaktrāt viśeṣataḥ

original: 4.034.003a naivākṛtajñaḥ sugrīvo na śaṭho nāpi dāruṇaḥ
analyzed: na eva akṛtajñaḥ sugrīvaḥ na śaṭhaḥ nā api dāruṇaḥ

original: 4.034.003c naivānṛtakatho vīra na jihmaś ca kapīśvaraḥ
analyzed: na eva anṛta kathaḥ vīra na jihmaḥ ca kapi īśvaraḥ

original: 4.034.004a upakāraṃ kṛtaṃ vīro nāpy ayaṃ vismṛtaḥ kapiḥ
analyzed: upakāram kṛtam vīraḥ na api ayam vismṛtaḥ kapiḥ

original: 4.034.004c rāmeṇa vīra sugrīvo yad anyair duṣkaraṃ raṇe
analyzed: rāmeṇa vīra sugrīvaḥ yat anyaiḥ duṣkaram raṇe

original: 4.034.005a rāmaprasādāt kīrtiṃ ca kapirājyaṃ ca śāśvatam
analyzed: rāma prasādāt kīrtim ca kapi rājyam ca śāśvatam

original: 4.034.005c prāptavān iha sugrīvo rumāṃ māṃ ca paraṃtapa
analyzed: prāptavān iha sugrīvaḥ rumām mām ca paraṃtapa

original: 4.034.006a suduḥkhaṃ śāyitaḥ pūrvaṃ prāpyedaṃ sukham uttamam
analyzed: su duḥkham śāyitaḥ pūrvam prāpya idam sukham uttamam

original: 4.034.006c prāptakālaṃ na jānīte viśvāmitro yathā muniḥ
analyzed: prāpta kālam na jānīte viśvāmitraḥ yathā muniḥ
ghṛtācyām kila saṃsaktaḥ daśa varṣāṇi lakṣmaṇa
aho manyata dharma ātmā viśvāmitraḥ mahā muniḥ

original: 4.034.008a sa hi prāptaṃ na jānīte kālaṃ kālavidāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: sa hi prāptam na jānīte kālam kāla vidām varaḥ

original: 4.034.008c viśvāmitro mahātejāḥ kiṃ punar yaḥ pṛthagjanaḥ
analyzed: viśvāmitraḥ mahā tejāḥ kim punar yaḥ pṛthagjanaḥ
deha dharmam gatasya asya pariśrāntasya lakṣmaṇa
a vitṛptasya kāmeṣu rāmaḥ kṣantum iha arhati

original: 4.034.010a na ca roṣavaśaṃ tāta gantum arhasi lakṣmaṇa
analyzed: na ca roṣa vaśam tāta gantum arhasi lakṣmaṇa
niścaya artham a vijñāya sahasā prākṛtaḥ yathā
sattva yuktāḥ hi puruṣāḥ tvadvidhāḥ puruṣa ṛṣabha

original: 4.034.011c avimṛśya na roṣasya sahasā yānti vaśyatām
analyzed: a vimṛśya na roṣasya sahasā yānti vaśya tām
prasādaye tvām dharma jña sugrīva arthe samāhitā
mahān roṣa samutpannaḥ saṃrambhaḥ tyajyatām ayam

original: 4.034.013a rumāṃ māṃ kapirājyaṃ ca dhanadhānyavasūni ca
analyzed: rumām mām kapi rājyam ca dhana dhānya vasūni ca

original: 4.034.013c rāmapriyārthaṃ sugrīvas tyajed iti matir mama
analyzed: rāma priya artham sugrīvaḥ tyajet iti matiḥ mama
samāneṣu yati sugrīvaḥ sītayā saha rāghavam

original: 4.034.014c śaśāṅkam iva rohiṣyā nihatvā rāvaṇaṃ raṇe
analyzed: śaśāṅkam iva rohiṣyā nihatvā rāvaṇam raṇe
śata koṭi sahasrāṇi laṅkāyām kila rakṣasām

original: 4.034.015c ayutāni ca ṣaṭtriṃśat sahasrāṇi śatāni ca
analyzed: ayutāni ca ṣaṭtriṃśat sahasrāṇi śatāni ca

original: 4.034.016a ahatvā tāṃś ca durdharṣān rākṣasān kāmarūpiṇaḥ
analyzed: a hatvā tān ca durdharṣān rākṣasān kāmarūpiṇaḥ

original: 4.034.016c na śakyo rāvaṇo hantuṃ yena sā maithilī hṛtā
analyzed: na śakyaḥ rāvaṇaḥ hantum yena sā maithilī hṛtā

original: 4.034.017a te na śakyā raṇe hantum asahāyena lakṣmaṇa
analyzed: te na śakyāḥ raṇe hantum asahāyena lakṣmaṇa
rāvaṇaḥ krūra karmā ca sugrīveṇa viśeṣataḥ

original: 4.034.018a evam ākhyātavān vālī sa hy abhijño harīśvaraḥ
analyzed: evam ākhyātavān vālī sa hi abhijñaḥ hari īśvaraḥ

original: 4.034.018c āgamas tu na me vyaktaḥ śravāt tasya bravīmy aham
analyzed: āgamaḥ tu na me vyaktaḥ śravāt tasya bravīmi aham
tvad sahāya nimittam vai preṣitāḥ hari puṃgavāḥ
ānetum vānarān yuddhe su bahūn hari yūthapān
tān ca pratīkṣamāṇaḥ yam vikrāntān su mahā balān
rāghavasya artha siddhi artham na niryāti hari īśvaraḥ

original: 4.034.021a kṛtā tu saṃsthā saumitre sugrīveṇa yathāpurā
analyzed: kṛtā tu saṃsthā saumitre sugrīveṇa yathā purā

original: 4.034.021c adya tair vānarair sarvair āgantavyaṃ mahābalaiḥ
analyzed: adya taiḥ vānaraiḥ sarvaiḥ āgantavyam mahā balaiḥ
ṛkṣa koṭi sahasrāṇi golāṅgūla śatāni ca

original: 4.034.022c adya tvām upayāsyanti jahi kopam ariṃdama
analyzed: adya tvām upayāsyanti jahi kopam ariṃdama
koṭyaḥ nekāḥ tu kākutstha kapīnām dīpta tejasām

original: 4.034.023a tava hi mukham idaṃ nirīkṣya kopāt;
analyzed: tava hi mukham idam nirīkṣya kopāt
kṣataja nibhe nayane nirīkṣamāṇāḥ
hari vara vanitāḥ na yānti śāntim
prathama bhayasya hi śaṅkitāḥ sma sarvāḥ

original: 4.035.001a ity uktas tārayā vākyaṃ praśritaṃ dharmasaṃhitam
analyzed: iti uktaḥ tārayā vākyam praśritam dharma saṃhitam
mṛdu svabhāvaḥ saumitriḥ pratijagrāha tat vacaḥ
tasmin pratigṛhīte tu vākye hari gaṇa īśvaraḥ

original: 4.035.002c lakṣmaṇāt sumahat trāsaṃ vastraṃ klinnam ivātyajat
analyzed: lakṣmaṇāt su mahat trāsam vastram klinnam iva atyajat

original: 4.035.003a tataḥ kaṇṭhagataṃ mālyaṃ citraṃ bahuguṇaṃ mahat
analyzed: tatas kaṇṭha gatam mālyam citram bahu guṇam mahat
ciccheda vimadaḥ ca āsīt sugrīvaḥ vānara īśvaraḥ
sa lakṣmaṇam bhīma balam sarva vānara sattamaḥ
abravīt praśritam vākyam sugrīvaḥ saṃpraharṣayan

original: 4.035.005a pranaṣṭā śrīś ca kīrtiś ca kapirājyaṃ ca śāśvatam
analyzed: pranaṣṭā śrīḥ ca kīrtiḥ ca kapi rājyam ca śāśvatam

original: 4.035.005c rāmaprasādāt saumitre punaḥ prāptam idaṃ mayā
analyzed: rāma prasādāt saumitre punar prāptam idam mayā

original: 4.035.006a kaḥ śaktas tasya devasya khyātasya svena karmaṇā
analyzed: kaḥ śaktaḥ tasya devasya khyātasya svena karmaṇā
tādṛśam vikramam vīra pratikartum ariṃdama

original: 4.035.007a sītāṃ prāpsyati dharmātmā vadhiṣyati ca rāvaṇam
analyzed: sītām prāpsyati dharma ātmā vadhiṣyati ca rāvaṇam
sahāya mātreṇa mayā rāghavaḥ svena tejasā

original: 4.035.008a sahāyakṛtyaṃ hi tasya yena sapta mahādrumāḥ
analyzed: sahāya kṛtyam hi tasya yena sapta mahā drumāḥ

original: 4.035.008c śailaś ca vasudhā caiva bāṇenaikena dāritāḥ
analyzed: śailaḥ ca vasudhā ca eva bāṇena ekena dāritāḥ
dhanuḥ visphāramāṇasya yasya śabdena lakṣmaṇa

original: 4.035.009c saśailā kampitā bhūmiḥ sahāyais tasya kiṃ nu vai
analyzed: sa śailā kampitā bhūmiḥ sahāyaiḥ tasya kim nu vai
anuyātrām narendrasya kariṣye ham nara ṛṣabha
gacchataḥ rāvaṇam hantum vairiṇam sa puraḥsaram

original: 4.035.011a yadi kiṃ cid atikrāntaṃ viśvāsāt praṇayena vā
analyzed: yadi kim cit atikrāntam viśvāsāt praṇayena vā

original: 4.035.011c preṣyasya kṣamitavyaṃ me na kaś cin nāparādhyati
analyzed: preṣyasya kṣamitavyam me na kaḥ cit na aparādhyati
iti tasya bruvāṇasya sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 4.035.012c abhaval lakṣmaṇaḥ prītaḥ preṃṇā cedam uvāca ha
analyzed: abhavat lakṣmaṇaḥ prītaḥ preṃṇā ca idam uvāca ha

original: 4.035.013a sarvathā hi mama bhrātā sanātho vānareśvara
analyzed: sarvathā hi mama bhrātā sanāthaḥ vānara īśvara
tvayā nāthena sugrīva praśritena viśeṣataḥ

original: 4.035.014a yas te prabhāvaḥ sugrīva yac ca te śaucam uttamam
analyzed: yaḥ te prabhāvaḥ sugrīva yat ca te śaucam uttamam

original: 4.035.014c arhas taṃ kapirājyasya śriyaṃ bhoktum anuttamām
analyzed: arhaḥ tam kapi rājyasya śriyam bhoktum anuttamām

original: 4.035.015a sahāyena ca sugrīva tvayā rāmaḥ pratāpavān
analyzed: sahāyena ca sugrīva tvayā rāmaḥ pratāpavān

original: 4.035.015c vadhiṣyati raṇe śatrūn acirān nātra saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: vadhiṣyati raṇe śatrūn acirāt na atra saṃśayaḥ
dharma jñasya kṛtajñasya saṃgrāmeṣu anivartinaḥ

original: 4.035.016c upapannaṃ ca yuktaṃ ca sugrīva tava bhāṣitam
analyzed: upapannam ca yuktam ca sugrīva tava bhāṣitam

original: 4.035.017a doṣajñaḥ sati sāmarthye ko 'nyo bhāṣitum arhati
analyzed: doṣa jñaḥ sati sāmarthye kaḥ nyaḥ bhāṣitum arhati

original: 4.035.017c varjayitvā mama jyeṣṭhaṃ tvāṃ ca vānarasattama
analyzed: varjayitvā mama jyeṣṭham tvām ca vānara sattama

original: 4.035.018a sadṛśaś cāsi rāmasya vikrameṇa balena ca
analyzed: sadṛśaḥ ca asi rāmasya vikrameṇa balena ca
sahāyaḥ daivataiḥ dattaḥ cirāya hari puṃgava

original: 4.035.019a kiṃ tu śīghram ito vīra niṣkrāma tvaṃ mayā saha
analyzed: kim tu śīghram itas vīra niṣkrāma tvam mayā saha
sāntvayasva vayasyam ca bhāryā haraṇa duḥkhitam

original: 4.035.020a yac ca śokābhibhūtasya śrutvā rāmasya bhāṣitam
analyzed: yat ca śoka abhibhūtasya śrutvā rāmasya bhāṣitam

original: 4.035.020c mayā tvaṃ paruṣāṇy uktas tac ca tvaṃ kṣantum arhasi
analyzed: mayā tvam paruṣāṇi uktaḥ tat ca tvam kṣantum arhasi

original: 4.036.001a evam uktas tu sugrīvo lakṣmaṇena mahātmanā
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu sugrīvaḥ lakṣmaṇena mahātmanā

original: 4.036.001c hanumantaṃ sthitaṃ pārśve sacivaṃ vākyam abravīt
analyzed: hanumantam sthitam pārśve sacivam vākyam abravīt
mahendra himavat vindhya kailāsa śikhareṣu ca
mandare pāṇḍu śikhare pañcaśaileṣu ye sthitāḥ
taruṇa āditya varṇeṣu bhrājamāneṣu sarvaśas

original: 4.036.003c parvateṣu samudrānte paścimasyāṃ tu ye diśi
analyzed: parvateṣu samudra ante paścimasyām tu ye diśi
āditya bhavane ca eva girau saṃdhyā abhra saṃnibhe
padma tāla vanam bhīmam saṃśritāḥ hari puṃgavāḥ
añjana ambuda saṃkāśāḥ kuñjara pratimā ojasaḥ

original: 4.036.005c añjane parate caiva ye vasanti plavaṃgamāḥ
analyzed: añjane parate ca eva ye vasanti plavaṃgamāḥ

original: 4.036.006c merupārśvagatāś caiva ye ca dhūmragiriṃ śritāḥ
analyzed: meru pārśva gatāḥ ca eva ye ca dhūmragirim śritāḥ
taruṇa āditya varṇāḥ ca parvate ye mahāruṇe
pibantaḥ madhumaireyam bhīma vegāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ

original: 4.036.008a vaneṣu ca suramyeṣu sugandhiṣu mahatsu ca
analyzed: vaneṣu ca su ramyeṣu sugandhiṣu mahatsu ca
tāpasānām ca ramyeṣu vana anteṣu samantataḥ

original: 4.036.009a tāṃs tāṃs tvam ānaya kṣipraṃ pṛthivyāṃ sarvavānarān
analyzed: tān tān tvam ānaya kṣipram pṛthivyām sarva vānarān
sāma dāna ādibhiḥ kalpaiḥ āśu preṣaya vānarān

original: 4.036.010a preṣitāḥ prathamaṃ ye ca mayā dūtā mahājavāḥ
analyzed: preṣitāḥ prathamam ye ca mayā dūtāḥ mahā javāḥ

original: 4.036.010c tvaraṇārthaṃ tu bhūyas tvaṃ harīn saṃpreṣayāparān
analyzed: tvaraṇa artham tu bhūyas tvam harīn saṃpreṣaya aparān

original: 4.036.011a ye prasaktāś ca kāmeṣu dīrghasūtrāś ca vānarāḥ
analyzed: ye prasaktāḥ ca kāmeṣu dīrghasūtrāḥ ca vānarāḥ

original: 4.036.011c ihānayasva tān sarvāñ śīghraṃ tu mama śāsanāt
analyzed: iha ānayasva tān sarvām śīghram tu mama śāsanāt

original: 4.036.012a ahobhir daśabhir ye ca nāgacchanti mamājñayā
analyzed: ahobhiḥ daśabhiḥ ye ca na āgacchanti mama ājñayā
hantavyāḥ te durātmānaḥ rāja śāsana dūṣakāḥ

original: 4.036.013a śatāny atha sahasrāṇi koṭyaś ca mama śāsanāt
analyzed: śatāni atha sahasrāṇi koṭyaḥ ca mama śāsanāt

original: 4.036.013c prayāntu kapisiṃhānāṃ diśo mama mate sthitāḥ
analyzed: prayāntu kapi siṃhānām diśaḥ mama mate sthitāḥ
meghaparvata saṃkāśāḥ chādayantaḥ iva ambaram
ghora rūpāḥ kapi śreṣṭhāḥ yāntu mad śāsanāt itas

original: 4.036.015a te gatijñā gatiṃ gatvā pṛthivyāṃ sarvavānarāḥ
analyzed: te gati jñāḥ gatim gatvā pṛthivyām sarva vānarāḥ

original: 4.036.015c ānayantu harīn sarvāṃs tvaritāḥ śāsanān mama
analyzed: ānayantu harīn sarvān tvaritāḥ śāsanāt mama
tasya vānara rājasya śrutvā vāyu sutaḥ vacaḥ

original: 4.036.016c dikṣu sarvāsu vikrāntān preṣayām āsa vānarān
analyzed: dikṣu sarvāsu vikrāntān preṣayām āsa vānarān
te padam viṣṇu vikrāntam patatri jyotiḥ adhva gāḥ

original: 4.036.017c prayātāḥ prahitā rājñā harayas tatkṣaṇena vai
analyzed: prayātāḥ prahitāḥ rājñā harayaḥ tad kṣaṇena vai

original: 4.036.018a te samudreṣu giriṣu vaneṣu ca saritsu ca
analyzed: te samudreṣu giriṣu vaneṣu ca saritsu ca
vānarāḥ vānarān sarvān rāma hetoḥ acodayan
mṛtyu kāla upamasya ājñām rājarājasya vānarāḥ
sugrīvasya āyayuḥ śrutvā sugrīva bhaya darśinaḥ
tatas te ñjana saṃkāśāḥ gireḥ tasmāt mahā javāḥ

original: 4.036.020c tisraḥ koṭyaḥ plavaṃgānāṃ niryayur yatra rāghavaḥ
analyzed: tisraḥ koṭyaḥ plavaṃgānām niryayuḥ yatra rāghavaḥ

original: 4.036.021a astaṃ gacchati yatrārkas tasmin girivare ratāḥ
analyzed: astam gacchati yatra arkaḥ tasmin giri vare ratāḥ
tapta hema sama ābhāsāḥ tasmāt koṭyaḥ daśa cyutāḥ
kailāsa śikharebhyaḥ ca siṃha kesara varcasām
tatas koṭi sahasrāṇi vānarāṇām upāgaman
phala mūlena jīvantaḥ himavantam upāśritāḥ
teṣām koṭi sahasrāṇām sahasram samavartata
aṅgāraka samānānām bhīmānām bhīma karmaṇām
vindhyāt vānara koṭīnām sahasrāṇi apatan drutam
kṣīroda velā nilayāḥ tamāla vana vāsinaḥ

original: 4.036.025c nārikelāśanāś caiva teṣāṃ saṃkhyā na vidyate
analyzed: nārikela aśanāḥ ca eva teṣām saṃkhyā na vidyate

original: 4.036.026a vanebhyo gahvarebhyaś ca saridbhyaś ca mahājavāḥ
analyzed: vanebhyaḥ gahvarebhyaḥ ca saridbhyaḥ ca mahā javāḥ
āgacchat vānarī senā pibantī iva divākaram

original: 4.036.027a ye tu tvarayituṃ yātā vānarāḥ sarvavānarān
analyzed: ye tu tvarayitum yātāḥ vānarāḥ sarva vānarān

original: 4.036.027c te vīrā himavac chailaṃ dadṛśus taṃ mahādrumam
analyzed: te vīrāḥ himavat śailam dadṛśuḥ tam mahā drumam

original: 4.036.028a tasmin girivare ramye yajño maheśvaraḥ purā
analyzed: tasmin giri vare ramye yajñaḥ maheśvaraḥ purā
sarva deva manaḥ toṣaḥ babhau divyaḥ manoharaḥ
anna viṣyanda jātāni mūlāni ca phalāni ca
amṛta svādu kalpāni dadṛśuḥ tatra vānarāḥ

original: 4.036.030a tad anna saṃbhavaṃ divyaṃ phalaṃ mūlaṃ manoharam
analyzed: tat anna saṃbhavam divyam phalam mūlam manoharam

original: 4.036.030c yaḥ kaś cit sakṛd aśnāti māsaṃ bhavati tarpitaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ kaḥ cit sakṛt aśnāti māsam bhavati tarpitaḥ

original: 4.036.031a tāni mūlāni divyāni phalāni ca phalāśanāḥ
analyzed: tāni mūlāni divyāni phalāni ca phala aśanāḥ
auṣadhāni ca divyāni jagṛhuḥ hari yūthapāḥ

original: 4.036.032a tasmāc ca yajñāyatanāt puṣpāṇi surabhīṇi ca
analyzed: tasmāt ca yajña āyatanāt puṣpāṇi surabhīṇi ca
āninyuḥ vānarāḥ gatvā sugrīva priya kāraṇāt

original: 4.036.033a te tu sarve harivarāḥ pṛthivyāṃ sarvavānarān
analyzed: te tu sarve hari varāḥ pṛthivyām sarva vānarān
saṃcodayitvā tvaritam yūthānām jagmuḥ agratas

original: 4.036.034a te tu tena muhūrtena yūthapāḥ śīghrakāriṇaḥ
analyzed: te tu tena muhūrtena yūthapāḥ śīghrakāriṇaḥ

original: 4.036.034c kiṣkindhāṃ tvarayā prāptāḥ sugrīvo yatra vānaraḥ
analyzed: kiṣkindhām tvarayā prāptāḥ sugrīvaḥ yatra vānaraḥ

original: 4.036.035a te gṛhītvauṣadhīḥ sarvāḥ phalaṃ mūlaṃ ca vānarāḥ
analyzed: te gṛhītvā oṣadhīḥ sarvāḥ phalam mūlam ca vānarāḥ

original: 4.036.035c taṃ pratigrāhayām āsur vacanaṃ cedam abruvan
analyzed: tam pratigrāhayām āsuḥ vacanam ca idam abruvan

original: 4.036.036a sarve parigatāḥ śailāḥ samudrāś ca vanāni ca
analyzed: sarve parigatāḥ śailāḥ samudrāḥ ca vanāni ca

original: 4.036.036c pṛthivyāṃ vānarāḥ sarve śāsanād upayānti te
analyzed: pṛthivyām vānarāḥ sarve śāsanāt upayānti te

original: 4.036.037a evaṃ śrutvā tato hṛṣṭaḥ sugrīvaḥ plavagādhipaḥ
analyzed: evam śrutvā tatas hṛṣṭaḥ sugrīvaḥ plavaga adhipaḥ

original: 4.036.037c pratijagrāha ca prītas teṣāṃ sarvam upāyanam
analyzed: pratijagrāha ca prītaḥ teṣām sarvam upāyanam

original: 4.037.001a pratigṛhya ca tat sarvam upānayam upāhṛtam
analyzed: pratigṛhya ca tat sarvam upānayam upāhṛtam

original: 4.037.001c vānarān sāntvayitvā ca sarvān eva vyasarjayat
analyzed: vānarān sāntvayitvā ca sarvān eva vyasarjayat

original: 4.037.002a visarjayitvā sa harīñ śūrāṃs tān kṛtakarmaṇaḥ
analyzed: visarjayitvā sa harīm śūrān tān kṛtakarmaṇaḥ

original: 4.037.002c mene kṛtārtham ātmānaṃ rāghavaṃ ca mahābalam
analyzed: mene kṛtārtham ātmānam rāghavam ca mahā balam
sa lakṣmaṇaḥ bhīma balam sarva vānara sattamam
abravīt praśritam vākyam sugrīvam saṃpraharṣayan

original: 4.037.003e kiṣkindhāyā viniṣkrāma yadi te saumya rocate
analyzed: kiṣkindhāyāḥ viniṣkrāma yadi te saumya rocate
tasya tat vacanam śrutvā lakṣmaṇasya subhāṣitam

original: 4.037.004c sugrīvaḥ paramaprīto vākyam etad uvāca ha
analyzed: sugrīvaḥ parama prītaḥ vākyam etat uvāca ha

original: 4.037.005a evaṃ bhavatu gacchāmaḥ stheyaṃ tvacchāsane mayā
analyzed: evam bhavatu gacchāmaḥ stheyam tvad śāsane mayā

original: 4.037.005c tam evam uktvā sugrīvo lakṣmaṇaṃ śubhalakṣmaṇam
analyzed: tam evam uktvā sugrīvaḥ lakṣmaṇam śubha lakṣmaṇam

original: 4.037.006a visarjayām āsa tadā tārām anyāś ca yoṣitaḥ
analyzed: visarjayām āsa tadā tārām anyāḥ ca yoṣitaḥ
eta iti uccais hari varān sugrīvaḥ samudāharat

original: 4.037.007a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā harayaḥ śīghram āyayuḥ
analyzed: tasya tat vacanam śrutvā harayaḥ śīghram āyayuḥ
baddhāñjali puṭāḥ sarve ye syuḥ strī darśana kṣamāḥ
tān uvāca tatas prāptān rājā arka sadṛśa prabhaḥ
upasthāpayata kṣipram śibikām mama vānarāḥ

original: 4.037.009a śrutvā tu vacanaṃ tasya harayaḥ śīghravikramāḥ
analyzed: śrutvā tu vacanam tasya harayaḥ śīghra vikramāḥ
samupasthāpayām āsuḥ śibikām priya darśanām
tām upasthāpitām dṛṣṭvā śibikām vānara adhipaḥ
lakṣmaṇa āruhyatām śīghram iti saumitrim abravīt

original: 4.037.011a ity uktvā kāñcanaṃ yānaṃ sugrīvaḥ sūryasaṃnibham
analyzed: iti uktvā kāñcanam yānam sugrīvaḥ sūrya saṃnibham
bṛhadbhiḥ haribhiḥ yuktam āruroha sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
pāṇḍureṇa ātapatreṇa dhriyamāṇena mūrdhani
śuklaiḥ ca bāla vyajanaiḥ dhūyamānaiḥ samantataḥ
śaṅkha bherī ninādaiḥ ca bandibhiḥ ca abhivanditaḥ
niryayau prāpya sugrīvaḥ rājya śriyam anuttamām
sa vānara śataiḥ tīṣkṇaiḥ bahubhiḥ śastra pāṇibhiḥ

original: 4.037.014c parikīrṇo yayau tatra yatra rāmo vyavasthitaḥ
analyzed: parikīrṇaḥ yayau tatra yatra rāmaḥ vyavasthitaḥ

original: 4.037.015a sa taṃ deśam anuprāpya śreṣṭhaṃ rāmaniṣevitam
analyzed: sa tam deśam anuprāpya śreṣṭham rāma niṣevitam
avātarat mahā tejāḥ śibikāyāḥ sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
āsādya ca tatas rāmam kṛta añjali puṭaḥ bhavat

original: 4.037.016c kṛtāñjalau sthite tasmin vānarāś cabhavaṃs tathā
analyzed: kṛta añjalau sthite tasmin vānarāḥ ca bhavan tathā

original: 4.037.017a taṭākam iva tad dṛṣṭvā rāmaḥ kuḍmalapaṅkajam
analyzed: taṭākam iva tat dṛṣṭvā rāmaḥ kuḍmala paṅkajam

original: 4.037.017c vānarāṇāṃ mahat sainyaṃ sugrīve prītimān abhūt
analyzed: vānarāṇām mahat sainyam sugrīve prītimān abhūt

original: 4.037.018a pādayoḥ patitaṃ mūrdhnā tam utthāpya harīśvaram
analyzed: pādayoḥ patitam mūrdhnā tam utthāpya hari īśvaram

original: 4.037.018c preṃṇā ca bahumānāc ca rāghavaḥ pariṣasvaje
analyzed: preṃṇā ca bahu mānāt ca rāghavaḥ pariṣasvaje
pariṣvajya ca dharma ātmā niṣīda iti tatas bravīt

original: 4.037.019c taṃ niṣaṇṇaṃ tato dṛṣṭvā kṣitau rāmo 'bravīd vacaḥ
analyzed: tam niṣaṇṇam tatas dṛṣṭvā kṣitau rāmaḥ bravīt vacaḥ

original: 4.037.020a dharmam arthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca kāle yas tu niṣevate
analyzed: dharmam artham ca kāmam ca kāle yaḥ tu niṣevate

original: 4.037.020c vibhajya satataṃ vīra sa rājā harisattama
analyzed: vibhajya satatam vīra sa rājā hari sattama

original: 4.037.021a hitvā dharmaṃ tathārthaṃ ca kāmaṃ yas tu niṣevate
analyzed: hitvā dharmam tathā artham ca kāmam yaḥ tu niṣevate

original: 4.037.021c sa vṛkṣāgre yathā suptaḥ patitaḥ pratibudhyate
analyzed: sa vṛkṣa agre yathā suptaḥ patitaḥ pratibudhyate

original: 4.037.022a amitrāṇāṃ vadhe yukto mitrāṇāṃ saṃgrahe rataḥ
analyzed: amitrāṇām vadhe yuktaḥ mitrāṇām saṃgrahe rataḥ
trivarga phala bhoktā tu rājā dharmeṇa yujyate
udyoga samayaḥ tu eṣa prāptaḥ śatru vināśana

original: 4.037.023c saṃcintyatāṃ hi piṅgeśa haribhiḥ saha mantribhiḥ
analyzed: saṃcintyatām hi piṅga īśa haribhiḥ saha mantribhiḥ

original: 4.037.024a evam uktas tu sugrīvo rāmaṃ vacanam abravīt
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu sugrīvaḥ rāmam vacanam abravīt

original: 4.037.025a pranaṣṭā śrīś ca kīrtiś ca kapirājyaṃ ca śāśvatam
analyzed: pranaṣṭā śrīḥ ca kīrtiḥ ca kapi rājyam ca śāśvatam

original: 4.037.025c tvatprasādān mahābāho punaḥ prāptam idaṃ mayā
analyzed: tvad prasādāt mahā bāho punar prāptam idam mayā

original: 4.037.026a tava devaprasadāc ca bhrātuś ca jayatāṃ vara
analyzed: tava deva prasadāt ca bhrātuḥ ca jayatām vara

original: 4.037.026c kṛtaṃ na pratikuryād yaḥ puruṣāṇāṃ sa dūṣakaḥ
analyzed: kṛtam na pratikuryāt yaḥ puruṣāṇām sa dūṣakaḥ
ete vānara mukhyāḥ ca śataśas śatru sūdana
prāptāḥ ca ādāya balinaḥ pṛthivyām sarva vānarān

original: 4.037.028a ṛkṣāś cāvahitāḥ śūrā golāṅgūlāś ca rāghava
analyzed: ṛkṣāḥ ca avahitāḥ śūrāḥ golāṅgūlāḥ ca rāghava
kāntāra vana durgāṇām abhijñāḥ ghora darśanāḥ
deva gandharva putrāḥ ca vānarāḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ

original: 4.037.029c svaiḥ svaiḥ parivṛtāḥ sainyair vartante pathi rāghava
analyzed: svaiḥ svaiḥ parivṛtāḥ sainyaiḥ vartante pathi rāghava

original: 4.037.030a śataiḥ śatasahasraiś ca koṭibhiś ca plavaṃgamāḥ
analyzed: śataiḥ śata sahasraiḥ ca koṭibhiḥ ca plavaṃgamāḥ

original: 4.037.030c ayutaiś cāvṛtā vīrā śaṅkubhiś ca paraṃtapa
analyzed: ayutaiḥ ca āvṛtā vīrā śaṅkubhiḥ ca paraṃtapa

original: 4.037.031a arbudair arbudaśatair madhyaiś cāntaiś ca vānarāḥ
analyzed: arbudaiḥ arbuda śataiḥ madhyaiḥ ca antaiḥ ca vānarāḥ

original: 4.037.031c samudraiś ca parārdhaiś ca harayo hariyūthapāḥ
analyzed: samudraiḥ ca parārdhaiḥ ca harayaḥ hari yūthapāḥ
āgamiṣyanti te rājan mahā indra sama vikramāḥ
merumandara saṃkāśāḥ vindhya meru kṛta ālayāḥ

original: 4.037.033a te tvām abhigamiṣyanti rākṣasaṃ ye sabāndhavam
analyzed: te tvām abhigamiṣyanti rākṣasam ye sa bāndhavam

original: 4.037.033c nihatya rāvaṇaṃ saṃkhye hy ānayiṣyanti maithilīm
analyzed: nihatya rāvaṇam saṃkhye hi ānayiṣyanti maithilīm
tatas tam udyogam avekṣya buddhimān
hari pravīrasya nideśa vartinaḥ
babhūva harṣāt vasudhā adhipa ātmajaḥ
prabuddha nīlotpala tulya darśanaḥ

original: 4.038.001a iti bruvāṇaṃ sugrīvaṃ rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: iti bruvāṇam sugrīvam rāmaḥ dharma bhṛtām varaḥ
bāhubhyām saṃpariṣvajya pratyuvāca kṛtāñjalim

original: 4.038.002a yad indro varṣate varṣaṃ na tac citraṃ bhaved bhuvi
analyzed: yat indraḥ varṣate varṣam na tat citram bhavet bhuvi

original: 4.038.002c ādityo vā sahasrāṃśuḥ kuryād vitimiraṃ nabhaḥ
analyzed: ādityaḥ vā sahasrāṃśuḥ kuryāt vitimiram nabhaḥ

original: 4.038.003a candramā raśmibhiḥ kuryāt pṛthivīṃ saumya nirmalām
analyzed: candramāḥ raśmibhiḥ kuryāt pṛthivīm saumya nirmalām
tvadvidhaḥ vā api mitrāṇām pratikuryāt paraṃtapa

original: 4.038.004a evaṃ tvayi na tac citraṃ bhaved yat saumya śobhanam
analyzed: evam tvayi na tat citram bhavet yat saumya śobhanam

original: 4.038.004c jānāmy ahaṃ tvāṃ sugrīva satataṃ priyavādinam
analyzed: jānāmi aham tvām sugrīva satatam priya vādinam

original: 4.038.005a tvatsanāthaḥ sakhe saṃkhye jetāsmi sakalān arīn
analyzed: tvad sanāthaḥ sakhe saṃkhye jetā asmi sakalān arīn

original: 4.038.005c tvam eva me suhṛn mitraṃ sāhāyyaṃ kartum arhasi
analyzed: tvam eva me suhṛd mitram sāhāyyam kartum arhasi
jahāra ātma vināśāya vaidehīm rākṣasa adhamaḥ

original: 4.038.006c vañcayitvā tu paulomīm anuhlādo yathā śacīm
analyzed: vañcayitvā tu paulomīm anuhlādaḥ yathā śacīm

original: 4.038.007a nacirāt taṃ haniṣyāmi rāvaṇaṃ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: nacirāt tam haniṣyāmi rāvaṇam niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
paulomyāḥ pitaram dṛptam śatakratuḥ iva ari hā
etasmin antare ca eva rajaḥ samabhivartata

original: 4.038.008c uṣṇāṃ tīvrāṃ sahasrāṃśoś chādayad gagane prabhām
analyzed: uṣṇām tīvrām sahasrāṃśoḥ chādayat gagane prabhām

original: 4.038.009a diśaḥ paryākulāś cāsan rajasā tena mūrchitāḥ
analyzed: diśaḥ paryākulāḥ ca āsan rajasā tena mūrchitāḥ
cacāla ca mahī sarvā sa śaila vana kānanā
tatas naga indra saṃkāśaiḥ tīkṣṇa daṃṣṭraiḥ mahā balaiḥ
kṛtsnā saṃchāditā bhūmiḥ asaṃkhyeyaiḥ plavaṃgamaiḥ
nimeṣa antara mātreṇa tatas taiḥ hari yūthapaiḥ
koṭī śata parīvāraiḥ kāmarūpibhiḥ āvṛtā

original: 4.038.012a nādeyaiḥ pārvatīyaiś ca sāmudraiś ca mahābalaiḥ
analyzed: nādeyaiḥ pārvatīyaiḥ ca sāmudraiḥ ca mahā balaiḥ
haribhiḥ megha nirhrādaiḥ anyaiḥ ca vana cāribhiḥ
taruṇa āditya varṇaiḥ ca śaśi gauraiḥ ca vānaraiḥ
padma kesara varṇaiḥ ca śvetaiḥ meru kṛta ālayaiḥ
koṭī sahasraiḥ daśabhiḥ śrīmān parivṛtaḥ tadā
vīraḥ śatabaliḥ nāma vānaraḥ pratyadṛśyata
tatas kāñcana śaila ābhaḥ tārāyāḥ vīryavān pitā
anekaiḥ daśa sāhasraiḥ koṭibhiḥ pratyadṛśyata
buddhimān vānara śreṣṭhaḥ sarva vānara sattamaḥ
anīkaiḥ bahu sāhasraiḥ vānarāṇām samanvitaḥ
pitā hanumataḥ śrīmān kesarī pratyadṛśyata
vṛtaḥ koṭi sahasreṇa vānarāṇām adṛśyata
ṛkṣāṇām bhīma vegānām dhūmraḥ śatru nibarhaṇaḥ
vṛtaḥ koṭi sahasrābhyām dvābhyām samabhivartata
mahā acala nibhaiḥ ghoraiḥ panasaḥ nāma yūthapaḥ
ājagāma mahā vīryaḥ tisṛbhiḥ koṭibhiḥ vṛtaḥ
nīlāñjana caya ākāraḥ nīlaḥ nāma atha yūthapaḥ
adṛśyata mahā kāyaḥ koṭibhiḥ daśabhiḥ vṛtaḥ
darīmukhaḥ ca balavān yūthapaḥ bhyāyayau tadā
vṛtaḥ koṭi sahasreṇa sugrīvam samupasthitaḥ

original: 4.038.023a maindaś ca dvividaś cobhāv aśviputrau mahāvalau
analyzed: maindaḥ ca dvividaḥ ca ubhau aśvi putrau mahā valau
koṭi koṭi sahasreṇa vānarāṇām adṛśyatām
tatas koṭi sahasrāṇām sahasreṇa śatena ca
pṛṣṭhatas nugataḥ prāptaḥ haribhiḥ gandhamādanaḥ
tatas padma sahasreṇa vṛtaḥ śaṅku śatena ca
yuvarājaḥ ṅgadaḥ prāptaḥ pitṛ tulya parākramaḥ
tatas tārā dyutiḥ tāraḥ hariḥ bhīma parākramaḥ
pañcabhiḥ hari koṭībhiḥ dūratas pratyadṛśyata
indrajānuḥ kapiḥ vīraḥ yūthapaḥ pratyadṛśyata

original: 4.038.027c ekādaśānāṃ koṭīnām īśvaras taiś ca saṃvṛtaḥ
analyzed: ekādaśānām koṭīnām īśvaraḥ taiḥ ca saṃvṛtaḥ
tatas rambhaḥ tu anuprāptaḥ taruṇa āditya saṃnibhaḥ

original: 4.038.028c ayutena vṛtaś caiva sahasreṇa śatena ca
analyzed: ayutena vṛtaḥ ca eva sahasreṇa śatena ca

original: 4.038.029a tato yūthapatir vīro durmukho nāma vānaraḥ
analyzed: tatas yūtha patiḥ vīraḥ durmukhaḥ nāma vānaraḥ
pratyadṛśyata koṭibhyām dvābhyām parivṛtaḥ balī
kailāsa śikhara ākāraiḥ vānaraiḥ bhīma vikramaiḥ
vṛtaḥ koṭi sahasreṇa hanumān pratyadṛśyata
nalaḥ ca api mahā vīryaḥ saṃvṛtaḥ drumavāsibhiḥ
koṭī śatena saṃprāptaḥ sahasreṇa śatena ca

original: 4.038.032a śarabhaḥ kumudo vahnir vānaro rambha eva ca
analyzed: śarabhaḥ kumudaḥ vahniḥ vānaraḥ rambhaḥ eva ca

original: 4.038.032c ete cānye ca bahavo vānarāḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ
analyzed: ete ca anye ca bahavaḥ vānarāḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ

original: 4.038.033a āvṛtya pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ parvatāṃś ca vanāni ca
analyzed: āvṛtya pṛthivīm sarvām parvatān ca vanāni ca

original: 4.038.033c āplavantaḥ plavantaś ca garjantaś ca plavaṃgamāḥ
analyzed: āplavantaḥ plavantaḥ ca garjantaḥ ca plavaṃgamāḥ
abhyavartanta sugrīvam sūryam abhra gaṇāḥ iva
kurvāṇāḥ bahu śabdān ca prahṛṣṭāḥ bala śālinaḥ
śirobhiḥ vānara indrāya sugrīvāya nyavedayan
apare vānara śreṣṭhāḥ saṃgamya ca yathocitam
sugrīveṇa samāgamya sthitāḥ prāñjalayaḥ tadā

original: 4.038.036a sugrīvas tvarito rāme sarvāṃs tān vānararṣabhān
analyzed: sugrīvaḥ tvaritaḥ rāme sarvān tān vānara ṛṣabhān
nivedayitvā dharma jñaḥ sthitaḥ prāñjaliḥ abravīt
yathā sukham parvata nirjhareṣu
vaneṣu sarveṣu ca vānara indrāḥ
niveśayitvā vidhivat balāni
balam bala jñaḥ pratipattum īṣṭe
atha rājā samṛddha arthaḥ sugrīvaḥ plavaga īśvaraḥ
uvāca nara śārdūlam rāmam para bala ardanam
āgatāḥ viniviṣṭāḥ ca balinaḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ
vānara indrāḥ mahā indra ābhāḥ ye mad viṣaya vāsinaḥ
te ime bahu sāhasraiḥ haribhiḥ bhīma vikramaiḥ
āgatāḥ vānarāḥ ghorāḥ daitya dānava saṃnibhāḥ
khyāta karma apadānāḥ ca balavantaḥ jita klamāḥ
parākrameṣu vikhyātāḥ vyavasāyeṣu ca uttamāḥ
pṛthivī ambu carāḥ rāma nānā naga nivāsinaḥ

original: 4.039.005c koṭyagraśa ime prāptā vānarās tava kiṃkarāḥ
analyzed: koṭi agraśas ime prāptāḥ vānarāḥ tava kiṃkarāḥ
nideśa vartinaḥ sarve sarve guru hite ratāḥ
abhipretam anuṣṭhātum tava śakṣyanti ariṃdama

original: 4.039.007a yan manyase naravyāghra prāptakālaṃ tad ucyatām
analyzed: yat manyase nara vyāghra prāpta kālam tat ucyatām

original: 4.039.007c tat sainyaṃ tvadvaśe yuktam ājñāpayitum arhasi
analyzed: tat sainyam tvad vaśe yuktam ājñāpayitum arhasi

original: 4.039.008a kāmam eṣām idaṃ kāryaṃ viditaṃ mama tattvataḥ
analyzed: kāmam eṣām idam kāryam viditam mama tattvataḥ

original: 4.039.008c tathāpi tu yathā tattvam ājñāpayitum arhasi
analyzed: tathā api tu yathā tattvam ājñāpayitum arhasi
tathā bruvāṇam sugrīvam rāmaḥ daśaratha ātmajaḥ
bāhubhyām saṃpariṣvajya idam vacanam abravīt

original: 4.039.010a jñāyatāṃ saumya vaidehī yadi jīvati vā na vā
analyzed: jñāyatām saumya vaidehī yadi jīvati vā na vā

original: 4.039.010c sa ca deśo mahāprājña yasmin vasati rāvaṇaḥ
analyzed: sa ca deśaḥ mahā prājña yasmin vasati rāvaṇaḥ

original: 4.039.011a adhigamya ca vaidehīṃ nilayaṃ rāvaṇasya ca
analyzed: adhigamya ca vaidehīm nilayam rāvaṇasya ca

original: 4.039.011c prāptakālaṃ vidhāsyāmi tasmin kāle saha tvayā
analyzed: prāpta kālam vidhāsyāmi tasmin kāle saha tvayā

original: 4.039.012a nāham asmin prabhuḥ kārye vānareśa na lakṣmaṇaḥ
analyzed: na aham asmin prabhuḥ kārye vānara īśa na lakṣmaṇaḥ

original: 4.039.012c tvam asya hetuḥ kāryasya prabhuś ca plavageśvara
analyzed: tvam asya hetuḥ kāryasya prabhuḥ ca plavaga īśvara
tvam eva ājñāpaya vibho mama kārya viniścayam

original: 4.039.013c tvaṃ hi jānāsi yat kāryaṃ mama vīra na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: tvam hi jānāsi yat kāryam mama vīra na saṃśayaḥ
bhavān asmad hite yuktaḥ sukṛta arthaḥ rtha vittamaḥ

original: 4.039.015a evam uktas tu sugrīvo vinataṃ nāma yūthapam
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tu sugrīvaḥ vinatam nāma yūthapam

original: 4.039.015c abravīd rāma sāmnidhye lakṣmaṇasya ca dhīmataḥ
analyzed: abravīt rāma sāmnidhye lakṣmaṇasya ca dhīmataḥ
śaila ābham megha nirghoṣam ūrjitam plavaga īśvaram
soma sūrya ātmajaiḥ sārdham vānaraiḥ vānara uttama
deśa kāla nayaiḥ yuktaḥ kārya akārya viniścaye
vṛtaḥ śata sahasreṇa vānarāṇām tarasvinām
adhigaccha diśam pūrvām sa śaila vana kānanām

original: 4.039.018a tatra sītāṃ ca vaidehīṃ nilayaṃ rāvaṇasya ca
analyzed: tatra sītām ca vaidehīm nilayam rāvaṇasya ca

original: 4.039.018c mārgadhvaṃ giridurgeṣu vaneṣu ca nadīṣu ca
analyzed: mārgadhvam giri durgeṣu vaneṣu ca nadīṣu ca

original: 4.039.019a nadīṃ bhāgīrathīṃ ramyāṃ sarayūṃ kauśikīṃ tathā
analyzed: nadīm bhāgīrathīm ramyām sarayūm kauśikīm tathā

original: 4.039.019c kālindīṃ yamunāṃ ramyāṃ yāmunaṃ ca mahāgirim
analyzed: kālindīm yamunām ramyām yāmunam ca mahā girim

original: 4.039.020a sarasvatīṃ ca sindhuṃ ca śoṇaṃ maṇinibhodakam
analyzed: sarasvatīm ca sindhum ca śoṇam maṇi nibha udakam
mahīm kāla mahīm ca eva śaila kānana śobhitām
brahmamālān videhān ca mālavān kāśi kosalān

original: 4.039.021c māgadhāṃś ca mahāgrāmān puṇḍrān vaṅgāṃs tathaiva ca
analyzed: māgadhān ca mahāgrāmān puṇḍrān vaṅgān tathā eva ca
pattanam kośakārāṇām bhūmim ca rajata ākarām

original: 4.039.022c sarvam etad vicetavyaṃ mṛgayadbhir tatas tataḥ
analyzed: sarvam etat vicetavyam mṛgayadbhiḥ tatas tatas

original: 4.039.023a rāmasya dayitāṃ bhāryāṃ sītāṃ daśarataḥ snuṣām
analyzed: rāmasya dayitām bhāryām sītām daśarataḥ snuṣām

original: 4.039.023c samudram avagāḍhāṃś ca parvatān pattanāni ca
analyzed: samudram avagāḍhān ca parvatān pattanāni ca

original: 4.039.024a mandarasya ca ye koṭiṃ saṃśritāḥ ke cid āyatām
analyzed: mandarasya ca ye koṭim saṃśritāḥ ke cit āyatām
karṇaprāvaraṇāḥ ca eva tathā ca api oṣṭhakarṇakāḥ
ghorāḥ lohamukhāḥ ca eva javanāḥ ca ekapādakāḥ
akṣayāḥ balavantaḥ ca puruṣāḥ puruṣādakāḥ
kirātāḥ karṇa cūḍāḥ ca hemāṅgāḥ priya darśanāḥ
āma mīna aśanāḥ tatra kirātāḥ dvīpa vāsinaḥ
antar jalacarāḥ ghorāḥ nara vyāghrāḥ iti śrutāḥ
eteṣām ālayāḥ sarve viceyāḥ kānanaukasaḥ

original: 4.039.028a giribhir ye ca gamyante plavanena plavena ca
analyzed: giribhiḥ ye ca gamyante plavanena plavena ca
ratnavantam yavadvīpam sapta rājya upaśobhitam
suvarṇa rūpyakam ca eva suvarṇa ākara maṇḍitam
yavadvīpam atikramya śiśiraḥ nāma parvataḥ
divam spṛśati śṛṅgeṇa deva dānava sevitaḥ
eteṣām giri durgeṣu pratāpeṣu vaneṣu ca

original: 4.039.031a rāvaṇaḥ saha vaidehyā mārgitavyas tatas tataḥ
analyzed: rāvaṇaḥ saha vaidehyā mārgitavyaḥ tatas tatas

original: 4.039.031c tataḥ samudradvīpāṃś ca subhīmān draṣṭum arhatha
analyzed: tatas samudra dvīpān ca su bhīmān draṣṭum arhatha
tatra asurāḥ mahā kāyāḥ chāyām gṛhṇanti nityaśas
brahmaṇā samanujñātāḥ dīrgha kālam bubhukṣitāḥ
tam kāla megha pratimam mahā uraga niṣevitam
abhigamya mahānādam tīrthena eva mahā udadhim

original: 4.039.034a tato raktajalaṃ bhīmaṃ lohitaṃ nāma sāgaram
analyzed: tatas rakta jalam bhīmam lohitam nāma sāgaram

original: 4.039.034c gatā drakṣyatha tāṃ caiva bṛhatīṃ kūṭaśālmalīm
analyzed: gatāḥ drakṣyatha tām ca eva bṛhatīm kūṭaśālmalīm
gṛham ca vainateyasya nānā ratna vibhūṣitam
tatra kailāsa saṃkāśam vihitam viśvakarmaṇā

original: 4.039.036a tatra śailanibhā bhīmā mandehā nāma rākṣasāḥ
analyzed: tatra śaila nibhāḥ bhīmāḥ mandehāḥ nāma rākṣasāḥ
śaila śṛṅgeṣu lambante nānā rūpāḥ bhaya āvahāḥ

original: 4.039.037a te patanti jale nityaṃ sūryasyodayanaṃ prati
analyzed: te patanti jale nityam sūryasya udayanam prati

original: 4.039.037c abhitaptāś ca sūryeṇa lambante sma punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: abhitaptāḥ ca sūryeṇa lambante sma punar punar
tatas pāṇḍura megha ābham kṣīraudam nāma sāgaram

original: 4.039.038c gatā drakṣyatha durdharṣā mukhā hāram ivormibhiḥ
analyzed: gatāḥ drakṣyatha durdharṣāḥ mukhā hāram iva ūrmibhiḥ

original: 4.039.039a tasya madhye mahāśveta ṛṣabho nāma parvataḥ
analyzed: tasya madhye mahā śvetaḥ ṛṣabhaḥ nāma parvataḥ

original: 4.039.039c divyagandhaiḥ kusumitai rajataiś ca nagair vṛtaḥ
analyzed: divya gandhaiḥ rajataiḥ ca nagaiḥ vṛtaḥ

original: 4.039.040a saraś ca rājataiḥ padmair jvalitair hemakesaraiḥ
analyzed: saraḥ ca rājataiḥ padmaiḥ jvalitaiḥ hema kesaraiḥ
nāmnā sudarśanam nāma rājahaṃsaiḥ samākulam
vibudhāḥ cāraṇāḥ yakṣāḥ kiṃnarāḥ sa apsaraḥ gaṇāḥ
hṛṣṭāḥ samabhigacchanti nalinīm tām riraṃsavaḥ
kṣīrodam samatikramya tatas drakṣyatha vānarāḥ
jala udam sāgara śreṣṭham sarva bhūta bhaya āvaham

original: 4.039.043a tatra tat kopajaṃ tejaḥ kṛtaṃ hayamukhaṃ mahat
analyzed: tatra tat kopa jam tejaḥ kṛtam hayamukham mahat
asya āhuḥ tat mahā vegam odanam sacarācaram
tatra vikrośatām nādaḥ bhūtānām sāgaraukasām
śrūyate ca asamarthānām dṛṣṭvā tat vaḍavāmukham
svādu udasya uttare deśe yojanāni trayodaśa
jātarūpaśilaḥ nāma mahān kanaka parvataḥ
āsīnam parvatasya agre sarva bhūta namaskṛtam
sahasra śirasam devam anantam nīla vāsasam

original: 4.039.047a triśirāḥ kāñcanaḥ ketus tālas tasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: triśirāḥ kāñcanaḥ ketuḥ tālaḥ tasya mahātmanaḥ
sthāpitaḥ parvatasya agre virājati sa vedikaḥ

original: 4.039.048a pūrvasyāṃ diśi nirmāṇaṃ kṛtaṃ tat tridaśeśvaraiḥ
analyzed: pūrvasyām diśi nirmāṇam kṛtam tat tridaśa īśvaraiḥ
tatas param hema mayaḥ śrīmān udayaparvataḥ

original: 4.039.049a tasya koṭir divaṃ spṛṣṭvā śatayojanam āyatā
analyzed: tasya koṭiḥ divam spṛṣṭvā śata yojanam āyatā
jātarūpa mayī divyā virājati sa vedikā

original: 4.039.050a sālais tālais tamālaiś ca karṇikāraiś ca puṣpitaiḥ
analyzed: sālaiḥ tālaiḥ tamālaiḥ ca karṇikāraiḥ ca puṣpitaiḥ
jātarūpa mayaiḥ divyaiḥ śobhate sūrya saṃnibhaiḥ
tatra yojana vistāram ucchritam daśa yojanam
śṛṅgam saumanasam nāma jātarūpa mayam dhruvam

original: 4.039.052a tatra pūrvaṃ padaṃ kṛtvā purā viṣṇus trivikrame
analyzed: tatra pūrvam padam kṛtvā purā viṣṇuḥ trivikrame
dvitīyam śikharam meroḥ cakāra puruṣottamaḥ
uttareṇa parikramya jambūdvīpam divākaraḥ

original: 4.039.053c dṛśyo bhavati bhūyiṣṭhaṃ śikharaṃ tan mahocchrayam
analyzed: dṛśyaḥ bhavati bhūyiṣṭham śikharam tat mahā ucchrayam
tatra vaikhānasāḥ nāma vālakhilyāḥ mahā ṛṣayaḥ
prakāśamānāḥ dṛśyante sūrya varṇāḥ tapasvinaḥ

original: 4.039.055a ayaṃ sudarśano dvīpaḥ puro yasya prakāśate
analyzed: ayam sudarśanaḥ dvīpaḥ puras yasya prakāśate

original: 4.039.055c yasmiṃs tejaś ca cakṣuś ca sarvaprānabhṛtām api
analyzed: yasmin tejaḥ ca cakṣuḥ ca sarva prāna bhṛtām api

original: 4.039.056a śailasya tasya kuñjeṣu kandareṣu vaneṣu ca
analyzed: śailasya tasya kuñjeṣu kandareṣu vaneṣu ca

original: 4.039.056c rāvaṇaḥ saha vaidehyā mārgitavyas tatas tataḥ
analyzed: rāvaṇaḥ saha vaidehyā mārgitavyaḥ tatas tatas

original: 4.039.057a kāñcanasya ca śailasya sūryasya ca mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: kāñcanasya ca śailasya sūryasya ca mahātmanaḥ

original: 4.039.057c āviṣṭā tejasā saṃdhyā pūrvā raktā prakāśate
analyzed: āviṣṭā tejasā saṃdhyā pūrvā raktā prakāśate

original: 4.039.058a tataḥ paramagamyā syād dik pūrvā tridaśāvṛtā
analyzed: tatas parama gamyā syāt diś pūrvā tridaśa āvṛtā
rahitā candra sūryābhyām adṛśyā timira āvṛtā

original: 4.039.059a śaileṣu teṣu sarveṣu kandareṣu vaneṣu ca
analyzed: śaileṣu teṣu sarveṣu kandareṣu vaneṣu ca

original: 4.039.059c ya ca noktā mayā deśā viceyā teṣu jānakī
analyzed: ca na uktāḥ mayā deśāḥ viceyā teṣu jānakī
etāvat vānaraiḥ śakyam gantum vānara puṃgavāḥ

original: 4.039.060c abhāskaram amaryādaṃ na jānīmas tataḥ param
analyzed: abhāskaram amaryādam na jānīmaḥ tatas param

original: 4.039.061a adhigamya tu vaidehīṃ nilayaṃ rāvaṇasya ca
analyzed: adhigamya tu vaidehīm nilayam rāvaṇasya ca

original: 4.039.061c māse pūrṇe nivartadhvam udayaṃ prāpya parvatam
analyzed: māse pūrṇe nivartadhvam udayam prāpya parvatam

original: 4.039.062a ūrdhvaṃ māsān na vastavyaṃ vasan vadhyo bhaven mama
analyzed: ūrdhvam māsāt na vastavyam vasan vadhyaḥ bhavet mama
siddhārthāḥ saṃnivartadhvam adhigamya ca maithilīm
mahā indra kāntām vana ṣaṇḍa maṇḍitām
diśam caritvā nipuṇena vānarāḥ
avāpya sītām raghu vaṃśa ja priyām
tatas nivṛttāḥ sukhitaḥ bhaviṣyatha

original: 4.040.001a tataḥ prasthāpya sugrīvas tan mahad vānaraṃ balam
analyzed: tatas prasthāpya sugrīvaḥ tat mahat vānaram balam
dakṣiṇām preṣayām āsa vānarān abhilakṣitān

original: 4.040.002a nīlam agnisutaṃ caiva hanumantaṃ ca vānaram
analyzed: nīlam agni sutam ca eva hanumantam ca vānaram
pitāmaha sutam ca eva jāmbavantam mahā kapim

original: 4.040.003a suhotraṃ ca śarīraṃ ca śaragulmaṃ tathaiva ca
analyzed: suhotram ca śarīram ca śara gulmam tathā eva ca

original: 4.040.003c gajaṃ gavākṣaṃ gavayaṃ suṣeṇam ṛṣabhaṃ tathā
analyzed: gajam gavākṣam gavayam suṣeṇam ṛṣabham tathā

original: 4.040.004a maindaṃ ca dvividaṃ caiva vijayaṃ gandhamādanam
analyzed: maindam ca dvividam ca eva vijayam gandhamādanam

original: 4.040.004c ulkāmukham asaṅgaṃ ca hutāśana sutāv ubhau
analyzed: ulkāmukham asaṅgam ca hutāśana sutau ubhau
aṅgada pramukhān vīrān vīraḥ kapi gaṇa īśvaraḥ
vega vikrama saṃpannān saṃdideśa viśeṣa vid

original: 4.040.006a teṣām agreṣaraṃ caiva mahad balam asaṃgagam
analyzed: teṣām agreṣaram ca eva mahat balam asaṃgagam
vidhāya hari vīrāṇām ādiśat dakṣiṇām diśam

original: 4.040.007a ye ke cana samuddeśās tasyāṃ diśi sudurgamāḥ
analyzed: ye ke cana samuddeśāḥ tasyām diśi su durgamāḥ

original: 4.040.007c kapīśaḥ kapimukhyānāṃ sa teṣāṃ tān udāharat
analyzed: kapīśaḥ kapi mukhyānām sa teṣām tān udāharat
sahasra śirasam vindhyam nānā druma latā āvṛtam
narmadām ca nadīm durgām mahā uraga niṣevitām
tatas godāvarīm ramyām kṛṣṇāveṇīm mahā nadīm
vara dām ca mahābhāgām mahā uraga niṣevitām
mekhalān utkalān ca eva daśārṇa nagarāṇi api
avantīm abhravantīm ca sarvam eva anupaśyata

original: 4.040.011a vidarbhān ṛṣikāṃś caiva ramyān māhiṣakān api
analyzed: vidarbhān ṛṣikān ca eva ramyān māhiṣakān api

original: 4.040.011c tathā baṅgān kaliṅgāṃś ca kauśikāṃś ca samantataḥ
analyzed: tathā baṅgān kaliṅgān ca kauśikān ca samantataḥ
anvīkṣya daṇḍaka araṇyam sa parvata nadī guham
nadīm godāvarīm ca eva sarvam eva anupaśyata

original: 4.040.013a tathaivāndhrāṃś ca puṇḍrāṃś ca colān pāṇḍyān sakeralān
analyzed: tathā eva andhrān ca puṇḍrān ca colān pāṇḍyān sa keralān
ayomukhaḥ ca gantavyaḥ parvataḥ dhātu maṇḍitaḥ
vicitra śikharaḥ śrīmān citra puṣpita kānanaḥ
sa candana vana uddeśaḥ mārgitavyaḥ mahā giriḥ

original: 4.040.015a tatas tām āpagāṃ divyāṃ prasannasalilāṃ śivām
analyzed: tatas tām āpagām divyām prasanna salilām śivām
tatra drakṣyatha kāverīm vihṛtām apsaraḥ gaṇaiḥ
tasya āsīnam nagasya agre malayasya mahā ojasam
drakṣyatha āditya saṃkāśam agastyam ṛṣi sattamam
tatas tena abhyanujñātāḥ prasannena mahātmanā
tāmraparṇīm grāha juṣṭām tariṣyatha mahā nadīm

original: 4.040.018a sā candanavanair divyaiḥ pracchannā dvīpa śālinī
analyzed: sā candana vanaiḥ divyaiḥ pracchannā dvīpa śālinī
kāntā iva yuvatiḥ kāntam samudram avagāhate
tatas hema mayam divyam muktāmaṇi vibhūṣitam

original: 4.040.019c yuktaṃ kavāṭaṃ pāṇḍyānāṃ gatā drakṣyatha vānarāḥ
analyzed: yuktam kavāṭam pāṇḍyānām gatāḥ drakṣyatha vānarāḥ
tatas samudram āsādya saṃpradhārya artha niścayam
agastyena antare tatra sāgare viniveśitaḥ
citra nānā nagaḥ śrīmān mahendraḥ parvata uttamaḥ
jātarūpa mayaḥ śrīmān avagāḍhaḥ mahā arṇavam
nānāvidhaiḥ nagaiḥ phullaiḥ latābhiḥ ca upaśobhitam
deva ṛṣi yakṣa pravaraiḥ apsarobhiḥ ca sevitam
siddha cāraṇa saṃghaiḥ ca prakīrṇam su manoharam

original: 4.040.023c tam upaiti sahasrākṣaḥ sadā parvasu parvasu
analyzed: tam upaiti sahasra akṣaḥ sadā parvasu parvasu
dvīpaḥ tasya apare pāre śata yojanam āyataḥ

original: 4.040.024c agamyo mānuṣair dīptas taṃ mārgadhvaṃ samantataḥ
analyzed: agamyaḥ mānuṣaiḥ dīptaḥ tam mārgadhvam samantataḥ
tatra sarva ātmanā sītā mārgitavyā viśeṣataḥ

original: 4.040.025a sa hi deśas tu vadhyasya rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ
analyzed: sa hi deśaḥ tu vadhyasya rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ
rākṣasa adhipateḥ vāsaḥ sahasrākṣa sama dyuteḥ

original: 4.040.026a dakṣiṇasya samudrasya madhye tasya tu rākṣasī
analyzed: dakṣiṇasya samudrasya madhye tasya tu rākṣasī
aṅgāraka iti vikhyātā chāyām ākṣipya bhojinī
tam atikramya lakṣmīvān samudre śata yojane
giriḥ puṣpitakaḥ nāma siddha cāraṇa sevitaḥ

original: 4.040.028c bhrājate vipulaiḥ śṛṅgair ambaraṃ vilikhann iva
analyzed: bhrājate vipulaiḥ śṛṅgaiḥ ambaram vilikhan iva

original: 4.040.029a tasyaikaṃ kāñcanaṃ śṛṅgaṃ sevate yaṃ divākaraḥ
analyzed: tasya ekam kāñcanam śṛṅgam sevate yam divākaraḥ

original: 4.040.029c śvetaṃ rājatam ekaṃ ca sevate yaṃ niśākaraḥ
analyzed: śvetam rājatam ekam ca sevate yam niśākaraḥ

original: 4.040.030a na taṃ kṛtaghnāḥ paśyanti na nṛśaṃsā na nāstikāḥ
analyzed: na tam kṛtaghnāḥ paśyanti na nṛśaṃsāḥ na nāstikāḥ

original: 4.040.030c praṇamya śirasā śailaṃ taṃ vimārgata vānarāḥ
analyzed: praṇamya śirasā śailam tam vimārgata vānarāḥ

original: 4.040.031a tam atikramya durdharṣāḥ sūryavān nāma parvataḥ
analyzed: tam atikramya durdharṣāḥ sūryavān nāma parvataḥ
adhvanā durvigāhena yojanāni caturdaśa

original: 4.040.032a tatas tam apy atikramya vaidyuto nāma parvataḥ
analyzed: tatas tam api atikramya vaidyutaḥ nāma parvataḥ
sarva kāma phalaiḥ vṛkṣaiḥ sarva kāla manoharaiḥ

original: 4.040.033a tatra bhuktvā varārhāṇi mūlāni ca phalāni ca
analyzed: tatra bhuktvā vara arhāṇi mūlāni ca phalāni ca

original: 4.040.033c madhūni pītvā mukhyāni paraṃ gacchata vānarāḥ
analyzed: madhūni pītvā mukhyāni param gacchata vānarāḥ
tatra netra manaḥ kāntaḥ kuñjaraḥ nāma parvataḥ
agastya bhavanam yatra nirmitam viśvakarmaṇā
tatra yojana vistāram ucchritam daśa yojanam
śaraṇam kāñcanam divyam nānā ratna vibhūṣitam

original: 4.040.036a tatra bhogavatī nāma sarpāṇām ālayaḥ purī
analyzed: tatra bhogavatī nāma sarpāṇām ālayaḥ purī
viśāla rathyā durdharṣā sarvatas parirakṣitā
rakṣitā pannagaiḥ ghoraiḥ tīkṣṇa daṃṣṭraiḥ mahāviṣaiḥ
sarpa rājaḥ mahā ghoraḥ yasyām vasati vāsukiḥ

original: 4.040.037c niryāya mārgitavyā ca sā ca bhogavatī purī
analyzed: niryāya mārgitavyā ca sā ca bhogavatī purī

original: 4.040.038a taṃ ca deśam atikramya mahān ṛṣabhasaṃsthitaḥ
analyzed: tam ca deśam atikramya mahān ṛṣabha saṃsthitaḥ
sarva ratna mayaḥ śrīmān ṛṣabhaḥ nāma parvataḥ

original: 4.040.039a gośīrṣakaṃ padmakaṃ ca hariśyāmaṃ ca candanam
analyzed: gośīrṣakam padmakam ca hariśyāmam ca candanam
divyam utpadyate yatra tat ca eva agni sama prabham

original: 4.040.040a na tu tac candanaṃ dṛṣṭvā spraṣṭavyaṃ ca kadā cana
analyzed: na tu tat candanam dṛṣṭvā spraṣṭavyam ca kadā cana

original: 4.040.040c rohitā nāma gandharvā ghorā rakṣanti tad vanam
analyzed: rohitāḥ nāma gandharvāḥ ghorāḥ rakṣanti tat vanam
tatra gandharva patayaḥ pañca sūrya sama prabhāḥ

original: 4.040.041c śailūṣo grāmaṇīr bhikṣuḥ śubhro babhrus tathaiva ca
analyzed: śailūṣaḥ grāmaṇīḥ bhikṣuḥ śubhraḥ babhruḥ tathā eva ca

original: 4.040.042a ante pṛthivyā durdharṣās tatra svargajitaḥ sthitāḥ
analyzed: ante pṛthivyāḥ durdharṣāḥ tatra svarga jitaḥ sthitāḥ

original: 4.040.042c tataḥ paraṃ na vaḥ sevyaḥ pitṛlokaḥ sudāruṇaḥ
analyzed: tatas param na vaḥ sevyaḥ pitṛ lokaḥ su dāruṇaḥ
rājadhānī yamasya eṣā kaṣṭena tamasā āvṛtā
etāvat eva yuṣmābhiḥ vīrāḥ vānara puṃgavāḥ

original: 4.040.043c śakyaṃ vicetuṃ gantuṃ vā nāto gatimatāṃ gatiḥ
analyzed: śakyam vicetum gantum vā na atas gatimatām gatiḥ

original: 4.040.044a sarvam etat samālokya yac cānyad api dṛśyate
analyzed: sarvam etat samālokya yat ca anyat api dṛśyate
gatim viditvā vaidehyāḥ saṃnivartitam arhatha

original: 4.040.045a yas tu māsān nivṛtto 'gre dṛṣṭā sīteti vakṣyati
analyzed: yaḥ tu māsāt nivṛttaḥ gre dṛṣṭā sītā iti vakṣyati
mad tulya vibhavaḥ bhogaiḥ sukham sa vihariṣyati

original: 4.040.046a tataḥ priyataro nāsti mama prāṇād viśeṣataḥ
analyzed: tatas priyataraḥ nā asti mama prāṇāt viśeṣataḥ
kṛta aparādhaḥ bahuśas mama bandhuḥ bhaviṣyati
amita bala parākramāḥ
vipula guṇeṣu kuleṣu ca prasūtāḥ
manuja pati sutām yathā labhadhvam
tat adhiguṇam puruṣa artham ārabhadhvam

original: 4.041.001a tataḥ prasthāpya sugrīvas tān harīn dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
analyzed: tatas prasthāpya sugrīvaḥ tān harīn dakṣiṇām diśam
buddhi vikrama saṃpannān vāyu vega samān jave
atha āhūya mahā tejāḥ suṣeṇam nāma yūthapam
tārāyāḥ pitaram rājā śvaśura bhīma vikramam

original: 4.041.003a abravīt prāñjalir vākyam abhigamya praṇamya ca
analyzed: abravīt prāñjaliḥ vākyam abhigamya praṇamya ca
sāhāyyam kuru rāmasya kṛtye smin samupasthite
vṛtaḥ śata sahasreṇa vānarāṇām tarasvinām

original: 4.041.004c abhigaccha diśaṃ saumya paścimāṃ vāruṇīṃ prabho
analyzed: abhigaccha diśam saumya paścimām vāruṇīm prabho

original: 4.041.005a surāṣṭrān saha bāhlīkāñ śūrābhīrāṃs tathaiva ca
analyzed: surāṣṭrān saha vāhlīkām śūra ābhīrān tathā eva ca
sphītān janapadān ramyān vipulāni purāṇi ca
puṃnāga gahanam kukṣim bahula uddālaka ākulam
tathā ketaka ṣaṇḍān ca mārgadhvam hari yūthapāḥ

original: 4.041.007a pratyak srotogamāś caiva nadyaḥ śītajalāḥ śivāḥ
analyzed: pratyak srotaḥ gamāḥ ca eva nadyaḥ śīta jalāḥ śivāḥ

original: 4.041.007c tāpasānām araṇyāni kāntārā girayaś ca ye
analyzed: tāpasānām araṇyāni kāntārāḥ girayaḥ ca ye
giri jāla āvṛtām durgām mārgitvā paścimām diśam

original: 4.041.008c tataḥ paścimam āsādya samudraṃ draṣṭum arhatha
analyzed: tatas paścimam āsādya samudram draṣṭum arhatha

original: 4.041.008e timi nakrāyuta jalam akṣobhyam atha vānaraḥ
analyzed: timi nakrāyuta jalam akṣobhyam atha vānaraḥ
tatas ketaka ṣaṇḍeṣu tamāla gahaneṣu ca
kapayaḥ vihariṣyanti nārikela vaneṣu ca

original: 4.041.010a tatra sītāṃ ca mārgadhvaṃ nilayaṃ rāvaṇasya ca
analyzed: tatra sītām ca mārgadhvam nilayam rāvaṇasya ca
marīcipattanam ca eva ramyam ca eva jaṭī puram

original: 4.041.011a avantīm aṅgalopāṃ ca tathā cālakṣitaṃ vanam
analyzed: avantīm aṅgalopām ca tathā ca ālakṣitam vanam

original: 4.041.011c rāṣṭrāṇi ca viśālāni pattanāni tatas tataḥ
analyzed: rāṣṭrāṇi ca viśālāni pattanāni tatas tatas
sindhu sāgarayoḥ ca eva saṃgame tatra parvataḥ
mahān hemagiriḥ nāma śata śṛṅgaḥ mahā drumaḥ

original: 4.041.013a tasya prastheṣu ramyeṣu siṃhāḥ pakṣagamāḥ sthitāḥ
analyzed: tasya prastheṣu ramyeṣu siṃhāḥ pakṣagamāḥ sthitāḥ
timi matsya gajān ca eva nīḍāni āropayanti te

original: 4.041.014a tāni nīḍāni siṃhānāṃ giriśṛṅgagatāś ca ye
analyzed: tāni nīḍāni siṃhānām giri śṛṅga gatāḥ ca ye
dṛptāḥ tṛptāḥ ca mātaṅgāḥ toyada svana niḥsvanāḥ
vicaranti viśāle smin toya pūrṇe samantataḥ
tasya śṛṅgam diva sparśam kāñcanam citra pādapam
sarvam āśu vicetavyam kapibhiḥ kāmarūpibhiḥ

original: 4.041.016a koṭiṃ tatra samudre tu kāñcanīṃ śatayojanam
analyzed: koṭim tatra samudre tu kāñcanīm śata yojanam
durdarśām pariyātrasya gatāḥ drakṣyatha vānarāḥ
koṭyaḥ tatra caturviṃśat gandharvāṇām tarasvinām
vasanti agni nikāśānām ghorāṇām kāmarūpiṇām
na atyāsādayitavyāḥ te vānaraiḥ bhīma vikramaiḥ

original: 4.041.018c nādeyaṃ ca phalaṃ tasmād deśāt kiṃ cit plavaṃgamaiḥ
analyzed: na ādeyam ca phalam tasmāt deśāt kim cit plavaṃgamaiḥ

original: 4.041.019a durāsadā hi te vīrāḥ sattvavanto mahābalāḥ
analyzed: durāsadāḥ hi te vīrāḥ sattvavantaḥ mahā balāḥ
phala mūlāni te tatra rakṣante bhīma vikramāḥ

original: 4.041.020a tatra yatnaś ca kartavyo mārgitavyā ca jānakī
analyzed: tatra yatnaḥ ca kartavyaḥ mārgitavyā ca jānakī

original: 4.041.020c na hi tebhyo bhayaṃ kiṃ cit kapitvam anuvartatām
analyzed: na hi tebhyaḥ bhayam kim cit kapi tvam anuvartatām
caturbhāge samudrasya cakravān nāma parvataḥ
tatra cakram sahasra aram nirmitam viśvakarmaṇā

original: 4.041.022a tatra pañcajanaṃ hatvā hayagrīvaṃ ca dānavam
analyzed: tatra pañcajanam hatvā hayagrīvam ca dānavam

original: 4.041.022c ājahāra tataś cakraṃ śaṅkhaṃ ca puruṣottamaḥ
analyzed: ājahāra tatas cakram śaṅkham ca puruṣottamaḥ

original: 4.041.023a tasya sānuṣu citreṣu viśālāsu guhāsu ca
analyzed: tasya sānuṣu citreṣu viśālāsu guhāsu ca

original: 4.041.023c rāvaṇaḥ saha vaidehyā mārgitavyas tatas tataḥ
analyzed: rāvaṇaḥ saha vaidehyā mārgitavyaḥ tatas tatas
yojanāni catuḥṣaṣṭiḥ varāhaḥ nāma parvataḥ
suvarṇa śṛṅgaḥ suśrīmān agādhe varuṇālaye
tatra prāgjyotiṣam nāma jātarūpa mayam puram

original: 4.041.025c yasmin vasti duṣṭātmā narako nāma guhāsu ca
analyzed: yasmin duṣṭa ātmā narakaḥ nāma guhāsu ca

original: 4.041.026a tasya sānuṣu citreṣu viśālāsu guhāsu ca
analyzed: tasya sānuṣu citreṣu viśālāsu guhāsu ca

original: 4.041.026c rāvaṇaḥ saha vaidehyā mārgitavyas tatas tataḥ
analyzed: rāvaṇaḥ saha vaidehyā mārgitavyaḥ tatas tatas
tam atikramya śaila indram kāñcana antara nirdaraḥ
parvataḥ sarva sauvarṇaḥ dhārā prasravaṇa āyutaḥ

original: 4.041.028a taṃ gajāś ca varāhāś ca siṃhā vyāghrāś ca sarvataḥ
analyzed: tam gajāḥ ca varāhāḥ ca siṃhāḥ vyāghrāḥ ca sarvatas
abhigarjanti satatam tena śabdena darpitāḥ
tasmin harihayaḥ śrīmān mahā indraḥ pākaśāsanaḥ

original: 4.041.029c abhiṣiktaḥ surai rājā meghavān nāma parvataḥ
analyzed: abhiṣiktaḥ suraiḥ rājā meghavān nāma parvataḥ
tam atikramya śaila indram mahā indra paripālitam
ṣaṣṭim giri sahasrāṇi kāñcanāni gamiṣyatha
taruṇa āditya varṇāni bhrājamānāni sarvatas
jātarūpa mayaiḥ vṛkṣaiḥ śobhitāni su puṣpitaiḥ

original: 4.041.032a teṣāṃ madhye sthito rājā merur uttamaparvataḥ
analyzed: teṣām madhye sthitaḥ rājā meruḥ uttama parvataḥ
ādityena prasannena śailaḥ datta varaḥ purā

original: 4.041.033a tenaivam uktaḥ śailendraḥ sarva eva tvadāśrayāḥ
analyzed: tena evam uktaḥ śailendraḥ sarvaḥ eva tvad āśrayāḥ
mad prasādāt bhaviṣyanti divārātrau ca kāñcanāḥ
tvayi ye ca api vatsyanti deva gandharva dānavāḥ

original: 4.041.034c te bhaviṣyanti raktāś ca prabhayā kāñcanaprabhāḥ
analyzed: te bhaviṣyanti raktāḥ ca prabhayā kāñcana prabhāḥ

original: 4.041.035a ādityā vasavo rudrā marutaś ca divaukasaḥ
analyzed: ādityāḥ vasavaḥ rudrāḥ marutaḥ ca divaukasaḥ
āgamya paścimām saṃdhyām merum uttama parvatam
ādityam upatiṣṭhanti taiḥ ca sūryaḥ abhipūjitaḥ
adṛśyaḥ sarva bhūtānām astam gacchati parvatam
yojanānām sahasrāṇi daśatāni divākaraḥ
muhūrta ardhena tam śīghram abhiyāti śiloccayam

original: 4.041.038a śṛṅge tasya mahad divyaṃ bhavanaṃ sūryasaṃnibham
analyzed: śṛṅge tasya mahat divyam bhavanam sūrya saṃnibham
prāsāda guṇa saṃbādham vihitam viśvakarmaṇā
śobhitam tarubhiḥ citraiḥ nānā pakṣi samākulaiḥ
niketam pāśa hastasya varuṇasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 4.041.040a antarā merum astaṃ ca tālo daśaśirā mahān
analyzed: antarā merum astam ca tālaḥ daśaśirāḥ mahān
jātarūpa mayaḥ śrīmān bhrājate citra vedikaḥ

original: 4.041.041a teṣu sarveṣu durgeṣu saraḥsu ca saritsu ca
analyzed: teṣu sarveṣu durgeṣu saraḥsu ca saritsu ca

original: 4.041.041c rāvaṇaḥ saha vaidehyā mārgitavyas tatas tataḥ
analyzed: rāvaṇaḥ saha vaidehyā mārgitavyaḥ tatas tatas

original: 4.041.042a yatra tiṣṭhati dharmātmā tapasā svena bhāvitaḥ
analyzed: yatra tiṣṭhati dharma ātmā tapasā svena bhāvitaḥ

original: 4.041.042c merusāvarṇir ity eva khyāto vai brahmaṇā samaḥ
analyzed: merusāvarṇiḥ iti eva khyātaḥ vai brahmaṇā samaḥ
praṣṭavyaḥ merusāvarṇiḥ mahā ṛṣiḥ sūrya saṃnibhaḥ

original: 4.041.043c praṇamya śirasā bhūmau pravṛttiṃ maithilīṃ prati
analyzed: praṇamya śirasā bhūmau pravṛttim maithilīm prati
etāvat jīva lokasya bhāskaraḥ rajanī kṣaye

original: 4.041.044c kṛtvā vitimiraṃ sarvam astaṃ gacchati parvatam
analyzed: kṛtvā vitimiram sarvam astam gacchati parvatam
etāvat vānaraiḥ śakyam gantum vānara puṃgavāḥ

original: 4.041.045c abhāskaram amaryādaṃ na jānīmas tataḥ param
analyzed: abhāskaram amaryādam na jānīmaḥ tatas param

original: 4.041.046a adhigamya tu vaidehīṃ nilayaṃ rāvaṇasya ca
analyzed: adhigamya tu vaidehīm nilayam rāvaṇasya ca

original: 4.041.046c astaṃ parvatam āsādya pūrṇe māse nivartata
analyzed: astam parvatam āsādya pūrṇe māse nivartata

original: 4.041.047a ūrdhvaṃ māsān na vastavyaṃ vasan vadhyo bhaven mama
analyzed: ūrdhvam māsāt na vastavyam vasan vadhyaḥ bhavet mama

original: 4.041.047c sahaiva śūro yuṣmābhiḥ śvaśuro me gamiṣyati
analyzed: saha eva śūraḥ yuṣmābhiḥ śvaśuraḥ me gamiṣyati

original: 4.041.048a śrotavyaṃ sarvam etasya bhavadbhir diṣṭa kāribhiḥ
analyzed: śrotavyam sarvam etasya bhavadbhiḥ diṣṭa kāribhiḥ

original: 4.041.048c gurur eṣa mahābāhuḥ śvaśuro me mahābalaḥ
analyzed: guruḥ eṣa mahā bāhuḥ śvaśuraḥ me mahā balaḥ
bhavantaḥ ca api vikrāntāḥ pramāṇam sarva karmasu

original: 4.041.049c pramāṇam enaṃ saṃsthāpya paśyadhvaṃ paścimāṃ diśam
analyzed: pramāṇam enam saṃsthāpya paśyadhvam paścimām diśam
dṛṣṭāyām tu patnyām amita tejasaḥ
kṛtakṛtyāḥ bhaviṣyāmaḥ kṛtasya pratikarmaṇā

original: 4.041.051a ato 'nyad api yat kiṃ cit kāryasyāsya hitaṃ bhavet
analyzed: atas nyat api yat kim cit kāryasya asya hitam bhavet
saṃpradhārya bhavadbhiḥ ca deśa kāla artha saṃhitam
tatas suṣeṇa pramukhāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
sugrīva vākyam nipuṇam niśamya
āmantrya sarve plavaga adhipam te
jagmuḥ diśam tām varuṇa abhiguptām

original: 4.042.001a tataḥ saṃdiśya sugrīvaḥ śvaśuraṃ paścimāṃ diśam
analyzed: tatas saṃdiśya sugrīvaḥ śvaśuram paścimām diśam
vīram śatabalim nāma vānaram vānara ṛṣabhaḥ
uvāca rājā mantra jñaḥ sarva vānara saṃmatam

original: 4.042.002c vākyam ātmahitaṃ caiva rāmasya ca hitaṃ tathā
analyzed: vākyam ātma hitam ca eva rāmasya ca hitam tathā
vṛtaḥ śata sahasreṇa tvadvidhānām vanaukasām
vaivasvata sutaiḥ sārdham pratiṣṭhasva sva mantribhiḥ
diśam hi udīcīm vikrāntām himaśaila avataṃsakām
sarvatas parimārgadhvam rāma patnīm aninditām

original: 4.042.005a asmin kārye vinivṛtte kṛte dāśaratheḥ priye
analyzed: asmin kārye vinivṛtte kṛte dāśaratheḥ priye
ṛṇāt muktāḥ bhaviṣyāmaḥ kṛtārtha artha vidām varāḥ

original: 4.042.006a kṛtaṃ hi priyam asmākaṃ rāghaveṇa mahātmanā
analyzed: kṛtam hi priyam asmākam rāghaveṇa mahātmanā

original: 4.042.006c tasya cet pratikāro 'sti saphalaṃ jīvitaṃ bhavet
analyzed: tasya ced saphalam jīvitam bhavet

original: 4.042.007a etāṃ buddhiṃ samāsthāya dṛśyate jānakī yathā
analyzed: etām buddhim samāsthāya dṛśyate jānakī yathā
tathā bhavadbhiḥ kartavyam asmad priya hita eṣibhiḥ

original: 4.042.008a ayaṃ hi sarvabhūtānāṃ mānyas tu narasattamaḥ
analyzed: ayam hi sarva bhūtānām mānyaḥ tu nara sattamaḥ
asmāsu ca āgata prītiḥ rāmaḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ
imāni vana durgāṇi nadyaḥ śaila antarāṇi ca
bhavantaḥ tu buddhi vikrama saṃpadā

original: 4.042.010a tatra mlecchān pulindāṃś ca śūrasenāṃs tathāiva ca
analyzed: tatra mlecchān pulindān ca śūrasenān tathā iva ca

original: 4.042.010c prasthālān bharatāṃś caiva kurūṃś ca saha madrakaiḥ
analyzed: prasthālān bharatān ca eva kurūn ca saha madrakaiḥ

original: 4.042.011a kāmbojān yavanāṃś caiva śakān āraṭṭakān api
analyzed: kāmbojān yavanān ca eva śakān āraṭṭakān api

original: 4.042.011c bāhlīkān ṛṣikāṃś caiva pauravān atha ṭaṅkaṇān
analyzed: vāhlīkān ṛṣikān ca eva pauravān atha ṭaṅkaṇān

original: 4.042.012a cīnān paramacīnāṃś ca nīhārāṃś ca punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: cīnān parama cīnān ca nīhārān ca punar punar
anviṣya daradān ca eva himavantam vicinu atha

original: 4.042.013c rāvaṇaḥ saha vaidehya mārgitavyas tatas tataḥ
analyzed: rāvaṇaḥ saha vaidehya mārgitavyaḥ tatas tatas
tatas somāśramam gatvā deva gandharva sevitam

original: 4.042.014c kālaṃ nāma mahāsānuṃ parvataṃ taṃ gamiṣyatha
analyzed: kālam nāma mahā sānum parvatam tam gamiṣyatha

original: 4.042.015a mahatsu tasya śṛṅgeṣu nirdareṣu guhāsu ca
analyzed: mahatsu tasya śṛṅgeṣu nirdareṣu guhāsu ca
vicinudhvam mahābhāgām rāma patnīm yaśasvinīm
tam atikramya śaila indram hema vargam mahā girim

original: 4.042.016c tataḥ sudarśanaṃ nāma parvataṃ gantum arhatha
analyzed: tatas sudarśanam nāma parvatam gantum arhatha
tasya kānana ṣaṇḍeṣu nirdareṣu guhāsu ca

original: 4.042.017c rāvaṇaḥ saha vaidehyā mārgitavyas tatas tataḥ
analyzed: rāvaṇaḥ saha vaidehyā mārgitavyaḥ tatas tatas
tam atikramya ca ākāśam sarvatas śata yojanam
aparvata nadī vṛkṣam sarva sattva vivarjitam

original: 4.042.019a taṃ tu śīghram atikramya kāntāraṃ romaharṣaṇam
analyzed: tam tu śīghram atikramya kāntāram roma harṣaṇam

original: 4.042.019c kailāsaṃ pāṇḍuraṃ śailaṃ prāpya hṛṣṭā bhaviṣyatha
analyzed: kailāsam pāṇḍuram śailam prāpya hṛṣṭāḥ bhaviṣyatha
tatra pāṇḍura megha ābham jāmbūnada pariṣkṛtam
kubera bhavanam divyam nirmitam viśvakarmaṇā
viśālā nalinī yatra prabhūta kamala utpalā
haṃsa kāraṇḍava ākīrṇā apsaraḥ gaṇa sevitā
tatra vaiśravaṇaḥ rājā sarva bhūta namaskṛtaḥ

original: 4.042.022c dhanado ramate śrīmān guhyakaiḥ saha yakṣarāṭ
analyzed: dhanadaḥ ramate śrīmān guhyakaiḥ saha yakṣa rāj
tasya candra nikaśeṣu parvateṣu guhāsu ca

original: 4.042.023c rāvaṇaḥ saha vaidehyā mārgitavyas tatas tataḥ
analyzed: rāvaṇaḥ saha vaidehyā mārgitavyaḥ tatas tatas

original: 4.042.024a krauñcaṃ tu girim āsādya bilaṃ tasya sudurgamam
analyzed: krauñcam tu girim āsādya bilam tasya su durgamam

original: 4.042.024c apramattaiḥ praveṣṭavyaṃ duṣpraveśaṃ hi tat smṛtam
analyzed: apramattaiḥ praveṣṭavyam duṣpraveśam hi tat smṛtam
vasanti hi mahātmānaḥ tatra sūrya sama prabhāḥ

original: 4.042.025c devair apy arcitāḥ samyag devarūpā maharṣayaḥ
analyzed: devaiḥ api arcitāḥ samyak deva rūpāḥ mahā ṛṣayaḥ

original: 4.042.026a krauñcasya tu guhāś cānyāḥ sānūni śikharāṇi ca
analyzed: krauñcasya tu guhāḥ ca anyāḥ sānūni śikharāṇi ca

original: 4.042.026c nirdarāś ca nitambāś ca vicetavyās tatas tataḥ
analyzed: nirdarāḥ ca nitambāḥ ca vicetavyāḥ tatas tatas

original: 4.042.027a krauñcasya śikharaṃ cāpi nirīkṣya ca tatas tataḥ
analyzed: krauñcasya śikharam ca api nirīkṣya ca tatas tatas
avṛkṣam kāmaśailam ca mānasam vihaga ālayam
na gatiḥ tatra bhūtānām deva dānava rakṣasām
sa ca sarvaiḥ vicetavyaḥ sasānu prastha bhūdharaḥ

original: 4.042.029a krauñcaṃ girim atikramya maināko nāma parvataḥ
analyzed: krauñcam girim atikramya mainākaḥ nāma parvataḥ

original: 4.042.029c mayasya bhavanaṃ tatra dānavasya svayaṃ kṛtam
analyzed: mayasya bhavanam tatra dānavasya svayam kṛtam
mainākaḥ tu vicetavyaḥ sasānu prastha kandaraḥ

original: 4.042.030c strīṇām aśvamukhīnāṃ ca niketās tatra tatra tu
analyzed: strīṇām aśvamukhīnām ca niketāḥ tatra tatra tu
tam deśam samatikramya āśramam siddha sevitam

original: 4.042.031c siddhā vaikhānasās tatra vālakhilyāś ca tāpasāḥ
analyzed: siddhāḥ vaikhānasāḥ tatra vālakhilyāḥ ca tāpasāḥ

original: 4.042.032a vandyās te tu tapaḥsiddhās tāpasā vītakalmaṣāḥ
analyzed: vandyāḥ te tu tapaḥ siddhāḥ tāpasāḥ vīta kalmaṣāḥ
praṣṭavyāḥ ca api sītāyāḥ pravṛttam vinaya anvitaiḥ
hema puṣkara saṃchannam tatra vaikhānasam saraḥ
taruṇa āditya saṃkāśaiḥ haṃsaiḥ vicaritam śubhaiḥ
aupavāhyaḥ kuberasya sarvabhaumaḥ iti smṛtaḥ

original: 4.042.034c gajaḥ paryeti taṃ deśaṃ sadā saha kareṇubhiḥ
analyzed: gajaḥ paryeti tam deśam sadā saha kareṇubhiḥ
tat sāraḥ samatikramya naṣṭa candra divākaram
a nakṣatra gaṇam vyoma niṣpayodam an āadimat

original: 4.042.036a gabhastibhir ivārkasya sa tu deśaḥ prakāśate
analyzed: gabhastibhiḥ iva arkasya sa tu deśaḥ prakāśate
viśrāmyadbhiḥ tapaḥ siddhaiḥ deva kalpaiḥ svayamprabhaiḥ

original: 4.042.037a taṃ tu deśam atikramya śailodā nāma nimnagā
analyzed: tam tu deśam atikramya śailodā nāma nimnagā

original: 4.042.037c ubhayos tīrayor yasyāḥ kīcakā nāma veṇavaḥ
analyzed: ubhayoḥ tīrayoḥ yasyāḥ kīcakāḥ nāma veṇavaḥ

original: 4.042.038a te nayanti paraṃ tīraṃ siddhān pratyānayanti ca
analyzed: te nayanti param tīram siddhān pratyānayanti ca
uttarāḥ kuravaḥ tatra kṛta puṇya pratiśriyāḥ
tatas kāñcana padmābhiḥ padminībhiḥ kṛta udakāḥ
nīla vaidūrya patra āḍhyāḥ nadyaḥ tatra sahasraśas
rakta utpala vanaiḥ ca atra maṇḍitāḥ ca hiraṇmayaiḥ
taruṇa āditya sadṛśaiḥ bhānti tatra jalāśayāḥ
mahārha maṇi patraiḥ ca kāñcana prabha kesaraiḥ
nīlotpala vanaiḥ citraiḥ sa deśaḥ sarvatas vṛtaḥ

original: 4.042.042a nistulābhiś ca muktābhir maṇibhiś ca mahādhanaiḥ
analyzed: nistulābhiḥ ca muktābhiḥ maṇibhiḥ ca mahādhanaiḥ
udbhūta pulināḥ tatra jātarūpaiḥ ca nimnagāḥ
sarva ratna mayaiḥ citraiḥ avagāḍhāḥ naga uttamaiḥ
jātarūpa mayaiḥ ca api hutāśana sama prabhaiḥ
nitya puṣpa phalāḥ ca atra nagāḥ patraratha ākulāḥ
divya gandha rasa sparśāḥ sarva kāmān sravanti ca
nānā ākārāṇi vāsāṃsi phalanti anye naga uttamāḥ
muktā vaidūrya citrāṇi bhūṣaṇāni tathā eva ca

original: 4.042.046a strīṇāṃ yāny anurūpāṇi puruṣāṇāṃ tathaiva ca
analyzed: strīṇām yāni anurūpāṇi puruṣāṇām tathā eva ca
sarva ṛtu sukha sevyāni phalanti anye naga uttamāḥ
mahārhāṇi vicitrāṇi haimāni anye naga uttamāḥ
śayanāni prasūyante citra āstāraṇavanti ca
manaḥ kāntāni mālyāni phalanti atra apare drumāḥ

original: 4.042.048c pānāni ca mahārhāṇi bhakṣyāṇi vividhāni ca
analyzed: pānāni ca mahārhāṇi bhakṣyāṇi vividhāni ca
striyaḥ ca guṇa saṃpannāḥ rūpa yauvana lakṣitāḥ

original: 4.042.049c gandharvāḥ kiṃnarā siddhā nāgā vidyādharās tathā
analyzed: gandharvāḥ siddhāḥ nāgāḥ vidyādharāḥ tathā
ramante sahitāḥ tatra nārībhiḥ bhāskara prabhāḥ
sarve su kṛta karmāṇaḥ sarve rati parāyaṇāḥ
sarve kāma artha sahitāḥ vasanti saha yoṣitaḥ
śrūyate satatam tatra sarva bhūta manoharaḥ

original: 4.042.052a tatra nāmuditaḥ kaś cin nāsti kaś cid asatpriyaḥ
analyzed: tatra na amuditaḥ kaḥ cit na asti kaḥ cit asat priyaḥ

original: 4.042.052c ahany ahani vardhante guṇās tatra manoramāḥ
analyzed: ahani ahani vardhante guṇāḥ tatra manoramāḥ

original: 4.042.053a samatikramya taṃ deśam uttaras toyasāṃ nidhiḥ
analyzed: samatikramya tam deśam uttaraḥ toyasām nidhiḥ

original: 4.042.053c tatra somagirir nāma madhye hemamayo mahān
analyzed: tatra somagiriḥ nāma madhye hema mayaḥ mahān

original: 4.042.054a indralokagatā ye ca brahmalokagatāś ca ye
analyzed: indra loka gatāḥ ye ca brahma loka gatāḥ ca ye

original: 4.042.054c devās taṃ samavekṣante girirājaṃ divaṃ gatam
analyzed: devāḥ tam samavekṣante giri rājam divam gatam

original: 4.042.055a sa tu deśo visūryo 'pi tasya bhāsā prakāśate
analyzed: sa tu deśaḥ visūryaḥ pi tasya bhāsā prakāśate
sūrya lakṣmyā abhivijñeyaḥ tapasā iva vivasvatā
bhagavān api viśvātmā śambhuḥ ekādaśa ātmakaḥ
brahmā vasati deveśaḥ brahmarṣi parivāritaḥ

original: 4.042.057a na kathaṃ cana gantavyaṃ kurūṇām uttareṇa vaḥ
analyzed: na katham cana gantavyam kurūṇām uttareṇa vaḥ
