original: 4.042.057c anyeṣām api bhūtānāṃ nātikrāmati vai gatiḥ
analyzed: anyeṣām api bhūtānām na atikrāmati vai gatiḥ

original: 4.042.058a sā hi somagirir nāma devānām api durgamaḥ
analyzed: sā hi somagiriḥ nāma devānām api durgamaḥ

original: 4.042.058c tam ālokya tataḥ kṣipram upāvartitum arhatha
analyzed: tam ālokya tatas kṣipram upāvartitum arhatha
etāvat vānaraiḥ śakyam gantum vānara puṃgavāḥ

original: 4.042.059c abhāskaram amaryādaṃ na jānīmas tataḥ param
analyzed: abhāskaram amaryādam na jānīmaḥ tatas param

original: 4.042.060a sarvam etad vicetavyaṃ yan mayā parikīrtitam
analyzed: sarvam etat vicetavyam yat mayā parikīrtitam

original: 4.042.060c yad anyad api noktaṃ ca tatrāpi kriyatāṃ matiḥ
analyzed: yat anyat api na uktam ca tatra api kriyatām matiḥ
tatas kṛtam dāśaratheḥ mahat priyam
mahattaram ca api tatas mama priyam
kṛtam bhaviṣyati anila anala upamā
videha jāḥ darśana jena karmaṇā
tatas kṛtārthāḥ sahitāḥ sa bāndhavā
mayā arcitāḥ sarva guṇaiḥ manoramaiḥ
cariṣyatha urvīm pratiśānta śatravaḥ
sahapriyāḥ bhūta dharāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
viśeṣeṇa tu sugrīvaḥ hanumanti artham uktavān
sa hi tasmin hari śreṣṭhe niścita arthaḥ rtha sādhane

original: 4.043.002a na bhūmau nāntarikṣe vā nāmbare nāmarālaye
analyzed: na bhūmau na antarikṣe vā na ambare na amara ālaye

original: 4.043.002c nāpsu vā gatisaṃgaṃ te paśyāmi haripuṃgava
analyzed: na apsu vā gati saṃgam te paśyāmi hari puṃgava
sa asurāḥ saha gandharvāḥ sa nāga nara devatāḥ
viditāḥ sarva lokāḥ te sa sāgara dharādharāḥ

original: 4.043.004a gatir vegaś ca tejaś ca lāghavaṃ ca mahākape
analyzed: gatiḥ vegaḥ ca tejaḥ ca lāghavam ca mahā kape

original: 4.043.004c pitus te sadṛśaṃ vīra mārutasya mahaujasaḥ
analyzed: pituḥ te sadṛśam vīra mārutasya mahā ojasaḥ

original: 4.043.005a tejasā vāpi te bhūtaṃ samaṃ bhuvi na vidyate
analyzed: tejasā vā api te bhūtam samam bhuvi na vidyate

original: 4.043.005c tad yathā labhyate sītā tattvam evopapādaya
analyzed: tat yathā labhyate sītā tattvam eva upapādaya

original: 4.043.006a tvayy eva hanumann asti balaṃ buddhiḥ parākramaḥ
analyzed: tvayi eva hanuman asti balam buddhiḥ parākramaḥ
deśa kāla anuvṛttaḥ ca nayaḥ ca naya paṇḍita
tatas kārya samāsaṃgam avagamya hanumati

original: 4.043.007c viditvā hanumantaṃ ca cintayām āsa rāghavaḥ
analyzed: viditvā hanumantam ca cintayām āsa rāghavaḥ
sarvathā niścita arthaḥ yam hanūmati hari īśvaraḥ
niścitārthataraḥ ca api hanūmān kārya sādhane
tat evam prasthitasya asya parijñātasya karmabhiḥ
bhartrā parigṛhītasya dhruvaḥ kārya phala udayaḥ
tam samīkṣya mahā tejāḥ vyavasāya uttaram harim
kṛtārthaḥ iva saṃvṛttaḥ prahṛṣṭa indriya mānasaḥ
dadau tasya tatas prītaḥ sva nāma aṅka upaśobhitam
aṅgulīyam abhijñānam rāja putryāḥ paraṃtapaḥ
anena tvām hari śreṣṭha cihnena janakātmajā
mad sakāśāt anuprāptam an udvignā anupaśyati

original: 4.043.013a vyavasāyaś ca te vīra sattvayuktaś ca vikramaḥ
analyzed: vyavasāyaḥ ca te vīra sattva yuktaḥ ca vikramaḥ

original: 4.043.013c sugrīvasya ca saṃdeśaḥ siddhiṃ kathayatīva me
analyzed: sugrīvasya ca saṃdeśaḥ siddhim kathayati iva me

original: 4.043.014a sa tad gṛhya hariśreṣṭhaḥ sthāpya mūrdhni kṛtāñjaliḥ
analyzed: sa tat gṛhya hari śreṣṭhaḥ sthāpya mūrdhni kṛtāñjaliḥ
vanditvā caraṇau ca eva prasthitaḥ plavaga uttamaḥ

original: 4.043.015a sa tat prakarṣan hariṇāṃ balaṃ mahad;
analyzed: sa tat prakarṣan hariṇām balam mahat
babhūva vīraḥ pavana ātmajaḥ kapi
śaśī iva nakṣatra gaṇa upaśobhitaḥ
ati bala balam āśritaḥ tava aham
hari vara vikrama vikramaiḥ analpaiḥ
pavanasuta yathā abhigamyate sā
janakasutāḥ hanuman tathā kuruṣva
tat ugra śāsanam bhartuḥ vijñāya hari puṃgavāḥ
śalabhāḥ iva saṃchādya medinīm saṃpratasthire
rāmaḥ prasravaṇe tasmin nyavasat sahalakṣmaṇaḥ

original: 4.044.002c pratīkṣamāṇas taṃ māsaṃ yaḥ sītādhigame kṛtaḥ
analyzed: pratīkṣamāṇaḥ tam māsam yaḥ sītā adhigame kṛtaḥ
uttarām tu diśam ramyām giri rāja samāvṛtām

original: 4.044.003c pratasthe sahasā vīro hariḥ śatabalis tadā
analyzed: pratasthe sahasā vīraḥ hariḥ śatabaliḥ tadā

original: 4.044.004a pūrvāṃ diśaṃ prati yayau vinato hariyūthapaḥ
analyzed: pūrvām diśam prati yayau vinataḥ hari yūthapaḥ
tārā aṅgada ādi sahitaḥ plavagaḥ pavanātmajaḥ
agastya caritām āśām dakṣiṇām hari yūthapaḥ

original: 4.044.006a paścimāṃ tu diśaṃ ghorāṃ suṣeṇaḥ plavageśvaraḥ
analyzed: paścimām tu diśam ghorām suṣeṇaḥ plavaga īśvaraḥ
pratasthe hari śārdūlaḥ bhṛśam varuṇa pālitām

original: 4.044.007a tataḥ sarvā diśo rājā codayitvā yathā tatham
analyzed: tatas sarvāḥ diśaḥ rājā codayitvā yathā tatham

original: 4.044.007c kapisenā patīn mukhyān mumoda sukhitaḥ sukham
analyzed: kapisenā patīn mukhyān mumoda sukhitaḥ sukham
evam saṃcoditāḥ sarve rājñā vānara yūthapāḥ

original: 4.044.008c svāṃ svāṃ diśam abhipretya tvaritāḥ saṃpratasthire
analyzed: svām svām diśam abhipretya tvaritāḥ saṃpratasthire

original: 4.044.009a nadantaś connadantaś ca garjantaś ca plavaṃgamāḥ
analyzed: nadantaḥ ca unnadantaḥ ca garjantaḥ ca plavaṃgamāḥ
kṣvelantaḥ dhāvamānāḥ ca yayuḥ plavaga sattamāḥ
ānayiṣyāmahe sītām haniṣyāmaḥ ca rāvaṇam

original: 4.044.010a aham eko haniṣyāmi prāptaṃ rāvaṇam āhave
analyzed: aham ekaḥ haniṣyāmi prāptam rāvaṇam āhave
tatas ca unmathya sahasā hariṣye janakātmajām
vepamānam śrameṇa adya bhavadbhiḥ sthīyatām iti
ekaḥ evā āhariṣyāmi pātālāt api jānakīm

original: 4.044.012a vidhamiṣyāmy ahaṃ vṛkṣān dārayiṣyāmy ahaṃ girīn
analyzed: vidhamiṣyāmi aham vṛkṣān dārayiṣyāmi aham girīn
dharaṇīm dārayiṣyāmi kṣobhayiṣyāmi sāgarān
aham yojana saṃkhyāyāḥ plavitā na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: 4.044.013c śataṃ yojanasaṃkhyāyāḥ śataṃ samadhikaṃ hy aham
analyzed: śatam yojana saṃkhyāyāḥ śatam samadhikam hi aham

original: 4.044.014a bhūtale sāgare vāpi śaileṣu ca vaneṣu ca
analyzed: bhū tale sāgare vā api śaileṣu ca vaneṣu ca

original: 4.044.014c pātālasyāpi vā madhye na mamācchidyate gatiḥ
analyzed: pātālasya api vā madhye na mama ācchidyate gatiḥ

original: 4.044.015a ity ekaikaṃ tadā tatra vānarā baladarpitāḥ
analyzed: iti ekaikam tadā tatra vānarāḥ bala darpitāḥ

original: 4.044.015c ūcuś ca vacanaṃ tasmin harirājasya saṃnidhau
analyzed: ūcuḥ ca vacanam tasmin hari rājasya saṃnidhau
gateṣu vānara indreṣu rāmaḥ sugrīvam abravīt

original: 4.045.001c kathaṃ bhavān vinājīte sarvaṃ vai maṇḍalaṃ bhuvaḥ
analyzed: katham bhavān vinā ājīte sarvam vai maṇḍalam bhuvaḥ

original: 4.045.002a sugrīvas tu tato rāmam uvāca praṇatātmavān
analyzed: sugrīvaḥ tu tatas rāmam uvāca praṇata ātmavān
śrūyatām sarvam ākhyāsye vistareṇa nara ṛṣabha

original: 4.045.003a yadā tu dundubhiṃ nāma dānavaṃ mahiṣākṛtim
analyzed: yadā tu dundubhim nāma dānavam mahiṣa ākṛtim
parikālayate vālī malayam prati parvatam

original: 4.045.004a tadā viveśa mahiṣo malayasya guhāṃ prati
analyzed: tadā viveśa mahiṣaḥ malayasya guhām prati
viveśa vālī tatra api malayam tad jighāṃsayā
tatas ham tatra nikṣiptaḥ guhāt vāri vinīta vat

original: 4.045.005c na ca niṣkramate vālī tadā saṃvatsare gate
analyzed: na ca niṣkramate vālī tadā saṃvatsare gate
tatas kṣataja vegena āpupūre tadā bilam
tat aham vismitaḥ dṛṣṭvā bhrātṛ śoka viṣa arditaḥ

original: 4.045.007a athāhaṃ kṛtabuddhis tu suvyaktaṃ nihato guruḥ
analyzed: atha aham kṛtabuddhiḥ tu su vyaktam nihataḥ guruḥ
śilā parvata saṃkāśā bila dvāri mayā kṛtā
a śaknuvan niṣkramitum mahiṣaḥ vinaśet iti

original: 4.045.008a tato 'ham āgāṃ kiṣkindhāṃ nirāśas tasya jīvite
analyzed: tatas ham āgām kiṣkindhām nirāśaḥ tasya jīvite

original: 4.045.008c rājyaṃ ca sumahat prāptaṃ tārā ca rumayā saha
analyzed: rājyam ca su mahat prāptam tārā ca rumayā saha

original: 4.045.008e mitraiś ca sahitas tatra vasāmi vigatajvaraḥ
analyzed: mitraiḥ ca sahitaḥ tatra vasāmi vigata jvaraḥ

original: 4.045.009a ājagāma tato vālī hatvāṃ taṃ dānavarṣabham
analyzed: ājagāma tatas vālī hatvā tam dānava ṛṣabham
tatas ham adadām rājyam gauravāt bhaya yantritaḥ

original: 4.045.010a sa māṃ jighāṃsur duṣṭātmā vālī pravyathitendriyaḥ
analyzed: sa mām jighāṃsuḥ duṣṭa ātmā vālī pravyathita indriyaḥ
parilākayate krodhāt dhāvantam sacivaiḥ saha
tatas ham vālinā tena sānubandhaḥ pradhāvitaḥ

original: 4.045.011c nadīś ca vividhāḥ paśyan vanāni nagarāṇi ca
analyzed: nadīḥ ca vividhāḥ paśyan vanāni nagarāṇi ca
ādarśa tala saṃkāśā tatas vai pṛthivī mayā
alāta cakra pratimā dṛṣṭā goṣpada vat tadā

original: 4.045.013a tataḥ pūrvam ahaṃ gatvā dakṣiṇām aham āśritaḥ
analyzed: tatas pūrvam aham gatvā dakṣiṇām aham āśritaḥ

original: 4.045.013c diśaṃ ca paścimāṃ bhūyo gato 'smi bhayaśaṅkitaḥ
analyzed: diśam ca paścimām bhūyas gataḥ smi bhaya śaṅkitaḥ

original: 4.045.013e uttarāṃ tu diśaṃ yāntaṃ hanumān mām athābravīt
analyzed: uttarām tu diśam yāntam hanumān mām atha abravīt

original: 4.045.014a idānīṃ me smṛtaṃ rājan yathā vālī harīśvaraḥ
analyzed: idānīm me smṛtam rājan yathā vālī hari īśvaraḥ

original: 4.045.014c mataṅgena tadā śapto hy asminn āśramamaṇḍale
analyzed: mataṅgena tadā śaptaḥ hi asmin āśrama maṇḍale

original: 4.045.015a praviśed yadi vā vālī mūrdhāsya śatadhā bhavet
analyzed: praviśet yadi vā vālī mūrdhā asya śatadhā bhavet
tatra vāsaḥ sukhaḥ smākam nirudvignaḥ bhaviṣyati
tatas parvatam āsādya ṛśyamūkam nṛpa ātmaja

original: 4.045.016c na viveśa tadā vālī mataṅgasya bhayāt tadā
analyzed: na viveśa tadā vālī mataṅgasya bhayāt tadā

original: 4.045.017a evaṃ mayā tadā rājan pratyakṣam upalakṣitam
analyzed: evam mayā tadā rājan pratyakṣam upalakṣitam

original: 4.045.017c pṛthivīmaṇḍalaṃ kṛtsnaṃ guhām asmy āgatas tataḥ
analyzed: pṛthivī maṇḍalam kṛtsnam guhām asmi āgataḥ tatas
darśana artham tu vaidehyāḥ sarvatas kapi yūthapāḥ
vyādiṣṭāḥ kapi rājena yathoktam jagmuḥ añjasā

original: 4.046.002a sarāṃsi saritaḥ kakṣān ākāśaṃ nagarāṇi ca
analyzed: sarāṃsi saritaḥ kakṣān ākāśam nagarāṇi ca
nadī durgān tathā śailān vicinvanti samantataḥ
sugrīveṇa samākhyātān sarve vānara yūthapāḥ
pradeśān pravicinvanti sa śaila vana kānanān
vicintya divasam sarve sītā adhigamane dhṛtāḥ
samāyānti sma medinyām vānarāḥ

original: 4.046.005a sarvartukāṃś ca deśeṣu vānarāḥ saphalān drumān
analyzed: sarvartukān ca deśeṣu vānarāḥ sa phalān drumān

original: 4.046.005c āsādya rajanīṃ śayyāṃ cakruḥ sarveṣv ahaḥsu te
analyzed: āsādya rajanīm śayyām cakruḥ sarveṣu ahaḥsu te

original: 4.046.006a tad ahaḥ prathamaṃ kṛtvā māse prasravaṇaṃ gatāḥ
analyzed: tat ahar prathamam kṛtvā māse prasravaṇam gatāḥ
kapi rājena saṃgamya nirāśāḥ kapi yūthapāḥ

original: 4.046.007a vicitya tu diśaṃ pūrvāṃ yathoktāṃ sacivaiḥ saha
analyzed: vicitya tu diśam pūrvām yathā uktām sacivaiḥ saha
a dṛṣṭvā vinataḥ sītām ājagāma mahā balaḥ

original: 4.046.008a uttarāṃ tu diśaṃ sarvāṃ vicitya sa mahākapiḥ
analyzed: uttarām tu diśam sarvām vicitya sa mahā kapiḥ

original: 4.046.008c āgataḥ saha sainyena vīraḥ śatabalis tadā
analyzed: āgataḥ saha sainyena vīraḥ śatabaliḥ tadā

original: 4.046.009a suṣeṇaḥ paścimām āśāṃ vicitya saha vānaraiḥ
analyzed: suṣeṇaḥ paścimām āśām vicitya saha vānaraiḥ
sametya māse saṃpūrṇe sugrīvam upacakrame
tam prasravaṇa pṛṣṭha stham samāsādya abhivādya ca

original: 4.046.010c āsīnaṃ saha rāmeṇa sugrīvam idam abruvan
analyzed: āsīnam saha rāmeṇa sugrīvam idam abruvan

original: 4.046.011a vicitāḥ parvatāḥ sarve vanāni nagarāṇi ca
analyzed: vicitāḥ parvatāḥ sarve vanāni nagarāṇi ca

original: 4.046.011c nimnagāḥ sāgarāntāś ca sarve janapadās tathā
analyzed: nimnagāḥ sāgara antāḥ ca sarve janapadāḥ tathā

original: 4.046.012a guhāś ca vicitāḥ sarvā yās tvayā parikīrtitāḥ
analyzed: guhāḥ ca vicitāḥ sarvāḥ yāḥ tvayā parikīrtitāḥ
vicitāḥ ca mahā gulmāḥ latā vitata saṃtatāḥ

original: 4.046.013a gahaneṣu ca deśeṣu durgeṣu viṣameṣu ca
analyzed: gahaneṣu ca deśeṣu durgeṣu viṣameṣu ca
sattvāni atipramāṇāni vicitāni hatāni ca

original: 4.046.013e ye caiva gahanā deśā vicitās te punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: ye ca eva gahanāḥ deśāḥ vicitāḥ te punar punar
udāra sattva abhijanaḥ mahātmā
sa maithilīm drakṣyati vānara indraḥ

original: 4.046.014c diśaṃ tu yām eva gatā tu sītā;
analyzed: diśam tu yām eva gatā tu sītā
tām āsthitaḥ vāyu sutaḥ hanūmān

original: 4.047.001a sahatārāṅgadābhyāṃ tu gatvā sa hanumān kapiḥ
analyzed: saha tārā aṅgadābhyām tu gatvā sa hanumān kapiḥ
sugrīveṇa yathā uddiṣṭam tam deśam upacakrame

original: 4.047.002a sa tu dūram upāgamya sarvais taiḥ kapisattamaiḥ
analyzed: sa tu dūram upāgamya sarvaiḥ taiḥ kapi sattamaiḥ

original: 4.047.002c vicinoti sma vindhyasya guhāś ca gahanāni ca
analyzed: vicinoti sma vindhyasya guhāḥ ca gahanāni ca
parvata agrān nadī durgān sarāṃsi vipulān drumān
vṛkṣa ṣaṇḍān ca vividhān parvatān ghana pādapān

original: 4.047.004a anveṣamāṇās te sarve vānarāḥ sarvato diśam
analyzed: anveṣamāṇāḥ te sarve vānarāḥ sarvatas diśam

original: 4.047.004c na sītāṃ dadṛśur vīrā maithilīṃ janakātmajām
analyzed: na sītām dadṛśuḥ vīrāḥ maithilīm janakātmajām

original: 4.047.005a te bhakṣayanto mūlāni phalāni vividhāni ca
analyzed: te bhakṣayantaḥ mūlāni phalāni vividhāni ca

original: 4.047.005c anveṣamāṇā durdharṣā nyavasaṃs tatra tatra ha
analyzed: anveṣamāṇāḥ durdharṣāḥ nyavasan tatra tatra ha

original: 4.047.005e sa tu deśo duranveṣo guhāgahanavān mahān
analyzed: sa tu deśaḥ duranveṣaḥ guhā gahanavān mahān

original: 4.047.006a tyaktvā tu taṃ tadā deśaṃ sarve vai hariyūthapāḥ
analyzed: tyaktvā tu tam tadā deśam sarve vai hari yūthapāḥ
deśam anyam durādharṣam viviśuḥ ca akutobhayāḥ
yatra vandhya phalāḥ vṛkṣāḥ vipuṣpāḥ parṇa varjitāḥ

original: 4.047.007c nistoyāḥ sarito yatra mūlaṃ yatra sudurlabham
analyzed: nistoyāḥ saritaḥ yatra mūlam yatra su durlabham

original: 4.047.008a na santi mahiṣā yatra na mṛgā na ca hastinaḥ
analyzed: na santi mahiṣāḥ yatra na mṛgāḥ na ca hastinaḥ

original: 4.047.008c śārdūlāḥ pakṣiṇo vāpi ye cānye vanagocarāḥ
analyzed: śārdūlāḥ pakṣiṇaḥ vā api ye ca anye vana gocarāḥ
snigdha patrāḥ sthale yatra padminyaḥ phulla paṅkajāḥ

original: 4.047.009c prekṣaṇīyāḥ sugandhāś ca bhramaraiś cāpi varjitāḥ
analyzed: prekṣaṇīyāḥ sugandhāḥ ca bhramaraiḥ ca api varjitāḥ
kaṇḍuḥ nāma mahābhāgaḥ satya vādī tapodhanaḥ

original: 4.047.011a tasya tasmin vane putro bālako daśavārṣikaḥ
analyzed: tasya tasmin vane putraḥ bālakaḥ daśa vārṣikaḥ
pranaṣṭaḥ jīvita antāya kruddhaḥ tatra mahā muniḥ

original: 4.047.012a tena dharmātmanā śaptaṃ kṛtsnaṃ tatra mahad vanam
analyzed: tena dharma ātmanā śaptam kṛtsnam tatra mahat vanam
aśaraṇyam durādharṣam mṛga pakṣi vivarjitam

original: 4.047.013a tasya te kānanāntāṃs tu girīṇāṃ kandarāṇi ca
analyzed: tasya te kānana antān tu girīṇām kandarāṇi ca
prabhavāni nadīnām ca vicinvanti samāhitāḥ
tatra ca api mahātmānaḥ na apaśyam janakātmajām
hartāram rāvaṇam vā api sugrīva priya kāriṇaḥ

original: 4.047.015a te praviśya tu taṃ bhīmaṃ latāgulmasamāvṛtam
analyzed: te praviśya tu tam bhīmam latā gulma samāvṛtam
dadṛśuḥ krūra karmāṇam asuram sura nirbhayam

original: 4.047.016a taṃ dṛṣṭvā vanarā ghoraṃ sthitaṃ śailam ivāparam
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā vanarāḥ ghoram sthitam śailam iva aparam

original: 4.047.016c gāḍhaṃ parihitāḥ sarve dṛṣṭvā taṃ parvatopamam
analyzed: gāḍham parihitāḥ sarve dṛṣṭvā tam parvata upamam

original: 4.047.017a so 'pi tān vānarān sarvān naṣṭāḥ sthety abravīd balī
analyzed: saḥ u pi tān vānarān sarvān naṣṭāḥ stha iti abravīt balī
abhyadhāvata saṃkruddhaḥ muṣṭim udyamya saṃhitam
tam āpatantam sahasā vāli putraḥ ṅgadaḥ tadā
rāvaṇaḥ yam iti jñātvā talena abhijaghāna ha
sa vāli putra abhihataḥ vaktrāt śoṇitam udvaman

original: 4.047.020a asuro nyapatad bhūmau paryasta iva parvataḥ
analyzed: asuraḥ nyapatat bhūmau paryastaḥ iva parvataḥ

original: 4.047.020c te tu tasmin nirucchvāse vānarā jitakāśinaḥ
analyzed: te tu tasmin nirucchvāse vānarāḥ jita kāśinaḥ

original: 4.047.020e vyacinvan prāyaśas tatra sarvaṃ tad girigahvaram
analyzed: vyacinvan prāyaśas tatra sarvam tat giri gahvaram

original: 4.047.021a vicitaṃ tu tataḥ kṛtvā sarve te kānanaṃ punaḥ
analyzed: vicitam tu tatas kṛtvā sarve te kānanam punar
anyat eva aparam ghoram viviśuḥ giri gahvaram

original: 4.047.022a te vicintya punaḥ khinnā viniṣpatya samāgatāḥ
analyzed: te vicintya punar khinnāḥ viniṣpatya samāgatāḥ
ekānte vṛkṣa mūle tu niṣeduḥ dīna mānasāḥ

original: 4.048.001a athāṅgadas tadā sarvān vānarān idam abravīt
analyzed: atha aṅgadaḥ tadā sarvān vānarān idam abravīt
pariśrāntaḥ mahā prājñaḥ samāśvāsya śanais vacaḥ

original: 4.048.002a vanāni girayo nadyo durgāṇi gahanāni ca
analyzed: vanāni girayaḥ nadyaḥ durgāṇi gahanāni ca

original: 4.048.002c daryo giriguhāś caiva vicitā naḥ samantataḥ
analyzed: daryaḥ giri guhāḥ ca eva vicitāḥ naḥ samantataḥ

original: 4.048.003a tatra tatra sahāsmābhir jānakī na ca dṛśyate
analyzed: tatra tatra saha asmābhiḥ jānakī na ca dṛśyate

original: 4.048.003c tad vā rakṣo hṛtā yena sītā surasutopamā
analyzed: tat vā rakṣaḥ hṛtā yena sītā sura sutā upamā

original: 4.048.004a kālaś ca no mahān yātaḥ sugrīvaś cograśāsanaḥ
analyzed: kālaḥ ca naḥ mahān yātaḥ sugrīvaḥ ca ugra śāsanaḥ
tasmāt bhavantaḥ sahitāḥ vicinvantu samantataḥ

original: 4.048.005a vihāya tandrīṃ śokaṃ ca nidrāṃ caiva samutthitām
analyzed: vihāya tandrīm śokam ca nidrām ca eva samutthitām
vicinudhvam yathā sītām paśyāmaḥ janakātmajām

original: 4.048.006a anirvedaṃ ca dākṣyaṃ ca manasaś cāparājayam
analyzed: anirvedam ca dākṣyam ca manasaḥ ca aparājayam

original: 4.048.006c kāryasiddhikarāṇy āhus tasmād etad bravīmy aham
analyzed: kārya siddhi karāṇi āhuḥ tasmāt etat bravīmi aham
adyā api idam vanam durgam vicinvantu vanaukasaḥ

original: 4.048.007c khedaṃ tyaktvā punaḥ sarvaṃ vanam etad vicīyatām
analyzed: khedam tyaktvā punar sarvam vanam etat vicīyatām
avaśyam kriyamāṇasya dṛśyate karmaṇaḥ phalam

original: 4.048.008c alaṃ nirvedam āgamya na hi no malinaṃ kṣamam
analyzed: alam nirvedam āgamya na hi naḥ malinam kṣamam

original: 4.048.009a sugrīvaḥ krodhano rājā tīkṣṇadaṇḍaś ca vānarāḥ
analyzed: sugrīvaḥ krodhanaḥ rājā tīkṣṇa daṇḍaḥ ca vānarāḥ

original: 4.048.009c bhetavyaṃ tasya satataṃ rāmasya ca mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: bhetavyam tasya satatam rāmasya ca mahātmanaḥ

original: 4.048.010a hitārtham etad uktaṃ vaḥ kriyatāṃ yadi rocate
analyzed: hita artham etat uktam vaḥ kriyatām yadi rocate

original: 4.048.010c ucyatāṃ vā kṣamaṃ yan naḥ sarveṣām eva vānarāḥ
analyzed: ucyatām vā kṣamam yat naḥ sarveṣām eva vānarāḥ
aṅgadasya vacaḥ śrutvā vacanam gandhamādanaḥ
uvāca avyaktayā vācā pipāsā śrama khinnayā

original: 4.048.012a sadṛśaṃ khalu vo vākyam aṅgado yad uvāca ha
analyzed: sadṛśam khalu vaḥ vākyam aṅgadaḥ yat uvāca ha

original: 4.048.012c hitaṃ caivānukūlaṃ ca kriyatām asya bhāṣitam
analyzed: hitam ca eva anukūlam ca kriyatām asya bhāṣitam

original: 4.048.013a punar mārgāmahe śailān kandarāṃś ca darīs tathā
analyzed: punar mārgāmahe śailān kandarān ca darīḥ tathā
kānanāni ca śūnyāni giri prasravaṇāni ca
yathoddiṣṭhāni sarvāṇi sugrīveṇa mahātmanā
vicinvantu vanam sarve giri durgāṇi sarvaśas

original: 4.048.015a tataḥ samutthāya punar vānarās te mahābalāḥ
analyzed: tatas samutthāya punar vānarāḥ te mahā balāḥ
vindhya kānana saṃkīrṇām viceruḥ dakṣiṇām diśam
te śārada abhra pratimam śrīmat rajata parvatam
śṛṅgavantam darīvantam adhiruhya ca vānarāḥ
tatra lodhra vanam ramyam saptaparṇa vanāni ca
vicinvantaḥ hari varāḥ sītā darśana kāṅkṣiṇaḥ
tasya agram adhirūḍhāḥ te śrāntāḥ vipula vikramāḥ

original: 4.048.018c na paśyanti sma vaidehīṃ rāmasya mahiṣīṃ priyām
analyzed: na paśyanti sma vaidehīm rāmasya mahiṣīm priyām

original: 4.048.019a te tu dṛṣṭigataṃ kṛtvā taṃ śailaṃ bahukandaram
analyzed: te tu dṛṣṭi gatam kṛtvā tam śailam bahu kandaram
avārohanta harayaḥ vīkṣamāṇāḥ samantataḥ
avaruhya tatas bhūmim śrāntāḥ vigata cetasaḥ
sthitvā muhūrtam tatra atha vṛkṣa mūlam upāśritāḥ

original: 4.048.021a te muhūrtaṃ samāśvastāḥ kiṃ cid bhagnapariśramāḥ
analyzed: te muhūrtam samāśvastāḥ kim cit bhagna pariśramāḥ

original: 4.048.021c punar evodyatāḥ kṛtsnāṃ mārgituṃ dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
analyzed: punar eva udyatāḥ kṛtsnām mārgitum dakṣiṇām diśam
hanumat pramukhāḥ te tu prasthitāḥ plavaga ṛṣabhāḥ

original: 4.048.022c vindhyam evāditas tāvad vicerus te samantataḥ
analyzed: vindhyam eva āditas tāvat viceruḥ te samantataḥ

original: 4.049.001a saha tārāṅgadābhyāṃ tu saṃgamya hanumān kapiḥ
analyzed: saha tārā aṅgadābhyām tu saṃgamya hanumān kapiḥ

original: 4.049.001c vicinoti sma vindhyasya guhāś ca gahanāni ca
analyzed: vicinoti sma vindhyasya guhāḥ ca gahanāni ca

original: 4.049.002a siṃhaśārdūlajuṣṭāś ca guhāś ca paritas tathā
analyzed: siṃha śārdūla juṣṭāḥ ca guhāḥ ca paritas tathā
viṣameṣu naga indrasya mahā prasravaṇeṣu ca

original: 4.049.003a teṣāṃ tatraiva vasatāṃ sa kālo vyatyavartata
analyzed: teṣām tatra eva vasatām sa kālaḥ vyatyavartata

original: 4.049.004a sa hi deśo duranveṣo guhā gahanavān mahān
analyzed: sa hi deśaḥ duranveṣaḥ guhā gahanavān mahān

original: 4.049.004c tatra vāyusutaḥ sarvaṃ vicinoti sma parvatam
analyzed: tatra vāyu sutaḥ sarvam vicinoti sma parvatam
paraspareṇa rahitāḥ anyonyasya avidūrataḥ
gajaḥ gavākṣaḥ gavayaḥ śarabhaḥ gandhamādanaḥ

original: 4.049.006a maindaś ca dvividaś caiva hanumāñ jāmbavān api
analyzed: maindaḥ ca dvividaḥ ca eva hanumān jāmbavān api

original: 4.049.006c aṅgado yuvarājaś ca tāraś ca vanagocaraḥ
analyzed: aṅgadaḥ yuvarājaḥ ca tāraḥ ca vanagocaraḥ
giri jāla āvṛtān deśān mārgitvā dakṣiṇām diśam

original: 4.049.007c kṣutpipāsā parītāś ca śrāntāś ca salilārthinaḥ
analyzed: kṣudh pipāsā parītāḥ ca śrāntāḥ ca salila arthinaḥ
avakīrṇam latā vṛkṣaiḥ dadṛśuḥ te mahā bilam

original: 4.049.008a tataḥ krauñcāś ca haṃsāś ca sārasāś cāpi niṣkraman
analyzed: tatas krauñcāḥ ca haṃsāḥ ca sārasāḥ ca api niṣkraman
jala ārdrāḥ cakravākāḥ ca rakta aṅgāḥ padma reṇubhiḥ

original: 4.049.009a tatas tad bilam āsādya sugandhi duratikramam
analyzed: tatas tat bilam āsādya sugandhi duratikramam
vismaya vyagra manasaḥ babhūvuḥ vānara ṛṣabhāḥ
saṃjāta pariśaṅkāḥ te tat bilam plavaga uttamāḥ
abhyapadyanta saṃhṛṣṭāḥ tejovantaḥ mahā balāḥ
tatas parvata kūṭa ābhaḥ hanumān mārutātmajaḥ
abravīt vānarān sarvān kāntāra vana kovidaḥ
giri jāla āvṛtān deśān mārgitvā dakṣiṇām diśam

original: 4.049.012c vayaṃ sarve pariśrāntā na ca paśyāmi maithilīm
analyzed: vayam sarve pariśrāntāḥ na ca paśyāmi maithilīm

original: 4.049.013a asmāc cāpi bilād dhaṃsāḥ krauñcāś ca saha sārasaiḥ
analyzed: asmāt ca api bilāt haṃsāḥ krauñcāḥ ca saha sārasaiḥ

original: 4.049.013c jalārdrāś cakravākāś ca niṣpatanti sma sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: jala ārdrāḥ cakravākāḥ ca niṣpatanti sma sarvaśas

original: 4.049.014a nūnaṃ salilavān atra kūpo vā yadi vā hradaḥ
analyzed: nūnam salilavān atra kūpaḥ vā yadi vā hradaḥ

original: 4.049.014c tathā ceme biladvāre snigdhās tiṣṭhanti pādapāḥ
analyzed: tathā ca ime bila dvāre snigdhāḥ tiṣṭhanti pādapāḥ

original: 4.049.015a ity uktās tad bilaṃ sarve viviśus timirāvṛtam
analyzed: iti uktāḥ tat bilam sarve viviśuḥ timira āvṛtam
a candra sūryam harayaḥ dadṛśuḥ roma harṣaṇam
tatas tasmin bile durge nānā pādapa saṃkule
anyonyam saṃpariṣvajya jagmuḥ yojanam antaram
te naṣṭa saṃjñāḥ tṛṣitāḥ saṃbhrāntāḥ salila arthinaḥ

original: 4.049.017c paripetur bile tasmin kaṃ cit kālam atandritāḥ
analyzed: paripetuḥ bile tasmin kam cit kālam atandritāḥ
te kṛśāḥ dīna vadanāḥ pariśrāntāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ

original: 4.049.018c ālokaṃ dadṛśur vīrā nirāśā jīvite tadā
analyzed: ālokam dadṛśuḥ vīrāḥ nirāśāḥ jīvite tadā

original: 4.049.019a tatas taṃ deśam āgamya saumyaṃ vitimiraṃ vanam
analyzed: tatas tam deśam āgamya saumyam vitimiram vanam
dadṛśuḥ kāñcanān vṛkṣān dīpta vaiśvānara prabhān

original: 4.049.020a sālāṃs tālāṃś ca puṃnāgān kakubhān vañjulān dhavān
analyzed: sālān tālān ca puṃnāgān kakubhān vañjulān dhavān

original: 4.049.020c campakān nāgavṛkṣāṃś ca karṇikārāṃś ca puṣpitān
analyzed: campakān nāgavṛkṣān ca karṇikārān ca puṣpitān
taruṇa āditya saṃkāśān vaidūrya maya vedikān
nīla vaidūrya varṇāḥ ca padminīḥ pataga āvṛtāḥ

original: 4.049.022a mahadbhiḥ kāñcanair vṛkṣair vṛtaṃ bālārka saṃnibhaiḥ
analyzed: mahadbhiḥ kāñcanaiḥ vṛkṣaiḥ vṛtam bāla arka saṃnibhaiḥ
jātarūpa mayaiḥ matsyaiḥ mahadbhiḥ ca sa kacchapaiḥ
nalinīḥ tatra dadṛśuḥ prasanna salila āyutāḥ
kāñcanāni vimānāni rājatāni tathā eva ca
tapanīya gavākṣāṇi muktā jāla āvṛtāni ca
haima rājata bhaumāni vaidūrya maṇimanti ca
dadṛśuḥ tatra harayaḥ gṛha mukhyāni sarvaśas
puṣpitān phalinaḥ vṛkṣān pravāla maṇi saṃnibhān
kāñcana bhramarān ca eva madhūni ca samantataḥ
maṇi kāñcana citrāṇi śayanāni āsanāni ca

original: 4.049.027a mahārhāṇi ca yānāni dadṛśus te samantataḥ
analyzed: mahārhāṇi ca yānāni dadṛśuḥ te samantataḥ
haima rājata kāṃsyānām bhājanānām ca saṃcayān

original: 4.049.028a agarūṇāṃ ca divyānāṃ candanānāṃ ca saṃcayān
analyzed: agarūṇām ca divyānām candanānām ca saṃcayān

original: 4.049.028c śucīny abhyavahāryāṇi mūlāni ca phalāni ca
analyzed: śucīni abhyavahāryāṇi mūlāni ca phalāni ca

original: 4.049.029a mahārhāṇi ca pānāni madhūni rasavanti ca
analyzed: mahārhāṇi ca pānāni madhūni rasavanti ca

original: 4.049.029c divyānām ambarāṇāṃ ca mahārhāṇāṃ ca saṃcayān
analyzed: divyānām ambarāṇām ca mahārhāṇām ca saṃcayān

original: 4.049.029e kambalānāṃ ca citrāṇām ajinānāṃ ca saṃcayān
analyzed: kambalānām ca citrāṇām ajinānām ca saṃcayān

original: 4.049.030a tatra tatra vicinvanto bile tatra mahāprabhāḥ
analyzed: tatra tatra vicinvantaḥ bile tatra mahā prabhāḥ

original: 4.049.030c dadṛśur vānarāḥ śūrāḥ striyaṃ kāṃ cid adūrataḥ
analyzed: dadṛśuḥ vānarāḥ śūrāḥ striyam kām cit adūrataḥ
tām dṛṣṭvā bhṛśa saṃtrastāḥ cīra kṛṣṇa ajina ambarām
tāpasīm niyata āhārām jvalantīm iva tejasā
tatas hanūmān giri saṃnikāśaḥ
kṛtāñjaliḥ tām abhivādya vṛddhām

original: 4.049.032c papraccha kā tvaṃ bhavanaṃ bilaṃ ca;
analyzed: papraccha kā tvam bhavanam bilam ca
ratnāni ca imāni vadasva kasya

original: 4.050.001a ity uktvā hanumāṃs tatra punaḥ kṛṣṇājināmbarām
analyzed: iti uktvā hanumān tatra punar kṛṣṇa ajina ambarām
abravīt tām mahābhāgām tāpasīm dharma cāriṇīm
idam praviṣṭāḥ sahasā bilam timira saṃvṛtam
kṣudh pipāsā pariśrāntāḥ parikhinnāḥ ca sarvaśas

original: 4.050.003a mahad dhiraṇyā vivaraṃ praviṣṭāḥ sma pipāsitāḥ
analyzed: mahat hiraṇyāḥ vivaram praviṣṭāḥ sma pipāsitāḥ

original: 4.050.003c imāṃs tv evaṃ vidhān bhāvān vividhān adbhutopamān
analyzed: imān tu evaṃvidhān bhāvān vividhān adbhuta upamān
dṛṣṭvā vayam pravyathitāḥ saṃbhrāntāḥ naṣṭa cetasaḥ
kasya ime kāñcanāḥ vṛkṣāḥ taruṇa āditya saṃnibhāḥ

original: 4.050.004c śucīny abhyavahāryāṇi mūlāni ca phalāni ca
analyzed: śucīni abhyavahāryāṇi mūlāni ca phalāni ca
kāñcanāni vimānāni rājatāni gṛhāṇi ca
tapanīya gavākṣāṇi maṇi jāla āvṛtāni ca
puṣpitāḥ phālavantaḥ ca puṇyāḥ surabhi gandhinaḥ
ime jāmbūnada mayāḥ pādapāḥ kasya tejasā

original: 4.050.007a kāñcanāni ca padmāni jātāni vimale jale
analyzed: kāñcanāni ca padmāni jātāni vimale jale

original: 4.050.007c kathaṃ matsyāś ca sauvarṇā caranti saha kacchapaiḥ
analyzed: katham matsyāḥ ca sauvarṇā caranti saha kacchapaiḥ

original: 4.050.008a ātmānam anubhāvaṃ ca kasya caitat tapobalam
analyzed: ātmānam anubhāvam ca kasya ca etat tapaḥ balam

original: 4.050.008c ajānatāṃ naḥ sarveṣāṃ sarvam ākhyātum arhasi
analyzed: a jānatām naḥ sarveṣām sarvam ākhyātum arhasi
evam uktā hanumatā tāpasī dharma cāriṇī
pratyuvāca hanūmantam sarva bhūta hite ratā
mayaḥ nāma mahā tejāḥ māyāvī dānava ṛṣabhaḥ

original: 4.050.010c tenedaṃ nirmitaṃ sarvaṃ māyayā kāñcanaṃ vanam
analyzed: tena idam nirmitam sarvam māyayā kāñcanam vanam
purā dānava mukhyānām viśvakarmā babhūva ha
yena idam kāñcanam divyam nirmitam bhavana uttamam

original: 4.050.012a sa tu varṣasahasrāṇi tapas taptvā mahāvane
analyzed: sa tu varṣa sahasrāṇi tapaḥ taptvā mahā vane

original: 4.050.012c pitāmahād varaṃ lebhe sarvam auśasanaṃ dhanam
analyzed: pitāmahāt varam lebhe sarvam auśasanam dhanam
vidhāya sarvam balavān sarva kāma īśvaraḥ tadā

original: 4.050.013c uvāsa sukhitaḥ kālaṃ kaṃ cid asmin mahāvane
analyzed: uvāsa sukhitaḥ kālam kam cit asmin mahā vane
tam apsarasi hemāyām saktam dānava puṃgavam
vikramya eva aśanim gṛhya jaghāna īśaḥ puraṃdaraḥ

original: 4.050.015a idaṃ ca brahmaṇā dattaṃ hemāyai vanam uttamam
analyzed: idam ca brahmaṇā dattam hemāyai vanam uttamam

original: 4.050.015c śāśvataḥ kāmabhogaś ca gṛhaṃ cedaṃ hiraṇmayam
analyzed: śāśvataḥ kāma bhogaḥ ca gṛham ca idam hiraṇmayam

original: 4.050.016a duhitā merusāvarṇer ahaṃ tasyāḥ svayaṃ prabhā
analyzed: duhitā merusāvarṇeḥ aham tasyāḥ svayam prabhā
idam rakṣāmi bhavanam hemāyāḥ vānara uttama
mama priya sakhī hemā nṛtta gīta viśāradā
tayā datta varā ca asmi rakṣāmi bhavana uttamam

original: 4.050.018a kiṃ kāryaṃ kasya vā hetoḥ kāntārāṇi prapadyatha
analyzed: kim kāryam kasya vā hetoḥ kāntārāṇi prapadyatha

original: 4.050.018c kathaṃ cedaṃ vanaṃ durgaṃ yuṣmābhir upalakṣitam
analyzed: katham ca idam vanam durgam yuṣmābhiḥ upalakṣitam

original: 4.050.019a imāny abhyavahāryāṇi mūlāni ca phalāni ca
analyzed: imāni abhyavahāryāṇi mūlāni ca phalāni ca

original: 4.050.019c bhuktvā pītvā ca pānīyaṃ sarvaṃ me vaktum arhatha
analyzed: bhuktvā pītvā ca pānīyam sarvam me vaktum arhatha

original: 4.051.001a atha tān abravīt sarvān viśrāntān hariyūthapān
analyzed: atha tān abravīt sarvān viśrāntān hari yūthapān
idam vacanam ekāgrā tāpasī dharma cāriṇī

original: 4.051.002a vānarā yadi vaḥ khedaḥ pranaṣṭaḥ phalabhakṣaṇāt
analyzed: vānarāḥ yadi vaḥ khedaḥ pranaṣṭaḥ phala bhakṣaṇāt

original: 4.051.002c yadi caitan mayā śrāvyaṃ śrotum icchāmi kathyatām
analyzed: yadi ca etat mayā śrāvyam śrotum icchāmi kathyatām

original: 4.051.003a tasyās tad vacanaṃ śrutvā hanumān mārutātmajaḥ
analyzed: tasyāḥ tat vacanam śrutvā hanumān mārutātmajaḥ
ārjavena yathātattvam ākhyātum upacakrame
rājā sarvasya lokasya mahā indra varuṇa upamaḥ
rāmaḥ dāśarathiḥ śrīmān praviṣṭaḥ daṇḍaka vanam

original: 4.051.005a lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā vaidehyā cāpi bhāryayā
analyzed: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā vaidehyā ca api bhāryayā

original: 4.051.005c tasya bhāryā janasthānād rāvaṇena hṛtā balāt
analyzed: tasya bhāryā janasthānāt rāvaṇena hṛtā balāt

original: 4.051.006a vīras tasya sakhā rājñaḥ sugrīvo nāma vānaraḥ
analyzed: vīraḥ tasya sakhā rājñaḥ sugrīvaḥ nāma vānaraḥ
rājā vānara mukhyānām yena prasthāpitāḥ vayam
agastya caritām āśām dakṣiṇām yama rakṣitām
saha ebhiḥ vānaraiḥ mukhyaiḥ aṅgada pramukhaiḥ vayam
rāvaṇam sahitāḥ sarve rākṣasam kāmarūpiṇam

original: 4.051.008c sītayā saha vaidehyā mārgadhvam iti coditāḥ
analyzed: sītayā saha vaidehyā mārgadhvam iti coditāḥ

original: 4.051.009a vicitya tu vayaṃ sarve samagrāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
analyzed: vicitya tu vayam sarve samagrām dakṣiṇām diśam
bubhukṣitāḥ pariśrāntāḥ vṛkṣa mūlam upāśritāḥ
vivarṇa vadanāḥ sarve sarve dhyāna parāyaṇāḥ
na adhigacchāmahe pāram magnāḥ cintā mahā arṇave

original: 4.051.011a cārayantas tataś cakṣur dṛṣṭavanto mahad bilam
analyzed: cārayantaḥ tatas cakṣuḥ dṛṣṭavantaḥ mahat bilam
latā pādapa saṃchannam timireṇa samāvṛtam
asmāt haṃsāḥ jala klinnāḥ pakṣaiḥ salila reṇubhiḥ
kurarāḥ sārasāḥ ca eva niṣpatanti patatriṇaḥ

original: 4.051.012e sādhv atra praviśāmeti mayā tūktāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
analyzed: sādhu atra praviśāma iti mayā tu uktāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ

original: 4.051.013a teṣām api hi sarveṣām anumānam upāgatam
analyzed: teṣām api hi sarveṣām anumānam upāgatam
gacchāmaḥ praviśāma iti bhartṛ kārya tvarā anvitāḥ

original: 4.051.014a tato gāḍhaṃ nipatitā gṛhya hastau parasparam
analyzed: tatas gāḍham nipatitāḥ gṛhya hastau parasparam
idam praviṣṭāḥ sahasā bilam timira saṃvṛtam

original: 4.051.015a etan naḥ kāyam etena kṛtyena vayam āgatāḥ
analyzed: etat naḥ kāyam etena kṛtyena vayam āgatāḥ
tvām ca eva upagatāḥ sarve paridyūnāḥ bubhukṣitāḥ
ātithya dharma dattāni mūlāni ca phalāni ca
asmābhiḥ upabhuktāni bubhukṣā paripīḍitaiḥ

original: 4.051.017a yat tvayā rakṣitāḥ sarve mriyamāṇā bubhukṣayā
analyzed: yat tvayā rakṣitāḥ sarve mriyamāṇāḥ bubhukṣayā

original: 4.051.017c brūhi pratyupakārārthaṃ kiṃ te kurvantu vānarāḥ
analyzed: brūhi pratyupakāra artham kim te kurvantu vānarāḥ

original: 4.051.018a evam uktā tu sarvajñā vānarais taiḥ svayaṃprabhā
analyzed: evam uktā tu sarva jñā vānaraiḥ taiḥ svayaṃprabhā
pratyuvāca tatas sarvān idam vānara yūthapam
sarveṣām parituṣṭā asmi vānarāṇām tarasvinām

original: 4.051.019c carantyā mama dharmeṇa na kāryam iha kena cit
analyzed: carantyāḥ mama dharmeṇa na kāryam iha kena cit

original: 4.052.001a evam uktaḥ śubhaṃ vākyaṃ tāpasyā dharmasaṃhitam
analyzed: evam uktaḥ śubham vākyam tāpasyā dharma saṃhitam
uvāca hanumān vākyam tām anindita ceṣṭitām

original: 4.052.002a śaraṇaṃ tvāṃ prapannāḥ smaḥ sarve vai dharmacāriṇi
analyzed: śaraṇam tvām prapannāḥ smaḥ sarve vai dharma cāriṇi
yaḥ kṛtaḥ samayaḥ smākam sugrīveṇa mahātmanā

original: 4.052.002e sa tu kālo vyatikrānto bile ca parivartatām
analyzed: sa tu kālaḥ vyatikrāntaḥ bile ca parivartatām

original: 4.052.003a sā tvam asmād bilād ghorād uttārayitum arhasi
analyzed: sā tvam asmāt bilāt ghorāt uttārayitum arhasi
tasmāt sugrīva vacanāt atikrāntān gata āyuṣaḥ
trātum arhasi naḥ sarvān sugrīva bhaya śaṅkitān

original: 4.052.005a mahac ca kāryam asmābhiḥ kartavyaṃ dharmacāriṇi
analyzed: mahat ca kāryam asmābhiḥ kartavyam dharma cāriṇi

original: 4.052.005c tac cāpi na kṛtaṃ kāryam asmābhir iha vāsibhiḥ
analyzed: tat ca api na kṛtam kāryam asmābhiḥ iha vāsibhiḥ

original: 4.052.006a evam uktā hanumatā tāpasī vākyam abravīt
analyzed: evam uktā hanumatā tāpasī vākyam abravīt
jīvatā duṣkaram manye praviṣṭena nivartitum
tapasaḥ tu prabhāvena niyama upārjitena ca

original: 4.052.007c sarvān eva bilād asmād uddhariṣyāmi vānarān
analyzed: sarvān eva bilāt asmāt uddhariṣyāmi vānarān
nimīlayata cakṣūṃṣi sarve vānara puṃgavāḥ
na hi niṣkramitum śakyam a nimīlita locanaiḥ
tatas saṃmīlitāḥ sarve sukumāra aṅgulaiḥ karaiḥ
sahasā pidadhuḥ dṛṣṭim hṛṣṭāḥ gamana kāṅkṣiṇaḥ
vānarāḥ tu mahātmānaḥ hasta ruddha mukhāḥ tadā
nimeṣa antara mātreṇa bilāt uttāritāḥ tayā

original: 4.052.011a tatas tān vānarān sarvāṃs tāpasī dharmacāriṇī
analyzed: tatas tān vānarān sarvān tāpasī dharma cāriṇī
niḥsṛtān viṣamāt tasmāt samāśvāsya idam abravīt
eṣa vindhyaḥ giriḥ śrīmān nānā druma latā yutaḥ
eṣa prasavaṇaḥ śailaḥ sāgaraḥ yam mahā udadhiḥ
svasti vaḥ stu gamiṣyāmi bhavanam vānara ṛṣabhāḥ

original: 4.052.013c ity uktvā tad bilaṃ śrīmat praviveśa svayaṃprabhā
analyzed: iti uktvā tat bilam śrīmat praviveśa svayaṃprabhā

original: 4.052.014a tatas te dadṛśur ghoraṃ sāgaraṃ varuṇālayam
analyzed: tatas te dadṛśuḥ ghoram sāgaram varuṇālayam
apāram abhigarjantam ghoraiḥ ūrmibhiḥ ākulam
mayasya māyā vihitam giri durgam vicinvatām

original: 4.052.015c teṣāṃ māso vyatikrānto yo rājñā samayaḥ kṛtaḥ
analyzed: teṣām māsaḥ vyatikrāntaḥ yaḥ rājñā samayaḥ kṛtaḥ
vindhyasya tu gireḥ pāde saṃprapuṣpita pādape
upaviśya mahābhāgāḥ cintām āpedire tadā
tatas puṣpa atibhāra agrān latā śata samāvṛtān
drumān vāsantikān dṛṣṭvā babhūvuḥ bhaya śaṅkitāḥ
te vasantam anuprāptam prativedya parasparam
naṣṭa saṃdeśa kāla arthāḥ nipetuḥ dharaṇī tale

original: 4.052.019a sa tu siṃharṣabha skandhaḥ pīnāyatabhujaḥ kapiḥ
analyzed: sa tu siṃha ṛṣabha skandhaḥ pīna āyata bhujaḥ kapiḥ
yuvarājaḥ mahā prājña aṅgadaḥ vākyam abravīt
śāsanāt kapi rājasya vayam sarve vinirgatāḥ

original: 4.052.020c māsaḥ pūrṇo bilasthānāṃ harayaḥ kiṃ na budhyate
analyzed: māsaḥ pūrṇaḥ bila sthānām harayaḥ kim na budhyate

original: 4.052.021a tasminn atīte kāle tu sugrīveṇa kṛte svayam
analyzed: tasmin atīte kāle tu sugrīveṇa kṛte svayam
prāya upaveśanam yuktam sarveṣām ca vanaukasām
tīkṣṇaḥ prakṛtyā sugrīvaḥ svāmi bhāve vyavasthitaḥ

original: 4.052.022c na kṣamiṣyati naḥ sarvān aparādhakṛto gatān
analyzed: na kṣamiṣyati naḥ sarvān aparādha kṛtaḥ gatān

original: 4.052.023a apravṛttau ca sītāyāḥ pāpam eva kariṣyati
analyzed: apravṛttau ca sītāyāḥ pāpam eva kariṣyati

original: 4.052.023c tasmāt kṣamam ihādyaiva prāyopaviśanaṃ hi naḥ
analyzed: tasmāt kṣamam iha adya eva prāya upaviśanam hi naḥ

original: 4.052.024a tyaktvā putrāṃś ca dārāṃś ca dhanāni ca gṛhāṇi ca
analyzed: tyaktvā putrān ca dārān ca dhanāni ca gṛhāṇi ca

original: 4.052.024c yāvan na ghātayed rājā sarvān pratigatān itaḥ
analyzed: yāvat na ghātayet rājā sarvān pratigatān itas
vadhena apratirūpeṇa śreyān mṛtyuḥ iha eva naḥ
na ca aham yauvarājyena sugrīveṇa abhiṣecitaḥ
narendreṇa abhiṣiktaḥ smi rāmeṇa akliṣṭa karmaṇā

original: 4.052.026a sa pūrvaṃ baddhavairo māṃ rājā dṛṣṭvā vyatikramam
analyzed: sa pūrvam baddha vairaḥ mām rājā dṛṣṭvā vyatikramam
ghātayiṣyati daṇḍena tīkṣṇena kṛta niścayaḥ

original: 4.052.027a kiṃ me suhṛdbhir vyasanaṃ paśyadbhir jīvitāntare
analyzed: kim me suhṛdbhiḥ vyasanam paśyadbhiḥ jīvitāntare
iha eva prāyam āsiṣye puṇye sāgara rodhasi
etat śrutvā kumāreṇa yuvarājena bhāṣitam

original: 4.052.028c sarve te vānaraśreṣṭhāḥ karuṇaṃ vākyam abruvan
analyzed: sarve te vānara śreṣṭhāḥ karuṇam vākyam abruvan

original: 4.052.029a tīkṣṇaḥ prakṛtyā sugrīvaḥ priyāsaktaś ca rāghavaḥ
analyzed: tīkṣṇaḥ prakṛtyā sugrīvaḥ priya āsaktaḥ ca rāghavaḥ

original: 4.052.029c adṛṣṭāyāṃ ca vaidehyāṃ dṛṣṭvāsmāṃś ca samāgatān
analyzed: adṛṣṭāyām ca vaidehyām dṛṣṭvā asmān ca samāgatān
rāghava priya kāma artham ghātayiṣyati asaṃśayam
na kṣamam ca aparāddhānām gamanam svāmi pārśvataḥ
plavaṃgamānām tu bhaya arditānām
śrutvā vacaḥ tāraḥ idam babhāṣe
alam viṣādena bilam praviśya
vasāma sarve yadi rocate vaḥ
idam hi māyā vihitam su durgamam
prabhūta vṛkṣa udaka bhojya peyam
iha asti naḥ na eva bhayam puraṃdarān
na rāghavāt vānararājataḥ pi vā
śrutvā aṅgadasya api vacaḥ nukūlam
ūcuḥ ca sarve harayaḥ pratītāḥ
yathā na hanyema tathā vidhānam
asaktam adyā eva vidhīyatām naḥ
tathā bruvati tāre tu tārā adhipati varcasi

original: 4.053.001c atha mene hṛtaṃ rājyaṃ hanumān aṅgadena tat
analyzed: atha mene hṛtam rājyam hanumān aṅgadena tat
buddhyā hi aṣṭāṅgayā yuktam catur bala samanvitam
caturdaśa guṇam mene hanumān vālinaḥ sutam
āpūryamāṇam śaśvat ca tejaḥ bala parākramaiḥ
śaśinam śukla pakṣa ādau vardhamānam iva śriyā
bṛhaspati samam buddhyā vikrame sadṛśam pituḥ
śuśrūṣamāṇam tārasya śukrasya iva puraṃdaram
bhartuḥ arthe pariśrāntam sarva śāstra viśāradam
abhisaṃdhātum ārebhe hanumān aṅgadam tatas
sa caturṇām upāyānām tṛtīyam upavarṇayan

original: 4.053.006c bhedayām āsa tān sarvān vānarān vākyasaṃpadā
analyzed: bhedayām āsa tān sarvān vānarān vākya saṃpadā
teṣu sarveṣu bhinneṣu tatas bhīṣayat aṅgadam
bhīṣaṇaiḥ bahubhiḥ vākyaiḥ kopa upāya samanvitaiḥ

original: 4.053.008a tvaṃ samarthataraḥ pitrā yuddhe tāreya vai dhuram
analyzed: tvam samarthataraḥ pitrā yuddhe tāreya vai dhuram

original: 4.053.008c dṛḍhaṃ dhārayituṃ śaktaḥ kapirājyaṃ yathā pitā
analyzed: dṛḍham dhārayitum śaktaḥ kapi rājyam yathā pitā
nityam asthira cittāḥ hi kapayaḥ hari puṃgava
na ājñāpyam viṣahiṣyanti putra dārān vinā tvayā

original: 4.053.010a tvāṃ naite hy anuyuñjeyuḥ pratyakṣaṃ pravadāmi te
analyzed: tvām na ete hi anuyuñjeyuḥ pratyakṣam pravadāmi te

original: 4.053.010c yathāyaṃ jāmbavān nīlaḥ suhotraś ca mahākapiḥ
analyzed: yathā ayam jāmbavān nīlaḥ suhotraḥ ca mahā kapiḥ

original: 4.053.011a na hy ahaṃ ta ime sarve sāmadānādibhir guṇaiḥ
analyzed: na hi aham te ime sarve sāma dāna ādibhiḥ guṇaiḥ

original: 4.053.011c daṇḍena na tvayā śakyāḥ sugrīvād apakarṣitum
analyzed: daṇḍena na tvayā śakyāḥ sugrīvāt apakarṣitum
vigṛhya āsanam api āhuḥ durbalena balīyasaḥ
ātma rakṣā karaḥ tasmāt na vigṛhṇīta durbalaḥ

original: 4.053.013a yāṃ cemāṃ manyase dhātrīm etad bilam iti śrutam
analyzed: yām ca imām manyase dhātrīm etat bilam iti śrutam
etat lakṣmaṇa bāṇānām īṣatkāryam vidāraṇe

original: 4.053.014a svalpaṃ hi kṛtam indreṇa kṣipatā hy aśaniṃ purā
analyzed: su alpam hi kṛtam indreṇa kṣipatā hi aśanim purā

original: 4.053.014c lakṣmaṇo niśitair bāṇair bhindyāt patrapuṭaṃ yathā
analyzed: lakṣmaṇaḥ niśitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ bhindyāt patra puṭam yathā

original: 4.053.014e lakṣmaṇasya ca nārācā bahavaḥ santi tadvidhāḥ
analyzed: lakṣmaṇasya ca nārācāḥ bahavaḥ santi tadvidhāḥ
avasthāne yadā eva tvam āsiṣyasi paraṃtapa
tadā eva harayaḥ sarve tyakṣyanti kṛta niścayāḥ
smarantaḥ putra dārāṇām nitya udvignāḥ bubhukṣitāḥ
kheditāḥ duḥkha śayyābhiḥ tvām kariṣyanti pṛṣṭhatas

original: 4.053.017a sa tvaṃ hīnaḥ suhṛdbhiś ca hitakāmaiś ca bandhubhiḥ
analyzed: sa tvam hīnaḥ suhṛdbhiḥ ca hita kāmaiḥ ca bandhubhiḥ
tṛṇāt api bhṛśa udvignaḥ spandamānāt bhaviṣyasi

original: 4.053.018a na ca jātu na hiṃsyus tvāṃ ghorā lakṣmaṇasāyakāḥ
analyzed: na ca jātu na hiṃsyuḥ tvām ghorāḥ lakṣmaṇa sāyakāḥ
apavṛttam jighāṃsantaḥ mahā vegāḥ durāsadāḥ

original: 4.053.019a asmābhis tu gataṃ sārdhaṃ vinītavad upasthitam
analyzed: asmābhiḥ tu gatam sārdham vinīta vat upasthitam

original: 4.053.019c ānupūrvyāt tu sugrīvo rājye tvāṃ sthāpayiṣyati
analyzed: ānupūrvyāt tu sugrīvaḥ rājye tvām sthāpayiṣyati
dharma kāmaḥ pitṛvyaḥ te prīti kāmaḥ dṛḍha vrataḥ

original: 4.053.020c śuciḥ satyapratijñaś ca nā tvāṃ jātu jighāṃsati
analyzed: śuciḥ satya pratijñaḥ ca nā tvām jātu jighāṃsati

original: 4.053.021a priyakāmaś ca te mātus tadarthaṃ cāsya jīvitam
analyzed: priya kāmaḥ ca te mātuḥ tad artham ca asya jīvitam

original: 4.053.021c tasyāpatyaṃ ca nāsty anyat tasmād aṅgada gamyatām
analyzed: tasya apatyam ca nā asti anyat tasmāt aṅgada gamyatām
śrutvā hanumataḥ vākyam praśritam dharma saṃhitam
svāmi satkāra saṃyuktam aṅgadaḥ vākyam abravīt
sthairyam sarva ātmanā śaucam ānṛśaṃsyam atha ārjavam

original: 4.054.002c vikramaiś caiva dhairyaṃ ca sugrīve nopapadyate
analyzed: vikramaiḥ ca eva dhairyam ca sugrīve nā upapadyate

original: 4.054.003a bhrātur jyeṣṭhasya yo bhāryāṃ jīvito mahiṣīṃ priyām
analyzed: bhrātuḥ jyeṣṭhasya yaḥ bhāryām jīvitaḥ mahiṣīm priyām

original: 4.054.003c dharmeṇa mātaraṃ yas tu svīkaroti jugupsitaḥ
analyzed: dharmeṇa mātaram yaḥ tu svīkaroti jugupsitaḥ

original: 4.054.004a kathaṃ sa dharmaṃ jānīte yena bhrātrā durātmanā
analyzed: katham sa dharmam jānīte yena bhrātrā durātmanā
yuddhāya abhiniyuktena bilasya pihitam mukham
satyāt pāṇi gṛhītaḥ ca kṛtakarmā mahā yaśāḥ

original: 4.054.005c vismṛto rāghavo yena sa kasya sukṛtaṃ smaret
analyzed: vismṛtaḥ rāghavaḥ yena sa kasya sukṛtam smaret
lakṣmaṇasya bhayāt yena na adharma bhaya bhīruṇā

original: 4.054.006c ādiṣṭā mārgituṃ sītāṃ dharmam asmin kathaṃ bhavet
analyzed: ādiṣṭāḥ mārgitum sītām dharmam asmin katham bhavet

original: 4.054.007a tasmin pāpe kṛtaghne tu smṛtihīne calātmani
analyzed: tasmin pāpe kṛtaghne tu smṛti hīne cala ātmani

original: 4.054.007c āryaḥ ko viśvasej jātu tat kulīno jijīviṣuḥ
analyzed: āryaḥ kaḥ viśvaset jātu tat kulīnaḥ jijīviṣuḥ

original: 4.054.008a rājye putraṃ pratiṣṭhāpya saguṇo nirguṇo 'pi vā
analyzed: rājye putram pratiṣṭhāpya saguṇaḥ vā
katham śatru kulīnam mām sugrīvaḥ jīvayiṣyati

original: 4.054.009a bhinnamantro 'parāddhaś ca hīnaśaktiḥ kathaṃ hy aham
analyzed: bhinna mantraḥ uparāddhaḥ ca hīna śaktiḥ katham hi aham

original: 4.054.009c kiṣkindhāṃ prāpya jīveyam anātha iva durbalaḥ
analyzed: kiṣkindhām prāpya jīveyam anāthaḥ iva durbalaḥ
upāṃśu daṇḍena hi mām bandhanena upapādayet

original: 4.054.010c śaṭhaḥ krūro nṛśaṃsaś ca sugrīvo rājyakāraṇāt
analyzed: śaṭhaḥ krūraḥ nṛśaṃsaḥ ca sugrīvaḥ rājya kāraṇāt
bandhanāt ca avasādāt me śreyaḥ prāya upaveśanam

original: 4.054.011c anujānīta māṃ sarve gṛhān gacchantu vānarāḥ
analyzed: anujānīta mām sarve gṛhān gacchantu vānarāḥ

original: 4.054.012a ahaṃ vaḥ pratijānāmi na gamiṣyāmy ahaṃ purīm
analyzed: aham vaḥ pratijānāmi na gamiṣyāmi aham purīm

original: 4.054.012c ihaiva prāyam āsiṣye śreyo maraṇam eva me
analyzed: iha eva prāyam āsiṣye śreyaḥ maraṇam eva me

original: 4.054.013a abhivādanapūrvaṃ tu rājā kuśalam eva ca
analyzed: abhivādana pūrvam tu rājā kuśalam eva ca

original: 4.054.013c vācyas tato yavīyān me sugrīvo vānareśvaraḥ
analyzed: vācyaḥ tatas yavīyān me sugrīvaḥ vānara īśvaraḥ

original: 4.054.014a ārogyapūrvaṃ kuśalaṃ vācyā mātā rumā ca me
analyzed: ārogya pūrvam kuśalam vācyā mātā rumā ca me

original: 4.054.014c mātaraṃ caiva me tārām āśvāsayitum arhatha
analyzed: mātaram ca eva me tārām āśvāsayitum arhatha
prakṛtyā priya putrā sā sa anukrośā tapasvinī

original: 4.054.015c vinaṣṭaṃ mām iha śrutvā vyaktaṃ hāsyati jīvitam
analyzed: vinaṣṭam mām iha śrutvā vyaktam hāsyati jīvitam

original: 4.054.016a etāvad uktvā vacanaṃ vṛddhān apy abhivādya ca
analyzed: etāvat uktvā vacanam vṛddhān api abhivādya ca
saṃviveśa aṅgadaḥ bhūmau rudan darbheṣu durmanāḥ
tasya saṃviśataḥ tatra rudantaḥ vānara ṛṣabhāḥ
nayanebhyaḥ pramumucuḥ uṣṇam vai vāri duḥkhitāḥ

original: 4.054.018a sugrīvaṃ caiva nindantaḥ praśaṃsantaś ca vālinam
analyzed: sugrīvam ca eva nindantaḥ praśaṃsantaḥ ca vālinam
parivārya aṅgado sarve vyavasyan prāyam āsitum
matam tat vāli putrasya vijñāya plavaga ṛṣabhāḥ
upaspṛśya udakam sarve prāc mukhāḥ samupāviśan
dakṣiṇa agreṣu darbheṣu udak tīram samāśritāḥ
sa saṃviśadbhiḥ bahubhiḥ mahīdharaḥ
mahā adri kūṭa pramitaiḥ plavaṃgamaiḥ
babhūva saṃnādita nirjhara antaraḥ
bhṛśam nadadbhiḥ jaladaiḥ iva ulbaṇaiḥ

original: 4.055.001a upaviṣṭās tu te sarve yasmin prāyaṃ giristhale
analyzed: upaviṣṭāḥ tu te sarve yasmin prāyam giri sthale

original: 4.055.001c harayo gṛdhrarājaś ca taṃ deśam upacakrame
analyzed: harayaḥ gṛdhra rājaḥ ca tam deśam upacakrame

original: 4.055.002a sāmpātir nāma nāmnā tu cirajīvī vihaṃgamaḥ
analyzed: sāmpātiḥ nāma nāmnā tu cirajīvī vihaṃgamaḥ
bhrātā jaṭāyuṣaḥ śrīmān prakhyāta bala pauruṣaḥ
kandarāt abhiniṣkramya sa vindhyasya mahā gireḥ

original: 4.055.003c upaviṣṭān harīn dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭātmā giram abravīt
analyzed: upaviṣṭān harīn dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭa ātmā giram abravīt
vidhiḥ kila naram loke vidhānena anuvartate

original: 4.055.004c yathāyaṃ vihito bhakṣyaś cirān mahyam upāgataḥ
analyzed: yathā ayam vihitaḥ bhakṣyaḥ cirāt mahyam upāgataḥ
paramparāṇām bhakṣiṣye vānarāṇām mṛtam mṛtam

original: 4.055.005c uvācaivaṃ vacaḥ pakṣī tān nirīkṣya plavaṃgamān
analyzed: uvāca evam vacaḥ pakṣī tān nirīkṣya plavaṃgamān
tasya tat vacanam śrutvā bhakṣa lubdhasya pakṣiṇaḥ
aṅgadaḥ param āyastaḥ hanūmantam atha abravīt
paśya sītā apadeśena sākṣāt vaivasvataḥ yamaḥ
imam deśam anuprāptaḥ vānarāṇām vipattaye

original: 4.055.008a rāmasya na kṛtaṃ kāryaṃ rājño na ca vacaḥ kṛtam
analyzed: rāmasya na kṛtam kāryam rājñaḥ na ca vacaḥ kṛtam
harīṇām iyam ajñātā vipattiḥ sahasā āgatā
vaidehyāḥ priya kāmena kṛtam karma jaṭāyuṣā

original: 4.055.009c gṛdhrarājena yat tatra śrutaṃ vas tad aśeṣataḥ
analyzed: gṛdhra rājena yat tatra śrutam vaḥ tat aśeṣatas
tathā sarvāṇi bhūtāni tiryagyoni gatāni api

original: 4.055.010c priyaṃ kurvanti rāmasya tyaktvā prāṇān yathā vayam
analyzed: priyam kurvanti rāmasya tyaktvā prāṇān yathā vayam
rāghava arthe pariśrāntāḥ vayam saṃtyakta jīvitāḥ

original: 4.055.011c kāntārāṇi prapannāḥ sma na ca paśyāma maithilīm
analyzed: kāntārāṇi prapannāḥ sma na ca paśyāma maithilīm

original: 4.055.012a sa sukhī gṛdhrarājas tu rāvaṇena hato raṇe
analyzed: sa sukhī gṛdhra rājaḥ tu rāvaṇena hataḥ raṇe

original: 4.055.012c muktaś ca sugrīvabhayād gataś ca paramāṃ gatim
analyzed: muktaḥ ca sugrīva bhayāt gataḥ ca paramām gatim
jaṭāyuṣaḥ vināśena rājñaḥ daśarathasya ca

original: 4.055.013c haraṇena ca vaidehyāḥ saṃśayaṃ harayo gatāḥ
analyzed: haraṇena ca vaidehyāḥ saṃśayam harayaḥ gatāḥ
rāma lakṣmaṇayoḥ vāsām araṇye saha sītayā

original: 4.055.014c rāghavasya ca bāṇena vālinaś ca tathā vadhaḥ
analyzed: rāghavasya ca bāṇena vālinaḥ ca tathā vadhaḥ
rāma kopāt aśeṣāṇām rākṣasānām tathā vadhaḥ

original: 4.055.015c kaikeyyā varadānena idaṃ hi vikṛtaṃ kṛtam
analyzed: kaikeyyāḥ vara dānena idam hi vikṛtam kṛtam

original: 4.055.016a tat tu śrutvā tadā vākyam aṅgadasya mukhodgatam
analyzed: tat tu śrutvā tadā vākyam aṅgadasya mukha udgatam
abravīt vacanam gṛdhraḥ tīkṣṇa tuṇḍaḥ mahā svanaḥ

original: 4.055.017a ko 'yaṃ girā ghoṣayati prāṇaiḥ priyatarasya me
analyzed: kaḥ yam girā ghoṣayati prāṇaiḥ priyatarasya me

original: 4.055.017c jaṭāyuṣo vadhaṃ bhrātuḥ kampayann iva me manaḥ
analyzed: jaṭāyuṣaḥ vadham bhrātuḥ kampayan iva me manaḥ
katham āsīt janasthāne yuddham rākṣasa gṛdhrayoḥ

original: 4.055.018c nāmadheyam idaṃ bhrātuś cirasyādya mayā śrutam
analyzed: nāmadheyam idam bhrātuḥ cirasya adya mayā śrutam
yavīyasaḥ guṇa jñasya ślāghanīyasya vikramaiḥ

original: 4.055.019c tad iccheyam ahaṃ śrotuṃ vināśaṃ vānararṣabhāḥ
analyzed: tat iccheyam aham śrotum vināśam vānara ṛṣabhāḥ
bhrātuḥ jaṭāyuṣaḥ tasya janasthāna nivāsinaḥ

original: 4.055.020c tasyaiva ca mama bhrātuḥ sakhā daśarathaḥ katham
analyzed: tasya eva ca mama bhrātuḥ sakhā daśarathaḥ katham

original: 4.055.020e yasya rāmaḥ priyaḥ putro jyeṣṭho gurujanapriyaḥ
analyzed: yasya rāmaḥ priyaḥ putraḥ jyeṣṭhaḥ guru jana priyaḥ
sūrya aṃśu dagdha pakṣa tvāt na śaknomi visarpitum
iccheyam parvatāt asmāt avatartum ariṃdamāḥ

original: 4.056.001a śokād bhraṣṭasvaram api śrutvā te hariyūthapāḥ
analyzed: śokāt bhraṣṭa svaram api śrutvā te hari yūthapāḥ

original: 4.056.001c śraddadhur naiva tad vākyaṃ karmaṇā tasya śaṅkitāḥ
analyzed: śraddadhuḥ nā eva tat vākyam karmaṇā tasya śaṅkitāḥ

original: 4.056.002a te prāyam upaviṣṭās tu dṛṣṭvā gṛdhraṃ plavaṃgamāḥ
analyzed: te prāyam upaviṣṭāḥ tu dṛṣṭvā gṛdhram plavaṃgamāḥ

original: 4.056.002c cakrur buddhiṃ tadā raudrāṃ sarvān no bhakṣayiṣyati
analyzed: cakruḥ buddhim tadā raudrām sarvān naḥ bhakṣayiṣyati

original: 4.056.003a sarvathā prāyam āsīnān yadi no bhakṣayiṣyati
analyzed: sarvathā prāyam āsīnān yadi naḥ bhakṣayiṣyati

original: 4.056.003c kṛtakṛtyā bhaviṣyāmaḥ kṣipraṃ siddhim ito gatāḥ
analyzed: kṛtakṛtyāḥ bhaviṣyāmaḥ kṣipram siddhim itas gatāḥ

original: 4.056.004a etāṃ buddhiṃ tataś cakruḥ sarve te vānararṣabhāḥ
analyzed: etām buddhim tatas cakruḥ sarve te vānara ṛṣabhāḥ

original: 4.056.004c avatārya gireḥ śṛṅgād gṛdhram āhāṅgadas tadā
analyzed: avatārya gireḥ śṛṅgāt gṛdhram āha aṅgadaḥ tadā
babhūvuḥ kṣarajaḥ nāma vānara indraḥ pratāpavān

original: 4.056.005c mamāryaḥ pārthivaḥ pakṣin dhārmikau tasya cātmajau
analyzed: mama āryaḥ pārthivaḥ pakṣin dhārmikau tasya ca ātmajau

original: 4.056.006a sugrīvaś caiva valī ca putrāv oghabalāv ubhau
analyzed: sugrīvaḥ ca eva valī ca putrau ogha balau ubhau

original: 4.056.006c loke viśrutakarmābhūd rājā vālī pitā mama
analyzed: loke viśruta karmā abhūt rājā vālī pitā mama
rājā kṛtsnasya jagataḥ ikṣvākūṇām mahā rathaḥ
rāmaḥ dāśarathiḥ śrīmān praviṣṭaḥ daṇḍaka vanam

original: 4.056.008a lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā vaidehyā cāpi bhāryayā
analyzed: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā vaidehyā ca api bhāryayā
pituḥ nideśa nirataḥ dharmyam panthānam āśritaḥ

original: 4.056.008e tasya bhāryā janasthānād rāvaṇena hṛtā balāt
analyzed: tasya bhāryā janasthānāt rāvaṇena hṛtā balāt

original: 4.056.009a rāmasya ca pitur mitraṃ jaṭāyur nāma gṛdhrarāṭ
analyzed: rāmasya ca pituḥ mitram jaṭāyuḥ nāma gṛdhra rāj
dadarśa sītām vaidehīm hriyamāṇām vihāyasā

original: 4.056.010a rāvaṇaṃ virathaṃ kṛtvā sthāpayitvā ca maithilīm
analyzed: rāvaṇam viratham kṛtvā sthāpayitvā ca maithilīm

original: 4.056.010c pariśrāntaś ca vṛddhaś ca rāvaṇena hato raṇe
analyzed: pariśrāntaḥ ca vṛddhaḥ ca rāvaṇena hataḥ raṇe

original: 4.056.011a evaṃ gṛdhro hatas tena rāvaṇena bahīyasā
analyzed: evam gṛdhraḥ hataḥ tena rāvaṇena bahīyasā

original: 4.056.011c saṃskṛtaś cāpi rāmeṇa gataś ca gatim uttamām
analyzed: saṃskṛtaḥ ca api rāmeṇa gataḥ ca gatim uttamām
tatas mama pitṛvyeṇa sugrīveṇa mahātmanā

original: 4.056.012c cakāra rāghavaḥ sakhyaṃ so 'vadhīt pitaraṃ mama
analyzed: cakāra rāghavaḥ sakhyam saḥ vadhīt pitaram mama

original: 4.056.013a māma pitrā viruddho hi sugrīvaḥ sacivaiḥ saha
analyzed: māma pitrā viruddhaḥ hi sugrīvaḥ sacivaiḥ saha

original: 4.056.013c nihatya vālinaṃ rāmas tatas tam abhiṣecayat
analyzed: nihatya vālinam rāmaḥ tatas tam abhiṣecayat

original: 4.056.014a sa rājye sthāpitas tena sugrīvo vānareśvaraḥ
analyzed: sa rājye sthāpitaḥ tena sugrīvaḥ vānara īśvaraḥ
rājā vānara mukhyānām yena prasthāpitāḥ vayam

original: 4.056.015a evaṃ rāmaprayuktās tu mārgamāṇās tatas tataḥ
analyzed: evam rāma prayuktāḥ tu mārgamāṇāḥ tatas tatas
vaidehīm na adhigacchāmaḥ rātrau sūrya prabhām iva
te vayam daṇdaka araṇyam vicitya su samāhitāḥ

original: 4.056.016c ajñānāt tu praviṣṭāḥ sma dharaṇyā vivṛtaṃ bilam
analyzed: ajñānāt tu praviṣṭāḥ sma dharaṇyāḥ vivṛtam bilam

original: 4.056.017a mayasya māyā vihitaṃ tad bilaṃ ca vicinvatām
analyzed: mayasya māyā vihitam tat bilam ca vicinvatām

original: 4.056.017c vyatītas tatra no māso yo rājñā sāmayaḥ kṛtaḥ
analyzed: vyatītaḥ tatra naḥ māsaḥ yaḥ rājñā sāmayaḥ kṛtaḥ
te vayam kapi rājasya sarve vacana kāriṇaḥ

original: 4.056.018c kṛtāṃ saṃsthām atikrāntā bhayāt prāyam upāsmahe
analyzed: kṛtām saṃsthām atikrāntāḥ bhayāt prāyam upāsmahe

original: 4.056.019a kruddhe tasmiṃs tu kākutsthe sugrīve ca salakṣmaṇe
analyzed: kruddhe tasmin tu kākutsthe sugrīve ca sa lakṣmaṇe

original: 4.056.019c gatānām api sarveṣāṃ tatra no nāsti jīvitam
analyzed: gatānām api sarveṣām tatra naḥ nā asti jīvitam

original: 4.057.001a ity uktaḥ karuṇaṃ vākyaṃ vānarais tyaktajīvitaiḥ
analyzed: iti uktaḥ karuṇam vākyam vānaraiḥ tyakta jīvitaiḥ
sa bāṣpaḥ vānarān gṛdhraḥ pratyuvāca mahā svanaḥ

original: 4.057.002a yavīyān mama sa bhrātā jaṭāyur nāma vānarāḥ
analyzed: yavīyān mama sa bhrātā jaṭāyuḥ nāma vānarāḥ
yam ākhyāta hatam yuddhe rāvaṇena balīyasā

original: 4.057.003a vṛddhabhāvād apakṣatvāc chṛṇvaṃs tad api marṣaye
analyzed: vṛddha bhāvāt apakṣa tvāt śṛṇvan tat api marṣaye

original: 4.057.003c na hi me śaktir adyāsti bhrātur vairavimokṣaṇe
analyzed: na hi me śaktiḥ adya asti bhrātuḥ vaira vimokṣaṇe

original: 4.057.004a purā vṛtravadhe vṛtte sa cāhaṃ ca jayaiṣiṇau
analyzed: purā vṛtra vadhe vṛtte sa ca aham ca jaya eṣiṇau
ādityam upayātau svaḥ jvalantam raśmimālinam
āvṛtya ākāśa mārgeṇa javena sma gatau bhṛśam

original: 4.057.005c madhyaṃ prāpte ca sūrye ca jaṭāyur avasīdati
analyzed: madhyam prāpte ca sūrye ca jaṭāyuḥ avasīdati

original: 4.057.006a tam ahaṃ bhrātaraṃ dṛṣṭvā sūryaraśmibhir arditam
analyzed: tam aham bhrātaram dṛṣṭvā sūrya raśmibhiḥ arditam
chādayām āsa snehāt parama vihvalam
nirdagdha pakṣaḥ patitaḥ vindhye ham vānara uttamāḥ

original: 4.057.007c aham asmin vasan bhrātuḥ pravṛttiṃ nopalakṣaye
analyzed: aham asmin vasan bhrātuḥ pravṛttim na upalakṣaye

original: 4.057.008a jaṭāyuṣas tv evam ukto bhrātrā saṃpātinā tadā
analyzed: jaṭāyuṣaḥ tu evam uktaḥ bhrātrā saṃpātinā tadā
yuvarājaḥ mahā prājñaḥ pratyuvāca aṅgadaḥ tadā

original: 4.057.009a jaṭāyuṣo yadi bhrātā śrutaṃ te gaditaṃ mayā
analyzed: jaṭāyuṣaḥ yadi bhrātā śrutam te gaditam mayā

original: 4.057.009c ākhyāhi yadi jānāsi nilayaṃ tasya rakṣasaḥ
analyzed: ākhyāhi yadi jānāsi nilayam tasya rakṣasaḥ
a dīrgha darśinam tam vā rāvaṇam rākṣasa adhipam

original: 4.057.010c antike yadi vā dūre yadi jānāsi śaṃsa naḥ
analyzed: antike yadi vā dūre yadi jānāsi śaṃsa naḥ
tatas bravīt mahā tejāḥ jyeṣṭhaḥ bhrātā jaṭāyuṣaḥ
ātma anurūpam vacanam vānarān saṃpraharṣayan
nirdagdha pakṣaḥ gṛdhraḥ ham gata vīryaḥ plavaṃgamāḥ

original: 4.057.012c vāṅmātreṇa tu rāmasya kariṣye sāhyam uttamam
analyzed: vāc mātreṇa tu rāmasya kariṣye sāhyam uttamam

original: 4.057.013a jānāmi vāruṇāl lokān viṣṇos traivikramān api
analyzed: jānāmi vāruṇān lokān viṣṇoḥ traivikramān api
deva asura vimardān ca amṛtasya ca manthanam

original: 4.057.014a rāmasya yad idaṃ kāryaṃ kartavyaṃ prathamaṃ mayā
analyzed: rāmasya yat idam kāryam kartavyam prathamam mayā

original: 4.057.014c jarayā ca hṛtaṃ tejaḥ prāṇāś ca śithilā mama
analyzed: jarayā ca hṛtam tejaḥ prāṇāḥ ca śithilāḥ mama
taruṇī rūpa saṃpannā sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitā
hriyamāṇā mayā dṛṣṭā rāvaṇena durātmanā

original: 4.057.016a krośantī rāma rāmeti lakṣmaṇeti ca bhāminī
analyzed: krośantī rāma rāma iti lakṣmaṇa iti ca bhāminī
bhūṣaṇāni apavidhyantī gātrāṇi ca vidhunvatī
sūrya prabhā iva śaila agre tasyāḥ kauśeyam uttamam

original: 4.057.017c asite rākṣase bhāti yathā vā taḍidambude
analyzed: asite rākṣase bhāti yathā vā taḍit ambude

original: 4.057.018a tāṃ tu sītām ahaṃ manye rāmasya parikīrtanāt
analyzed: tām tu sītām aham manye rāmasya parikīrtanāt

original: 4.057.018c śrūyatāṃ me kathayato nilayaṃ tasya rakṣasaḥ
analyzed: śrūyatām me kathayataḥ nilayam tasya rakṣasaḥ

original: 4.057.019a putro viśravasaḥ sākṣād bhrātā vaiśravaṇasya ca
analyzed: putraḥ viśravasaḥ sākṣāt bhrātā vaiśravaṇasya ca

original: 4.057.019c adhyāste nagarīṃ laṅkāṃ rāvaṇo nāma rākasaḥ
analyzed: adhyāste nagarīm laṅkām rāvaṇaḥ nāma rākasaḥ
itas dvīpe samudrasya saṃpūrṇe śata yojane

original: 4.057.020c tasmiṃl laṅkā purī ramyā nirmitā viśvakarmaṇā
analyzed: tasmin laṅkā purī ramyā nirmitā viśvakarmaṇā
tasyām vasati vaidehī dīnā kauśeya vāsinī
rāvaṇa antaḥpure ruddhā rākṣasībhiḥ su rakṣitā
janakasya ātmajām rājñaḥ tasyām drakṣyatha maithilīm
laṅkāyām atha guptāyām sāgareṇa samantataḥ
saṃprāpya sāgarasya antam saṃpūrṇam śata yojanam

original: 4.057.023c āsādya dakṣiṇaṃ kūlaṃ tato drakṣyatha rāvaṇam
analyzed: āsādya dakṣiṇam kūlam tatas drakṣyatha rāvaṇam
tatra eva tvaritāḥ kṣipram vikramadhvam plavaṃgamāḥ
jñānena khalu paśyāmi dṛṣṭvā pratyāgamiṣyatha

original: 4.057.025a ādyaḥ panthāḥ kuliṅgānāṃ ye cānye dhānyajīvinaḥ
analyzed: ādyaḥ panthāḥ kuliṅgānām ye ca anye dhānya jīvinaḥ
dvitīyaḥ bali bhojānām ye ca vṛkṣa phala āśinaḥ

original: 4.057.026a bhāsās tṛtīyaṃ gacchanti krauñcāś ca kuraraiḥ saha
analyzed: bhāsāḥ tṛtīyam gacchanti krauñcāḥ ca kuraraiḥ saha

original: 4.057.026c śyenāś caturthaṃ gacchanti gṛdhrā gacchanti pañcamam
analyzed: śyenāḥ caturtham gacchanti gṛdhrāḥ gacchanti pañcamam
bala vīrya upapannānām rūpa yauvana śālinām

original: 4.057.027c ṣaṣṭhas tu panthā haṃsānāṃ vainateyagatiḥ parā
analyzed: ṣaṣṭhaḥ tu panthāḥ haṃsānām vainateya gatiḥ parā

original: 4.057.027e vainateyāc ca no janma sarveṣāṃ vānararṣabhāḥ
analyzed: vainateyāt ca naḥ janma sarveṣām vānara ṛṣabhāḥ

original: 4.057.028a garhitaṃ tu kṛtaṃ karma yena sma piśitāśanāḥ
analyzed: garhitam tu kṛtam karma yena sma piśitāśanāḥ
ihasthaḥ ham prapaśyāmi rāvaṇam jānakīm tathā

original: 4.057.029a asmākam api sauvarṇaṃ divyaṃ cakṣurbalaṃ tathā
analyzed: asmākam api sauvarṇam divyam cakṣuḥ balam tathā
tasmāt āhāra vīryeṇa nisargeṇa ca vānarāḥ
āyojana śatāt sāgrāt vayam paśyāma nityaśas

original: 4.057.030a asmākaṃ vihitā vṛttir nisārgeṇa ca dūrataḥ
analyzed: asmākam vihitā vṛttiḥ nisārgeṇa ca dūratas
vihitā pāda mūle tu vṛttiḥ caraṇa yodhinām

original: 4.057.031a upāyo dṛśyatāṃ kaś cil laṅghane lavaṇāmbhasaḥ
analyzed: upāyaḥ dṛśyatām kaḥ cit laṅghane lavaṇāmbhasaḥ
abhigamya tu vaidehīm samṛddha arthāḥ gamiṣyatha
samudram netum icchāmi bhavadbhiḥ varuṇālayam
pradāsyāmi udakam bhrātuḥ svargatasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 4.057.033a tato nītvā tu taṃ deśaṃ tīre nadanadīpateḥ
analyzed: tatas nītvā tu tam deśam tīre nadanadīpateḥ
nirdagdha pakṣam saṃpātim vānarāḥ su mahā ojasaḥ

original: 4.057.034a punaḥ pratyānayitvā vai taṃ deśaṃ patageśvaram
analyzed: punar pratyānayitvā vai tam deśam pataga īśvaram

original: 4.057.034c babhūvur vānarā hṛṣṭāḥ pravṛttim upalabhya te
analyzed: babhūvuḥ vānarāḥ hṛṣṭāḥ pravṛttim upalabhya te
tatas tat amṛta āsvādam gṛdhra rājena bhāṣitam

original: 4.058.001c niśamya vadato hṛṣṭās te vacaḥ plavagarṣabhāḥ
analyzed: niśamya vadataḥ hṛṣṭāḥ te vacaḥ plavaga ṛṣabhāḥ

original: 4.058.002a jāmbavān vai hariśreṣṭhaḥ saha sarvaiḥ plavaṃgamaiḥ
analyzed: jāmbavān vai hari śreṣṭhaḥ saha sarvaiḥ plavaṃgamaiḥ
bhū talāt sahasā utthāya gṛdhra rājānam abravīt

original: 4.058.003a kva sītā kena vā dṛṣṭā ko vā harati maithilīm
analyzed: kva sītā kena vā dṛṣṭā kaḥ vā harati maithilīm

original: 4.058.003c tad ākhyātu bhavān sarvaṃ gatir bhava vanaukasām
analyzed: tat ākhyātu bhavān sarvam gatiḥ bhava vanaukasām
kaḥ dāśarathi bāṇānām vajra vega nipātinām

original: 4.058.004c svayaṃ lakṣmaṇam uktānāṃ na cintayati vikramam
analyzed: svayam lakṣmaṇam uktānām na cintayati vikramam
sa harīn prīti saṃyuktān sītā śruti samāhitān

original: 4.058.005c punar āśvāsayan prīta idaṃ vacanam abravīt
analyzed: punar āśvāsayan prītaḥ idam vacanam abravīt

original: 4.058.006a śrūyatām iha vaidehyā yathā me haraṇaṃ śrutam
analyzed: śrūyatām iha vaidehyāḥ yathā me haraṇam śrutam
yena ca api mama ākhyātam yatra ca āyata locanā

original: 4.058.007a aham asmin girau durge bahuyojanam āyate
analyzed: aham asmin girau durge bahu yojanam āyate
cirāt nipatitaḥ vṛddhaḥ kṣīṇa prāṇa parākramaḥ

original: 4.058.008a taṃ mām evaṃgataṃ putraḥ supārśvo nāma nāmataḥ
analyzed: tam mām evaṃgatam putraḥ supārśvaḥ nāma nāmataḥ
āhāreṇa yathākālam bibharti patatām varaḥ
tīkṣṇa kāmāḥ tu gandharvāḥ tīkṣṇa kopāḥ bhujaṃgamāḥ

original: 4.058.009c mṛgāṇāṃ tu bhayaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ tatas tīkṣṇakṣudhā vayam
analyzed: mṛgāṇām tu bhayam tīkṣṇam tatas tīkṣṇa kṣudhāḥ vayam

original: 4.058.010a sa kadā cit kṣudhārtasya mama cāhārakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: sa kadā cit kṣudhā ārtasya mama ca āhāra kāṅkṣiṇaḥ

original: 4.058.010c gatasūryo 'hani prāpto mama putro hy anāmiṣaḥ
analyzed: gata sūryaḥ hani prāptaḥ mama putraḥ hi anāmiṣaḥ

original: 4.058.011a sa mayā vṛddhabhāvāc ca kopāc ca paribhartsitaḥ
analyzed: sa mayā vṛddha bhāvāt ca kopāt ca paribhartsitaḥ
kṣudh pipāsā parītena kumāraḥ patatām varaḥ
sa mama āhāra saṃrodhāt pīḍitaḥ prīti vardhanaḥ
anumānya yathātattvam idam vacanam abravīt

original: 4.058.013a ahaṃ tāta yathākālam āmiṣārthī kham āplutaḥ
analyzed: aham tāta yathākālam āmiṣa arthī kham āplutaḥ

original: 4.058.013c mahendrasya girer dvāram āvṛtya ca samāsthitaḥ
analyzed: mahā indrasya gireḥ dvāram āvṛtya ca samāsthitaḥ
tatra sattva sahasrāṇām sāgara antara cāriṇām
panthānam ekaḥ dhi avasam saṃniroddhum avāṅmukhaḥ

original: 4.058.015a tatra kaś cin mayā dṛṣṭaḥ sūryodayasamaprabhām
analyzed: tatra kaḥ cit mayā dṛṣṭaḥ sūrya udaya sama prabhām
striyam ādāya gacchan vai bhinnāñjana caya upamaḥ
saḥ ham abhyavahāra arthī tau dṛṣṭvā kṛta niścayaḥ
tena sāmnā vinītena panthānam abhiyācitaḥ

original: 4.058.017a na hi sāmopapannānāṃ prahartā vidyate kva cit
analyzed: na hi sāma upapannānām prahartā vidyate kva cit

original: 4.058.017c nīceṣv api janaḥ kaś cit kim aṅga bata madvidhaḥ
analyzed: nīceṣu api janaḥ kaḥ cit kim aṅga bata madvidhaḥ

original: 4.058.018a sa yātas tejasā vyoma saṃkṣipann iva vegataḥ
analyzed: sa yātaḥ tejasā vyoma saṃkṣipan iva vegataḥ

original: 4.058.018c athāhaṃ khe carair bhūtair abhigamya sabhājitaḥ
analyzed: atha aham khe caraiḥ bhūtaiḥ abhigamya sabhājitaḥ

original: 4.058.019a diṣṭyā jīvasi tāteti abruvan māṃ maharṣayaḥ
analyzed: diṣṭyā jīvasi tāta iti abruvan mām mahā ṛṣayaḥ

original: 4.058.019c kathaṃ cit sakalatro 'sau gatas te svasty asaṃśayam
analyzed: katham cit sa kalatraḥ sau gataḥ te svasti asaṃśayam

original: 4.058.020a evam uktas tato 'haṃ taiḥ siddhaiḥ paramaśobhanaiḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ tatas ham taiḥ siddhaiḥ parama śobhanaiḥ

original: 4.058.020c sa ca me rāvaṇo rājā rakṣasāṃ prativeditaḥ
analyzed: sa ca me rāvaṇaḥ rājā rakṣasām prativeditaḥ
haran dāśaratheḥ bhāryām rāmasya janakātmajām
bhraṣṭa ābharaṇa kauśeyām śoka vega parājitām
rāma lakṣmaṇayoḥ nāma krośantīm mukta mūrdhajām

original: 4.058.022c eṣa kālātyayas tāvad iti vākyavidāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: eṣa kāla atyayaḥ tāvat iti vākya vidām varaḥ

original: 4.058.023a etam arthaṃ samagraṃ me supārśvaḥ pratyavedayat
analyzed: etam artham samagram me supārśvaḥ pratyavedayat

original: 4.058.023c tac chrutvāpi hi me buddhir nāsīt kā cit parākrame
analyzed: tat śrutvā api hi me buddhiḥ na āsīt kā cit parākrame

original: 4.058.024a apakṣo hi kathaṃ pakṣī karma kiṃ cid upakramet
analyzed: apakṣaḥ hi katham pakṣī karma kim cit upakramet

original: 4.058.024c yat tu śakyaṃ mayā kartuṃ vāgbuddhiguṇavartinā
analyzed: yat tu śakyam mayā kartum vāc buddhi guṇa vartinā
śrūyatām tat pravakṣyāmi bhavatām pauruṣa āśrayam

original: 4.058.025c vāṅmatibhyāṃ hi sārveṣāṃ kariṣyāmi priyaṃ hi vaḥ
analyzed: vāc matibhyām hi sārveṣām kariṣyāmi priyam hi vaḥ

original: 4.058.025e yad dhi dāśaratheḥ kāryaṃ mama tan nātra saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: yat hi dāśaratheḥ kāryam mama tat na atra saṃśayaḥ
te bhavantaḥ mati śreṣṭhāḥ balavantaḥ manasvinaḥ
sahitāḥ kapi rājena devaiḥ api durāsadāḥ
rāma lakṣmaṇa bāṇāḥ ca niśitāḥ kaṅka patriṇaḥ
trayāṇām api lokānām paryāptāḥ trāṇa nigrahe
kāmam khalu daśagrīvaḥ tejaḥ bala samanvitaḥ

original: 4.058.028c bhavatāṃ tu samarthānāṃ na kiṃ cid api duṣkaram
analyzed: bhavatām tu samarthānām na kim cit api duṣkaram
tat alam kāla saṃgena kriyatām buddhi niścayaḥ

original: 4.058.029c na hi karmasu sajjante buddhimanto bhavadvidhāḥ
analyzed: na hi karmasu sajjante buddhimantaḥ bhavadvidhāḥ

original: 4.059.001a tataḥ kṛtodakaṃ snātaṃ taṃ gṛdhraṃ hariyūthapāḥ
analyzed: tatas kṛta udakam snātam tam gṛdhram hari yūthapāḥ
upaviṣṭāḥ girau durge parivārya samantataḥ

original: 4.059.002a tam aṅgadam upāsīnaṃ taiḥ sarvair haribhir vṛtam
analyzed: tam aṅgadam upāsīnam taiḥ sarvaiḥ haribhiḥ vṛtam
janita pratyayaḥ harṣāt saṃpātiḥ punar abravīt

original: 4.059.003a kṛtvā niḥśabdam ekāgrāḥ śṛṇvantu harayo mama
analyzed: kṛtvā niḥśabdam ekāgrāḥ śṛṇvantu harayaḥ mama
tattvam saṃkīrtayiṣyāmi yathā jānāmi maithilīm

original: 4.059.004a asya vindhyasya śikhare patito 'smi purā vane
analyzed: asya vindhyasya śikhare patitaḥ smi purā vane
sūrya ātapa parīta aṅgaḥ nirdagdhaḥ sūrya raśmibhiḥ

original: 4.059.005a labdhasaṃjñas tu ṣaḍrātrād vivaśo vihvalann iva
analyzed: labdha saṃjñaḥ tu ṣaṣ rātrāt vivaśaḥ vihvalan iva

original: 4.059.005c vīkṣamāṇo diśaḥ sarvā nābhijānāmi kiṃ cana
analyzed: vīkṣamāṇaḥ diśaḥ sarvāḥ na abhijānāmi kim cana

original: 4.059.006a tatas tu sāgarāñ śailān nadīḥ sarvāḥ sarāṃsi ca
analyzed: tatas tu śailān nadīḥ sarvāḥ sarāṃsi ca

original: 4.059.006c vanāny aṭavideśāṃś ca samīkṣya matir āgamat
analyzed: vanāni aṭavi deśān ca samīkṣya matiḥ āgamat
hṛṣṭa pakṣi gaṇa ākīrṇaḥ kandara antara kūṭavān
dakṣiṇasya udadheḥ tīre vindhyaḥ yam iti niścitaḥ

original: 4.059.008a āsīc cātrāśramaṃ puṇyaṃ surair api supūjitam
analyzed: āsīt ca atra āśramam puṇyam suraiḥ api su pūjitam
ṛṣiḥ niśākaraḥ nāma yasmin ugra tapāḥ abhavat
aṣṭau varṣa sahasrāṇi tena asmin ṛṣiṇā vinā

original: 4.059.009c vasato mama dharmajñāḥ svargate tu niśākare
analyzed: vasataḥ mama dharma jñāḥ svargate tu niśākare

original: 4.059.010a avatīrya ca vindhyāgrāt kṛcchreṇa viṣamāc chanaiḥ
analyzed: avatīrya ca vindhya agrāt kṛcchreṇa viṣamāt śanais
tīkṣṇa darbhām vasumatīm duḥkhena punar āgataḥ

original: 4.059.011a tam ṛṣiṃ draṣṭu kāmo 'smi duḥkhenābhyāgato bhṛśam
analyzed: tam ṛṣim draṣṭu kāmaḥ smi duḥkhena abhyāgataḥ bhṛśam

original: 4.059.011c jaṭāyuṣā mayā caiva bahuśo 'bhigato hi saḥ
analyzed: jaṭāyuṣā mayā ca eva bahuśas hi saḥ
tasya āśrama pada abhyāśe vavuḥ vātāḥ sugandhinaḥ

original: 4.059.012c vṛkṣo nāpuṣpitaḥ kaś cid aphalo vā na dṛśyate
analyzed: vṛkṣaḥ na a puṣpitaḥ kaḥ cit aphalaḥ vā na dṛśyate
upetya ca āśramam puṇyam vṛkṣa mūlam upāśritaḥ
draṣṭu kāmaḥ pratīkṣe ca bhagavantam niśākaram
athā apaśyam adūra stham ṛṣim jvalita tejasam
kṛta abhiṣekam durdharṣam upāvṛttam udak mukham

original: 4.059.015a tam ṛkṣāḥ sṛmarā vyāghrāḥ siṃhā nāgāḥ sarīsṛpāḥ
analyzed: tam ṛkṣāḥ sṛmarāḥ vyāghrāḥ siṃhāḥ nāgāḥ sarīsṛpāḥ
parivārya upagacchanti dātāram prāṇinaḥ yathā

original: 4.059.016a tataḥ prāptam ṛṣiṃ jñātvā tāni sattvāni vai yayuḥ
analyzed: tatas prāptam ṛṣim jñātvā tāni sattvāni vai yayuḥ

original: 4.059.016c praviṣṭe rājani yathā sarvaṃ sāmātyakaṃ balam
analyzed: praviṣṭe rājani yathā sarvam sa amātyakam balam

original: 4.059.017a ṛṣis tu dṛṣṭvā māṃ tuṣṭaḥ praviṣṭaś cāśramaṃ punaḥ
analyzed: ṛṣiḥ tu dṛṣṭvā mām tuṣṭaḥ praviṣṭaḥ ca āśramam punar
muhūrta mātrāt niṣkramya tatas kāryam apṛcchata

original: 4.059.018a saumya vaikalyatāṃ dṛṣṭvā roṃṇāṃ te nāvagamyate
analyzed: saumya vaikalya tām dṛṣṭvā te nā avagamyate

original: 4.059.018c agnidagdhāv imau pakṣau tvak caiva vraṇitā tava
analyzed: agni dagdhau imau pakṣau tvac ca eva vraṇitā tava

original: 4.059.019a dvau gṛdhrau dṛṣṭapūrvau me mātariśvasamau jave
analyzed: dvau gṛdhrau dṛṣṭa pūrvau me mātariśva samau jave
gṛdhrāṇām ca eva rājānau bhrātarau kāmarūpiṇau

original: 4.059.020a jyeṣṭhas tvaṃ tu ca saṃpātir jaṭāyur anujas tava
analyzed: jyeṣṭhaḥ tvam tu ca saṃpātiḥ jaṭāyuḥ anujaḥ tava

original: 4.059.020c mānuṣaṃ rūpam āsthāya gṛhṇītāṃ caraṇau mama
analyzed: mānuṣam rūpam āsthāya gṛhṇītām caraṇau mama

original: 4.059.021a kiṃ te vyādhisamutthānaṃ pakṣayoḥ patanaṃ katham
analyzed: kim te vyādhi samutthānam pakṣayoḥ patanam katham

original: 4.059.021c daṇḍo vāyaṃ dhṛtaḥ kena sarvam ākhyāhi pṛcchataḥ
analyzed: daṇḍaḥ vā ayam dhṛtaḥ kena sarvam ākhyāhi pṛcchataḥ

original: 4.060.001a tatas tad dāruṇaṃ karma duṣkaraṃ sāhasāt kṛtam
analyzed: tatas tat dāruṇam karma duṣkaram sāhasāt kṛtam
ācacakṣe muneḥ sarvam sūrya anugamanam tathā
bhagavan vraṇa yukta tvāt lajjayā ca ākula indriyaḥ
pariśrāntaḥ na śaknomi vacanam paribhāṣitum

original: 4.060.003a ahaṃ caiva jaṭāyuś ca saṃgharṣād darpamohitau
analyzed: aham ca eva jaṭāyuḥ ca saṃgharṣāt darpa mohitau
ākāśam patitau vīrau jighāsantau parākramam
kailāsa śikhare baddhvā munīnām agratas paṇam

original: 4.060.004c raviḥ syād anuyātavyo yāvad astaṃ mahāgirim
analyzed: raviḥ syāt anuyātavyaḥ yāvat astam mahā girim
atha āvām yugapad prāptau apaśyāva mahī tale
ratha cakra pramāṇāni nagarāṇi pṛthak pṛthak

original: 4.060.006a kva cid vāditraghoṣāṃś ca brahmaghoṣāṃś ca śuśruva
analyzed: kva cit vāditra ghoṣān ca brahmaghoṣān ca śuśruva
gāyantīḥ ca aṅganāḥ bahvīḥ paśyāvaḥ rakta vāsasaḥ
tūrṇam utpatya ca ākāśam āditya patham āsthitau
āvām ālokayāvaḥ tat vanam śādvala saṃsthitam

original: 4.060.008a upalair iva saṃchannā dṛśyate bhūḥ śiloccayaiḥ
analyzed: upalaiḥ iva saṃchannā dṛśyate bhūḥ śiloccayaiḥ

original: 4.060.008c āpagābhiś ca saṃvītā sūtrair iva vasuṃdharā
analyzed: āpagābhiḥ ca saṃvītā sūtraiḥ iva vasuṃdharā

original: 4.060.009a himavāṃś caiva vindhyaś ca meruś ca sumahān nagaḥ
analyzed: himavān ca eva vindhyaḥ ca meruḥ ca su mahān nagaḥ
bhū tale saṃprakāśante nāgāḥ iva jalāśaye

original: 4.060.010a tīvrasvedaś ca khedaś ca bhayaṃ cāsīt tadāvayoḥ
analyzed: tīvra svedaḥ ca khedaḥ ca bhayam ca āsīt tadā āvayoḥ

original: 4.060.010c samāviśata mohaś ca mohān mūrchā ca dāruṇā
analyzed: samāviśata mohaḥ ca mohāt mūrchā ca dāruṇā

original: 4.060.011a na dig vijñāyate yāmyā nāgenyā na ca vāruṇī
analyzed: na diś vijñāyate yāmyā nāgenyā na ca vāruṇī

original: 4.060.011c yugānte niyato loko hato dagdha ivāgninā
analyzed: yuga ante niyataḥ lokaḥ hataḥ dagdhaḥ iva agninā
yatnena mahatā bhūyas raviḥ samavalokitaḥ
tulyaḥ pṛthvī pramāṇena bhāskaraḥ pratibhāti nau

original: 4.060.013a jaṭāyur mām anāpṛcchya nipapāta mahīṃ tataḥ
analyzed: jaṭāyuḥ mām an āpṛcchya nipapāta mahīm tatas

original: 4.060.013c taṃ dṛṣṭvā tūrṇam ākāśād ātmānaṃ muktavān aham
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā tūrṇam ākāśāt ātmānam muktavān aham

original: 4.060.014a pakṣibhyāṃ ca mayā gupto jaṭāyur na pradahyata
analyzed: pakṣibhyām ca mayā guptaḥ jaṭāyuḥ na pradahyata

original: 4.060.014c pramādāt tatra nirdagdhaḥ patan vāyupathād aham
analyzed: pramādāt tatra nirdagdhaḥ patan vāyu pathāt aham
āśaṅke tam nipatitam janasthāne jaṭāyuṣam

original: 4.060.015c ahaṃ tu patito vindhye dagdhapakṣo jaḍīkṛtaḥ
analyzed: aham tu patitaḥ vindhye dagdha pakṣaḥ jaḍīkṛtaḥ

original: 4.060.016a rājyena hīno bhrātrā ca pakṣābhyāṃ vikrameṇa ca
analyzed: rājyena hīnaḥ bhrātrā ca pakṣābhyām vikrameṇa ca

original: 4.060.016c sarvathā martum evecchan patiṣye śikharād gireḥ
analyzed: sarvathā martum evā icchan patiṣye śikharāt gireḥ

original: 4.061.001a evam uktvā muniśreṣṭham arudaṃ duḥkhito bhṛśam
analyzed: evam uktvā muni śreṣṭham arudam duḥkhitaḥ bhṛśam

original: 4.061.001c atha dhyātvā muhūrtaṃ tu bhagavān idam abravīt
analyzed: atha dhyātvā muhūrtam tu bhagavān idam abravīt

original: 4.061.002a pakṣau ca te prapakṣau ca punar anyau bhaviṣyataḥ
analyzed: pakṣau ca te prapakṣau ca punar anyau bhaviṣyataḥ

original: 4.061.002c cakṣuṣī caiva prāṇāś ca vikramaś ca balaṃ ca te
analyzed: cakṣuṣī ca eva prāṇāḥ ca vikramaḥ ca balam ca te

original: 4.061.003a purāṇe sumahat kāryaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ hi mayā śrutam
analyzed: purāṇe su mahat kāryam bhaviṣyam hi mayā śrutam

original: 4.061.003c dṛṣṭaṃ me tapasā caiva śrutvā ca viditaṃ mama
analyzed: dṛṣṭam me tapasā ca eva śrutvā ca viditam mama

original: 4.061.004a rājā daśaratho nāma kaś cid ikṣvākunandanaḥ
analyzed: rājā daśarathaḥ nāma kaḥ cit ikṣvāku nandanaḥ

original: 4.061.004c tasya putro mahātejā rāmo nāma bhaviṣyati
analyzed: tasya putraḥ mahā tejāḥ rāmaḥ nāma bhaviṣyati

original: 4.061.005a araṇyaṃ ca saha bhrātrā lakṣmaṇena gamiṣyati
analyzed: araṇyam ca saha bhrātrā lakṣmaṇena gamiṣyati

original: 4.061.005c tasminn arthe niyuktaḥ san pitrā satyaparākramaḥ
analyzed: tasmin arthe niyuktaḥ san pitrā satya parākramaḥ

original: 4.061.006a nairṛto rāvaṇo nāma tasyā bhāryāṃ hariṣyati
analyzed: nairṛtaḥ rāvaṇaḥ nāma tasyāḥ bhāryām hariṣyati
rākṣasa indraḥ janasthānāt avadhyaḥ sura dānavaiḥ

original: 4.061.007a sā ca kāmaiḥ pralobhyantī bhakṣyair bhojyaiś ca maithilī
analyzed: sā ca kāmaiḥ bhakṣyaiḥ bhojyaiḥ ca maithilī
na bhokṣyati mahābhāgā duḥkha magnā yaśasvinī

original: 4.061.008a paramānnaṃ tu vaidehyā jñātvā dāsyati vāsavaḥ
analyzed: paramānnam tu vaidehyāḥ jñātvā dāsyati vāsavaḥ

original: 4.061.008c yad annam amṛtaprakhyaṃ surāṇām api durlabham
analyzed: yat annam amṛta prakhyam surāṇām api durlabham

original: 4.061.009a tad annaṃ maithilī prāpya vijñāyendrād idaṃ tv iti
analyzed: tat annam maithilī prāpya vijñāya indrāt idam tu iti
agram uddhṛtya rāmāya bhū tale nirvapiṣyati

original: 4.061.010a yadi jīvati me bhartā lakṣmaṇena saha prabhuḥ
analyzed: yadi jīvati me bhartā lakṣmaṇena saha prabhuḥ

original: 4.061.010c devatvaṃ gatayor vāpi tayor annam idaṃ tv iti
analyzed: deva tvam gatayoḥ vā api tayoḥ annam idam tu iti
eṣyanti anveṣakāḥ tasyāḥ rāma dūtāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
ākhyeyā rāma mahiṣī tvayā tebhyaḥ vihaṃgama

original: 4.061.012a sarvathā tu na gantavyam īdṛśaḥ kva gamiṣyasi
analyzed: sarvathā tu na gantavyam īdṛśaḥ kva gamiṣyasi
deśa kālau pratīkṣasva pakṣau tvam pratipatsyase

original: 4.061.013a utsaheyam ahaṃ kartum adyaiva tvāṃ sapakṣakam
analyzed: utsaheyam aham kartum adyā eva tvām sa pakṣakam

original: 4.061.013c ihasthas tvaṃ tu lokānāṃ hitaṃ kāryaṃ kariṣyasi
analyzed: ihasthaḥ tvam tu lokānām hitam kāryam kariṣyasi

original: 4.061.014a tvayāpi khalu tat kāryaṃ tayoś ca nṛpaputrayoḥ
analyzed: tvayā api khalu tat kāryam tayoḥ ca nṛpa putrayoḥ

original: 4.061.014c brāhmaṇānāṃ surāṇāṃ ca munīnāṃ vāsavasya ca
analyzed: brāhmaṇānām surāṇām ca munīnām vāsavasya ca

original: 4.061.015a icchāmy aham api draṣṭuṃ bhrātaru rāmalakṣmaṇau
analyzed: icchāmi aham api draṣṭum bhrātaru rāma lakṣmaṇau

original: 4.061.015c necche ciraṃ dhārayituṃ prāṇāṃs tyakṣye kalevaram
analyzed: na icche ciram dhārayitum prāṇān tyakṣye kalevaram

original: 4.062.001a etair anyaiś ca bahubhir vākyair vākyaviśāradaḥ
analyzed: etaiḥ anyaiḥ ca bahubhiḥ vākyaiḥ vākya viśāradaḥ

original: 4.062.001c māṃ praśasyābhyanujñāpya praviṣṭaḥ sa svam āśramam
analyzed: mām praśasya abhyanujñāpya praviṣṭaḥ sa svam āśramam

original: 4.062.002a kandarāt tu visarpitvā parvatasya śanaiḥ śanaiḥ
analyzed: kandarāt tu visarpitvā parvatasya śanais śanais
aham vindhyam samāruhya bhavataḥ pratipālaye

original: 4.062.003a adya tv etasya kālasya sāgraṃ varṣaśataṃ gatam
analyzed: adya tu etasya kālasya sāgram varṣa śatam gatam
deśa kāla pratīkṣaḥ smi hṛdi kṛtvā muneḥ vacaḥ
mahāprasthānam āsādya svargate tu niśākare

original: 4.062.004c māṃ nirdahati saṃtāpo vitarkair bahubhir vṛtam
analyzed: mām nirdahati saṃtāpaḥ vitarkaiḥ bahubhiḥ vṛtam

original: 4.062.005a utthitāṃ maraṇe buddhiṃ muni vākyair nivartaye
analyzed: utthitām maraṇe buddhim muni vākyaiḥ nivartaye

original: 4.062.005c buddhir yā tena me dattā prāṇasaṃrakṣaṇāya tu
analyzed: buddhiḥ yā tena me dattā prāṇa saṃrakṣaṇāya tu
sā me panayate duḥkham dīptā iva agni śikhā tamaḥ

original: 4.062.006a budhyatā ca mayā vīryaṃ rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ
analyzed: budhyatā ca mayā vīryam rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ

original: 4.062.006c putraḥ saṃtarjito vāgbhir na trātā maithilī katham
analyzed: putraḥ saṃtarjitaḥ vāgbhiḥ na trātā maithilī katham

original: 4.062.007a tasyā vilapitaṃ śrutvā tau ca sītā vinākṛtau
analyzed: tasyāḥ vilapitam śrutvā tau ca sītā vinākṛtau
na me daśaratha snehāt putreṇa utpāditam priyam

original: 4.062.008a tasya tv evaṃ bruvāṇasya saṃpāter vānaraiḥ saha
analyzed: tasya tu evam bruvāṇasya saṃpāteḥ vānaraiḥ saha
utpetatuḥ tadā pakṣau samakṣam vana cāriṇām

original: 4.062.009a sa dṛṣṭvā svāṃ tanuṃ pakṣair udgatair aruṇacchadaiḥ
analyzed: sa dṛṣṭvā svām tanum pakṣaiḥ udgataiḥ aruṇa chadaiḥ

original: 4.062.009c praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe vānarāṃś cedam abravīt
analyzed: praharṣam atulam lebhe vānarān ca idam abravīt
niśākarasya mahā ṛṣeḥ prabhāvāt amita ātmanaḥ
āditya raśmi nirdagdhau pakṣau me punar utthitau
yauvane vartamānasya mama āsīt yaḥ parākramaḥ

original: 4.062.011c tam evādyāvagacchāmi balaṃ pauruṣam eva ca
analyzed: tam eva adya avagacchāmi balam pauruṣam eva ca
sarvathā kriyatām yatnaḥ sītām adhigamiṣyatha
pakṣa lābhaḥ mama ayam vaḥ siddhi pratyaya kārakaḥ

original: 4.062.013a ity uktvā tān harīn sarvān saṃpātiḥ patatāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: iti uktvā tān harīn sarvān saṃpātiḥ patatām varaḥ

original: 4.062.013c utpapāta gireḥ śṛṅgāj jijñāsuḥ khagamo gatim
analyzed: utpapāta gireḥ śṛṅgāt jijñāsuḥ khagamaḥ gatim
tasya tat vacanam śrutvā prīti saṃhṛṣṭa mānasāḥ
babhūvuḥ hari śārdūlāḥ vikrama abhyudaya unmukhāḥ
atha pavana samāna vikramāḥ
plavaga varāḥ pratilabdha pauruṣāḥ
abhijit abhimukhām diśam yayuḥ
janakasutā parimārgaṇa unmukhāḥ
ākhyātāḥ gṛdhra rājena samutpatya plavaṃgamāḥ
saṃgatāḥ prīti saṃyuktāḥ vineduḥ siṃha vikramāḥ
saṃpāteḥ vacanam śrutvā harayaḥ rāvaṇa kṣayam
hṛṣṭāḥ sāgaram ājagmuḥ sītā darśana kāṅkṣiṇaḥ

original: 4.063.003a abhikramya tu taṃ deśaṃ dadṛśur bhīmavikramāḥ
analyzed: abhikramya tu tam deśam dadṛśuḥ bhīma vikramāḥ

original: 4.063.003c kṛtsnaṃ lokasya mahataḥ pratibimbam iva sthitam
analyzed: kṛtsnam lokasya mahataḥ pratibimbam iva sthitam
dakṣiṇasya samudrasya samāsādya uttarām diśam
saṃniveśam tatas cakruḥ sahitāḥ vānara uttamāḥ

original: 4.063.005a sattvair mahadbhir vikṛtaiḥ krīḍadbhir vividhair jale
analyzed: sattvaiḥ mahadbhiḥ vikṛtaiḥ krīḍadbhiḥ vividhaiḥ jale
vyātta āsyaiḥ su mahā kāyaiḥ ūrmibhiḥ ca samākulam

original: 4.063.006a prasuptam iva cānyatra krīḍantam iva cānyataḥ
analyzed: prasuptam iva ca anyatra krīḍantam iva ca anyatas

original: 4.063.006c kva cit parvatamātraiś ca jalarāśibhir āvṛtam
analyzed: kva cit parvata mātraiḥ ca jala rāśibhiḥ āvṛtam
saṃkulam dānava indraiḥ ca pātāla tala vāsibhiḥ
romaharṣa karam dṛṣṭvā viṣeduḥ kapi kuñjarāḥ

original: 4.063.008a ākāśam iva duṣpāraṃ sāgaraṃ prekṣya vānarāḥ
analyzed: ākāśam iva duṣpāram sāgaram prekṣya vānarāḥ

original: 4.063.008c viṣeduḥ sahasā sarve kathaṃ kāryam iti bruvan
analyzed: viṣeduḥ sahasā sarve katham kāryam iti bruvan
viṣaṇṇām vāhinīm dṛṣṭvā sāgarasya nirīkṣaṇāt
āśvāsayām āsa harīn bhaya ārtān hari sattamaḥ

original: 4.063.010a na niṣādena naḥ kāryaṃ viṣādo doṣavattaraḥ
analyzed: na niṣādena naḥ kāryam viṣādaḥ doṣavattaraḥ

original: 4.063.010c viṣādo hanti puruṣaṃ bālaṃ kruddha ivoragaḥ
analyzed: viṣādaḥ hanti puruṣam bālam kruddhaḥ iva uragaḥ
viṣādaḥ yam prasahate vikrame paryupasthite

original: 4.063.011c tejasā tasya hīnasya puruṣārtho na sidhyati
analyzed: tejasā tasya hīnasya puruṣa arthaḥ na sidhyati

original: 4.063.012a tasyāṃ rātryāṃ vyatītāyām aṅgado vānaraiḥ saha
analyzed: tasyām rātryām vyatītāyām aṅgadaḥ vānaraiḥ saha
hari vṛddhaiḥ samāgamya punar mantram amantrayat
sā vānarāṇām dhvajinī parivārya aṅgadam babhau
vāsavam parivārya iva marutām vāhinī sthitā

original: 4.063.014a ko 'nyas tāṃ vānarīṃ senāṃ śaktaḥ stambhayituṃ bhavet
analyzed: kaḥ nyaḥ tām vānarīm senām śaktaḥ stambhayitum bhavet
anyatra vāli tanayāt anyatra ca hanūmataḥ

original: 4.063.015a tatas tān harivṛddhāṃś ca tac ca sainyam ariṃdamaḥ
analyzed: tatas tān hari vṛddhān ca tat ca sainyam ariṃdamaḥ
anumānya aṅgadaḥ śrīmān vākyam arthavat abravīt
kaḥ idānīm mahā tejāḥ laṅghayiṣyati sāgaram
kaḥ kariṣyati sugrīvam satya saṃdham ariṃdamam
kaḥ vīraḥ yojana śatam laṅghayeta plavaṃgamāḥ

original: 4.063.017c imāṃś ca yūthapān sarvān mocayet ko mahābhayāt
analyzed: imān ca yūthapān sarvān mocayet kaḥ mahā bhayāt

original: 4.063.018a kasya prasādād dārāṃś ca putrāṃś caiva gṛhāṇi ca
analyzed: kasya prasādāt dārān ca putrān ca eva gṛhāṇi ca

original: 4.063.018c ito nivṛttāḥ paśyema siddhārthāḥ sukhino vayam
analyzed: itas nivṛttāḥ paśyema siddhārthāḥ sukhinaḥ vayam

original: 4.063.019a kasya prasādād rāmaṃ ca lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābalam
analyzed: kasya prasādāt rāmam ca lakṣmaṇam ca mahā balam
abhigacchema saṃhṛṣṭāḥ sugrīvam ca mahā balam

original: 4.063.020a yadi kaś cit samartho vaḥ sāgaraplavane hariḥ
analyzed: yadi kaḥ cit samarthaḥ vaḥ sāgara plavane hariḥ
