original: 4.063.020c sa dadātv iha naḥ śīghraṃ puṇyām abhayadakṣiṇām
analyzed: sa dadātu iha naḥ śīghram puṇyām abhaya dakṣiṇām

original: 4.063.021a aṅgadasya vacaḥ śrutvā na kaś cit kiṃ cid abravīt
analyzed: aṅgadasya vacaḥ śrutvā na kaḥ cit kim cit abravīt
stimitā iva abhavat sarvā sā tatra hari vāhinī

original: 4.063.022a punar evāṅgadaḥ prāha tān harīn harisattamaḥ
analyzed: punar eva aṅgadaḥ prāha tān harīn hari sattamaḥ
sarve balavatām śreṣṭhāḥ bhavantaḥ dṛḍha vikramāḥ

original: 4.063.023a vyapadeśya kule jātāḥ pūjitāś cāpy abhīkṣṇaśaḥ
analyzed: kule jātāḥ pūjitāḥ ca api abhīkṣṇaśas

original: 4.063.023c na hi vo gamane saṃgaḥ kadā cid api kasya cit
analyzed: na hi vaḥ gamane saṃgaḥ kadā cit api kasya cit

original: 4.063.024a bruvadhvaṃ yasya yā śaktir gamane plavagarṣabhāḥ
analyzed: bruvadhvam yasya yā śaktiḥ gamane plavaga ṛṣabhāḥ
tatas ṅgada vacaḥ śrutvā sarve te vānara uttamāḥ

original: 4.064.001c svaṃ svaṃ gatau samutsāham āhus tatra yathākramam
analyzed: svam svam gatau samutsāham āhuḥ tatra yathākramam
gajaḥ gavākṣaḥ gavayaḥ śarabhaḥ gandhamādanaḥ

original: 4.064.002c maindaś ca dvividaś caiva suṣeṇo jāmbavāṃs tathā
analyzed: maindaḥ ca dvividaḥ ca eva suṣeṇaḥ jāmbavān tathā
ābabhāṣe gajaḥ tatra plaveyam daśa yojanam
gavākṣaḥ yojanāni āha gamiṣyāmi iti viṃśatim

original: 4.064.004a gavayo vānaras tatra vānarāṃs tān uvāca ha
analyzed: gavayaḥ vānaraḥ tatra vānarān tān uvāca ha
triṃśatam tu gamiṣyāmi yojanānām plavaṃgamāḥ

original: 4.064.005a śarabho vānaras tatra vānarāṃs tān uvāca ha
analyzed: śarabhaḥ vānaraḥ tatra vānarān tān uvāca ha
catvāriṃśat gamiṣyāmi yojanānām na saṃśayaḥ
vānarān tu mahā tejāḥ abravīt gandhamādanaḥ

original: 4.064.006c yojanānāṃ gamiṣyāmi pañcāśat tu na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: yojanānām gamiṣyāmi pañcāśat tu na saṃśayaḥ

original: 4.064.007a maindas tu vānaras tatra vānarāṃs tān uvāca ha
analyzed: maindaḥ tu vānaraḥ tatra vānarān tān uvāca ha

original: 4.064.007c yojanānāṃ paraṃ ṣaṣṭim ahaṃ plavitum utsahe
analyzed: yojanānām param ṣaṣṭim aham plavitum utsahe
tatas tatra mahā tejāḥ dvividaḥ pratyabhāṣata

original: 4.064.008c gamiṣyāmi na saṃdehaḥ saptatiṃ yojanāny aham
analyzed: gamiṣyāmi na saṃdehaḥ saptatim yojanāni aham
suṣeṇaḥ tu hari śreṣṭhaḥ proktavān kapi sattamān
aśītim yojanānām tu plaveyam plavaga ṛṣabhāḥ

original: 4.064.010a teṣāṃ kathayatāṃ tatra sarvāṃs tān anumānya ca
analyzed: teṣām kathayatām tatra sarvān tān anumānya ca
tatas vṛddhatamaḥ teṣām jāmbavān pratyabhāṣata

original: 4.064.011a pūrvam asmākam apy āsīt kaś cid gatiparākramaḥ
analyzed: pūrvam asmākam api āsīt kaḥ cit gati parākramaḥ

original: 4.064.011c te vayaṃ vayasaḥ pāram anuprāptāḥ sma sāmpratam
analyzed: te vayam vayasaḥ pāram anuprāptāḥ sma sāmpratam

original: 4.064.012a kiṃ tu naivaṃ gate śakyam idaṃ kāryam upekṣitum
analyzed: kim tu nā evam gate śakyam idam kāryam upekṣitum

original: 4.064.012c yad arthaṃ kapirājaś ca rāmaś ca kṛtaniścayau
analyzed: yat artham kapi rājaḥ ca rāmaḥ ca kṛta niścayau

original: 4.064.013a sāmprataṃ kālabhedena yā gatis tāṃ nibodhata
analyzed: sāmpratam kāla bhedena yā gatiḥ tām nibodhata

original: 4.064.013c navatiṃ yojanānāṃ tu gamiṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: navatim yojanānām tu gamiṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ

original: 4.064.014a tāṃś ca sarvān hariśreṣṭhāñ jāmbavān punar abravīt
analyzed: tān ca sarvān hari śreṣṭhām jāmbavān punar abravīt

original: 4.064.014c na khalv etāvad evāsīd gamane me parākramaḥ
analyzed: na khalu etāvat evā āsīt gamane me parākramaḥ

original: 4.064.015a mayā mahābalaiś caiva yajñe viṣṇuḥ sanātanaḥ
analyzed: mayā mahā balaiḥ ca eva yajñe viṣṇuḥ sanātanaḥ
pradakṣiṇīkṛtaḥ pūrvam kramamāṇaḥ trivikramaḥ

original: 4.064.016a sa idānīm ahaṃ vṛddhaḥ plavane mandavikramaḥ
analyzed: saḥ idānīm aham vṛddhaḥ plavane manda vikramaḥ

original: 4.064.016c yauvane ca tadāsīn me balam apratimaṃ paraiḥ
analyzed: yauvane ca tadā āsīt me balam apratimam paraiḥ

original: 4.064.017a saṃpraty etāvatīṃ śaktiṃ gamane tarkayāmy aham
analyzed: saṃprati etāvatīm śaktim gamane tarkayāmi aham
na etāvatā ca saṃsiddhiḥ kāryasya asya bhaviṣyati
atha uttaram udāra artham abravīt aṅgadaḥ tadā
anumānya mahā prājñaḥ jāmbavantam mahā kapim

original: 4.064.019a aham etad gamiṣyāmi yojanānāṃ śataṃ mahat
analyzed: aham etat gamiṣyāmi yojanānām śatam mahat

original: 4.064.019c nivartane tu me śaktiḥ syān na veti na niścitam
analyzed: nivartane tu me śaktiḥ syāt na vā iti na niścitam
tam uvāca hari śreṣṭhaḥ jāmbavān vākya kovidaḥ
jñāyate gamane śaktiḥ tava hari ṛkṣa sattama

original: 4.064.021a kāmaṃ śatasahasraṃ vā na hy eṣa vidhir ucyate
analyzed: kāmam śata sahasram vā na hi eṣa vidhiḥ ucyate
yojanānām śaktaḥ gantum pratinivartitum

original: 4.064.022a na hi preṣayitā tata svāmī preṣyaḥ kathaṃ cana
analyzed: na hi preṣayitā tata svāmī preṣyaḥ katham cana
bhavatā ayam janaḥ sarvaḥ preṣyaḥ plavaga sattama
bhavān kalatram asmākam svāmi bhāve vyavasthitaḥ

original: 4.064.023c svāmī kalatraṃ sainyasya gatir eṣā paraṃtapa
analyzed: svāmī kalatram sainyasya gatiḥ eṣā paraṃtapa

original: 4.064.024a tasmāt kalatravat tāta pratipālyaḥ sadā bhavān
analyzed: tasmāt kalatra vat tāta pratipālyaḥ sadā bhavān

original: 4.064.024c api caitasya kāryasya bhavān mūlam ariṃdama
analyzed: api ca etasya kāryasya bhavān mūlam ariṃdama

original: 4.064.025a mūlam arthasya saṃrakṣyam eṣa kāryavidāṃ nayaḥ
analyzed: mūlam arthasya saṃrakṣyam eṣa kārya vidām nayaḥ

original: 4.064.025c mūle hi sati sidhyanti guṇāḥ puṣpaphalādayaḥ
analyzed: mūle hi sati sidhyanti guṇāḥ puṣpa phala ādayaḥ

original: 4.064.026a tad bhavān asyā kāryasya sādhane satyavikramaḥ
analyzed: tat bhavān kāryasya sādhane satya vikramaḥ
buddhi vikrama saṃpannaḥ hetuḥ atra paraṃtapaḥ

original: 4.064.027a guruś ca guruputraś ca tvaṃ hi naḥ kapisattama
analyzed: guruḥ ca guru putraḥ ca tvam hi naḥ kapi sattama

original: 4.064.027c bhavantam āśritya vayaṃ samarthā hy arthasādhane
analyzed: bhavantam āśritya vayam samarthāḥ hi artha sādhane
ukta vākyam mahā prājñam jāmbavantam mahā kapiḥ
pratyuvāca uttaram vākyam vāli sūnuḥ atha aṅgadaḥ
yadi nā aham gamiṣyāmi nā anyaḥ vānara puṃgavaḥ

original: 4.064.029c punaḥ khalv idam asmābhiḥ kāryaṃ prāyopaveśanam
analyzed: punar khalu idam asmābhiḥ kāryam prāya upaveśanam

original: 4.064.030a na hy akṛtvā haripateḥ saṃdeśaṃ tasya dhīmataḥ
analyzed: na hi a kṛtvā hari pateḥ saṃdeśam tasya dhīmataḥ
tatra api gatvā prāṇānām paśyāmi parirakṣaṇam

original: 4.064.031a sa hi prasāde cātyarthaṃ kope ca harir īśvaraḥ
analyzed: sa hi prasāde ca atyartham kope ca hariḥ īśvaraḥ

original: 4.064.031c atītya tasya saṃdeśaṃ vināśo gamane bhavet
analyzed: atītya tasya saṃdeśam vināśaḥ gamane bhavet

original: 4.064.032a tad yathā hy asya kāryasya na bhavaty anyathā gatiḥ
analyzed: tat yathā hi asya kāryasya na bhavati anyathā gatiḥ

original: 4.064.032c tad bhavān eva dṛṣṭārthaḥ saṃcintayitum arhati
analyzed: tat bhavān eva dṛṣṭa arthaḥ saṃcintayitum arhati
saḥ ṅgadena tadā vīraḥ pratyuktaḥ plavaga ṛṣabhaḥ
jāmbavān uttaram vākyam provāca idam tatas ṅgadam

original: 4.064.034a asya te vīra kāryasya na kiṃ cit parihīyate
analyzed: asya te vīra kāryasya na kim cit parihīyate

original: 4.064.034c eṣa saṃcodayāmy enaṃ yaḥ kāryaṃ sādhayiṣyati
analyzed: eṣa saṃcodayāmi enam yaḥ kāryam sādhayiṣyati
tatas pratītam plavatām variṣṭham
ekāntam āśritya sukha upaviṣṭam
saṃcodayām āsa hari pravīro
hari pravīram hanumantam eva
aneka śata sāhasrīm viṣaṇṇām hari vāhinīm
jāmbavān samudīkṣya evam hanumantam atha abravīt
vīra vānara lokasya sarva śāstram atha abravīt

original: 4.065.002c tūṣṇīm ekāntam āśritya hanuman kiṃ na jalpasi
analyzed: tūṣṇīm ekāntam āśritya hanuman kim na jalpasi

original: 4.065.003a hanuman harirājasya sugrīvasya samo hy asi
analyzed: hanuman hari rājasya sugrīvasya samaḥ hi asi

original: 4.065.003c rāmalakṣmaṇayoś cāpi tejasā ca balena ca
analyzed: rāma lakṣmaṇayoḥ ca api tejasā ca balena ca
ariṣṭaneminaḥ putrau vainateyaḥ mahā balaḥ
garutmān iva vikhyātaḥ uttamaḥ sarva pakṣiṇām

original: 4.065.005a bahuśo hi mayā dṛṣṭaḥ sāgare sa mahābalaḥ
analyzed: bahuśas hi mayā dṛṣṭaḥ sāgare sa mahā balaḥ
bhujagān uddharan pakṣī mahā vegaḥ mahā yaśāḥ

original: 4.065.006a pakṣayor yad balaṃ tasya tāvad bhujabalaṃ tava
analyzed: pakṣayoḥ yat balam tasya tāvat bhuja balam tava

original: 4.065.006c vikramaś cāpi vegaś ca na te tenāpahīyate
analyzed: vikramaḥ ca api vegaḥ ca na te tena apahīyate

original: 4.065.007a balaṃ buddhiś ca tejaś ca sattvaṃ ca harisattama
analyzed: balam buddhiḥ ca tejaḥ ca sattvam ca hari sattama

original: 4.065.007c viśiṣṭaṃ sarvabhūteṣu kim ātmānaṃ na budhyase
analyzed: viśiṣṭam sarva bhūteṣu kim ātmānam na budhyase
apsarāḥ apsarasām śreṣṭhā vikhyātā puñjikasthalā
parikhyātā patnī kesariṇaḥ hareḥ
abhiśāpāt abhūt tāta vānarī kāmarūpiṇī
duhitā vānara indrasya kuñjarasya mahātmanaḥ
kapi tve cāru sarva aṅgī kadā cit kāmarūpiṇī
mānuṣam vigraham kṛtvā yauvana uttama śālinī
acarat parvatasya agre prāvṛṣ ambuda saṃnibhe
vicitra mālya ābharaṇā mahārha kṣauma vāsinī

original: 4.065.012a tasyā vastraṃ viśālākṣyāḥ pītaṃ raktadaśaṃ śubham
analyzed: tasyāḥ vastram viśāla akṣyāḥ pītam rakta daśam śubham
sthitāyāḥ parvatasya agre mārutaḥ upaharat śanais

original: 4.065.013a sa dadarśa tatas tasyā vṛttāv ūrū susaṃhatau
analyzed: sa dadarśa tatas tasyāḥ vṛttau ūrū su saṃhatau

original: 4.065.013c stanau ca pīnau sahitau sujātaṃ cāru cānanam
analyzed: stanau ca pīnau sahitau sujātam cāru ca ānanam
tām viśāla āyata śroṇīm tanu madhyām yaśasvinīm
dṛṣṭvā eva pavanaḥ kāma mohitaḥ

original: 4.065.015a sa tāṃ bhujābhyāṃ pīnābhyāṃ paryaṣvajata mārutaḥ
analyzed: sa tām bhujābhyām pīnābhyām paryaṣvajata mārutaḥ
manmatha āviṣṭa sarva aṅgaḥ gata ātmā tām aninditām

original: 4.065.016a sā tu tatraiva saṃbhrāntā suvṛttā vākyam abravīt
analyzed: sā tu tatra eva saṃbhrāntā su vṛttā vākyam abravīt
eka patnī vratam idam kaḥ nāśayitum icchati
añjanāyāḥ vacaḥ śrutvā mārutaḥ pratyabhāṣata

original: 4.065.017c na tvāṃ hiṃsāmi suśroṇi mā bhūt te subhage bhayam
analyzed: na tvām hiṃsāmi suśroṇi mā bhūt te subhage bhayam

original: 4.065.018a manasāsmi gato yat tvāṃ pariṣvajya yaśasvini
analyzed: manasā asmi gataḥ yat tvām pariṣvajya yaśasvini
vīryavān buddhi saṃpannaḥ putraḥ tava bhaviṣyati

original: 4.065.019a abhyutthitaṃ tataḥ sūryaṃ bālo dṛṣṭvā mahāvane
analyzed: abhyutthitam tatas sūryam bālaḥ dṛṣṭvā mahā vane

original: 4.065.019c phalaṃ ceti jighṛkṣus tvam utplutyābhyapato divam
analyzed: phalam ca iti jighṛkṣuḥ tvam utplutya abhyapataḥ divam
śatāni trīṇi gatvā atha yojanānām mahā kape

original: 4.065.020c tejasā tasya nirdhūto na viṣādaṃ tato gataḥ
analyzed: tejasā tasya nirdhūtaḥ na viṣādam tatas gataḥ
tāvat āpatataḥ tūrṇam antarikṣam mahā kape

original: 4.065.021c kṣiptam indreṇa te vajraṃ krodhāviṣṭena dhīmatā
analyzed: kṣiptam indreṇa te vajram krodha āviṣṭena dhīmatā
tatas śaila agra śikhare vāmaḥ hanuḥ abhajyata

original: 4.065.022c tato hi nāmadheyaṃ te hanumān iti kīrtyate
analyzed: tatas hi nāmadheyam te hanumān iti kīrtyate

original: 4.065.023a tatas tvāṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā vāyur gandhavahaḥ svayam
analyzed: tatas tvām nihatam dṛṣṭvā vāyuḥ gandhavahaḥ svayam

original: 4.065.023c trailokye bhṛśasaṃkruddho na vavau vai prabhañjanaḥ
analyzed: trailokye bhṛśa saṃkruddhaḥ na vavau vai prabhañjanaḥ

original: 4.065.024a saṃbhrāntāś ca surāḥ sarve trailokye kṣubhite sati
analyzed: saṃbhrāntāḥ ca surāḥ sarve trailokye kṣubhite sati
prasādayanti saṃkruddham mārutam bhuvaneśvarāḥ

original: 4.065.025a prasādite ca pavane brahmā tubhyaṃ varaṃ dadau
analyzed: prasādite ca pavane brahmā tubhyam varam dadau
aśastra vadhyatām tāta samare satya vikrama

original: 4.065.026a vajrasya ca nipātena virujaṃ tvāṃ samīkṣya ca
analyzed: vajrasya ca nipātena   tvām samīkṣya ca

original: 4.065.026c sahasranetraḥ prītātmā dadau te varam uttamam
analyzed: sahasranetraḥ prīta ātmā dadau te varam uttamam

original: 4.065.027a svacchandataś ca maraṇaṃ te bhūyād iti vai prabho
analyzed: svacchandataḥ ca maraṇam te bhūyāt iti vai prabho

original: 4.065.027c sa tvaṃ kesariṇaḥ putraḥ kṣetrajo bhīmavikramaḥ
analyzed: sa tvam kesariṇaḥ putraḥ kṣetrajaḥ bhīma vikramaḥ
mārutasya aurasaḥ putraḥ tejasā ca api tad samaḥ

original: 4.065.028c tvaṃ hi vāyusuto vatsa plavane cāpi tatsamaḥ
analyzed: tvam hi vāyu sutaḥ vatsa plavane ca api tad samaḥ

original: 4.065.029a vayam adya gataprāṇā bhavān asmāsu sāmpratam
analyzed: vayam adya gata prāṇāḥ bhavān asmāsu sāmpratam
dākṣya vikrama saṃpannaḥ pakṣi rājaḥ iva aparaḥ
tri vikrame mayā tāta sa śaila vana kānanā
tris sapta kṛtvas pṛthivī parikrāntā pradakṣiṇam
tadā ca oṣadhayaḥ smābhiḥ saṃcitāḥ deva śāsanāt

original: 4.065.031c niṣpannam amṛtaṃ yābhis tadāsīn no mahad balam
analyzed: niṣpannam amṛtam yābhiḥ tadā āsīt naḥ mahat balam
saḥ idānīm aham vṛddhaḥ parihīna parākramaḥ
sāmpratam kālam asmākam bhavān sarva guṇa anvitaḥ

original: 4.065.033a tad vijṛmbhasva vikrāntaḥ plavatām uttamo hy asi
analyzed: tat vijṛmbhasva vikrāntaḥ plavatām uttamaḥ hi asi
tvad vīryam draṣṭu kāmā iyam sarvā vānara vāhinī
uttiṣṭha hari śārdūla laṅghayasva mahā arṇavam

original: 4.065.034c parā hi sarvabhūtānāṃ hanuman yā gatis tava
analyzed: parā hi sarva bhūtānām hanuman yā gatiḥ tava

original: 4.065.035a viṣāṇṇā harayaḥ sarve hanuman kim upekṣase
analyzed: viṣāṇṇāḥ harayaḥ sarve hanuman kim upekṣase

original: 4.065.035c vikramasva mahāvego viṣṇus trīn vikramān iva
analyzed: vikramasva mahā vegaḥ viṣṇuḥ trīn vikramān iva
tatas tu vai jāmbavatā abhicoditaḥ
pratītavegaḥ pavanātmajaḥ kapiḥ
praharṣayan tām hari vīra vāhinīm
cakāra rūpam mahat ātmanaḥ tadā
saṃstūyamānaḥ hanumān vyavardhata mahā balaḥ

original: 4.066.001c samāvidhya ca lāṅgūlaṃ harṣāc ca balam eyivān
analyzed: samāvidhya ca lāṅgūlam harṣāt ca balam eyivān
tasya saṃstūyamānasya sarvaiḥ vānara puṃgavaiḥ
tejasā āpūryamāṇasya rūpam āsīt anuttamam
yathā vijṛmbhate siṃhaḥ vivṛddhaḥ giri gahvare
mārutasya aurasaḥ putraḥ tathā saṃprati jṛmbhate
aśobhata mukham tasya jṛmbhamāṇasya dhīmataḥ
ambarīṣa upamam dīptam vidhūmaḥ iva pāvakaḥ
harīṇām utthitaḥ madhyāt saṃprahṛṣṭa tanūruhaḥ

original: 4.066.005c abhivādya harīn vṛddhān hanumān idam abravīt
analyzed: abhivādya harīn vṛddhān hanumān idam abravīt
arujan parvata agrāṇi hutāśana sakhaḥ nilaḥ
balavān aprameyaḥ ca vāyuḥ ākāśa gocaraḥ
tasya aham śīghra vegasya śīghra gasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 4.066.007c mārutasyaurasaḥ putraḥ plavane nāsti me samaḥ
analyzed: mārutasya aurasaḥ putraḥ plavane na asti me samaḥ
utsaheyam hi vistīrṇam ālikhantam iva ambaram
merum girim asaṃgena parigantum sahasraśas
bāhu vega praṇunnena sāgareṇa aham utsahe
samāplāvayitum lokam sa parvata nadī hradam
mama ūru jaṅghā vegena bhaviṣyati samutthitaḥ
saṃmūrchita mahā grāhaḥ samudraḥ varuṇālayaḥ
pannagāśanam ākāśe patantam pakṣi sevitam
vainateyam aham śaktaḥ parigantum sahasraśas
udayāt prasthitam vā api jvalantam raśmimālinam
an astamitam ādityam abhigantum samutsahe

original: 4.066.013a tato bhūmim asaṃspṛśya punar āgantum utsahe
analyzed: tatas bhūmim a saṃspṛśya punar āgantum utsahe
pravegena eva mahatā bhīmena plavaga ṛṣabhāḥ
utsaheyam atikrāntum sarvān ākāśa gocarān
sāgaram kṣobhayiṣyāmi dārayiṣyāmi medinīm
parvatān kampayiṣyāmi plavamānaḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
hariṣye ca ūru vegena plavamānaḥ mahā arṇavam

original: 4.066.016a latānāṃ vīrudhāṃ puṣpaṃ pādapānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: latānām vīrudhām puṣpam pādapānām ca sarvaśas
anuyāsyati mām adya plavamānam vihāyasā

original: 4.066.016e bhaviṣyati hi me panthāḥ svāteḥ panthā ivāmbare
analyzed: bhaviṣyati hi me panthāḥ svāteḥ panthāḥ iva ambare

original: 4.066.017a carantaṃ ghoram ākāśam utpatiṣyantam eva ca
analyzed: carantam ghoram ākāśam utpatiṣyantam eva ca
drakṣyanti nipatantam ca sarva bhūtāni vānarāḥ
mahā meru pratīkāśam mām drakṣyadhvam plavaṃgamāḥ
divam āvṛtya gacchantam grasamānam iva ambaram
vidhamiṣyāmi jīmūtān kampayiṣyāmi parvatān
sāgaram kṣobhayiṣyāmi plavamānaḥ samāhitaḥ

original: 4.066.020a vainateyasya vā śaktir mama vā mārutasya vā
analyzed: vainateyasya vā śaktiḥ mama vā mārutasya vā
ṛte suparṇa rājānam mārutam vā mahā balam

original: 4.066.020e na hi bhūtaṃ prapaśyāmi yo māṃ plutam anuvrajet
analyzed: na hi bhūtam prapaśyāmi yaḥ mām plutam anuvrajet
nimeṣa antara mātreṇa nirālambhanam ambaram
sahasā nipatiṣyāmi ghanāt vidyut iva utthitā

original: 4.066.022a bhaviṣyati hi me rūpaṃ plavamānasya sāgaram
analyzed: bhaviṣyati hi me rūpam plavamānasya sāgaram

original: 4.066.022c viṣṇoḥ prakramamāṇasya tadā trīn vikramān iva
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ prakramamāṇasya tadā trīn vikramān iva

original: 4.066.023a buddhyā cāhaṃ prapaśyāmi manaś ceṣṭā ca me tathā
analyzed: buddhyā ca aham prapaśyāmi manaḥ ceṣṭā ca me tathā
aham drakṣyāmi vaidehīm pramodadhvam plavaṃgamāḥ

original: 4.066.024a mārutasya samo vege garuḍasya samo jave
analyzed: mārutasya samaḥ vege garuḍasya samaḥ jave

original: 4.066.024c ayutaṃ yojanānāṃ tu gamiṣyāmīti me matiḥ
analyzed: ayutam yojanānām tu gamiṣyāmi iti me matiḥ
vāsavasya sa vajrasya brahmaṇaḥ vā svayambhuvaḥ

original: 4.066.025c vikramya sahasā hastād amṛtaṃ tad ihānaye
analyzed: vikramya sahasā hastāt amṛtam tat iha ānaye

original: 4.066.025e laṅkāṃ vāpi samutkṣipya gaccheyam iti me matiḥ
analyzed: laṅkām vā api samutkṣipya gaccheyam iti me matiḥ
tam evam vānara śreṣṭham garjantam amita ojasam
uvāca parisaṃhṛṣṭaḥ jāmbavān hari sattamaḥ
vīra kesariṇaḥ putra vegavat mārutātmaja

original: 4.066.027c jñātīnāṃ vipulaṃ śokas tvayā tāta praṇāśitaḥ
analyzed: jñātīnām vipulam śokaḥ tvayā tāta praṇāśitaḥ
tava kalyāṇa rucayaḥ kapi mukhyāḥ samāgatāḥ
maṅgalam kārya siddhi artham kariṣyanti samāhitāḥ
ṛṣīṇām ca prasādena kapi vṛddha matena ca

original: 4.066.029c gurūṇāṃ ca prasādena plavasva tvaṃ mahārṇavam
analyzed: gurūṇām ca prasādena plavasva tvam mahā arṇavam
sthāsyāmaḥ ca eka pādena yāvat āgamanam tava
tvad gatāni ca sarveṣām jīvitāni vanaukasām

original: 4.066.031a tatas tu hariśārdūlas tān uvāca vanaukasaḥ
analyzed: tatas tu hari śārdūlaḥ tān uvāca vanaukasaḥ

original: 4.066.031c neyaṃ mama mahī vegaṃ plavane dhārayiṣyati
analyzed: na iyam mama mahī vegam plavane dhārayiṣyati
etāni hi nagasya asya śilā saṃkaṭa śālinaḥ

original: 4.066.032c śikharāṇi mahendrasya sthirāṇi ca mahānti ca
analyzed: śikharāṇi mahendrasya sthirāṇi ca mahānti ca

original: 4.066.033a etāni mama niṣpeṣaṃ pādayoḥ patatāṃ varāḥ
analyzed: etāni mama niṣpeṣam pādayoḥ patatām varāḥ
plavataḥ dhārayiṣyanti yojanānām itas śatam

original: 4.066.034a tatas tu mārutaprakhyaḥ sa harir mārutātmajaḥ
analyzed: tatas tu māruta prakhyaḥ sa hariḥ mārutātmajaḥ
āruroha naga śreṣṭham mahendram ari mardanaḥ
vṛtam nānāvidhaiḥ vṛkṣaiḥ mṛga sevita śādvalam
siṃha śārdūla caritam matta mātaṅga sevitam
matta dvija gaṇa udghuṣṭam salila utpīḍa saṃkulam

original: 4.066.037a mahadbhir ucchritaṃ śṛṅgair mahendraṃ sa mahābalaḥ
analyzed: mahadbhiḥ ucchritam śṛṅgaiḥ mahā indram sa mahā balaḥ
vicacāra hari śreṣṭhaḥ mahā indra sama vikramaḥ
pādābhyām pīḍitaḥ tena mahā śailaḥ mahātmanā

original: 4.066.038c rarāsa siṃhābhihato mahān matta iva dvipaḥ
analyzed: rarāsa siṃha abhihataḥ mahān mattaḥ iva dvipaḥ
mumoca salila utpīḍān viprakīrṇa śilā uccayaḥ
vitrasta mṛga mātaṅgaḥ prakampita mahā drumaḥ
nānā gandharva mithunaiḥ pāna saṃsarga karkaśaiḥ
utpatadbhiḥ vihaṃgaiḥ ca vidyādhara gaṇaiḥ api
tyajyamāna mahā sānuḥ saṃnilīna mahā uragaḥ
śaila śṛṅga śilā udghātaḥ tadā abhūt sa mahā giriḥ

original: 4.066.042a niḥśvasadbhis tadā tais tu bhujagair ardhaniḥsṛtaiḥ
analyzed: niḥśvasadbhiḥ tadā taiḥ tu bhujagaiḥ ardha niḥsṛtaiḥ
sa patākaḥ iva ābhāti sa tadā dharaṇīdharaḥ
ṛṣibhiḥ trāsa saṃbhrāntaiḥ tyajyamānaḥ śiloccayaḥ
sīdan mahati kāntāre sārtha hīnaḥ iva adhvagaḥ
sa vegavān vega samāhita ātmā
manaḥ samādhāya mahā anubhāvaḥ
jagāma laṅkām manasā manasvī
